0201212802005933--.name: The empress needs to speak to you about our next steps. Please meet with her in the palace.

0201212802005934--.name: The empress is waiting for you in the palace.

0201212802005935--.name: It's time for us to show the strength of our alliance. We can no longer allow ourselves to simply react against the darkness.

0201212802005936--.name: Now that you're here, we can hold the first meeting of our new alliance. Please come with me to $map:52000087$.

0201212802005937--.name: I'll join you in a moment, so please take this time to introduce yourselves to each other.

0201212802005938--.name: Until we learn more about her, Madria will continue to hound us at every corner. This is a key mission, and I want it in the hands of someone I can trust.

0201224402005933--.name: This is no simple request. $MyPCName$, can I count on you?

0201212802005940--.name: I had a feeling you would say that. $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ can fill you in on the details.

0201212802005941--.name: It seems like we're always sending you to handle impossible tasks on your own. It just goes to show how much we trust you. At least, I hope you see it that way.

0201212802005942--.name: Tell me about this impossible task.

0201212802005943--.name: Karkar Island was a holy place to the lumarigon. I doubt it's coincidence that this dragon-man is looking for them there.

0201212802005944--.name: We've set up a temporary headquarters in $map:02010002$. If you travel to Karkar Island and meet with our man $npcName:11001311[gender:0]$ there, he can give you the details.

0201212802005945--.name: The seas are rough around that area, so we weren't able to get you a ship. Luckily, we found another way to get there. Tell $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ in $map:02000183$ that I sent you.

0201212802005946--.name: I pray that you return with good news.

0201212802005947--.name: Tell $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ in $map:02000183$ that I sent you. He'll get you to Karkar Island.

0201212802005950--.name: Yeah, I took some of your guys over to Karkar a few days ago. Listen up, you goon. The Lumiwind isn't your toy!

0201212802005951--.name: I don't care if you're the empress herself. I sailed the Lumiwind before she was ready thanks to you people, and now she's broken! I'm sunk without my repair guy...

0201212802005953--.name: She's my ship, you lunk! A perfect marriage of sleek design and rugged individuality! A dream made reality! Emma thought I was a dope for wanting to soar the skies. I still remember that night, when we...

0201212802005955--.name: Oh! Right. The Lumiwind is a big flying ship. Unlike boats that are stuck sailing the ocean, we can go anywhere in the world on this beauty.

0201212802005957--.name: Aren't you listening? She broke down after I took your soldiers to Karkar Island. If only $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ was here...

0201212802005959--.name: Argh! Just hearing his name makes me want to scream!

0201212802005960--.name: Argh! Just hearing his name makes me want to scream!

0201212802005961--.name: Sigh... I'm fed up with him, but he's still my friend...

0201212802005962--.name: $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ is my partner in crime. The Lumiwind would still be a pipe dream without his engineering genius. But he ditched me a while ago, accused us of wasting our time. The nerve!

0201212802005963--.name: What made him change his mind?

0201212802005964--.name: Well... A lot of newer tech makes the Lumiwind a tiny bit obsolete. Sure, our ship doesn't have an onboard computer or internal combustion or seat belts, but it's our dream! Doesn't that count for something?

0201212802005965--.name: So, you need $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ to make this thing fly again...

0201212802005966--.name: Well, yeah. He's a genius, but a stubborn genius. If you can convince him to help out, then I'll take you wherever you want to go.

0201212802005968--.name: He didn't go far. I heard he just bought a house in $map:02000182$.

0201212802005969--.name: $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ just bought a house in $map:02000182$. I doubt you'll convince him, but you're welcome to try.

0201212802005971--.name: I need your help fixing the Lumiwind.

0201212802005972--.name: Oh? I shoulda known that fool $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ would break her...

0201212802005973--.name: I poured my best years into that bucket of gears, and he can't even keep it running for a few days... But that doesn't matter to me anymore. Leave me alone.

0201212802005974--.name: You don't care that the Lumiwind may never fly again?

0201212802005975--.name: Sure... I reckon nobody could fix her up like I could. But that changes nothing. I can't help you.

0201212802005977--.name: Sigh... I suppose telling you won't matter one way or the other. I dedicated my life to building the Lumiwind, you know? Long days and late nights... Even weekends...

0201212802005978--.name: After a decade of hard work, we came up with a flying ship that didn't need any of the fancy high-tech gizmos that younger engineers rely on. It was the birth of a whole new kind of ship! But... that's when I realized...

0201212802005979--.name: I wanted to celebrate with my family, but they didn't know who I was no more. I ran so blindly towards my dream, I didn't even realize I'd left them behind. That's why I gave up the Lumiwind.

0201212802005980--.name: I wanted to celebrate with my family, but they didn't know who I was no more. I ran so blindly towards my dream, I didn't even realize I'd left them behind. That's why I gave up the Lumiwind.

0201212802005981--.name: I promised to put this whole inventing business behind me, and my family took me back. I can't bear to lose them again.

0201212802005982--.name: There's nothing you can say to change my mind. Sorry.

0201212802005983--.name: Okay. I'll just get some scientists to help instead.

0201212802005984--.name: S-scientists? No! Who knows what those miscreants would install on my Lumiwind?!

0201212802005985--.name: Some computers. A new engine. Maybe a seat belt or two!

0201212802005986--.name: Are you out of your mind? Only I can complete the Lumiwind! Don't you dare hand it over to those hacks!

0201212802005987--.name: But you already said you can't help me.

0201212802005988--.name: Wait! Not so fast. I'll help if you swear not to let any of their hoity-toity science near my airship! I just... need you to cover for me while I'm gone.

0201212802005990--.name: When we moved here, the realtor said we'd wake up every morning to the sound of the waves. But you know what? This place is teeming with noisy pirates! My wife asked me to kick them out.

0201212802005991--.name: I'll take care of the pirates. You fix the Lumiwind.

0201212802005992--.name: You'd do that for me? All right. I'll have the Lumiwind in flying shape by the time you're done!

0201212802005993--.name: You take care of the pirates, and I'll take care of the Lumiwind.

0201212802005994--.name: Hear that? The sound of the ocean, and not a yo-ho-ho in earshot! You've got a knack for pirate-pummeling.

0201212802005996--.name: Don't you worry about a thing. I'm a mechanical genius, after all. The Lumiwind could still use some finishing touches, but she'll fly, all right.

0201212802005997--.name: Thanks. I know this wasn't easy for you.

0201212802005998--.name: Don't mention it. Really. Especially not to my wife!

0201212802005999--.name: $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ should let you ride the Lumiwind now. You and your alliance buddies are going to Karkar Island, right? Good luck!

0201212802006001--.name: $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ should let you ride the Lumiwind now. You and your alliance buddies are going to Karkar Island, right? Good luck!

0201212802006002--.name: I've got to say, you surprised me. I never thought I'd see that old curmudgeon pick up a wrench again.

0201212802006003--.name: He's trying to find work-life balance.

0201212802006004--.name: Hmph... I guess he didn't have much time for his family in the old days. But he never looked happier than when he was working on the Lumiwind. People are funny, eh?

0201212802006007--.name: Ready to fly to Karkar Island, the land of sand and sun?

0201212802006008--.name: Ready to fly to Karkar Island, the land of sand and sun?

0201212802006009--.name: Welcome to Karkar Island. Pretty different from Victoria Island, right?

0201212802006011--.name: You're with those soldiers, then? I think they're staying in $map:02010002$. You just have to cross the Tiares Desert.

0201212802006012--.name: This place is beautiful, but dangerous! They even say that this weird dragon-man started appearing lately...

0201212802006013--.name: Cross the Tiares Desert to reach $map:02010002$. Your Maple Alliance buddies should be there.

0201212802006014--.name: Cross the Tiares Desert to reach $map:02010002$. Your Maple Alliance buddies should be there.

0201212802006015--.name: Y-you're $MyPCName$! It's an honor to meet you! Me and the others are real... real pleased that you'll be taking charge of the investigation, $male:sir,female:ma'am$.

0201212802006017--.name: Ah... Well, yes. We didn't expect the mission to be quite this... difficult...

0201212802006018--.name: To be honest, most of us thought the rumors of a humanoid dragon monster were made-up nonsense. But there's too much going on here that we just don't understand...

0201212802006019--.name: I can't get into this here. $npcName:11001311[gender:0]$ is inside. He'll fill you in.

0201212802006020--.name: $npcName:11001311[gender:0]$ is inside. He'll fill you in.

0201212802006021--.name: It's about time we got reinforcements!

0201212802006023--.name: Right. That. It started when we were sent to investigate reports of some kind of dragon-man.

0201212802006024--.name: We've run into all kinds of problems since we got here, and we don't have the manpower to do anything about it. So... we've been sitting tight, waiting for you.

0201212802006025--.name: If I can be frank with you, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, we're all terrified ever since we heard about the attack on Tria. If the enemy is brave enough to attack the capital in force, what's to stop them from snuffing our little squad out?

0201212802006026--.name: That's why we have to watch each others' backs.

0201212802006027--.name: We aren't strong like you, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. I don't think you can understand how we feel.

0201212802006028--.name: We want to help you. We really do. But nobody's got the courage left to step forward... I think I can rally the troops, but I need more time.

0201212802006029--.name: I'll handle things for now, but I expect you to pull it together.

0201212802006031--.name: Can you tell me anything useful, at least?

0201212802006032--.name: We've interviewed the locals, but they haven't exactly been helpful. Then we heard that $npcName:11000251$ is here. You know, the boss of Blackstar? He said that he had information for us, but that we didn't have anything worth trading.

0201212802006034--.name: You think you can get him to talk? I don't think he'll be persuaded peacefully... But if you're sure, he's been seen in the $map:52010010$.

0201212802006035--.name: That place is crawling with his thugs. I have a feeling that they'll work with you if you rough them up first, though.

0201212802006036--.name: $npcName:11000251$ was last spotted in the $map:52010010$. That place is crawling with his thugs. I have a feeling that they'll work with you if you rough them up first, though.

0201212802006037--.name: W-wait! You made your point. Let's talk, okay?

0201212802006038--.name: I apologize for my men's... rudeness earlier. So, what do you want, huh?

0201212802006040--.name: Are you nuts? The boss doesn't meet with just anyone. What makes you so special?

0201212802006041--.name: Do you really need another demonstration?

0201212802006042--.name: D-don't be hasty! J-just let me ring him up. Wait one second...

0201212802006043--.name: Well, aren't you lucky? He wants to meet the $male:man,female:woman$ who roughed up his lackeys. Just go through the door behind me.

0201212802006044--.name: Just go through the door behind me. $npcName:11000251$ is waiting.

0201212802006045--.name: I was curious to see the hooligan who roughed up my men. And lo and behold, it's the great $MyPCName$.

0201212802006047--.name: Reckless kids like you aren't very common. I prefer to know them all. Now, what business do you have with me?

0201212802006049--.name: You know, the Maple Alliance came by and said the same question. I didn't think you were a mere lackey, but it seems they have you on their leash.

0201212802006050--.name: Do you know anything or not?

0201212802006051--.name: Sure, I have the answers you're after. But why should I give you such information for free?

0201212802006052--.name: I could use someone of your caliber. Do a little job for me, and you'll get your answers.

0201212802006053--.name: And what might this little job be?

0201212802006054--.name: My organization possesses... possessed two trains known as the Blaknovs. These trains have been stolen by hijackers. I don't take kindly to those who breach the code of honor among thieves.

0205202802005933--.name: Fools like this are beneath my attention, but still... they must be made into examples of what happens when you cross Blackstar.

0201212802006055--.name: You seem perfect for the job. So, what do you say? Want to ditch that stuffy empress and work for me, instead?

0201212802006056--.name: I'll get your train back, but this is a one-time deal.

0201212802006057--.name: Sure, sure. Now hurry along. If you let those trains slip away, then you'll miss out on your precious information.

0206221702005944--.name: I've got another train ready to take you to the Blaknovs at the $map:02010009$. Can't wait to hear about your exploits, kid.

0201212802006058--.name: I've got another train ready to take you to the Blaknovs at the $map:02010009$. My idiot subordinates, $npcName:11003124[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003125[gender:0]$, are trapped on that train. Bring them back... alive.

0201212802006059--.name: Hmph! I didn't expect you'd make it back alive. Seems like I should have given you a harder job.

0201212802006061--.name: And you'll get them! I'm a man of my word, after all.

0201212802006062--.name: The dragon-man you're looking for is seeking the lumarigons. It's probably chasing the same objective you and your Maple Alliance are after.

0201212802006063--.name: O-objective? What objective? We're totally aimless!

0205202802005934--.name: Play dumb all you want. There's nothing Blackstar doesn't know about. Anyway, you'll be happy to know that the creature didn't find any traces of the lumarigons. They're long gone, no matter what either of you think.

0201212802006064--.name: However, there are certain... children that the Dragon Master sacrified himself to protect.

0201212802006066--.name: Hold on. I agreed to answer your questions... about the dragon-man. If you want to ask questions about anything else, well...

0201212802006067--.name: What do you want this time?

0201212802006068--.name: Nothing you wouldn't do anyway. See, Blackstar's poured a lot of money into Karkar Island. Ludari City owes a lot of its prosperity to our generous contributions.

0201212802006069--.name: Anyway, we got an infestation in one of our new establishments here on the island. Can't run a business with bugs crawling all over, can you? If you want any more information, you'll take care of our little bug problem.

0201212802006070--.name: Deal, but then you tell me everything.

0201212802006071--.name: That works for me. The site is $map:02010019$. I'll send $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ word that you're on your way.

0201212802006072--.name: The site is $map:02010019$. I'll send $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ word that you're on your way.

0201212802006073--.name: You're the exterminator? Thank goodness. If we don't get this place up and running again, I'll lose my job!

0201212802006074--.name: I don't know where they came from or why they're here, but a huge swarm of bugs have completely taken over the place. I've been through all the exterminators in town already, but they were no good. At this rate, we'll have to close up shop!

0201212802006075--.name: This sounds like a job for... me.

0201212802006076--.name: Great! Start by thinning out the swarm. Please, I'm begging you!

0201212802006077--.name: Start by thinning out the swarm. Please, I'm begging you!

0201212802006078--.name: That was some of the best exterminating I've ever seen!

0201212802006079--.name: That's a fine start. Now all we have to do is take out their general, and $map:02010019$ will be free!

0201212802006081--.name: Yes, a great, big, hideous, savage, rude beast of a bug! It led the swarm straight into the park and took over the pool.

0201212802006082--.name: Where can I find this bad bug?

0201212802006083--.name: Go up this rainbow hill and you'll see it. Good luck!

0201212802006084--.name: Go up this rainbow hill. The bug king has taken over the park's interior.

0201212802006085--.name: You did it! You really did it! Hooray!

0201212802006086--.name: If the park had shut down, I'd be out of a job. No job, no money. No money, no apartment... You saved my skin. I can't thank you enough, but maybe a nice big paycheck can. It should be waiting for you at headquarters.

0201212802006087--.name: Your paycheck should be waiting for you at headquarters.

0206050102005941--.name: You're handy, you know that? I can see why the empress keeps you around. What's your official title back home? Royal exterminator?

0201212802006090--.name: Temper, temper! Now, what shall I tell you first?

0201212802006091--.name: They say that Biset, the last of the Dragon Masters, died protecting four orphans. This makes them a link to the lumarigons, but there's more.

0205202802005935--.name: One of these children supposedly has the Lumenstone, a jewel passed down from Dragon Master to Dragon Master. If that's true, then I bet your dragon-man is looking for this child.

0205202802005936--.name: Then I need to find them first...

0201212802006093--.name: There are four of them, and they all grew up right here on Karkar Island. But...

0201212802006095--.name: They're sneaky little street rats. Even my organization had trouble tracking them down. Luckily for you, I happen to have two of them already...

0201212802006097--.name: They're my guests! Champions of the arena. One beat some of our best fighters, and the other got first place in our motorcycle derby. $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001297[gender:1]$, Biset's little urchins in the flesh.

0201212802006098--.name: $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ isn't seeing visitors. But, since you've been such a good kid, I'll let you meet $npcName:11001297[gender:1]$. She's putting her legs up in $map:02010064$ over at $map:02010016$.

0205202802005937--.name: I've been more than generous with you. Remember that next time you need to deal with Blackstar!

0201212802006099--.name: $npcName:11001297[gender:1]$'s putting her legs up in $map:02010064$ over at $map:02010016$.

0201212802006100--.name: I'm sick and tired of you guys. Get out of my sight!

0201212802006101--.name: For the last time, I don't know anything about the lumarigons, and nothing you do to me will change that!

0201212802006102--.name: I'm with the Maple Alliance, not Blackstar.

0201212802006103--.name: So what? Maple Alliance, Blackstar, you're all the same. All you care about is hassling me for answers I don't have!

0201212802006104--.name: How can I earn your trust?

0201212802006105--.name: Hmm... If you're really one of the good guys, prove it by doing some hero stuff. One of my friends is in danger. Rescue him for me.

0201212802006107--.name: He's a big, gentle dope named $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$. He may not look it, but he's the champion of Ludari Arena.

0201212802006108--.name: I heard he isn't taking visitors.

0201212802006109--.name: Isn't... or can't? He won one of Blackstar's stupid tournaments, and now they won't let him go.

0201212802006111--.name: They're not exactly letting me look around, now are they? But I heard someone say that he's going to fight a guy named Vasara Chen in the $map:52010004$. I'd start there.

0201212802006112--.name: I heard someone say that he's going to fight a guy named Vasara Chen in the $map:52010004$. I'd start there.

0201212802006113--.name: Is this the end for me...?

0201212802006115--.name: Calm down. I'm on your side.

0201212802006116--.name: You aren't with Blackstar...? No, I guess you aren't wearing one of their tacky suits...

0201212802006118--.name: $npcName:11001297[gender:1]$ got caught too...? What are those Blackstar guys up to...?

0201212802006119--.name: I think they're after the Lumenstone.

0201212802006120--.name: I thought they took me 'cause I wouldn't throw a match... My friends are in danger...!

0201212802006121--.name: Well, Blackstar hasn't found them yet, at least.

0201212802006122--.name: Please make sure they're okay! I'd go with you, but I bet Blackstar's got eyes on us. I better keep them distracted. You go on to $map:02010053$ and find the owner...

0201212802006124--.name: Be careful. $npcName:11001292[gender:0]$ acts cool, but he has a crazy temper... He'll run off and get hurt if you tell him Blackstar has us. Just tell him we're okay.

0201212802006125--.name: Go to $map:02010053$ and find the owner. Make sure my friends are safe...

0201212802006126--.name: If you're hungry, you need to wait your turn.

0201212802006128--.name: Don't be cute with me. The only time $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ "sends his regards" is when he's in trouble. What's going on?

0201212802006130--.name: If that's what he told you to say, then he must be in deep trouble. Cough up the details or I'll fry you in this oil!

0201212802006133--.name: So, you abandoned them to come find me? You're a real stand-up $male:guy,female:gal$, you know that?

0201212802006135--.name: Cram it! Tell me where my friends are. I'm going to destroy those Blackstar chumps.

0201212802006136--.name: Blackstar won't hurt your friends until they get the Lumenstone.

0201212802006137--.name: Oh, so you think Blackstar has my friends up in a four-star hotel? All so they can get their hands on some stone? Some stone that... Huh.

0201212802006139--.name: $npcName:11000735$'s got this rock she takes with her everywhere she goes. It always had a strange shine to it. Could that be what they're after?

0201212802006140--.name: Do you know where she is?

0201212802006141--.name: She tends to wander for days. Her usual spot is a bit far from here... and I need to stay in town until the others are safe.

0201212802006142--.name: You take care of your friends. I'll find Mika.

0201212802006143--.name: I guess I'll have to trust you for now. But if you double-cross me... you know what'll happen.

0206221702005945--.name: Once you leave Ludari City, you'll see some ruins. Mika likes to wander them. She says they energize her... But they're too big to search on your own. Keep going until you hit $map:02010063$ and find a meerkat named $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$.

0205202802005938--.name: The meerkat scouts know every inch of Karkar Island. If anyone can find her, they can. But remember... Anything bad happens to her, and it'll happen to you tenfold!

0201212802006144--.name: Go to $map:02010063$ and find a meerkat named $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$. If anyone can find Mika, the meerkats can. But remember... Anything bad happens to her, and it'll happen to you tenfold!

0201212802006145--.name: What do you want? I'm busy scoutin'!

0201212802006146--.name: Have you seen a girl named Mika?

0201212802006147--.name: Mika? Girl? Carrying something shiny? Yes, yes, saw her days ago. She was mumbling about a snowy kingdom that vanished!

0201212802006148--.name: Uh... Do you know where she went?

0201212802006149--.name: I know, I know. And I'll tell. But first, you'll help me!

0201212802006150--.name: Old kingdom of Merjit used to be here! Humans who worshipped lumarigons. They went bad and now they're gone. But lately, their spirits rise from the graves to haunt their ruins!

0201212802006151--.name: So you want me to bust up some ghosts?

0201212802006152--.name: I don't care who you bust up. I just want to know what happens in the pyramid in $map:02010023$.

0201212802006153--.name: Find out what's going on in the pyramid at $map:02010023$!

0201212802006154--.name: What a creepy pyramid! I have a feeling this is just the beginning. My scouts will take it from here!

0201212802006155--.name: The human girl went into the $map:02010026$. Maybe she was looking for a new base? I don't understand humans.

0201212802006156--.name: The human girl went into the $map:02010026$. Maybe she was looking for a new base? I don't understand humans.

0201212802006157--.name: It was the wrong girl! My mistake. All humans look the same.

0206225602005947--.name: My intel was wrong. That usually doesn't happen! The others will help. You'll see. We'll find her!

0206225602005948--.name: Thanks. In the meantime, have you seen any dragon-human hybrids?

0206225602005949--.name: No, but I've heard of one! Dragon wings and a tail. And a big, big sword!

0206225602005950--.name: Do you know where he went?

0206225602005951--.name: To the Moropapa Tribe. He caused big trouble for them. Big trouble! The Moropapa Tribe knows much, more than anyone. They can tell you. But... they don't like strangers. I have to vouch for you.

0206225602005953--.name: Go to $map:02010023$! Miss $npcName:11001315[gender:1]$'s a friend. And the granddaughter of the Moropapa chief. She'll help!

0206225602005954--.name: Go to $map:02010023$! Miss $npcName:11001315[gender:1]$'s a friend. And the granddaughter of the Moropapa chief. She'll help!

0206225602005955--.name: $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ wrote that you'd be coming. He said I should help you...

0206225602005956--.name: Strangers aren't welcome here. We used to open our doors to outsiders, but ever since the Land of Darkness was sealed years ago, gramps became weary of strangers. It's against the rules for me to help you.

0206225602005957--.name: Can I try talking to the chief?

0206225602005958--.name: Gramps isn't feeling too hot. He already strained himself dealing with another outsider today. Now, if that's all...

0206225602005960--.name: Well... Okay. Look inside the jars around town. I need $itemPlural:30000492$ for gramps's medicine, but bugs got into our stores. They're... gross.

0206225602005961--.name: Leave the gross bugs to me.

0206225602005962--.name: Really? Even after I said I couldn't help you? Thanks!

0206225602005963--.name: Please get the herbs from the jars around town. Gramps needs them badly...

0206225602005964--.name: Thanks! Gramps'll perk up in no time!

0206225602005965--.name: Gramps is coming around. I told you it'd be no time at all!

0206225602005966--.name: I guess you can meet with him, after all. He hates strangers, but you diiiid kinda save his life.

0206225602005968--.name: You're pretty nice for an outsider. Gramps is in the mud hut with the eggs on the roof.

0206225602005969--.name: Gramps is in the mud hut with the eggs on the roof.

0206225602005970--.name: I sense something ominous... If Varrekant isn't stopped...

0206225602005971--.name: The $map:52010006$ that $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ mentioned is in $map:02010030$. Hurry up and rescue that poor girl!

0206225602005972--.name: The $map:52010006$ that $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ mentioned is in $map:02010030$. Hurry up and rescue that poor girl!

0207185002005983--.name: $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ filled us in. We were inspired by your heroics, and decided to get back to work.

0207185002005984--.name: Are you sure you're up to it?

0207185002005985--.name: We're fine! Compared to what you're doing, our work is a walk in the park. Anyway, we managed to get on the hybrid's trail, and we saw him go into the $map:02010029$. Some of us were injured in the process, but we'll be ready to move out soon.

0208013302005991--.name: You take care of your wounded. I'll take it from here.

0208013302005992--.name: Yes, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! We'll regroup so we're ready to support you when you need us. Now, based on the direction he was headed, I think he's going into the $map:02010055$.

0208013302005994--.name: It's some important site for the lost kingdom of Merjit. It was originally a temple for the lumarigons, but the Merjit started using it for dark rituals... I'd be careful there if I were you!

0207185002005986--.name: I'm sure that monster is headed for the $map:02010055$. We'll regroup so we're ready to support you when you need us.

0207185002005987--.name: You're safe! And what happened to Varrekant?

0208013302005996--.name: Hm... I can't see him surviving that. While you were fighting him, we managed to recover the Lumenstone.

0208013302005997--.name: Great. But we didn't learn anything about Madria...

0208013302005998--.name: You're right! Dang... Was this whole trip a waste?

0208013302005999--.name: We did manage to save the world again. That's something.

0208013302006000--.name: Haha... Let's hope the empress sees it that way! I wonder if we could use the Lumenstone as a weapon against the darkness?

0208013302006001--.name: I think we should return the stone to its owner.

0208013302006002--.name: Ah... Good point, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. We aren't thieves, after all.

0208030702006003--.name: I'd better start packing our supplies for the return trip. When you're done here, talk to $npcName:11001310[gender:0]$.

0207185002005988--.name: $npcName:11001363[gender:1]$ had a rough time here. She came by and told us to give you her thanks.

0208030702006004--.name: I should speak with her before leaving for Tria.

0208030702006005--.name: I'd better start packing our supplies for the return trip. When you're done here, talk to $npcName:11001310[gender:0]$.

0207185002005989--.name: I'd better start packing our supplies for the return trip. When you're done here, talk to $npcName:11001310[gender:0]$.

0207185002005990--.name: Oh! We were just talking about you.

0208030702006006--.name: I hope you didn't overhear any of it. Someone doesn't know how to be grateful.

0208030702006007--.name: Shouldn't you be the grateful one? If $MyPCName$ hadn't come along, you'd have "put it all on the line" and "tossed aside your life" to save me. At least, that's what Dunba and Tara told me...

0208030702006008--.name: I-I never—For a friend! I-I'd do that for any of my friends! Th-that's what friendship is all about, r-right?

0208030702006009--.name: Don't mind them. They're always like that. Anyway, thanks. You're the reason we're all together again. For now, at least.

0208030702006010--.name: Maybe Blackstar will leave us alone now that the Lumenstone is lost.

0208030702006011--.name: I loved that necklace... Do you think it's really gone forever?

0208030702006012--.name: Not lost! In fact, I'm here to return it.

0208030702006013--.name: Really? Wow! Thanks, but... I really can't take it back.

0208030702006015--.name: Your friends with the Maple Alliance said you were fighting a powerful enemy. Someone who'd taken the lives of your friends. And that my necklace could help you win...

0208030702006016--.name: I know how it feels to lose someone you love. If my necklace can help you, then you can have it.

0208030702006017--.name: Thank you. I'll bring it back someday.

0208030702006018--.name: Well, duh! It's not like I'm letting you have it to keep!

0207184802005974--.name: We're ready to return to Tria when you are.

0207184802005977--.name: I suddenly have a bad feeling...

0207184802005978--.name: I bet you're just tired from everything that's happened. You'll feel better when we get back to Tria.

0207184802005979--.name: I bet you're just tired from everything that's happened. You'll feel better when we get back to Tria.

0207184802005980--.name: Welcome back, $MyPCName$. I hope you take some time to relax after this report, but first... Did you learn anything from your investigation in Karkar Island?

0207184802005981--.name: We couldn't find anything related to Madria.

0207184802005982--.name: I see... Well, at least you've returned safely. Perhaps one of the other heroes will find something.

0208195002006019--.name: (Tell her about Varrekant, Mika, and the Lumenstone.)

0208195002006020--.name: So it is still possible to cross the dimensions. For a nova to appear now, when the forces of darkness are spreading... It couldn't be mere coincidence, could it?

0208195002006021--.name: I don't know why Biset entrusted Mika with his Lumenstone, but he must have had good reason. He never took any action lightly.

0208195002006022--.name: Can we use the Lumenstone somehow?

0208195002006023--.name: The scholars at Ellinel are doing their own research on the magic used by Madria and her pet. If that monster really is related to the lumarigons, then the Lumenstone could lead us to it.

0208195002006024--.name: I shall have my royal magician study it personally. If there is a connection, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ will find it. Now, you should take some time to recuperate.

0208195002006025--.name: I can't take a break while everyone else is working so hard.

0208195002006026--.name: Tireless, as always. $MyPCName$, you're at the heart of all the work we're doing here. We can't have you collapsing from exhaustion.

0711180702006502--.name: $map:02000100$, $map:02000076$, and $map:02000023$. They were targeted for a reason.

0711180702006503--.name: Even with the situation at the Door of Light, I never thought things would escalate this far. We need to capture the ragged wraith if we're to get to the bottom of this. I never should have let him slip through my fingers...

0711180702006504--.name: Who do you think he is? What is he planning?

0711180702006505--.name: There's no way to know for certain. What we do know is that he's connected to all of the recent attacks.

0711182302006749--.name: $MyPCName$, do you recall the woman who attacked the caravan from $map:02000062$? I suspect she's working with our wraith.

0711180702006506--.name: As if one super powerful bad guy wasn't enough.

0711180702006507--.name: One thing that is certain is that darkness has returned to Maple World. First we lost $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$, then $npcName:29000250[gender:0]$, and now $npcName:11001573[gender:0]$...

0711180702006508--.name: This can't be a coincidence, can it? Are they targeting the Seven Heroes?

0711180702006509--.name: It could be. $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$ was the first of the Seven Heroes, and the first to fall. This could give us some insight into their plans...

0712112202006820--.name: Of the heroes who remain, we know the whereabouts of $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$.

0711180702006510--.name: If they really are after the Seven Heroes, then that's where we should focus our attention.

0711181402006747--.name: But I can't risk spreading my forces out only to have the ragged wraith slip past us. We barely have enough men to handle the crisis here...

0720130902006966--.name: Without the numbers for a thorough sweep, we should instead gather a small, elite team to spearhead the investigation and keep the remaining heroes safe.

0721005702006986--.name: I can handle one of the heroes.

0711180702006512--.name: Are you sure you're up to the task?

0711180702006514--.name: All right, then. I'll leave $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$'s protection in your hands. I will go to $map:02000001$ and see to $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$'s safety personally.

0712133902006821--.name: The warriors of $map:02000051$ are slow to trust those who haven't proven their courage... But I'm sure you'll be fine, since you have my referral.

0711194302006750--.name: This won't be easy, but we're all counting on you.

0711180702006516--.name: If you've got a message for the war chief, tell me and I'll pass it along.

0711180702006517--.name: I need to meet with $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ in person.

0711180702006518--.name: And what makes you think the war chief wants to see you, Greenhorn? You're talking to the toughest warrior in $map:02000051$. Why shouldn't I boot you out right now?

0711180702006520--.name: And what do I care about some soft captain from the capital? He's no better than you! Now, beat it.

0711180702006521--.name: $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$! $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s always been a friend to us. You sure it's a good idea to turn $male:him,female:her$ away?

0711180702006522--.name: Shush! I'm the ranking warrior in $map:02000051$ right now, and I don't give a rat's behind about fancy letters or shiny titles. There's no place for weaklings here!

0711180702006523--.name: I thought I told you to scram.

0711180702006524--.name: How can I prove myself to you?

0711180702006525--.name: You could try taking the warrior's test, but it'd be a waste of time. Never met an outsider who could cut it!

0711180702006527--.name: Fine. Maybe it'll teach you a lesson about knowing your place. The monsters at $map:02000010$ have been giving our hunters some trouble lately. If you're a real warrior, then you can take them, right?

0711204602006751--.name: You can just give up if you're too—

0711180702006529--.name: Ha! I bet you're all talk. This'll be funny to watch, at least.

0711180702006530--.name: What's the matter? Shaking in your boots?

0711180702006532--.name: Hey, sorry you had to waste your time with that stupid test. I guess it's good you made the town safer, at least...

0712222502006822--.name: Not that $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ cares. He just wanted to throw his weight around... Anyway, thanks.

0711180702006534--.name: He went to pick a fight with $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ about getting left behind. He's not a bad guy, really. He just wants to stomp everyone else into the dirt and show off how great he is.

0711214602006753--.name: He's ticked that you saved those villagers without him, so he's taking it out on everyone else. But he's good deep, deep, deep down.

0711214602006754--.name: You said something about getting left behind?

0711180702006536--.name: Yeah, he was mad he didn't get picked for the war party. You said you were here to see $npc:11000134[gender:0]$?

0711214602006755--.name: He's also off with the war party. You see, the town was attacked by this weird guy...

0712222502006824--.name: How weird are we talking here?

0711180702006538--.name: Uh... Well, he floated around like a ghost, and he was dressed in these old black rags. Anyway, a lot of people were hurt 'cause of him.

0712222502006825--.name: The ragged wraith! He must be after $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$.

0711180702006540--.name: Then he's a real idiot. The war chief is one of the Seven Heroes. There's no warrior stronger than him in all of $map:02000051$!

0712222502006826--.name: Funny. Didn't $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ say that he was the strongest?

0712222502006827--.name: Don't listen to anything $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ says. He's a real great guy, but he lies all the time. If he spent as much time training as he spent lying, then I bet he would be the best fighter.

0711180702006541--.name: Anyway, if you're that worried, why don't you talk to $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$? She should be at $map:02000032$, treating all the wounded. I can take you there.

0711180702006545--.name: $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$, that big dummy. I know he's mad about getting left behind, but that doesn't mean he can stomp around like that...

0712234002006830--.name: Oh! I didn't see you there! What do you want?

0712234002006832--.name: I'm sorry, but you just missed her.

0711180702006548--.name: Well, do you know who I can talk to about $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$? If I don't warn him—

0711180702006549--.name: Yeah, the attack! That's why $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ stepped out. She needed to get medicine for all the people who got hurt.

0712234002006833--.name: She went all the way to $map:02000023$ because the medicine she wants doesn't grow in $map:02000051$. But look at all these hurt people. I don't think they can wait that long.

0712234002006834--.name: I'm sure you're doing everything you can to help, but—

0711214602006757--.name: If only there was something more I could do. But all I can do is watch them and try to ease their suffering...

0711214602006758--.name: Okay, I get it! How can I help?

0711180702006551--.name: Gosh, you'd do that for little old me? No, I couldn't ask you that. You're probably tired from your long trip...

0711214602006759--.name: These people are in a lot of pain, but I'm sure some of them will pull through okay. Thank you for offering, though...

0711180702006553--.name: Well! It would be rude of me to say no, wouldn't it? If you insist...

0711180702006555--.name: I do have one teeny, tiny request!

0711180702006556--.name: $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ went off to get medicine, but we'll need some more special ingredients if we want everyone to get better.

0711180702006557--.name: I need $npcName:21000267$ shells. They tend to live in $map:02000010$ and the $map:02000045$, but they're wild beasties...

0711223002006761--.name: You might get hurt or even die, but please get the shells for me!

0711223002006762--.name: You're pretty chipper about all this...

0711180702006560--.name: I need $npcName:21000267$ shells. They tend to live in $map:02000010$ and the $map:02000045$. Good luck!

0711180702006561--.name: Phew! I made up a bed for you, but I'm glad to see you're back with the shells—and not as a patient.

0711180702006563--.name: Once I mash up these shells and feed it to the hurt people, $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ will have to believe me!

0711180702006564--.name: I'll just crush this shell into a paste... and...

0711180702006565--.name: Wait a second. What was that about $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ believing you?

0711180702006566--.name: $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ doesn't think I know anything about medicine. Well, I'll show her!

0713001402006836--.name: I'm not a fighter, but I know how to heal people. With the right ingredients, I can cure anything. So help me prove that I can be a doctor, too!

0713001402006837--.name: This seems like a fantastic idea.

0711180702006568--.name: Anyway, the medicine's ready. Give this to the injured and they'll perk up, just like that!

0711180702006569--.name: Whoa, now. Don't rope me into this!

0711180702006570--.name: Are you saying you don't believe in my ability as a physician?

0711180702006572--.name: That's a relief! Okay, let's do this. Since you went through the trouble of getting the shells for me, you should have the honor of giving the medicine to our patients!

0711180702006573--.name: <font color="#909090">(If the medicine is poison, would that make you responsible in a court of law?)</font>

0711180702006574--.name: It's only fair that you give the patients their medicine. Think of it as my way of thanking you!

0711180702006575--.name: $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ have told me much about your recent exploits. I hope they were exaggerating...

0711180702006576--.name: I'm curious... Why are you so interested in the Seven Heroes?

0713024102006838--.name:
It's a long story...
<font color="#909090">(You tell her about the ragged wraith and the attacks on the other heroes.)</font>

0713024102006839--.name: $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ and I will have a long talk about his priorities... I apologize on his behalf.

0713024102006840--.name: The war chief and his party were headed for $map:02000267$. Please pick up his trail there and bring him back safely.

0713024102006841--.name: I shall leave you to it.

0713110202006842--.name: <font color="#909090">(She's still conscious! The medicine $npcName:11003448[gender:1]$ made should be effective.)</font>

0711180702006581--.name: $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ sent me. I'm looking for the war party.

0711180702006583--.name: The scouting party went ahead... but when the rest of us got here... we were ambushed...

0711180702006584--.name: They caught us completely off guard... and we scattered... Have to find...

0711180702006585--.name: Don't get up! You need to rest.

0711180702006586--.name: N-no... My team is... in danger...

0711180702006587--.name: <font color="#909090">(She's unconscious, but she'll live. Look for the rest of her party.)</font>

0711180702006588--.name: <font color="#909090">(She's unconscious, but she'll live. Look for the rest of her party.)</font>

0711180702006590--.name: <font color="#909090">(She doesn't look good. Maybe there's an herb nearby that you can use to cure her.)</font>

0711180702006591--.name: <font color="#909090">(She doesn't look good. Maybe there's an herb nearby that you can use to cure her.)</font>

0711223002006764--.name: $map:02000048$? Is that where the war party is?

0711180702006594--.name: <font color="#909090">(Her wounds were too deep. There was nothing you could do to help her.)</font>

0711180702006595--.name: <font color="#909090">(You can't let any more of the war party fall. Hurry to the $map:02000048$ before it's too late.)</font>

0711180702006597--.name: I'm looking for the war party from $map:02000051$. Have you seen them?

0711180702006598--.name: Don't you talk to me about the war party! After they came through here, all those nasty creatures showed up. But did the war party do anything to help? No, they did not!

0711180702006599--.name: The war chief's supposed to be a hero. Well, if he were a hero, he'd be smashing the monsters here instead of running off to smash monsters somewhere else!

0711180702006600--.name: Did you see where he went?

0711180702006601--.name: Aren't you listening to me? These monsters smashed my home and left me to die! I've got problems of my own to worry about, $male:buddy,female:lady$!

0711180702006602--.name: <font color="#909090">(She's losing it. Maybe you'll get more out of her if you take care of the monsters.)</font>

0711180702006603--.name: <font color="#909090">(Get rid of the monsters near hear to calm $npcName:11000541[gender:1]$ down.)</font>

0711180702006604--.name: Okay. I feel much better now. I couldn't handle all those Inakimo-wannabes stomping around, kicking me out of my own home...

0711180702006605--.name: <font color="#909090">(Inakimo-wannabes...? No, better to just get the answers you need and move on.)</font>

0711180702006606--.name: You wanted to know about the war party, right?

0711180702006607--.name: I'll tell you where the war party was headed, but I need something from you in return. Don't tell anyone else about how I lost my cool here, okay? I've got a reputation to keep up.

0711180702006608--.name: I promise I won't tell anyone.

0711180702006609--.name: Then we've got a deal. The war party was headed to the nearby mountain, $map:02000046$. I'm certain that's where they were going.

0711180702006611--.name: I'm sure you'll find the war party at $map:02000046$. Just remember your promise, okay?

0711180702006612--.name: <font color="#909090">(The war party's tracks end here. There must be some clue nearby.)</font>

0711180702006613--.name: <font color="#909090">(There's a tiny gap in the center of the altar. Is it a secret entrance? But how do you open it?)</font>

0711180702006614--.name: <font color="#909090">(It looks like the nearby torches were lit recently. You should see what happens if you light them again.)</font>

0711180702006616--.name: <font color="#909090">(As expected, there was a secret entrance here! It's likely that $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ are inside.)</font>

0711180702006617--.name: <font color="#909090">(There's no telling how far down this goes, but this is no time to hesitate. Jump inside!)</font>

0711180702006618--.name: <font color="#909090">(There's no time to lose. You should jump down.)</font>

0711180702006619--.name: I can't believe this has happened to the war chief... $MyPCName$, it is just as you feared...

0711180702006620--.name: Tell me what you witnessed when you found them. Spare no detail.

0711180702006622--.name: Unbelievable. The war chief would never do such a thing. There must be something else to this story...

0713110202006844--.name: Did you notice anything strange about $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$?

0713110202006846--.name: The place stank of dark magic, so there's that. And... Oh, that's right!

0713110202006847--.name: Was it... Inakimo? He kept saying that name. Come to think of it, I also heard the name when I was in $map:52010027$ earlier.

0713110202006848--.name: Impossible! $npc:11003389[gender:1]$, $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ and I will look into this at once.

0713110202006849--.name: Uh... Is Inakimo what I think it is?

0713110202006850--.name: There's no point in speculating. It will just make the people panic.

0713110202006851--.name: For now, we focus on figuring out what happened to the war chief.

0711180702006624--.name: Possibly. He's been taken to $map:02000032$. $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$ is seeing to him while I keep an eye on the war chief.

0711180702006625--.name: $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ has been taken to $map:02000032$. $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$ is seeing to him while I keep an eye on the war chief.

0711180702006626--.name: Sorry, but I don't have time to talk. I need to get out of here.

0711180702006627--.name: $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$! $MyPCName$ is the one who brought you back here in one piece. You should be grateful!

0711180702006628--.name: Oh... It was you. You saved the war chief and me. I'm in your debt.

0713110202006853--.name: It's what I do. I was actually wondering if you saw what happened to $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$.

0711180702006630--.name: Well... I don't really understand it, either.

0711180702006631--.name: Fath—I mean, the war chief and I formed a war party after the town was attacked. We tracked down the attackers, too.

0711223002006766--.name: One was a freak in ragged black robes. The other was a woman... Such beauty...

0711223002006767--.name: <font color="#909090">(You sense a sudden, violently powerful fighting spirit!)</font>

0711180702006633--.name: <font size='40'>I-I mean, such wickedness!</font> Y-yes, so wicked. So very wicked. But the war chief was stunned, like he was seeing a ghost, and took off after them. Alone.

0711232502006768--.name: I could barely keep up, but the rest of the war party was left in our dust. When I finally caught him at $map:02000046$... something was different.

0711180702006635--.name: It's hard to explain. It's like... someone else was controlling him. I'm certain he wasn't acting under his own power.

0711180702006636--.name: But what about the war chief? Is he okay?

0711180702006638--.name: How could this happen to him... No. I have to do something. I have to—Argh!

0711180702006639--.name: Settle down! You're in no condition to be running around yet. What do you think you're going to accomplish in that state?

0711180702006640--.name: Don't you worry about me. I'm good as new! And if you don't believe me, you can—Urgh...

0711180702006641--.name: See! What if you get beat again, and there's no one to help you? W-we care about you here, you know...

0711180702006642--.name: Fine. If you're that worried, I'll stay here until you give me a clean bill of health.

0725203302006988--.name: You have my word. Anyway, $MyPCName$, I owe you. Please tell $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ everything I told you.

0711180702006644--.name: As for the war chief... I leave my father in your hands.

0711180702006645--.name: Don't worry. Just focus on getting better.

0711180702006647--.name: The war chief, my father... I leave him in your hands.

0711180702006650--.name: I have a bad feeling about this...

0711180702006651--.name: I think we'd better speak privately. Please meet me in $map:52010034$. The entrance is in the center of $map:02000051$, not far from $map:02000032$.

0711180702006652--.name: Please meet me in $map:52010034$. The entrance is in the center of $map:02000051$, not far from $map:02000032$.

0711180702006653--.name: I apologize for inconveniencing you, but I couldn't risk our conversation being overheard. What I'm about to tell you could cause a panic if word got out...

0711180702006655--.name: The war chief mentioned the Inakimo at $map:02000046$, right? That is the name of an old tribe of $map:02000051$. But... they no longer exist in this world.

0713124002006855--.name: For as long as it has existed, $map:02000051$ has been a place where all the peoples of the highlands could live in harmony. But the Inakimo wanted more. They wanted to rule.

0713124002006856--.name: They weren't corrupt in the beginning. But when $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$ rose to become their wise woman, she led them down a dark path. Soon they began to ritualistically sacrifice the other tribes to gain more power.

0713124002006857--.name: Things got so bad that the survivors had to join the Murpagoth tribe under the war chief's leadership. With the help of the other Seven Heroes, they started to fight back.

0713124002006858--.name: It took many sacrifices, but we were able to save $map:02000051$. After a crushing defeat, $npcName:11003431$ and the Inakimo tribe fled to the Land of Darkness. We thought they were gone forever when the gates between our worlds were closed...

0713124002006859--.name: If the Inakimo are behind these incidents...

0713110202006854--.name: $npcName:11003393$ and $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ are looking into the matter. We'll know for certain soon enough.

0715185802006926--.name: The woman $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ saw... She may have been $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$.

0711180702006656--.name: The dark magic that infects the war chief is similar to the sorcery used by $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$.

0711180702006657--.name: But how were they able to return to our world?

0711180702006658--.name:
I don't know, but if this is all true... Then we are facing grave danger...
<font color="#909090">(She has a pained, distant look in her eyes.)</font>

0711180702006659--.name: Our first order of business is stabilizing the war chief so he doesn't get any worse. Can I count on your help?

0711180702006661--.name: Thank you! For now, I just need some reagents for his medicine.

0712110202006770--.name: For a base, I need $item:30000864$ taken from the spring at $map:02000095$.

0711180702006662--.name: I know it's not particularly exciting work, but I can't risk letting anyone else know exactly what is wrong with the war chief. If the others find out that the Inakimo were involved, it could cause a mass panic.

0712110202006771--.name: I will begin my preparations at $map:52010032$. Meet me there when you have the ingredients.

0711180702006663--.name: For a base, I need $item:30000864$ taken from the spring at $map:02000095$.

0711180702006664--.name: It can't have been easy to gather all this. But thank you—these ingredients will buy us time while we look for a proper cure.

0711180702006665--.name: There. The war chief will live, at least. But I don't have the knowledge to truly cleanse him of this dark magic.

0713135902006860--.name: There's a witch in the forests to the south, $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$. They say she knows rituals to purify the darkness.

0713135902006861--.name: I hate to rely on an outsider—a witch, no less—but her methods may be our only hope. Please seek $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$ out at the $map:02000103$.

0711180702006666--.name: Please seek $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$ out at the $map:02000103$. If she understands how dire our situation is, she may help us...

0719142402006962--.name: Did... did you just fall asleep?

0719142402006964--.name: Ah, yes. I've been expecting you. You're here about $map:02000051$'s war chief, are you not?

0711180702006669--.name: I am a witch, little one. Our entire beings are awake to the world... when we aren't getting our beauty sleep, of course. Now, how is he?

0711180702006670--.name: Not good. He's been infected by dark magic.

0711180702006671--.name: Yes... I can sense the corruption of $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$ and her Inakimo. $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ must be desperate if she's sent you to me for help.

0713172402006862--.name: I know a ritual that will save his life, of course. But it's not something I can do for you.

0711180702006672--.name: You mean you won't help us?

0711180702006673--.name: Is there too much wax in your ears, $male:boy,female:girl$? I said I can't help, not that I won't!

0711180702006674--.name: The only thing that can cure $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ is the pure, holy light of a divine creature. Unfortunately for you, that isn't exactly the sort of power I dabble in as a witch... But if you had a unicorn, well...

0711180702006675--.name: Where can I find a unicorn?

0711180702006676--.name: Be patient, now. I'll tell you everything you need to know. There's a place called $map:02000053$ not far from here. Look there, and I'm sure some unicorn will trot out to meet you in short order.

0711180702006678--.name: I'm not helping you from the goodness of my heart, $male:boy,female:girl$. Someday I will need a favor in return. I expect you to deliver when that time comes. Now, if our business is complete... Zzz....

0720163902006967--.name: <font color="#909090">(How can she sleep at a time like this? And while standing up...? Anyway, look for a unicorn at $map:02000053$.)</font>

0711180702006679--.name: <font color="#909090">(Go to $map:02000053$ and look for a unicorn.)</font>

0711180702006680--.name: Excuse me, unicorn friend. Do you know—

0711180702006681--.name: My friends. My friends! Help meeeee!

0711180702006683--.name: There's dark magic in the forest. My friends! They were transformed! Why is this happening?!

0711180702006684--.name: <font color="#909090">(As usual, nothing is ever simple.)</font>

0711180702006685--.name: Oh-oh, won't someone save my poor friends?!

0711180702006687--.name: I-I need to bathe them in my great and holy light, but they've turned into vicious, savage, mean monsters! I can't save them alone...

0711180702006688--.name: Does your great and holy light work on non-unicorns?

0711180702006689--.name: Huh? I-I guess. My great and holy light should work on anything from Maple World. Why?

0711180702006690--.name: I need you to save Perion's war chief...

0711180702006691--.name: I can do it, but I need my friends' help! Which means I need help saving them!

0712110202006774--.name: Here, I've given you the blessing of my light. Pour it on my friends for me. Their fate is in your hands!

0711180702006692--.name: Don't worry. I'll purify the heck out of them!

0713172502006862--.name: The fate of my fellow unicorns is in your hands!

0713172502006863--.name: Thank you. Thank you so much! They could have been corrupted forever if you hadn't come along!

0713172502006864--.name: Dark sorcery is spreading quickly. If we miss this chance... there will be no turning back...

0713172502006865--.name: Ahem! I, magical fantastical unicorn of this enchanted realm, hereby grant you an aura of light! That should do the trick. You had better return to $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ right away.

0713172502006867--.name: No, it is I who should thank you! But this isn't the time for that. Hurry back to $map:02000051$!

0713172502006869--.name: You were longer than I'd hoped. Did $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$ agree to help us?

0713172502006871--.name: You went above and beyond my wildest expectations. The blessing of a unicorn... I'm sure this will cure the war chief!

0713172502006874--.name: I don't understand. The ritual worked... The curse was lifted! So why is he still crawling with dark magic?

0713172502006875--.name: Is it possible someone cast a fresh curse on him after we cured him?

0713172502006876--.name: No, no, the target of the curse has to be in close contact with the witch. They couldn't curse him remotely. Unless...!

0713172502006879--.name: I sent $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ to the $map:52010029$. He may be in grave danger!

0713172502006880--.name: The $npcName:11003392$ and its fellow golems didn't come to the town's defense when we were attacked. They are oathbound to protect $map:02000051$, so their absence was... disconcerting. That's why I sent $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ to find out what happened.

0713172502006881--.name: Throughout the generations, our war chiefs have had a mystical bond with the $npcName:11003392$. In times of trouble, they join forces to battle the enemies of $map:02000051$.

0713172502006882--.name: You think that bond is how $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ was cursed again?

0713172502006883--.name: Correct. I suspect the Inakimo have captured the $npcName:11003392$, and are somehow passing the curse to the war chief through their bond. $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$'s life is in danger...

0713172502006884--.name: We don't have time to wait for $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ to return on their own. I'll check it out.

0713172502006885--.name: I'll leave it to you, then. The path to the $map:52010029$ is hidden in $map:02000077$.

0713172502006886--.name: $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ is an upstanding member of the community. If he's in danger, please help him.

0713172502006887--.name: There's a path to $map:52010029$ hidden in $map:02000077$. If $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ is in danger, please help him.

0713172502006888--.name: The $npcName:11003392$ fell into the hands of $npcName:11003431$ and the Inakimo.

0715185802006927--.name: I feared this would happen. Fortunately, I took the precaution of sealing the war chief's mind while you were away. Even if they have the $npcName:11003392$, they won't be able to control him like before.

0715185802006928--.name: Their bond must go both ways, then. $npcName:11003431$ couldn't control the $npcName:11003392$'s mind. Not completely.

0715185802006929--.name: We can't rest on our laurels yet. This countermeasure is only temporary. Were you able to find $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$?

0713172502006890--.name: <font color="#909090">(If you tell $npcName:11000039[gender:0]$ the truth, then $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ really could lose his place in the tribe.)</font>

0713172502006891--.name: $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$... faced the Inakimo by himself. He's getting some rest after the battle.

0713172502006892--.name: I see. $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ is such a nice young man. I'm glad to hear that he's all right.

0715185802006932--.name: <font color="#909090">(Anyway, you were a little hard on him. You should apologize.)</font>

0713172502006893--.name: Uh... I may have offended him. By mistake. I'd like to give him a gift to make up—do you know what sort of things $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ likes?

0713172502006894--.name: You are too kind. There's an incense that I used to burn when I would sing him to sleep as a baby. I've noticed that he still burns it in his home from time to time.

0715185802006933--.name: I happen to have some on me. I'm sure he'll appreciate it if you give him some.

0713172502006895--.name: I happen to have some on me. I'm sure he'll appreciate it if you give him some.

0713172502006897--.name: $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ lives in $map:52010027$. $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ just returned from a mission. I'm sure he'll be happy to show you the way.

0713172502006898--.name: $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ lives in $map:52010027$. $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ just returned from a mission. I'm sure he'll be happy to show you the way.

0725203302006989--.name: Don't spread this around, but the Inakimo are involved, just like we feared. $npcName:11000078$ recognized them from years ago.

0725203302006990--.name: Anyway, $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ said you went to the $map:52010029$ alone. You should have waited for us!

0725203302006991--.name: I couldn't let $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ face them by himself.

0715185802006935--.name: Is that why $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ looks so downcast? Now there's a man who will spit in your eye for helping him out. Still, I guess he's a pretty good guy.

0715185802006937--.name: He was headed home. You aren't worried about him, are you? He's just sulking, as usual.

0715185802006938--.name: <font color="#909090">(You really got to him. You'd better hurry up with your apology.)</font>

0713172502006900--.name: I heard $npc:11003391[gender:0]$'s house is in $map:52010027$. Would you mind showing me the way?

0715185802006939--.name: You're that worried about him? Well, if you insist, sure. I can get you there.

0715185802006940--.name: I just need to make sure there's no beef between us.

0715185802006941--.name: You really don't need to think about his feelings. No one else does. But I see I won't change your mind, so let's just go to $map:52010027$ and get this over with.

0713172502006901--.name: I'll take you to $map:52010027$. Do what you're going to do.

0715185802006944--.name: You just missed him. He left again almost as soon as he got here. I'd have asked where he was headed, but he didn't seem to be in a talking mood.

0713172502006903--.name: Why are you looking for $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$, anyway?

0715185802006945--.name: I have to apologize to him. I brought a gift.

0715185802006946--.name: $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ isn't very good with apologies. Giving or receiving them. But, since you brought a gift, I guess you can just leave it here for him.

0715233502006947--.name: <font color="#909090">(That's not a bad idea. Leave the gift and a note inside his house.)</font>

0713172502006904--.name: <font color="#909090">(That's not a bad idea. Leave the gift and a note inside his house.)</font>

0713172502006905--.name: <font color="#909090">(You did a really good thing here, breaking into his house and leaving a gift in his stuff. He's lucky to know you.)</font>

0713172502006906--.name: <font color="#909090">(You hear a sudden commotion outside.)</font>

0713172502006907--.name: <font color="#909090">(You hear a sudden commotion outside.)</font>

0713172502006911--.name: You're here right on time. The Inakimo are attacking!

0716185402006948--.name: How could they be here already? I just defeated $npcName:11003431$!

0716185402006949--.name: You fought $npcName:11003431$? What in the world is going on?!

0713172502006912--.name: Bah! We can sort out the details later. Right now, I need to get the villagers to safety. $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ are waiting in $map:52010031$. Join them and put an end to these invaders!

0713172502006913--.name: $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ are waiting in $map:52010031$. Join them and put an end to these invaders!

0713172502006914--.name: I had a feeling you'd be showing up soon.

0713172502006915--.name: The Inakimo are using the passages from $map:52010031$ to attack $map:02000051$. The warriors we've managed to assemble can hold them off... barely.

0716185402006950--.name: But if the Inakimo manage to get the $npcName:11003392$ under their control, we'll have no hope of victory. We need you to stop that from happening.

0716185402006952--.name: We just might survive this, after all! $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ and I will lead the warriors of $map:02000051$ in a direct assault against the Inakimo.

0721005102006968--.name: Take the ladder up and find the secret passage. It should take you to $map:02000313$. I'm certain that they're holding the $npcName:11003392$ there.

0716185402006953--.name: We'll keep the Inakimo good and distracted for you. Hurry to $map:02000313$ and rescue the $npcName:11003392$.

0716185402006954--.name: If you rescue the $npcName:11003392$ from their clutches, the Inakimo will have no choice but to fall back. We'll join you as soon as we're through with their main force.

0716185402006955--.name: The fate of $map:02000051$ is in our hands. Good luck!

0713172502006916--.name: Take the ladder up and find the secret passage. It should take you to $map:02000313$. I'm certain that they're holding the $npcName:11003392$ there.

0713172502006917--.name: <font color="#909090">(This must be the passage to $map:02000313$.)</font>

0713172502006918--.name: <font color="#909090">(Take this passage to $map:02000313$. It's up to you to save $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and the $npcName:11003392$!)</font>

0716185402006956--.name: <font color="#909090">(Take this passage to $map:02000313$. It's up to you to save $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003392$!)</font>

0716185402006957--.name: I'm relieved to see you made it through the battle. Thank you...

0716185402006959--.name: I know. The war chief awoke while you were out. When he learned of everything that had happened, he decided to take matters into his own hands.

0716185402006960--.name: He knew what it would cost... But I failed to convince him to stay...

0713172502006919--.name: The war chief... $npcName:11000078$... Even the $npcName:11003392$... Their lives were too heavy a price for this temporary peace. If only I'd done more...

0713172502006920--.name: Don't beat yourself up over this. It was the Inakimo and their dark allies that did this. You did everything you could.

0713172502006921--.name: $MyPCName$ is right. Father and $npcName:11000078$ knew what they were doing. $map:02000051$ is still standing because of them.

0716185402006961--.name: I'm sure... they had no regrets...

0713172502006922--.name: And neither should you. You helped protect $map:02000051$, too.

0713172502006923--.name: You did your best. Save your punishments for the forces of darkness.

0713172502006924--.name: Yes... Thank you. I hope you're right.

0713172502006925--.name: $map:02000051$ must now rise under the leadership of its new war chief, $npc:11000009[gender:0]$. What will you do, $MyPCName$?

0712110302006800--.name: I need to report to $npc:11000076[gender:0]$. We failed here, but my battle isn't over yet.

0712110302006801--.name: The forces of darkness are after the Seven Heroes for a reason. I need to make sure that their sacrifices aren't in vain.

0712110302006802--.name: I believe you just might be able to do it, too. I'm counting on you to protect Maple World, just as you protected $map:02000051$.

0712110302006804--.name: I'm counting on you to protect Maple World, just as you protected $map:02000051$.

0712110302006806--.name: I have more work to do. If I don't stop the spread of darkness, there's only going to be more heartache for everyone.

0712110302006807--.name: We were only able to hold $map:02000051$ with your help. I owe you a great debt... I'm sure father would have said the same.

0712110302006808--.name: I just did what I had to do.

0712110302006809--.name: You did more than that. Everyone here has learned from your courage and sacrifice. I have decided to join you in your fight against the shadows.

0712110302006810--.name: I appreciate it, but don't push yourself. The people of $map:02000051$ need their war chief.

0712110302006811--.name: Ha! I wouldn't be much of a war chief if I let a little skirmish like this take me out of the fight, would I? But you're right—my people need me now. As soon as $map:02000051$ is secure again, I will lend you my sword arm.

0712110302006812--.name: Sure... If $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$ doesn't mind, of course.

0712110302006815--.name: N-nothing! Everything's fine! Just... just doing my new duties as war chief. Haha...

0724215602006987--.name: <font color="#909090">(She heard the whole conversation from that far away...?)</font>

0712110302006816--.name: Don't you worry about it. I'll take good care of you!

0712110302006818--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000009[gender:0]$... He has quite the road ahead of him.)</font>

0831175903000092--.name: Ugh! I never should've brought $npcName:11000367$ to this stupid place!

0831175903000094--.name: I was gonna surprise daddy by showing up at his work, and I brought my kitty, $npcName:11000367$, with me.

0831175903000095--.name: But when I was looking at all the big, pretty boxes, $npcName:11000367$ climbed up the crane behind me!

0831175903000096--.name: Poor, poor $npcName:11000367$. He must be so scared, all alone up there!

0831175903000097--.name: That lever over there calls down a ladder to climb the crane. Please save my kitty!

0831175903000098--.name: Hurry! That lever will put up a ladder so you can climb the crane. Poor $npcName:11000367$ is up there all alone!

0831175903000102--.name: Meow is me! I don't want to hurt her, but... I can't go back to her.

0831175903000103--.name: You see this fine feline beside me? We're getting married!

0831175903000104--.name: We're going to start a new life for ourselves far, far away. $npcName:11000366[gender:1]$ wouldn't understand... Please, just tell her that you couldn't find me.

0831175903000105--.name: Just tell $npcName:11000366[gender:1]$ you couldn't find me. I have a wedding to plan! Mew!

0831175903000107--.name: Sorry, kid. I couldn't find him.

0831175903000108--.name: He's run off with his lady love.

0831175903000109--.name: I never should've brought him here. It's all my fault...

0831175903000110--.name: He's in love? As long as he's happy... I just hope I can see him again someday...

0831175903000332--.name: I don't have time for you, your problems, or this horrible smell.

0831175903000334--.name: No, I suppose you don't. The smell is coming from the sewage plant in lower $map:02000100$!

0831175903000335--.name: A big city like this produces a lot of waste, and that waste pools in the lower districts. And you know what that means. Rivers of sewage!

0831175903000336--.name: I thought I could ignore it, but even city hall is starting to stink...

0831175903000337--.name: You seem like a cheap alternative to hiring a contractor. Why don't you perform your civic duty and set up some water purifiers in lower $map:02000100$? I'd do it myself, but I have donors to meet.

0831175903000338--.name: Did I mention that the sewage is poisonous? I'm sure I did. At any rate, $map:02000100$ is counting on you!

0831175903000339--.name: The mayor thanks you for your service!

0831175903000340--.name: You're so lucky. The mayor must be really impressed!

0831175903000342--.name: To thank you for taking care of the city's little sewage problem, $npc:11000065[gender:0]$ has recommended you for a job at Goldus Group.

0831175903000343--.name: I'm jealous. The benefits at Goldus Group are to die for. Did you know employees get free frozen yogurt? You'd better get to $map:02000189$ and interview right away!

0831175903000344--.name: I'm not exactly the "steady employment" type...

0831175903000345--.name: Maybe not, but would it kill you to at least try it?

0831175903000346--.name: Most people never even get to the interview at Goldus Group. This is the opportunity of a lifetime!

0831175903000347--.name: An interview at Goldus Group... Some things really are wasted on you, $MyPCName$.

0831175903000348--.name: Ah, yes, you're the one the mayor told us about. Welcome!

0831175903000349--.name: You must be here for the interview.

0831175903000351--.name: Everyone has to go through an interview before they work here, of course. But, since you have a friend in city hall, this is all just a formality for you.

0831175903000353--.name: First question. Who is the chairman of Goldus Group and the idol of our fair city's citizens?

0831175903000357--.name: Correct! That wasn't just the first question... it was the only question. You're hired!

0831175903000358--.name: Oh, you have jokes! We like a $male:man,female:woman$ with a sense of humor around here. The correct answer is Chairman Goldus, of course.

0831175903000359--.name: You may have gotten the question wrong, but I'm satisfied. You're hired!

0831175903000362--.name: As our newest employee, the first thing you need to do is introduce yourself to $npc:11000252[gender:0]$!

0831175903000363--.name: The chairman is a traditional man. You should memorize the company song, "Praise Goldus," before you meet him.

0831175903000364--.name: How does that one go again?

0831175903000368--.name: Pinch a penny, make a penny!

0831175903000369--.name: Catchy, isn't it? Do you want to hear it again?

0831175903000371--.name: I think I've got it memorized.

0831175903000372--.name: You've got a good head on your shoulders. Take the elevator and meet with the chairman!

0831175903000374--.name: Remember: "The Goldus way! Put your back into it! Pinch a penny, make a penny!"

0831175903000377--.name: Your reputation proceeds you. The Goldus Group could use a go-getter like you. I'll be watching your progress closely...

0831175903000378--.name: We'll take you far, but you must prove your devotion to us. I assume you've learned the company song?

0831175903000379--.name: If you mean "Praise Goldus," I sure have!

0831175903000385--.name: No, no, no. You've got it all wrong! Start again from the top.

0831175903000396--.name: Pinch a penny, make a penny!

0831175903000397--.name: That will do. What you lack in pitch, you make up for with vigor! You remind me of myself when I was young!

0831175903000410--.name: Keep up the rhythm. One, two! One, two! C'mon you guys. Dance already!

0831175903000412--.name: Who do you think? My baby $npcPlural:21000069$, of course!

0831175903000413--.name: I grew and raised them myself. $npcPlural:21000069$ love to dance...

0831175903000414--.name: But, no matter how hard I try, $npcPlural:21000069$ won't dance at all! Not even a little booty shake!

0831175903000415--.name: Is it my fault? Am I a bad dad? Just looking at them makes me feel like giving up...

0831175903000416--.name: $MyPCName$! You're a big-shot hunter. If you hunt some wild $npcPlural:21000069$, maybe you can learn their secret. Then you can teach me the secret, and I can get my babies to dance!

0831175903000417--.name: There are plenty of $npcPlural:21000069$ dancing around the $map:02000049$. There must be a clue on one of them...

0831175903000418--.name: I've never seen anything like this before. But... Is there music coming from this?

0831175903000419--.name: Just holding this $item:30000029$ makes me want to dance. More than usual, I mean.

0831175903000420--.name: Why don't you give it to your... babies?

0831175903000422--.name: This is what my $npcPlural:21000069$ have been missing this whole time. The $item:30000029$!

0831175903000423--.name: I'm counting on you. Please give this $item:30000029$ to my $npcPlural:21000069$.

0831175903000424--.name: I'll watch. From a safe distance.

0831175903000425--.name: What are you waiting for? Hurry up and make them dance!

0831175903000428--.name: I understand. You got so caught up in the dance that you dropped it. Well, here's a new one!

0831175903000429--.name: It's in your bag. I guess all the dancing distracted you...

0831175903000430--.name: How can you dance with such a full bag? Come back to me after you've emptied it.

0831175903000431--.name: If you're not happy with your life, you should dance. When your body's happy, your mind will be too!

0831175903000432--.name: Even though they're $npcPlural:21000069$, they don't always want to dance. I thought they'd want to party with me...

0831175903000433--.name: Anyway, thanks for all the help. I think I'll spend some time checking out this $item:30000029$...

1205153903002491--.name: It's not too late. We have just enough time to prepare a defense... but...
