1205153903002493--.name: You're right. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ will get reinforcements from the $map:02000146$, but I don't know if we can hold out that long.

1208210003002545--.name: He's working with the $npcName:11001811[gender:0]$... but he's trying to save the world? Nothing makes sense...

1208210003002546--.name: This isn't the time to second guess each other.

1208210003002547--.name: You're right. We can worry about that after we survive this fight. Ready to go?

1205153903002499--.name: Are you all right, Your Majesty?

1205153903002500--.name: Th-this... This is what Cerian meant... Destruction from light...

1205153903002502--.name: He said... that this is how the world would end...

1205153903002503--.name: Your Imperial Highness, you swore never to speak of this in public! We must be... cautious... in these trying times.

1205153903002504--.name: Karl, if this continues, then I might really...

1205153903002506--.name: Please escort her to safety. Immediately!

1205153903002507--.name: Minister, why don't you tell us all about this destructive light?

1205153903002508--.name: After everything they've been through, surely they have a right to know.

1205153903002509--.name: Nobody has a right to know anything. I will say, however, that I've heard some disturbing things about you and our enemies.

1205153903002510--.name: I would much rather know how you knew of this invasion when even my most elite scouts were caught unawares.

1205153903002511--.name: Surely the daughter of the great Winn Stilton isn't colluding with the enemy? He would be turning in his grave.

1205153903002512--.name: Captain, arrest this woman. We cannot allow her to walk free until we're certain of her loyalties.

1205153903002514--.name: Maybe you forgot, but without $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s warning, this city wouldn't be standing!

1205153903002515--.name: Captain, while you're at it, arrest $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$, as well. I'd like to find out exactly what he was up to—and what alliances he formed—while he was busy hiding from the law.

1205153903002516--.name: You just got Dark Wind back on your side. You really want to make an enemy of us so quick?

1205153903002520--.name: Look outside! While you're in here bickering, our guards lie in the street, injured from the battle for their homeland.

1205153903002521--.name: Is this really the time for your petty infighting?

1205153903002522--.name: $npcName:11001966[gender:0]$ is right. Our city needs us.

1205153903002524--.name: Oh jeez... This doesn't look good, does it?

1205153903002528--.name: I'm... I'm fine, you guys. Help the other guards...

1205153903002529--.name: I just need to... be still for a bit...

1205153903002530--.name: $MyPCName$, did we... did we save Tria?

1205153903002531--.name: Yes. Everyone's safe, thanks to you.

1205153903002537--.name: You're the best hero I know.

1205153903002538--.name: Th-thank you... I'll... I hope we meet again...

0202201203003165--.name: I was just looking for you. Please, go inside... and good luck!

0202201203003167--.name: I don't think I ever introduced myself. I'm Sir Rowen of the Secret Knights. I heard you had quite an adventure up north recently.

0202201203003168--.name: Ah, maybe this isn't the best time. Please head into the command center. Everyone is waiting for you.

0202201203003171--.name: The master wizard, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, says that she knows how to track lumarigon magic—and, along with it, Madria's stronghold.

0202201203003173--.name: That's right. The very Lumenstone that you recovered.

0202201203003174--.name: Captain Allon says that you'll play a central role in the next mission, too.

0202201203003175--.name: You'd better not keep the others waiting. Good luck!

0202201203003180--.name: As I'm sure you're all aware, we've been working to gather information on the enemy from many different angles.

0202201203003181--.name: We have worked tirelessly to this end. We've been so busy that we haven't even had time to introduce you all to each other.

0202201203003182--.name: However, for all this, we still haven't had the opportunity to launch a counterattack. We've had some minor skirmishes here and there, but we don't even know where or how the shadows are keeping their forces.

0202201203003183--.name: In other words, we're completely and utterly clueless.

0202201203003184--.name: But I think that's all about to change, thanks to the esteemed wizard, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.

0202201203003185--.name: Ah... So her spell is complete?

0202201203003186--.name: Yes. After grueling hours of studying the Lumenstone we retrieved from Karkar Island, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ has developed a spell to trace lumarigon.

0202201203003187--.name: We've had reason to believe that Madria's dragon is somehow related to the lumarigon. With this spell, we now have the key to tracking her down.

0202201203003188--.name: We need our best if we're going to track Madria's dragon... and her fortress. That means you, $MyPCName$.

0202201203003189--.name: This won't be easy, but you're our best hope. I'm afraid the alliance doesn't have the soldiers to spare to back you up.

0202201203003190--.name: I'll find a way to get this done.

0202201203003191--.name: That's what I like about you. Never even an ounce of hesitation. You'll be accompanied by $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, as she's the only one who knows how to use her spell.

0202201203003192--.name: Speaking of $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, she should be here by now...

0202201203003193--.name: It must have been a long journey, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.

0202201203003194--.name: Yes, very! Teleporting over long distances is exhausting. But it seems like I missed all the important stuff.

0202201203003195--.name: I've only just brought the others up to speed on your brilliant research.

0202201203003196--.name: So you haven't gotten to the important stuff! If you'll just allow me, I'd love to bring everyone up to speed on the unlimited potential of lumarigon-derived mana matrices.

0202201203003198--.name: Imagine if you will a series of parallel mana constructs arrayed into a series of ever-winding strings that cascade into each other resulting in geometrically increasing magical output that is reflected not only in their advanced spellwork but also their culture which may I say far eclipses those of humans by—

0202201203003199--.name: E-enough! I mean... This is all written down in your report, master wizard. I'll see to it that the others are informed of your discoveries so that you don't have to... ahem... waste your valuable time explaining it to us.

0202201203003200--.name: You have my word as a knight.

0202201203003201--.name: That would be efficient, yes. To put it bluntly, my own magic is like that of a child compared to the lumarigon.

0202201203003202--.name: But, if my meager spell is of use to the alliance, then it makes me one very happy dragon fan.

0202201203003205--.name: Let's go over the plan, shall we! $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ and $MyPCName$ will go on a scouting mission to track down Madria's dragon.

0202201203003206--.name: Remember, your focus is on information gathering. If you find Madria's stronghold, fall back until the rest of the alliance can join you.

0202201203003207--.name: Excuse me. I must have misheard. You're sending me on this mission?

0202201203003208--.name: You created the spell, did you not? Besides, according to your report, the magic you're tracing is very faint. I don't think we can risk a lesser mage losing the trail.

0202201203003209--.name: No, no no no. This is certainly the job for one of the alliance's mages, don't you think? I am not trained for battle!

0202201203003210--.name: I won't do it. I simply won't do it!

0202201203003211--.name: This is a difficult situation. This spell is too complex for any of our own mages. Without $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$'s help...

0202201203003212--.name: Empress, there's no other choice. We have to resort to... that strategy.

0202201203003213--.name: I trust your judgment in this, but are you sure we can even obtain it...?

0202201203003214--.name: With the right combination of prayer and divine intervention... perhaps.

0202201203003216--.name: $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, I would like to offer you a gift upon completion of this mission.

0202201203003217--.name: It's a 10th anniversary limited edition from Nerman Toys. Mint condition. "Afrien the Onyx Dragon."

0202201203003220--.name: She wasn't lying. She really is a fan...

0202201203003221--.name: There's no time to waste, $MyPCName$! Maple World is counting on us!

0202201203003222--.name: My spell found a concentration of lumarigon magic at $map:52000088$. Meet me there!

0202201203003223--.name: My spell found a concentration of lumarigon magic at $map:52000088$. Meet me there!

0202201203003224--.name: It's about time you got here. I came as fast as I could. You have no idea how much I need that figur—I mean, world peace!

0202201203003225--.name: Anyway, look over there. See the hot springs that formed in the middle of the ice?

0202201203003226--.name: Most people aren't used to seeing such extremes right next to each other. Dragons, on the other hand, love places like this.

0202201203003227--.name: But that's all basic stuff. Any dragon could have come here. We need to prove that it was the right dragon.

0202201203003228--.name: Look at those rocks. There's lumarigon magic coming from their runes.

0202201203003229--.name: Rune stones are used to cast powerful spells while only using a little bit of spirit. Since they draw mana from the earth, they're great tools for efficient spellcasting.

0202201203003230--.name: This is probably a good lead. I can determine the size of the dragon, along with other details, from the placement of the rune stones alone.

0202201203003231--.name: I'm going to analyze the mana that's lingering over here. Would you mind taking a look at the rune stones for me?

0202201203003233--.name: Go on. How were they arranged?

0202201203003235--.name: I see. Based on what you're telling me, the dragon should be the right size for Madria's pet.

0202201203003236--.name: I sense that a spell of spatial distortion was cast here recently. If I had to guess, some sort of cloaking magic...

0202201203003237--.name: If the dragon had used lumarigon mana to power such a spell, it would have been like sending out a signal flare to magic users like me. It must have used rune magic so that it could have a dip in the hot springs without any interruptions...

0202201203003238--.name: That lucky lizard. I wish I had time to laze around in hot water all day!

0202201203003239--.name: Anyway, our prey was careless to just leave these rune stones here. It probably didn't expect to be hunted by a wizard of my caliber.

0202201203003240--.name: I can use what we found here to focus my tracking spell a little more. Hopefully we can get a more precise location this time...

0202201203003242--.name: Success! The spell is more accurate than before, thanks to my brilliant deductions.

0202201203003243--.name: There's a lava floe deep in Magma Gorge. The lumarigon was there recently.

0202201203003244--.name: That's as far as my spell was able to trace. With any luck, we'll find some more clues that will help me refine the spell even more.

0202201203003246--.name: Um, excuse me? Why do I have to teleport you anywhere?

0202201203003248--.name: Do you have any idea how exhausting teleportation magic is? The drain on my spirit more than doubles with each extra person I take with me!

0202201203003249--.name: If you're ever dating a mage and you want to break up with them, all you have to do is say "Teleport me over to my place." They'll dump you before you can blink!

0202201203003251--.name: Magma Gorge isn't too far. Think of this as a chance to see the sights. I need to save my own energies for tracking magic, after all.

0202201203003252--.name: Magma Gorge isn't too far. Think of this as a chance to see the sights. I need to save my own energies for tracking magic, after all.

0202201203003253--.name: Phew. So glad I didn't walk here. Who knew magma was so hot?

0202201203003254--.name: Anyway, this place is full of interesting clues.

0202201203003255--.name: See the dragon scales scattered all over? They tell an interesting story.

0202201203003256--.name: Dragon skin is like steel. When it's injured, the dragon will go into hot fire or lava to burn its wounds cut. It's like how a blacksmith melts a dull blade in the forge in order to fix it.

0202201203003257--.name: Old scales will fall off the dragon's body in the process. Of course, examining these scales will tell us lots about the dragon.

0202201203003258--.name: I need you to get up close and personal with those scales. Tell me everything you can about them. No detail is unimportant, no matter how small!

0202201203003259--.name: I'd love to take a look at the scales myself, but I'm allergic to scalding hot lava.

0202201203003260--.name: Too hot... Oh, are you done?

0202201203003261--.name: I felt dark magic on the scales.

0202201203003262--.name: Really? Quick, show me your hand.

0202201203003264--.name: Yes, yes. Traces of shadow magic still cling to you. These definitely came from the scales...

0202201203003265--.name: Incredible. Traditionally, dark magic and dragons don't exactly mix.

0202201203003266--.name: There's no doubt about it. The dragon we're tracking is Madria's dragon.

0202201203003267--.name: It's amazing enough that we found a living lumarigon—or something like a lumarigon. But for that same creature to be tainted by dark magic? It's all a little too much.

0202201203003268--.name: Anyway, I need to refocus my spell.

0202201203003269--.name: Give me a minute. With any luck, I'll be able to find out where the dragon was heading...

0202201203003270--.name: Hmm... I think I'm picking up the source of this dark energy.

0202201203003271--.name: A unique signature. Shadow magic mixed with lumarigon mana. It's coming from the Land of Darkness...

0202201203003272--.name: But I can't pinpoint the location from here. We need to go to the $map:02000146$. I should be able to do a more precise scan from there.

0202201203003273--.name: All right, $MyPCName$. I'll see you the—

0202201203003274--.name: You don't expect me to walk again, do you?

0202201203003278--.name: (Turn the puppy dog eyes up to 11.)

0202201203003279--.name: Okay, enough! Hold on tight. And if I collapse from exhaustion, this is your fault, got it?

0202201203003280--.name: Okay, enough! Hold on tight. And if I collapse from exhaustion, this is your fault, got it?

0202201203003281--.name: Ugh... Group teleportation is really hard! You cheated by looking so pitiful and sad!

0202201203003283--.name: Well... I've learned a lot by going out into the field with you. So I guess we can consider ourselves even.

0202201203003284--.name: Anyway, I can sense the lumarigon's magic clearly now, this close to the Land of Darkness.

0202201203003285--.name: I see Obsidian Mount... No, beyond... Is that a forest?

0202201203003286--.name: Tch... What a hassle. It seems Madria's dragon has some business in Blackmist Forest.

0202201203003287--.name: The dark energy of that forest erodes other magical signals. Madria's dragon was probably topping off its own energy reserves...

0202201203003288--.name: Dragons can gather mana from the air just by breathing, you know. It's just one of many quirks of the draconic respiratory system!

0202201203003289--.name: Wait, this isn't the time for dragon facts. The forest and its denizens are gluttons for magic.

0202201203003290--.name: We have to hurry, or there will be no traces of lumarigon magic left for us to analyze!

0202201203003291--.name: I'll go. The Land of Darkness is too dangerous for you.

0202201203003292--.name: Not so fast! I am a master wizard, you know!

0202201203003294--.name: Sure. You try maintaining all these spells for hours at a time and see how bright and chipper you are. Of course I'm tired!

0202201203003295--.name: Fine, you win. I'll rest here for a bit. When you've done in the forest, meet me back here.

0202201203003296--.name: Is there anything I should look for in particular?

0202201203003297--.name: For now? Just get rid of the monsters there. Their dark magic should glop onto you. It'll be simple for me to scoop off some samples when you're done.

0202201203003299--.name: Blackmist Forest is somewhere beyond Obsidian Mount in the Land of Darkness. The path may be hard to find, so keep your eyes open.

0202201203003300--.name: All right. Let's take a look!

0202201203003301--.name: <font color="#909090">(Orde leans in and looks you all over.)</font>

0202201203003302--.name: Hmm... So much dark magic for such a short visit...

0202201203003303--.name: The royal court was right. Maple World can never be safe as long as the gate to the Land of Darkness is open.

0202201203003304--.name: Anyway, I can calibrate my spell a little more based on the samples you brought me. I can't help but feel that our goal is in reach...

0202201203003305--.name: What...? Right under our noses this whole time...?

0202201203003307--.name: Thanks to the latest sample you brought me, I can pinpoint the location of the lumarigon magic perfectly now.

0202201203003308--.name: But I'm not sure if I can explain what I'm seeing. The magic... it's coming from here. Come on, I'll show you.

0202201203003309--.name: I'm going on ahead. I need to check on something first. See you there!

0202201203003310--.name: I'm going on ahead. I need to check on something first. See you there!

0202201203003312--.name: Do you remember the cloaking spell at $map:52000088$? This is the same type of magic, but the scope... it's on a whole different level.

0202201203003313--.name: Look, you're floating! Space is so distorted here that not even the law of gravity is working properly.

0202201203003314--.name: This is really amazing... How hasn't the alliance noticed this place? It's right here!

0202201203003315--.name: We've been swimming in lumarigon magic lately.

0202201203003316--.name: Hmm... That's a good point. That energy could be the key that unlocked this place for us.

0202201203003317--.name: The time for investigation is over. Now we see what's beyond this phase distortion with our own eyes.

0202201203003318--.name: A spell this massive... Even if all the mages in the empire got together, they couldn't dispel it.

0202201203003319--.name: I guess that's obvious. Human magic doesn't hold a candle to dragon magic, after all.

0202201203003320--.name: I'm concerned by the shifts in the distortion that I'm picking up. By this time tomorrow, we may lose our ability to even see this much.

0202201203003321--.name: If we wait for the alliance to send reinforcements, it'll be too late. We have to break through this spell ourselves.

0202201203003322--.name: You said all the mages in the empire couldn't do that.

0202201203003323--.name: I was talking about them, not me! Anyway, we were the ones to find this place, right? I'm sure we can figure it out.

0202201203003324--.name: Instead of punching through the cloak directly, we're going to make the spell break down on its own. Mana overload.

0202201203003325--.name: When the mana flow reaches a pressure too high for the spell matrix to handle, the whole thing will overload. Then, poof, no more spell.

0202201203003326--.name: We just need to keep feeding it more phase magic.

0202201203003327--.name: First, let's seal up the spell's outflows. I can sense a stream of dark energy coming from the gorge to the right.

0202201203003328--.name: Gather materials from that place for the seal. I'll prepare things on my end while you're doing that.

0202201203003329--.name: Go to the gorge to our right. Collect anything that seems like a good source of dark energy.

0202201203003330--.name: This should be more than enough. Great!

0202201203003331--.name: Hm. This energy is in powder form, and the material is too dry. In a ritual chamber, it would be perfect, but it'll blow away out in the open like this.

0202201203003332--.name: I need a secondary source of dark energy that I can use as a mortar.

0202201203003333--.name: I saw some dark essences floating around the nearby fields.

0202201203003334--.name: You and your astute observations! I hadn't noticed that.

0202201203003335--.name: Dark energy that's practically alive... This place is sick with darkness. Fortunately for us, we actually need dark energy at the moment.

0202201203003336--.name: We're almost there. Help me out a little more!

0202201203003337--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ is focused on her ritual. Gather dark essence from the field to the left.)</font>

0202201203003338--.name: Ugh... My eyes are starting to water. They know that what they're seeing isn't real...

0202201203003339--.name: At least our preparations are almost done. Just one step left!

0202201203003340--.name: Shall we put the finishing touches on this magic seal?

0202201203003341--.name: Please rune stones on each of the six seal points while I put the finishing touches on the spell.

0202201203003342--.name: Where can I get rune stones?

0202201203003343--.name: Did you see any stones carved with strange symbols?

0202201203003344--.name: They formed naturally when they were struck by the phase distortion spell.

0202201203003345--.name: Normally it'd take months to make stones like that in a magic lab. We got lucky this time!

0202201203003346--.name: Please rune stones on each of the six seal points while I put the finishing touches on the spell.

0202201203003347--.name: Finally... We're about ready to trigger the overload!

0202201203003350--.name: Of course not! Who knows what's hiding behind this cloak? How could I possibly be ready?

0202201203003351--.name: I'm just going to do it. There's no one else here to do the job, after all.

0202201203003352--.name: Anyway... I hate the idea of tainted lumarigon wandering all over Maple World. They deserve better than that...

0202201203003353--.name: And don't forget the figurine the empress promised you.

0202201203003354--.name: Hey, I'm trying to be a hero over here! Don't I deserve a little more credit than that?

0202201203003355--.name: Though... the limited edition Afrien does sweeten the deal...

0202201203003356--.name: Enough small talk! Shall we see what's really right in front of us?

0202201203003357--.name: Enough small talk! Shall we see what's really right in front of us?

0202201203003358--.name: Uh... I was expecting something huge, but...

0202201203003360--.name: It has to be...! Hidden in a pocket dimension... It's no wonder nobody could find it!

0202201203003361--.name: Hold on! Do you see that?

0202201203003363--.name: With all the damage we've done to the phase distortion, they'll be able to see us, too!

0202201203003364--.name: What do we do? The two of us can't stand against an army!

0202201203003365--.name: We can't let Madria's forces go unopposed.

0202201203003366--.name: Y-you're right... If they were to attack another town or city...

0202201203003367--.name: We can slow them down, at least.

0202201203003368--.name: All right. Okay. Let's get them nice and distracted. Then, when we get a chance, we can call for reinforcements from the alliance!

0202201203003369--.name: All right. Okay. Let's get them nice and distracted. Then, when we get a chance, we can call for reinforcements from the alliance!

0202201203003371--.name: I thought bullies are supposed to back off if you put up a fight...! We're not going to make it back to headquarters at this rate.

0202201203003373--.name: Are you joking?! You can't face that army alone!

0202201203003374--.name: I just have to hold my ground until you get reinforcements.

0202201203003375--.name: Don't be stupid! Even if they leave right away, it'll take half a day for them to get here. Unless...

0202201203003377--.name: You don't expect me to teleport them here, do you?!

0202201203003378--.name: I was kinda hoping you might!

0202201203003379--.name: We really don't have a choice, do we...?

0202201203003380--.name: All right. I'll do my best. Just hang on, $MyPCName$!

0202201203003381--.name: All right. I'll do my best. Just hang on, $MyPCName$!

0202201203003382--.name: I've never seen a mage teleport so many people at once. It seems $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ is more than some eccentric goofball, after all.

0202201203003383--.name: $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ isn't the only impressive one here. Only $MyPCName$ would come up with a plan that involved fighting an entire army singlehandedly.

0202201203003384--.name: We have much to discuss... after the battle is through. Blackeye and his men are still fighting on the other side.

0202201203003385--.name: We'll handle things here. Make sure Dark Wind is holding its own.

0202201203003386--.name: We'll handle things here. Make sure Dark Wind is holding its own.

0202201203003387--.name: There won't be anything for you to do here, after all. Blackeye is showing off.

0202201203003388--.name: Enemy hostiles have been neutralized. Jin, casualty report.

0202201203003390--.name: It was the perfect surprise attack. I've never seen anything like it.

0202201203003391--.name: That $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ came through for us. I'd never thought of using mass teleportation to initiate an ambush. We should employ mages more often in the future.

0202201203003392--.name: That $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ came through for us. I'd never thought of using mass teleportation to initiate an ambush. We should employ mages more often in the future.

0202201203003394--.name: As you can see, we can hold our own. Of course, this victory would have been impossible without you and $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.

0202201203003395--.name: If anyone needs help, it'll be the militia in the gorge. They're cutting off the enemy's retreat.

0202201203003396--.name: I'm glad to see you're still alive, by the way. It's because of you that we were able to round them up.

0202201203003397--.name: Let's hurry and join the others.

0202201203003398--.name: Let's hurry and join the others.

0202201203003401--.name: Don't be crazy! This would have been impossible without you.

0202201203003402--.name: I will say, though... that I think I've earned a nap.

0202201203003403--.name: Well, here we are. Madria's stronghold. I sort of can't believe it.

0202201203003404--.name: It's all thanks to you and $MyPCName$.

0202201203003405--.name: But the fight isn't over yet. Not while Madria's castle still stands.

0202201203003406--.name: This latest battle was only the beginning.

0202201203003407--.name: All right. I need to rally the troops. We have a fight ahead of us.

0202201203003408--.name: $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, can you interpret the runes engraved on the gate? I don't want any surprises.

0202201203003409--.name: $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, can you interpret the runes engraved on the gate? I don't want any surprises.

0202201203003413--.name: She went to such lengths to hide this, and then wrote everything out on the front gate.

0202201203003414--.name: I guess she wanted to throw off. If Madria's attack had been successful, she probably would have brought any prisoners here as slaves, like at Katramus.

0202201203003415--.name: This message was probably meant for them.

0202201203003416--.name: Madrakan... the Fortress of Fury. She obviously named it after herself.

0202201203003417--.name: But that "rakan" part bothers me. I'm sure I've heard a word like that before...

0202201203003418--.name: Dakrakan... I didn't know it at the time, but maybe...

0202201203003419--.name: $npcName:11003135[gender:0]$, forward this information to headquarters. I want to know the significance of that word, "rakan."

0202201203003420--.name: We'd better finish getting the troops ready.

0202201203003421--.name: The alliance will focus on the assault on Madrakan.

0203160203003459--.name: $MyPCName$, your role will be pivotal to our success. I want you to lead our vanguard.

0202201203003422--.name: All right. Maple Alliance, it's time to attack!

0202201203003423--.name: The mission is simple. Attack Madrakan's rampart, central base, and spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.

0202201203003424--.name: The mission is simple. Attack Madrakan's rampart, central base, and spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.

0403144403003714--.name: Well fought. Let's move on to the next stage of the assault.

0202201203003434--.name: There is one person who has been waiting for news of our success more than anyone else.

0202201203003435--.name: $MyPCName$, I think you should be the one to deliver this report. Please let the empress know that we have won!

0202201203003436--.name: I give you the honor of delivering the good news.

0202201203003437--.name: You bring news from the front, I presume?

0202201203003439--.name: Truly...? I hadn't dared hope! Were there any casualties?

0202201203003440--.name: None of our own soldiers were seriously hurt.

0202201203003441--.name: I can't express how relieved I am to hear this news. Both you and $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ deserve the highest honors for your service to the empire!

0202201203003445--.name: That is fine. Without her army, there's little she can do to trouble us.

0202201203003458--.name: You will forever be known as the hero of the alliance.

0321104303003505--.name: Hey, Kate. Are you late, too?

0321104303003506--.name: Me, late? Have you ever, in your life, seen me show up late for class?

0321104303003507--.name: And for your information, you aren't late. Class is over!

0321104303003509--.name: You didn't even realize it, did you? At this point, I wouldn't be surprised if they held you back a year.

0321104303003510--.name: That's... perfect! I didn't feel like sitting through a boring lecture, anyway. Want me to walk you home?

0321104303003511--.name: Ugh! That vacant grin... That blank expression... The infuriatingly good grades... You have no idea how much I detest you!

0321104303003513--.name: Oh, did you finally realize how much trouble you're in? I bet they'll expel you before the month is through!

0321104303003514--.name: You never do your homework. You skip class. You—

0321104303003515--.name: I have to get to a make-up class with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$! So much for playing hooky today. And now I'm bummed out...

0321104303003516--.name: You better run along, Kate. I'll walk you home some other time.

0321104303003517--.name: Are you even listening to me?!

0321104303003518--.name: W-wait! You have a private study session... with Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?!

0321104303003519--.name: Tell me, why did you skip class today?

0321104303003520--.name: I'm sure you have a good excuse.

0321104303003521--.name: O-of course I do. My... alarm clock... has become sentient and is plotting against me.

0321104303003522--.name: I'll get you next time, alarm clock!

0321104303003525--.name: It is not the fact that you lied that bothers me. It is the fact that you used such a transparent lie.

0321104303003526--.name: It seems you still require more discipline...

0321104303003528--.name: I shall be lenient with you today. All you have to do is clean up this classroom...

0321104303003530--.name: P-please, oh wise and generous teacher! Anything but that!

0321104303003531--.name: A wizard, cleaning without magic?! I am a delicate flower! My hands are smooth and soft! Surely such a punishment is more suited to a warrior!

0321104303003532--.name: Oh, the anguish! The humiliation! At this rate, I ought to set down my staff and pick up a greatsword instead!

0321104303003533--.name: Come now, $MyPCName$. I doubt you could lift a greatsword.

0321104303003535--.name: Enough horsing around. The classroom won't clean itself!

0321104303003536--.name: Hmph. It was worth a shot.

0321104303003537--.name: All you need to do is clean up the classroom...

0321104303003540--.name: See? I'm not a total lost cause!

0321104303003541--.name: I have decided on your next punishment.

0321104303003543--.name: You didn't think this was over so quickly, did you? I take your education very seriously.

0321104303003545--.name: Simply fetch that book and place it on a podium.

0321104303003549--.name: Bring the book to a podium, if you will.

0321104303003550--.name: Of course, you have to do it by hand. No magic!

0321104303003551--.name: I hope you've learned to appreciate your magic.

0321104303003552--.name: No, but I've learned how heavy textbooks are!

0321104303003553--.name: A few more days of hard work like that and I'd be strong enough to clobber monsters with my bare hands.

0321104303003554--.name: Since you're still feeling chatty, you must have energy for your study session.

0321104303003555--.name: Let's catch up on what I covered in class today.

0321104303003556--.name: Open your textbook to page 46. We will begin with the section on dealing with cute monsters.

0321104303003557--.name: Ahem. "What should you do when a monster shows up and you just want to pinch its widdle chubby cheeks?"

0321104303003558--.name: "Most students struggle with this concept, but a cute monster is still a monster. No matter how much its widdle chubby cheeks call to you, do not pinch them. Instead, unleash arcane fire and eldritch frost on its adorable little facey-kins!"

0321104303003559--.name: Hmm... This is actually pretty interesting.

0321104303003560--.name: I'll summon some monsters for practice. Dispatch them however you see fit.

0321104303003561--.name: Use whatever spells you think are most appropriate.

0321104303003563--.name: Not bad, $MyPCName$. You may be a terrible student, but you have a knack for spellcraft.

0321104303003564--.name: Let's move on to the next topic. Give me a moment...

0321104303003565--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He turns from you and talks to himself.)</font>
<font size='20'>Once again, I am baffled by $male:his,female:her$ progress...</font>

0321104303003566--.name: <font size='20'>The other students could hardly face two monsters at a time.</font>

0321104303003567--.name: <font size='20'>But $MyPCName$ obliterated a dozen without breaking a sweat. Had I summoned more, I have no doubt $male:he,female:she$ would have dealt with them just as easily.</font>

0321104303003568--.name: <font size='20'>Spell potency, magic precision, mana channeling, spell memorization... $male:He,female:She$ excels in all of these categories.</font>

0321104303003569--.name: <font size='20'>Perhaps it is time to take this lesson off book...</font>

0321104303003570--.name: Let us continue the lesson on hunting monsters. This time, you will face something much stronger.

0321104303003571--.name: Really? It looks like the next chapter is about using magic to copy merets...

0321104303003572--.name: I thought you were enjoying these more hands-on exercises. If you'd rather call it a day...

0321104303003573--.name: Let's not be hasty! All I'm saying is... Shouldn't I be learning theory and stuff?

0321104303003575--.name: Ahem. My apologies. Let us begin the exercise.

0321104303003576--.name: These monsters are more powerful than the last group.

0321104303003577--.name: <font size='20'>Slime this strong would have been difficult even for an adult mage...</font>

0321104303003578--.name: <font size='20'>To defeat it so easily...! $male:His,female:Her$ latent talent is limitless...</font>

0321104303003579--.name: <font size='20'>$MyPCName$ could be a great archmage with the right training. It's good I made those arrangements when I did...</font>

0321104303003580--.name: <font size='20'>My role in this is almost done...</font>

0321104303003581--.name: Haha, wow! Those monsters really were tougher than the last batch.

0321104303003582--.name: What's next? Stronger monsters? Maybe a boss fight against the headmaster?

0321104303003583--.name: Hey, if I beat Headmaster Asimov, does that mean I get an automatic A for the year?

0321104303003584--.name: Focus, $MyPCName$! Your next opponent... will be me.

0321104303003585--.name: Ha... Haha... Enough joking around, Professor! I couldn't really fight you or the headmaster.

0321104303003586--.name: I'm serious. I wish to duel you.

0321104303003588--.name: Listen to me, $MyPCName$. You have a talent for magic unlike any I've ever seen.

0321104303003589--.name: As your teacher, it is my responsibility to push that talent to its limits. Now, let us begin...

0321104303003591--.name: What are you doing here, um... Miss Class President?

0321104303003593--.name: Of course, $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$! Everything we've done here is planned for tomorrow's class, of course.

0321104303003594--.name: $MyPCName$ has a nasty habit of missing class, you see, so I thought we would work ahead.

0321104303003595--.name: Oh man, Kate! You're gonna have so much fun tomorrow!

0321104303003598--.name: Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, does that mean we'll be dueling in tomorrow's class, too?

0321104303003601--.name: Oh, a friendly duel with Kate? This'll be so much fun!

0321104303003603--.name: Absolutely. This is my chance to show you that I'm the better mage!

0321104303003605--.name: After I beat $MyPCName$, I'll be the new teacher's pet!

0321104303003606--.name: <font size='20'>Then the professor and I will have our own study sessions... In private...</font>

0321104303003607--.name: <font size='20'>Einos will proclaim his love for me, and then I'll... But oh, Professor, surely it's too soon for us to get married...!</font>

0321104303003608--.name: Uh, Kate? What are you mumbling about?

0321104303003609--.name: N-none of your business! Get ready!

0321104303003610--.name: This duel isn't ideal, but I suppose there's no way around it.

0321104303003611--.name: What a rush! Woo... Good fight...

0321104303003612--.name: I can't beat Kate, Professor. She actually works hard.

0321104303003613--.name: Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ is an exemplary student, to be sure. But your potential goes beyond that.

0321104303003614--.name: Look at what you've done to the classroom. Where did you even learn such a spell?

0321104303003616--.name: There's something about the way your mind works. Spells come to you effortlessly.

0321104303003617--.name: You have an intuitive grasp of magic that has no need for a spellbook or rote memorization...

0321104303003618--.name: I had a feeling that a duel against another mage would reveal your potential. And I was right.

0321104303003619--.name: You are ready to start on a new path. The path to becoming an archmage.

0321104303003620--.name: People like you learn best through real-world experience, not by being cooped up in a classroom.

0321104303003621--.name: A single duel was able to draw out great magic from within you.

0321104303003622--.name: In that case, imagine if every day were a struggle to survive! You'd attain mastery of your abilities in no time.

0324131203003669--.name: Come with me to my office. We have much to discuss.

0324131203003670--.name: I'm sorry, but there's got to be some mistake here.

0324131203003671--.name: Let's not mince words. $MyPCName$, how would you like to study in Tria as a royal mage?

0324131203003672--.name: No. Nope. Too far away, sorry. I'm out.

0324131203003673--.name: Please hear us out, at least.

0324131203003674--.name: $MyPCName$, I will be leaving Ellinel soon.

0324131203003675--.name: Dark magics have been detected at the Door of Light. I've been called to investigate by the empress herself.

0324131203003677--.name: Yes. I don't know when I'll be able to return to Ellinel.

0324131203003678--.name: But if you become a royal mage, you'll be able to learn and grow into a powerful mage even if I'm not by your side.

0324131203003679--.name: You wouldn't have to worry about missing class anymore, and the headmaster would grant you credit for your time abroad. Enough credit to graduate.

0324131203003680--.name: Of course... I doubt you care about such things.

0324131203003681--.name: I believe it is your destiny to become a great mage. You could become more powerful than I. You could become even more powerful than Headmaster $npcName:11001573[gender:0]$.

0324131203003682--.name: What is this nonsense you're saying?

0324131203003683--.name: Of course $male:he,female:she$ will surpass me. There's no doubt about it!

0324131203003684--.name: I'm determined to do everything I can to help you reach your full potential.

0324131203003685--.name: I don't want the world to lose a great mage simply because I wasn't there to help shape $male:him,female:her$.

0324131203003686--.name: Are you sure you've got the right $male:guy,female:gal$? I'm $MyPCName$. I miss so much class, the freshmen think I'm the janitor.

0324131203003687--.name: You also rank first on every test without even trying, simply by doing what comes naturally.

0324131203003689--.name: I think you guys have lost your minds, but hey, what do I have to lose? This "great mage of destiny" stuff could be fun...

0324131203003690--.name: All right. I'll do it. I'll study abroad in Tria.

0324131203003691--.name: But you've got to promise me something in exchange. Someday, we'll both come back to Ellinel, and then we'll have our duel!

0324131203003692--.name: Of course! I look forward to it.

0324131203003693--.name: Haha! I suppose that would make me the referee.

0324131203003694--.name: Thank you for being so gracious about all of this, $MyPCName$.

0324131203003696--.name: Ah, perhaps I failed to mention...

0324131203003697--.name: I just love my new life as a royal mage. Each day, a new adventure!

0324131203003700--.name: I'm so bored!! I'd almost rather be back at Ellinel than cooped up in this library!

0324131203003701--.name: Ahem. $male:Mister,female:Miss$ $MyPCName$, you seem to be having trouble focusing today. And you still have so many books left to read!

0324131203003703--.name: Well, you have spent quite a bit of time indoors lately. Perhaps a little field trip is in order?

0324131203003704--.name: With the empress's grand court coming up, caravans are coming from throughout the land to bring in all manner of delicacies and goods.

0324131203003705--.name: As a royal mage, you do have a responsibility to the safety of the empire and its people. Perhaps you could lend a hand to one of these caravans.

0324131203003706--.name: Ah, but I've just remembered. You hate field trips, don't you? Yes, that's right. Back to reading, I suppose...

0324131203003707--.name: I believe this field trip will be important to the development of my moral character.

0324131203003708--.name: You've found your motivation, have you? Very well. I shall make the arrangements.

0324131203003709--.name: The next caravan should be leaving from $map:02000062$. Speak with the guard when you get there.

0324131203003710--.name: Have fun. But do remember that this is supposed to be educational, will you?

0324131203003711--.name: The caravan is waiting in $map:02000062$. Talk to the guard there.

0324131203003712--.name: Hey there! You must be Anne's student.

0403144403003715--.name: It is time to strike the heart of Madrakan and attack the phase control network. I want you to lead the charge, $MyPCName$.

0403144403003716--.name: It is time to strike the heart of Madrakan and attack the phase control network. I want you to lead the charge, $MyPCName$.

0403144403003717--.name: Well done! Your tactics are an inspiration.

0403144403003718--.name: It is time for the final assault on Madrakan. We must put an end to Madria's evil.

0403144403003719--.name: This won't be an easy battle. Prepare yourself.

0403144403003720--.name: The mission is simple. Attack Madrakan's rampart, central base, and spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.

0403144403003722--.name: We've defeated Tria's sworn enemy, Madria!

0403144403003723--.name: Look! It's the Maple Alliance's vanguard, $MyPCName$!

0403144403003724--.name: Three cheers for the Maple Alliance! Three cheers for $MyPCName$!

0403144403003725--.name: $male:He,female:She$ looked at me! $MyPCName$ looked at me!!

0403144403003727--.name: Truly, that was an amazing victory. The troops are in high spirits. I can't remember the last time we were able to celebrate...

0403144403003728--.name: Thanks to your efforts, the Madrakan mission has been a complete success.

0403144403003729--.name: It seems you've become a hero that could lead us all. You've earned my respect, $MyPCName$.

0421124303004053--.name: How's it looking, Boss? Are we getting a steady power feed?

0421124303004054--.name: So far, so good. The streetlights, the clock in the town square... Everything is operating properly!

0421124303004055--.name: This is the power of the fusion core! This incredible generator alone is more than enough to power Edelstein.

0421124303004056--.name: With this, we can give the town an endless supply of energy.

0421124303004057--.name: Usually you'd need magic to get that much energy.

0421124303004058--.name: Those days are in the past!

0421124303004059--.name: Aisha, let's head to the lab and do one last check on the fusion core.

0421124303004061--.name: Come on, let's go to the lab!

0421124303004062--.name: We're ready for the final test!

0421124303004063--.name: Good work. $npcName:11003291[gender:1]$, your skills have grown.

0421124303004064--.name: It's 'cause you're a great teacher, Boss!

0421124303004065--.name: I really am, aren't I? $npcName:11003291[gender:1]$, you just might be a genius for recognizing my genius.

0421124303004066--.name: If you think that, then I must be the smartest lady alive!

0421124303004068--.name: I'm ready when you are, Boss!

0421124303004069--.name: Good, good. Let's check the core temperature, then move on to the next phase.

0421124303004071--.name: Wow, Boss! You look so awesome fighting that fire!

0421124303004073--.name: Wow, Boss! You looked so awesome fighting that fire!

0421124303004074--.name: You're not just a crack shot with your Extinguisher cannon—you're amazing with a normal extinguisher, too!

0421124303004075--.name: Sometimes I wish I wasn't so amazing at everything...

0421124303004076--.name: Now, where were we? Oh, right. The core temperature!

0421124303004078--.name: Standing by to check thermometer, Boss!

0421124303004083--.name: Even without the fire, the core is way too hot!

0421124303004084--.name: There's got to be a way... Something to cool down the core...

0421124303004085--.name: Water slime! I need water slime!

0421124303004086--.name: Aisha, open the sewer hatch! We'll harvest the water slimes for their goop, then use it to cool the core!

0421124303004087--.name: I'll get the slime blobs. You get ready to slather the core with them!

0421124303004089--.name: B-Boss! How are the slime blobs coming?

0421124303004090--.name: The core temperature is stabilizing. I can tell just by looking at it. It scares me how good I am at this...

0421124303004091--.name: I've done it again. I'm such a genius.

0421124303004093--.name: $npcName:11003291[gender:1]$, you flatterer. But you're not wrong!

0421124303004095--.name: Give me a minute! I'm analyzing.

0421124303004096--.name: Yep, just as I thought. We blew out every last fuse.

0421124303004097--.name: Then we just have to replace the fuses and reboot the terminal. Right, Boss?

0421124303004098--.name: You've learned well, $npcName:11003291[gender:1]$. I'll leave it to—

0421124303004101--.name: Boss! Show me how it's done!

0421124303004102--.name: I hope you took notes. Next time, you're doing the repairs. You are supposed to be my assistant, after all.

0421124303004103--.name: But Boss, if I learn how to do everything... Won't I have to leave you and start a workshop of my own?

0421124303004104--.name: Aisha, Aisha, Aisha. People meet and part ways all the time. That's just life. No matter how much you adore me, I can't keep you by my side forever.

0421124303004105--.name: You're right, Boss. When you say it that way...

0421124303004107--.name: It wouldn't hurt you to feel a little sad, would it...?

0421124303004111--.name: $npcName:11003183[gender:0]$! You've got a lot of nerve, showing your face here.

0421124303004112--.name: Is that how you're going to greet your best friend? How cold.

0421124303004113--.name: Our friendship ended the moment you tried to make Edelstein the base for your stupid rebellion!

0421124303004114--.name: But it's okay for you to use it as your base? Not cool.

0421124303004115--.name: And our rebellion is not stupid! We're the Resistance, and we're fighting the forces of magic!

0421124303004116--.name: I don't want to hear it. What are you doing here?

0421124303004117--.name: Straight to business, then. Since we're old friends, I'm here to borrow something.

0421124303004119--.name: What do you call it... a fusion core? A promising design, even if it is just a prototype.

0421124303004120--.name: We have a weapon that needs your fusion core to power it. The ultimate weapon to bring Tria to heel...

0421124303004121--.name: Hand over the fusion core, and no blood need be shed in Edelstein. What do you say?

0421124303004124--.name: My invention is not a weapon! It is the technology that will uplift anyone who doesn't have magic!

0421124303004125--.name: You think science is a club you can use to beat down people you don't agree with. Our goals are completely different!

0421124303004128--.name: No need to dirty our own hands, is there? Send in the droids.

0421124303004129--.name: Droids, initialize protocol Savage Beating Alpha.

0421124303004130--.name: Trust me, you don't want to see Savage Beating Beta.

0421124303004133--.name: Since when do you guys have this kind of tech...?

0421124303004135--.name: I already know who they are, Boss. I saw the picture on your workshop table.

0421124303004138--.name: Now they're common villains trying to use my inventions for evil.

0421124303004139--.name: $npcName:11003291[gender:1]$, we have no choice. Prepare the HAPPY protocol.

0421124303004141--.name: We can't let these jokers have my invention, no matter what. Can I count on you?

0421124303004142--.name: I'll do whatever you ask of me. Just say the word!

0421124303004145--.name: HAPPY protocol countdown begins now. Let's get out of here!

0421124303004146--.name: Wait... Why do I feel like I've forgotten something important?

0421124303004147--.name: Whatever it is, it's not as important as your life! Hurry up, Boss!

0421124303004149--.name: $MyPCName$! What is the meaning of this?!

0421124303004150--.name: Ah, Mayor! As you can see, my fusion core encountered a... small bug...

0421124303004151--.name: Nothing to be worried about. Won't happen again. Promise.

0421124303004152--.name: <font size='20'>Pst! Boss! Why didn't you tell him about your friends...?</font>

0421124303004153--.name: <font size='20'>Shh! We need to handle this delicately.</font>

0421124303004154--.name: <font size='20'>To be loyal in a situation like this... Boss, you're so great!</font>

0421124303004155--.name: <font size='20'>Even if you offered a million gold, I'm no snitch!</font>

0421124303004157--.name: You've gone too far this time, $MyPCName$. As the mayor of $map:52000107$, I can't allow it.

0421124303004158--.name: I expect you to pay 1.5 billion for the damages to the town. Then I expect you to leave and never return.

0421124303004160--.name: M-mayor! It's not my fault! See, those Resistance guys, they—

0421124303004162--.name: You've gone too far this time, $MyPCName$. As the mayor of $map:52000107$, I can't allow it.

0421124303004165--.name: Indeed. I will pay the 1.5 billion mesos needed to repair Edelstein.

0421124303004167--.name: I am always serious. Besides, this is surprisingly affordable...

0421124303004168--.name: We did it, Boss! We're gonna be okay! Thank you, Mr. $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$!

0421124303004169--.name: <font color="#909090">(What the heck is going on?)</font>

0421124303004170--.name: <font color="#909090">(Could it be that the famous alchemist, $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$...)</font>

0421124303004171--.name: <font color="#909090">(...is a huge fan of yours?)</font>

0421124303004172--.name: Well, that should conclude this nastiness with Edelstein.

0421124303004173--.name: Let us find somewhere more quiet to talk.

0421124303004174--.name: Let us find somewhere more quiet to talk.

0421124303004175--.name: This spot will do nicely. Now, let's discuss this... situation.

0421124303004176--.name: Yes, this situation! If you're here, then you must have heard tales of my scientific genius. And let me tell you, everything you've heard... is true.

0421124303004177--.name: If it were anyone else, I'd assume they'd want an autograph. But you, $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$... There could be only one reason for you to swoop in and save me like this.

0421124303004178--.name: You want to be my apprentice, right? I already have one, but there's always room for one more, I say!

0421124303004179--.name: ...I have no interest in working with you.

0421124303004181--.name: I've come to collect your little energy reactor.

0421124303004182--.name: I'm not sure how a no-name tinkerer like you managed to cobble such a piece of technology together, but it has potential.

0421124303004183--.name: It's time for you to step aside and let the real engineers finish the job. Taliskar has the funding and the science to see it through.

0421124303004184--.name: All I need from you are the blueprints and your research notes.

0421124303004185--.name: Listen here, you. My 'little energy reactor' has a name—it's called a fusion core.

0421124303004186--.name: I didn't make it by accident or dumb luck. I invented it through endless nights of research, grueling development, and a dedication to the people of Edelstein!

0421124303004187--.name: And you can't put a price tag on that, mister.

0421124303004188--.name: Is that so? In that case, I suppose I shall leave you to your 1.5 billion meso debt.

0421124303004189--.name: H-hey! No need to be so hasty! Hear me out, first.

0421124303004190--.name: You don't need the blueprints. You've got something better...

0421124303004191--.name: You've got me! $MyPCName$, genius inventor... at your service.

0421124303004192--.name: No, I'd rather just have the blueprints.

0421124303004193--.name: Look. I'd love to give them to you. Really, I would. But...

0421124303004194--.name: All of my notes were destroyed in the blast.

0421124303004196--.name: <font color="#909090">(You knew you were forgetting something...)</font>

0421124303004197--.name: How tiresome. It seems you are my only hope to recreate the fusion core.

0421124303004198--.name: Very well. From now on, you're mine.

0421124303004199--.name: Oh! A shiver just ran down my spine. Is this how it feels to be an item...?

0421124303004200--.name: What do you expect? I've already paid my 1.5 billion mesos, and I don't intend to return empty-handed.

0421124303004201--.name: You will recreate your work on the fusion core. In the meantime, I can find some other uses for you...

0421124303004202--.name: Boss... Are we gonna be okay...?

0523103803004628--.name: I'm sure it will all turn out fine. Maybe.

0523103803004629--.name: He's not going to make me do something... weird... right?

0421124303004203--.name: You will recreate your work on the fusion core. In the meantime, I can find some other uses for you...

0421124303004204--.name: <font color="#909090">(And here is Ladin's first task. You are to escort a caravan to Tria in preparation for the empress's open court.)</font>

0421124303004205--.name: <font color="#909090">(How dare he work you like a slave? And what does this have to do with recreating the fusion core?)</font>

0523103903004628--.name: <font color="#909090">(Think about it some other time. It's been a while since you really got to stretch your legs. Think of this as an opportunity to get some fresh air!)</font>

0523103903004630--.name: <font color="#909090">(And thus, your youth is flushed down the drain... All thanks to a measly 1.5 billion meso fine...)</font>

0523103903004633--.name: All right? How could I be all right? My family... friends... the fusion core... all gone, all gone!

0523103903004634--.name: I'm sorry to hear that, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. Now, if you're here to guard the caravan, you'd better get inside.

0523103903004635--.name: Also, Ladin told me to tell you that he's always watching.

0523103903004636--.name: All right, all right! I'm going!

0525183103004904--.name: And apparently, distracted. Did something happen?

0525183103004910--.name: Our target is Dark Wind, Kerning City's spy ring.

0525183103004911--.name: That explains why we're here. They have a hidden base in this club.

0525183103004912--.name: Yes. And because of some intel from Ru—I mean, my informant in Dark Wind.

0525183103004913--.name: It seems they have some kind of special mission in the works. We're going to find out what they're up to.

0525183103004914--.name: These orders came from the $npcName:11001815[gender:0]$ himself.

0525183103004915--.name: That means that the $npcName:11001811[gender:0]$ will be taking a direct and personal interest in our results. Don't fail him!

0525183103004916--.name: This is your operation, $MyPCName$. Give your orders.

0525183103004917--.name: I don't need the squad for this. Let me go in alone.

0525183103004918--.name: Are you trying to show off? Ego has no place in the Rooks.

0525183103004919--.name: It's not ego, sir. I simply want to test myself.

0525183103004920--.name: Fine, do it your way. You've handled plenty of solo missions before.

0525183103004922--.name: <font color="#909090">(That's funny. You don't recall ever doing a solo mission before.)</font>

0525183103004923--.name: <font color="#909090">(Ever since you joined the Rooks, you've always acted as part of a squad...)</font>

0525183103004924--.name: <font color="#909090">(But that's unimportant for now. Focus on the mission.)</font>

0525183103004925--.name: <font color="#909090">(Get the information... and do it without killing anyone.)</font>

0525183103004928--.name: Why are you here? You said I could handle this alone!

0525183103004929--.name: I'm simply here to observe. Now, why have you left these miscreants alive?

0525183103004932--.name: I know who you really work for, Dark Wind punk. Tell us what we want to know and nobody gets hurt.

0525183103004933--.name: You have my word. So don't be stupid.

0525183103004935--.name: Speak up, or you'll regret it!

0525183103004939--.name: Do you see now, $MyPCName$? There's no point in talking to these dogs. If I didn't know better, I'd say you've gone soft...

0525183103004940--.name: Luckily for you, I know this place. If I remember correctly...

0525183103004941--.name: There's a secret basement beyond the door to the left. The information we need is sure to be there.

0525183103004942--.name: I bet Blackeye didn't even bother to change the password...

0525183103004943--.name: This is still your command, so continue as you see fit. But there will be a reckoning when we're done here.

0525183103004944--.name: For your sake, you better prove that taking hostages was the right move.

0525183103004946--.name: Then what are you waiting for? Attack!

0525183103004949--.name: You have your hostages. Now show me what you can do.

0525183103004952--.name: Who are you? How did you find us?!

0525183103004953--.name: Wrong question. Instead, ask yourself how you're going to get out of this alive.

0525183103004954--.name: Answer my questions and no one gets hurt.

0525183103004956--.name: The lives of you and your men will be spared if you cooperate. I swear it.

0525183103004957--.name: Now, it's time to fulfill your end of the bargain.

0525183103004958--.name: We know that Empress Ereve is importing goods to Tria for her open court. You will tell us the caravan route.

0525183103004959--.name: We've got it all written down. Check the stacks of notes over there.

0525183103004961--.name: We've got it all written down. Check the stacks of notes over there.

0525183103004963--.name: Those caravans are carrying all kinds of rare goods for the empress's little party.

0525183103004964--.name: If that's the route they're taking, it will be trivial to secure the wagons before the Black Mage arrives.

0525183103004965--.name: Mission complete. It's time to go.

0525183103004966--.name: There's one last task for you to complete.

0525183103004970--.name: Just whose side are you on?

0525183103004971--.name: Your methods may have worked, but they were foolhardy. We could easily have discovered this information on our own. And just what do you think they would tell their allies if we let them live?

0525183103004972--.name: This is your final chance. Obey me. Eliminate these Dark Wind fools.

0525183103004973--.name: If you refuse to obey my orders, then you will be punished.

0525183103004979--.name: I won't waste my breath explaining myself. You won't remember anyway.

0525183103004985--.name: As stubborn as ever, I see.

0525183103004987--.name: I hate to see your talents go to waste, but your emotions have resurfaced too many times. I'm simply cutting our losses.

0525183103004989--.name: You don't think this is the first time we've had this conversation, do you?

0525183103004990--.name: When a new soldier joins the Rooks, we remove their emotions. For some reason, the process doesn't seem to stick with you.

0525183103004991--.name: Normally we'd have disposed of you the first time it happened. But you have a special gift for killing, so we simply wiped your mind... and tried again.

0525183103004993--.name: It's a shame. You could have gone far. But your reckless behavior has interfered with the Black Mage's plans too many times.

0525183103004994--.name: It is time you were retired... permanently.

0525183103004995--.name: I'm sorry it has to come to this, $MyPCName$.

0525183103004998--.name: I didn't think I'd be swimming through the sewers when I woke up this morning...

0525183103004999--.name: They brainwashed you good, didn't they? I knew you weren't like the other Rooks.

0525183103005000--.name: I can't remember... who I am...

0525183103005001--.name: I was so obsessed with being a good Rook, I never thought about who I was before...

0525183103005004--.name: An assassin who refuses to kill. You really are something else.

0525183103005008--.name: Even if the Rooks wipe your memories, they can't take away who you are deep down inside.

0525183103005009--.name: But what do we do now?

0525183103005010--.name: We need to get away from here. Their agents should be looking for us by now.

0525183103005011--.name: Why don't you join us? Dark Wind can help find out who you really are.

0525183103005012--.name: At the very least, we can try to stop the Rooks from doing this to anyone else.

0525183103005013--.name: That fight took a lot out of me. It'll be a while before I'm back to my full strength...

0525183103005014--.name: But I want to recover my memories with my own two hands.

0525183103005015--.name: Your old boss wasn't kidding. You are stubborn.

0525183103005016--.name: I need to get back to headquarters. What about you? Where will you go?

0525183103005017--.name: I have a place in mind...

0525183103005020--.name: The caravan in Dark Wind's report should be leaving soon.

0525183103005021--.name: And they're hiring guards off the street? Sloppy...

0525183103005022--.name: Was Dark Wind unable to warn them of the security leak?

0525183103005024--.name: What kind of goods are they carrying to Tria? And why do the Rooks care?

0525183103005025--.name: It doesn't matter. If the Rooks are after this caravan, then I need to stop them.

0525183103005026--.name: You've been standing there talking to yourself for some time... I don't suppose you're here to sign on as a caravan guard.

0525183103005028--.name: You feeling okay, $male:mister,female:miss$? You look a bit red.

0525183103005029--.name: <font color="#909090">(You can't remember the last time you spoke with a person who wasn't an assassin or spy.)</font>

0525183103005032--.name: A bit shy, aren't you? No worries. If you happen to be interested in that job I mentioned, step into the building behind me and report to the clerk.

0619165203005064--.name: I lost my 998th fight against the old man...

0619165203005065--.name: And for my punishment, I had to run 998 laps around the island...

0619165203005066--.name: But I'm not giving up just because of that! So don't you dare look down on me, Lilin!

0619165203005067--.name: I don't look down on you, $MyPCName$.

0619165203005068--.name: I just think you're kind of sad.

0619165203005070--.name: You aren't getting any better because you don't pick fights you can win.

0619165203005071--.name: Instead of fighting grandpa over and over, you should go out. See the world. Maybe take some fencing lessons.

0619165203005072--.name: On the other hand... I bet you'd have a lot of trouble making any friends...

0619165203005073--.name: You really do need to learn how to do something other than scream and rage. We need to work on making you a real civilized person!

0619165203005075--.name: That's really too bad. I guess I have no choice...

0619165203005076--.name: ...but to tell grandpa not to give you any more meat for a week.

0619165203005077--.name: You wouldn't dare! What kind of monster holds meat hostage?!

0619165203005078--.name: All you have to do is learn how to calm your inner self.

0619165203005079--.name: And I know just where to start! A little flower arrangement to balance your emotions.

0619165203005080--.name: Pick some Riena Flowers and make me a beautiful bouquet.

0619165203005081--.name: Tch... This is extortion, you know!

0619165203005082--.name: Pick some Riena Flowers and make me a beautiful bouquet.

0619165203005083--.name: Huh... This is actually pretty fun...

0619165203005084--.name: If I just close my eyes and pretend these flowers are the old man... Heheheh...

0619165203005085--.name: Some day, old man... Just like this!

0619165203005089--.name: You crushed the flowers you were holding. Please start over.

0619165203005091--.name: I only had one flower to go!

0619165203005093--.name: I only had one flower to go!

0619165203005094--.name: Are you showing the big bad flowers who's boss?

0619165203005095--.name: Honestly, you'll never be fit to leave the island at this rate...

0619165203005096--.name: I don't care! I don't have to leave the island! I'll just live here forever!!

0619165203005097--.name: The old man was one of the Seven Heroes. If I beat him, that'll make me the strongest warrior in Maple World. Why would I leave when my goal is right in front of me?

0619165203005099--.name: I'm disappointed in you, $MyPCName$. I thought you were more mature than this. However, I see that you're still just a baby, after all.

0619165203005100--.name: Baby? Baby? Could a baby use a huge honkin' sword like this?!

0619165203005102--.name: Hahaha! It seems I need to keep a closer eye on you two.

0619165203005103--.name: Hahaha! It seems I need to keep a closer eye on you two.

0619165203005104--.name: Lilin. $MyPCName$. Let's have a quick talk.

0619165203005105--.name: First, Lilin. Why are you training $MyPCName$?

0619165203005106--.name: Well, there is a god of rage sealed inside of $MyPCName$'s body. I thought it would be a good idea to help $male:him,female:her$ rein it in a little.

0619165203005107--.name: But $male:he,female:she$ doesn't seem to care at all! Sometimes, I think $male:he,female:she$ wants to let the rage take over.

0619165203005108--.name: Hey, I didn't ask to be this way! Why do I have to deal with your nonsense because of something some dusty old ancestors did?!

0620174003005236--.name: I was born this way, okay? I can't help it!

0619165203005109--.name: You don't have to shout! You'll burst your seal.

0619165203005110--.name: That is quite the plan you've come up with, Lilin.

0619165203005111--.name: And $MyPCName$, why do you want to beat me so badly?

0619165203005112--.name: I already said why! I want to be the strongest warrior in the world. I don't care about gods or seals or any of that other junk.

0619165203005113--.name: You're supposed to be the strongest man alive. So if I beat you, then I'll be the strongest.

0619165203005115--.name: Stop looking down your nose at me! We're the same age, so you don't get to be all high and mighty!

0619165203005116--.name: If we're the same age, then why don't you act like it?

0619165203005118--.name: All right, all right. That's enough, you two. I do believe you'll reach your goals much more quickly if you just work together.

0619165203005119--.name: Come with me, both of you. We'll meet at the red greatsword in front of the training yard.

0619165203005120--.name: I have much to tell you.

0619165203005121--.name: Come with me, both of you. We'll meet at the red greatsword in front of the training yard.

0619165203005122--.name: You've probably gotten so used to this greatsword that you don't even notice it anymore. But starting today, that's going to change.

0619165203005123--.name: Lilin, this greatsword is what $MyPCName$ needs if $male:he,female:she$ is going to seal away the god of rage for good.

0619165203005124--.name: This was that god's weapon. If you can control this blade, then you can control the god that wielded it.

0619165203005127--.name: $MyPCName$, that is why you need to trust Lilin. To master the weapon, you must master your own rage.

0619165203005128--.name: If you can't do that, then the day you take up this greatsword... is the day that disaster falls upon us all.

0619165203005129--.name: Just as it did long ago, when the demon god Maha awoke on Rien Island.

0619165203005130--.name: Soooo... if I can master this weapon, I won't just be stronger than you. I'll be stronger than a god?

0619165203005131--.name: That isn't a bad angle. And then I could claim to have trained the world's greatest fighter...

0619165203005132--.name: I hope you two are taking this seriously!

0619165203005133--.name: $MyPCName$, there's no need for you to leave the island. I'll train you personally. But, in exchange, you need to work with Lilin to get your rage under control.

0619165203005134--.name: We've got a deal, old man. Lilin, I look forward to training with you.

0619165203005135--.name: I've never heard you speak so politely before! It's creeping me out.

0619165203005136--.name: See? You're already influencing $male:him,female:her$ for the better.

0619165203005137--.name: Follow me, $MyPCName$. We'll begin your real training right away.

0619165203005138--.name: What are we doing in this old place? I'm sick of fighting bamboo dummies.

0619165203005139--.name: You think there's some secret recipe for real training?

0619165203005140--.name: Training is the constant practice of basic skills every day. That's all there is to it.

0619165203005141--.name: But some variety is good, so I thought you could start practicing against monsters.

0619165203005143--.name: These are the creatures I fought in the war. Some say they were cursed by—

0619165203005144--.name: Spare me the history lessons. Let's do this!

0619165203005145--.name: Ha! I can see Lilin's going to have her hands full with you.

0619165203005146--.name: Very well. I'm going to call the monsters now. Show me what you can do with that oversized blade of yours!

0619165203005147--.name: Very well. I'm going to call the monsters now. Show me what you can do with that oversized blade of yours!

0619165203005148--.name: You did well, for a novice.

0619165203005149--.name: So... this is what fighting monsters feels like...

0619165203005150--.name: It's... fun! I want to fight more!

0619165203005151--.name: More! Give me more monsters to beat up!

0619165203005152--.name: Now you've got a taste for battle. All right. Prepare yourself.

0619165203005153--.name: Show me what you can really do!

0619165203005154--.name: That was pretty tough... But it was fun!

0619165203005155--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He turns away and mutters to himself.)</font>
<font size='20'>A born warrior, in love with the rush of battle.</font>

0619165203005156--.name: <font size='20'>But... if you do not fear death, then you will not cherish life. You will be no better than the god of rage...</font>

0619165203005157--.name: <font size='20'>A fear of death... can be learned.</font>

0619165203005158--.name: What next, old man? I'm not done!

0619165203005160--.name: Wow! This is the first time you were the one to challenge me.

0619165203005161--.name: The battles you've fought until now have been safe, controlled. That isn't the case when you're out in the real world.

0619165203005162--.name: How a warrior fights in the training yard is different from how he fights on the battlefield. I think it's time that you learned this difference.

0619165203005163--.name: Big talk, old man. Now that I'm warmed up, I'll beat you for sure!

0619165203005165--.name: How a warrior fights in the training yard is different from how he fights on the battlefield. I think it's time that you learned this difference.

0619165203005166--.name: Are you okay, $MyPCName$? You look pale.

0619165203005168--.name: He used all his usual moves, but that aura...

0619165203005170--.name: He's been taking it easy on me this whole time...

0619165203005171--.name: Well, that's it for the 999th match. You have a long way to go before you're ready for the 1,000th.

0619165203005172--.name: Remember what you've learned here. Without a reverence for death, you will be sloppy. A sword should not be swung lightly.

0619165203005174--.name: Grandpa, a courier came from the mainland with a letter! It has the Tria royal seal on it.

0619165203005175--.name: I told them I didn't want to hear from them again... All right, let's see it.

0619165203005177--.name: The Door of Light... Could it be...?

0619165203005178--.name: I wonder how grandpa is doing. He hasn't sent us so much as a letter, and it's been days...

0619165203005179--.name: Hmph! I think it's awfully convenient that this happened right after he finally agreed to train me.

0619165203005180--.name: It's not that bad! Think of this as a chance to work on your emotional training.

0619165203005181--.name: I'm worried... Did you see the old man's face? For something to scare him, of all people...

0619165203005183--.name: Well, I'm not going to stop training just because he's not here. I want to get my hands on the red sword as soon as I can!

0619165203005184--.name: Sure, sure. Start by hitting the training dummy 800 times.

0619165203005185--.name: Sorry to break it to you, but fighting dummies doesn't cut it anymore!

0619165203005186--.name: Hold on. Do you feel that?

0619165203005187--.name: This is no time to talk! We have to fight those... things!

0619165203005188--.name: Whew. Those shadow creatures were something else...

0619165203005189--.name: Hey, I looked pretty good just now, didn't I?

0619165203005192--.name: What's up with you? We survived, didn't we?

0619165203005194--.name: It came from one of those... things.

0619165203005195--.name: Take a look at this. It came from one of those... things.

0619165203005197--.name: I know this cloth. It came from the old man's cape. What were those monsters doing with it?

0619165203005200--.name: D-don't be stupid! The old man could eat those chumps for breakfast!

0619165203005201--.name: You're supposed to be the smart one, remember? I kicked those shadows' butts. There's no way they could've handled the old man.

0619165203005202--.name: Ugh! Why are you even letting yourself think such stupid thoughts?

0619165203005204--.name: Thank you. I feel better now.

0619165203005205--.name: Uh... you feeling okay? I don't think I've ever heard you thank me for anything before.

0619165203005206--.name: Grandpa... He's the only family I have left.

0619165203005207--.name: My parents fell protecting Rien from the god of rage, and my brother left to find a way to defeat him...

0619165203005208--.name: Ten took me in and cared for me when I was all alone.

0620174003005237--.name: The idea that I might be alone again...

0619165203005213--.name: We may not be related by blood, but I grew up with you on this stupid hunk of ice.

0619165203005215--.name: Look, I don't really care either way. But if you do think of me as family, I have bad news for you.

0619165203005218--.name: Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm abandoning you or anything.

0619165203005219--.name: I'm going to find the old man. I'm not done with him yet.

0619165203005220--.name: And I might learn a thing or two while I'm at it. You're the one who's always saying I should go out and see the world.

0619165203005221--.name: Remember, I'm the one who's going to beat the old man. So don't worry about us. Just keep Rien safe.

0619165203005222--.name: I'm not sure why, but that's... reassuring.

0619165203005224--.name: You thanked me! Again! Did one of those monsters knock you on the head?

0619165203005225--.name: Just try not to get hurt too badly. I'll be waiting for you and grandpa.

0619165203005226--.name: <font color="#909090">(The locals said the caravan to $map:02000001$ leaves from here. That's where the old man's letter came from, so it's a good place to start looking for him.)</font>

0619165203005227--.name: <font color="#909090">(As much as you hate getting involved in other people's messes, at least if you take the caravan to the capital, you won't have to worry about getting lost.)</font>

0619165203005228--.name: <font color="#909090">(Why is everyone in such a big hurry to get to Tria, anyway?)</font>

0619165203005229--.name: Hello! You look like an adventurer. We happen to be looking to hire caravan guards, if you're interested.

0619165203005230--.name: Adventurer? Do I look like a mere adventurer to you?

0619165203005231--.name: I am the warrior destined to surpass both demons and gods!

0619165203005234--.name: <font color="#909090">(He didn't even bat an eyelash... Who is this man?!)</font>

0619165203005235--.name: <font color="#909090">(You don't have time for this. You'll defeat him... after you return from Tria.)</font>

0605145903006268-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now that things have finally settled down, I think it's about time I paid a visit to a good friend...

0605145903006271-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I like to think that's some comfort to you now. You always seemed to find yourself in the middle of some kind of crisis...

0605145903006272-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Things haven't been the same without you, Joddy.

0605145903006273-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A lot of things have happened since you've been gone. I don't even know where to start...

0605145903006274-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A lot of things have happened since you've been gone. I don't even know where to start...

0605145903006275-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A lot of things have happened since you've been gone. I don't even know where to start...

0605145903006276-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I joined up with the crew of the Sky Fortress. It's this huge airship operated by the Maple Alliance. Together we roam around protecting the world from harm. You'd probably love it.
