0605145903006277-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I also met the old captain of the Royal Guard, that Condor guy. Did you ever work with him? He's kind of a character, but he means well.

0605145903006278-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And then there was this immortal demon named Infernog who wanted to rule the world or something. Things were a little scary for a minute there, but we ended up blasting him into space.

0605145903006279-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's been no shortage of threats to this world since then.

0605145903006280-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It hasn't been easy keeping everyone safe, but I like to think it would at least be a little more fun with you around.

0605145903006281-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I haven't had to do it alone though. A lot of people have stepped up. Brave people like you, unafraid to risk it all for what they believe in...

0605145903006284-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sometimes I can't help but wonder... if I'd only been there, could I have saved you?

0605145903006285-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If I had only made it there a little sooner... If I had been a little stronger...

0605145903006293-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm $npcName:11003897[gender:1]$, former captain of Tria's Royal Knights.

0605145903006294-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It was I who instructed $npcName:11003679[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003861[gender:0]$ as cadets...

0605145903006295-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Unless I'm mistaken, I was also your inspiration for joining the Knights.

0605145903006297-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You really don't remember? I was the one who saved you from hoodlums as a child.

0605145903006298-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh! The knight who came to my rescue... That was you?

0605145903006299-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I suppose I can forgive your confusion... It has been a long time.

0605145903006300-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah! Where are my manners? $MyPCName$ of the Royal Knights, at your service. It's an honor to officially meet you.

0605145903006302-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, it's good to see that you turned out all right. I hear you're quite famous, $MyPCName$. $npcName:11003679[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003861[gender:0]$ regaled me with tales of your heroism.

0605145903006303-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They also said that for all your heroism, your journey had taken a heavy toll on you...

0605145903006305-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It hasn't helped, has it? Sitting here conversing with the dead?

0605145903006306-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm... not sure... I just know that there's so much I want to say...

0605145903006307-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm... not sure... I just know that there's so much I want to say...

0605145903006308-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm... not sure... I just know that there's so much I want to say...

0605145903006309-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Reminiscing won't bring back the dead. Revisit those old fond memories all you like, but when you snap back to reality you'll be alone. Just you and the hole in your heart.

0605145903006311-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your sentimentality is your greatest weakness.

0605145903006312-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As a knight, the best thing you can do for yourself, and the world, is to stop second-guessing the past and focus instead on the people who need you now.

0605145903006315-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A lapenshard. You've probably heard rumors about them by now.

0605145903006316-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That crystal shard is the talk of the town. A remnant of the world stones known as Lapentas, they're said to grant power to those who seek it. But that's just the musings of an active imagination.

0605145903006317-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That crystal shard is the talk of the town. A remnant of the world stones known as Lapentas, they're said to grant power to those who seek it. But that's just the musings of an active imagination.

0605145903006318-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That crystal shard is the talk of the town. A remnant of the world stones known as Lapentas, they're said to grant power to those who seek it. But that's just the musings of an active imagination.

0605145903006319-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What we do know about the lapenshards is that they began showing up throughout the world right after the attack on Tria.

0605145903006320-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe this lapenshard may be the physical manifestation of the resolve of those who gave their everything defending Tria to their final breaths.

0605145903006321-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That may sound superstitious, but willpower is a powerful force. One that turns the tides of battle.

0605145903006322-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Perhaps by holding this shard, you can call upon their courage, even when yours is lacking. A day like today.

0605145903006323-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The forces of darkness grow stronger by the moment, and the specter of war looms ever closer on horizon.

0605145903006324-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: One day soon the enemy will come for us. When they do, will you still be here wallowing in sadness and self-pity, while more of your friends die?

0605145903006325-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now is not the time for mourning. Now is the time to prepare for battle. It is a knight's duty to defend their land until there are no more battles left to fight!

0605145903006326-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I initially came here to offer some words of inspiration and set you back on the right path, but I see now that words won't be enough.

0605145903006327-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I initially came here to offer some words of inspiration and set you back on the right path, but I see now that words won't be enough.

0605145903006328-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I initially came here to offer some words of inspiration and set you back on the right path, but I see now that words won't be enough.

0605145903006329-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's time someone reminded you of your vow to the knights. Very well. I will train you. Follow me!

0605145903006331-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You can sit here crying over the dead forever, or you can let me teach you how to channel that pain and become a better knight. The choice is yours.

0605145903006333-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hah. That's more like it. Let's get started!

0611194403007054-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That was an excellent display of skill and focus. We haven't been at it long, yet you've made impressive progress.

0611194403007055-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That was an excellent display of skill and focus. We haven't been at it long, yet you've made impressive progress.

0611194403007056-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That was an excellent display of skill and focus. We haven't been at it long, yet you've made impressive progress.

0611194203007053-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I think you're ready to resume your duties. This job will never be without loss and sacrifice, but remember, dwelling in the past is a choice. Keep your eyes focused on the road ahead, and never take for granted the good that you've done.

0605145903006337-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have to say, I'm impressed you managed to keep up with all of my lessons, despite the difficulty. Good work.

0605145903006338-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have to say, I'm impressed you managed to keep up with all of my lessons, despite the difficulty. Good work.

0605145903006339-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have to say, I'm impressed you managed to keep up with all of my lessons, despite the difficulty. Good work.

0605145903006340-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thanks. But I've still got a ways to go if I'm going to live up to the determination of the heroes before me.

0605145903006341-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Err, I meant considering how physically demanding your training was...

0605145903006342-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Considering I added around a hundred pounds of weights to your training equipment.

0605145903006344-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's insane! How is anyone supposed to train under those conditions?

0605145903006345-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Umm... Was that too much? That might explain why $npcName:11003679[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003861[gender:0]$ asked for a different instructor...

0605145903006346-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No wonder it felt so heavy! Do you have any idea how hard I worked, the whole time thinking I was weak?

0605145903006347-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough! Your temper is unbecoming of a knight.

0605145903006348-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Think on this: you completed your training, did you not? Whatever the difficulty, you made it through, and you'll be a better knight because of it.

0605145903006349-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I guess you're right. By the end of our training the weights actually felt pretty light.

0605145903006350-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Fascinating. It seems the stories about the lapenshards are more than rumor.

0605145903006351-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your determination to grow stronger caused the lapenshard to resonate, awakening a greater power within you.

0605145903006352-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If that's the case, then... the lapenshards are more than just a symbol.

0605145903006353-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If that's the case, then... the lapenshards are more than just a symbol.

0605145903006354-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If that's the case, then... the lapenshards are more than just a symbol.

0605145903006355-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That must be why the Frontier Foundation was created.

0605145903006357-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: An relatively new organization that serves the royal family. Their goal is to control the supply of lapenshards.

0605145903006358-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The stories surrounding the lapenshards has power-hungry individuals throughout the world frantically snapping up the crystal shards. The Frontier Foundation must have been created in the hopes of keeping them from falling into the wrong hands.

0605145903006359-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I thought that it was nonsense, and a serious misappropriation of resources... But in light of your progress, I now see the danger posed by the lapenshards.

0605145903006360-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Undoubtedly, in the hands of someone like yourself, a lapenshard could be a wondrous thing. But...

0605145903006361-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The forces of darkness are probably after them too.

0605145903006362-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's right. So if the Frontier Foundation is working to keep them in check, that's a very noble cause. Hmm...

0605145903006363-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I believe that aiding the Frontier Foundation will be an excellent test of your newfound strength.

0605145903006364-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not to mention a way to honor the bravery of the knights who have fallen in battle. We can't allow the lapenshards to fall into enemy hands.

0605145903006367-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No, I have things I need to take care of. Although your lesson has made me late.

0605145903006368-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Leaving so soon? We've only just reunited after all these years... Well, I'm glad I finally got to meet you. I'll never forget what you've done for me.

0605145903006369-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't be so sappy. Our business is concluded. You don't owe me anything.

0605145903006370-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Still, I suppose you turned out better than my other more pretentious students.

0605145903006371-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If fate wills it, we'll meet again. Until then, take care of yourself.

0605145903006372-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right then! Until we meet again!

0605145903006373-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: By the goddess, I've never seen such an injury... What kind of foe did they encounter?

0605145903006374-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not sure. All I heard is that they encountered some manner of wraith...

0605145903006379-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you for coming... I trust you read my message?

0605145903006380-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes! Several times. An incurable wound inflicted by an unidentified wraith...

0605145903006381-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But there is one thing I don't understand. If their wounds are beyond even your own healing abilities...

0605145903006382-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How could I possibly be of aid?

0605145903006383-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't say that, $MyPCName$. Your light shines brighter than anyone I have yet encountered.

0605145903006384-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And more importantly, we detected traces of magic very similar to your own in the soldiers wounds.

0605145903006386-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We're not saying we believe you're responsible, or that your power is tainted with darkness.

0605145903006387-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We're not saying we believe you're responsible, or that your power is tainted with darkness.

0605145903006388-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We're not saying we believe you're responsible, or that your power is tainted with darkness.

0605145903006389-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But rather, your light and this darkness are two sides of the same coin—in direct opposition. If anyone can save these poor souls, I believe it's you.

0605145903006391-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Please do your utmost to heal these men. I believe you can do it.

0605145903006392-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We can't let these young guardsmen go so soon to their graves. Not like that poor child.

0605145903006394-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I understand what's at stake. I'll do my best.

0605145903006397-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Their fate is in your hands, $MyPCName$.

0605145903006398-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Goddess of light, grant me the power to heal their affliction.

0605145903006399-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(A wave of warm, healing light flows through your body.)</font>

0605145903006405-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can feel the lifeforce flowing into them, but...

0605145903006406-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But? What is it you're not saying, Luanna?

0605145903006407-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Miss Luanna, I don't feel so good... AGHHH!

0605145903006408-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Even as their lifeforce returns, it is becoming twisted... Whatever their affliction is, our attempts to save them has only made them worse...

0605145903006411-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I can't save them. I don't know why I ever thought I might be able to.

0605145903006412-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I couldn't heal the others either.

0605145903006413-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So many guards lost their lives in the siege of Tria...

0605145903006414-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
I'll never be strong enough to save the people I care about...
<font color="#909090">(Hot tears begin to stream down your cheeks.)</font>

0605145903006418-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You saved so many lives during the siege.

0605145903006419-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(The soldier wheezes, struggling for breath.)</font>
If you hadn't been there... I would have lost so many more of my friends that day...

0605145903006420-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
You're a hero... You dropped everything to come and help us... I'm so grateful... Even if...
<font color="#909090">(His eyes grow wide.)</font>

0605145903006423-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You open your eyes, soldier, it's not your time!

0605145903006425-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I'm not sensing any signs of life.

0605145903006426-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I'm not sensing any signs of life.

0605145903006427-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I'm not sensing any signs of life.

0605145903006430-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No! I still feel it! The echo of life!

0605145903006432-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can't just give up... I'm not letting them go without a fight!

0605145903006438-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I... I don't understand it, my wounds are healed! I don't even feel any pain.

0605145903006439-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I... I don't understand it, my wounds are healed! I don't even feel any pain.

0605145903006440-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I... I don't understand it, my wounds are healed! I don't even feel any pain.

0605145903006441-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: By the goddess, I've seen the other side...

0605145903006442-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've never been so grateful to be alive!

0605145903006443-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Unbelievable. $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, have you ever seen anything like it?

0605145903006444-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No. I've only read of such occurrences in ancient literature. A brilliant, cleansing light capable of pulling the dying back from the edge of death.

0605145903006445-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, no human has ever performed such a feat. That power has belonged only to the goddess of light herself!

0605145903006446-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... There's a first time for everything.

0605145903006447-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was actually dead there for a minute... You brought me back. I don't know how I can repay you all for this second shot at life!

0605145903006448-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm afraid I can't take any credit here. This was all $MyPCName$'s doing.

0605145903006449-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you'll all excuse me, I should go deliver the good news to our old friend $npcName:11003862[gender:0]$. It's been some time since I've seen the man cry, but if memory serves it should be quite the show.

0605145903006450-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, thank you... thank so much! You're our savior!

0605145903006451-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, thank you... thank so much! You're our savior!

0605145903006452-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, thank you... thank so much! You're our savior!

0605145903006453-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Please, there must be something we can do to return the favor!

0605145903006454-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hahaha. There's no need for that. It's enough just knowing you're all going to be fine.

0605145903006455-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What? No way! We've got to celebrate! Hey, I know! Let's crack open the Vanguard Captain's snack safe!

0605145903006456-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But what if you get caught?

0605145903006457-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Pfft. The old man won't notice. He spends most of his time on that airship.

0605145903006458-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Besides, if he does, $MyPCName$ can always revive you! Assuming there's something left to revive. Heheheh.

0605145903006460-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Heh... It seems their wounds are completely healed.

0605145903006461-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I knew you had it in you, $MyPCName$.

0605145903006462-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: High Priestess $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, did you send for me?

0605145903006463-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: High Priestess $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, did you send for me?

0605145903006464-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: High Priestess $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, did you send for me?

0605145903006465-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hello $MyPCName$. How was the party? I can scarcely believe the captain truly kept a snack safe.

0605145903006466-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Indeed. And when he caught them in the act, I never would've imagined he'd crack the thing open himself. And after he finished handing out snacks, he goes to the kitchen and starts cooking for everybody. Of course, he was bawling the whole time. I don't believe I've ever seen a grown man cry like that.

0605145903006467-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess $npcName:11003862[gender:0]$ really cares about the guardsmen.

0605145903006468-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It seems he's not the only one.

0605145903006469-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... You're embarrassing me, High Priestess.

0605145903006470-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You have a big heart, $MyPCName$. The way you care so deeply for others is part of what makes you such a great hero.

0605145903006471-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But priestess... Heart and good intentions don't account for the power of the spell I conjured. I'm the same person today as I was during the siege of Tria.

0605145903006472-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I might be able to shed some light on that matter.

0605145903006473-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Have you ever seen one of these before?

0605145903006474-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Is that one of those crystals that've been cropping up everywhere?

0605145903006475-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Indeed. This is a lapenshard. There are many rumors surrounding it, and for good reason.

0605145903006476-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They are believed to be shards of the lapentas. Great crystals with power over the fundamental forces that make up this world.

0605145903006477-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It is said that the lapenshards grant power to those that seek it. I believe the power you demonstrated today is connected to this.

0605145903006478-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I only just learned this but, before they were injured, the guardsmen you met today were tasked with locating a lapenshard. The entity they encountered was also after the crystal, and a fight broke out.

0605145903006479-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And we discovered fragments of the lapenshard inside the guardsmen's wounds... They were merely fragments, but I believe it was their power that reacted to your efforts.

0605145903006480-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, what do you think about the idea of learning more about the lapenshards? If you can unlock the secrets of their power...

0605145903006481-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You could become the greatest healer in history.

0605145903006485-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: High Priestess, I've never given much thought to what awaits us in the distant future. I'm not concerned with legacy...

0605145903006486-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But... I never want to lose another person I care about because I wasn't strong enough to save them.

0605145903006487-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If I could learn to call upon the power of that brilliant light at will... I could do so much good for this world.

0605145903006489-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's actually part of why I called you here. I want to introduce you to a new organization that was recently established organization by the royal court.

0605145903006491-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A recruitment flier from the Frontier Foundation, an organization created to regulate lapenshards and prevent them from falling into the wrong hands.

0605145903006492-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As the foremost authority in the study of lapenshards, there's a great deal you could learn there. It is my hope that you might harness the power of the lapenshards and use it to do great things for this world.

0605145903006493-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you, $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$. I'll set out for the Foundation at once and see what I can learn.

0605145903006494-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Walk in the light of the goddess.

0605145903006495-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: (You received a letter from your old assistant!) Dear Boss! Hiya. It's me, $npcName:11003929[gender:1]$.

0605145903006496-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So, uh, it's been a while, right? You didn't forget about me, did you?

0605145903006497-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Aaaaand I haven't checked in on her since we left home. Whoops.

0605145903006498-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ever since you went off to work for the empire, I've been here in the lab, trying to build a new fusion core. It's hard work...

0605145903006499-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He's got a lab assistant doing the work of a real genius... like me!

0605145903006500-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To be honest, I'm not real good at writing letters. I'd have called you, but I think somebody might've listened in. Drop by the lab when you get a chance... I've got something to show you.

0605145903006501-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not good at writing letters? She isn't kidding. Well, I'd better go see what kind of mess she's got herself in...

0605145903006502-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, my loyal assistant! Did ya miss me?

0605145903006503-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, my loyal assistant! Did ya miss me?

0605145903006504-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Boss! I didn't think you'd come so quick. I figured you'd have more important things to do...

0605145903006505-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, that's okay! I can make some time for you. Anyway, like my letter said, there's something you've gotta see...

0605145903006507-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What's this all about, anyway? You think someone's listening to your phone calls?

0605145903006508-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shh! Keep your voice down, Boss. There are ears everywhere.

0605145903006511-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She motions for you to come close, and you lean in to listen to her.)</font>
<font size='5'>Whisper whisper whisper mumble mumble...</font>

0605145903006515-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font size='5'>Whisper whisper whisper whisper whisper mumble whisper.</font>

0605145903006516-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I hate to admit it, $npcName:11003929$, but I can't understand a word you're saying!!

0605145903006517-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Uh... Sorry, Boss. I didn't want to say this out loud, since my other, richer boss might be listening, but I guess there's no other way.

0605145903006519-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, I've heard of this before. Is that a lapenshard?

0605145903006520-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You already know about it! I was worried you were losing your edge, Boss.

0605145903006521-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Nothing escapes my attention! The rumor around town is that these lapenshards can give you all kinds of supernatural powers. Superstitious nonsense, of course.

0605145903006522-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't be so hasty, Boss! I've been putting this little shard through all kinds of tests, and... Well, it's unbelievable!

0605145903006523-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why don't I just show you? I've got readings from the last battery of tests on the workstation over there.

0605145903006524-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Fine, fine. I'll take a look at your little pet project.

0605145903006525-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is... It can't be! The lapenshard is so powerful, the monitor doesn't even show an energy level!

0605145903006526-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is... It can't be! The lapenshard is so powerful, the monitor doesn't even show an energy level!

0605145903006527-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is... It can't be! The lapenshard is so powerful, the monitor doesn't even show an energy level!

0605145903006528-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You need to turn the power on, Boss!

0605145903006529-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I was just testing you. Now, where's that on switch?

0605145903006532-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Th-this reading... $npcName:11003929$, what the heck is this?!

0605145903006533-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This can't be right. This is more than a hundred times more output than my fusion core!

0605145903006534-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's amazing, right? I spent all this time trying to rebuild your reactor, but I couldn't find anything that would work as fuel.

0605145903006535-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's why $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$ brought me this sample. Told me about the rumors.

0605145903006536-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, you've seen the results, Boss. I haven't shown this to anyone else.

0605145903006537-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm glad you did. It was smart not to share this with $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$...

0605145903006539-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've gotta nab the patent before he does!

0605145903006540-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've gotta nab the patent before he does!

0605145903006541-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've gotta nab the patent before he does!

0605145903006542-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, the patent. We've got to... Wait, what?

0605145903006543-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course! This lapenshard thing could make us filthy rich, Boss!

0605145903006545-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If we beat $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$ to the market with this, we'll make more mesos than we could spend in a lifetime!

0605145903006546-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Think about it, Boss. If we power a fusion core with lapenshards, we could turn it on for a minute and power Tria for a week!

0605145903006547-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's more than that. We could blast Tria to smithereens in a second!

0605145903006549-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Think about it, $npcName:11003929$. What if someone takes a lapenshard and decides to put it in a bomb instead of a generator?

0605145903006550-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Think about it, $npcName:11003929$. What if someone takes a lapenshard and decides to put make a bomb instead of a generator?

0605145903006551-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Think about it, $npcName:11003929$. What if someone takes a lapenshard and decides to put make a bomb instead of a generator?

0605145903006553-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Didn't think about that, did you? How naive you still are! Technology isn't just about making money!

0605145903006554-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Maybe the bad guys would make a bomb. Or maybe they'd use it to power a death ray. Who knows? All that matters is that this tech is too dangerous.

0605145903006555-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Resistance found out about the fusion core somehow, and the core was a mere toy compared to the lapenshards!

0605145903006556-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We can't allow the same thing to happen again.

0605145903006557-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I used to think technology could reshape the world, but I've fought a few hundred rampaging warbots since then. Now I know better.

0605145903006558-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Technology doesn't shape the world. It's the world that shapes technology. And the world we live in... All it's good for is making weapons.

0605145903006559-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Until Maple World gets over its taste for war, then both the fusion core and lapenshard technology have to be kept secret.

0605145903006564-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't be sad, kid. If it'll cheer you up, I'll find another way to make you boatloads of money!

0605145903006567-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You gave up billions of mesos, all for world peace!

0605145903006568-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Pft, who needs money? It can't buy happiness, and a full wallet would just attract thieves!

0605145903006569-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Right! But... what about our debt? Don't we still owe $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$, like, a billion mesos?

0605145903006570-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Close one. You were almost starting to feel good about your life...)</font>

0605145903006571-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough chit-chat. We have work to do. Delete the files, destroy the equipment that you can, and brick the rest of it.

0605145903006572-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough chit-chat. We have work to do. Delete the files, destroy the equipment that you can, and brick the rest of it.

0605145903006573-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough chit-chat. We have work to do. Delete the files, destroy the equipment that you can, and brick the rest of it.

0605145903006574-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Uh... Boss. I've got another idea...

0605145903006576-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why don't we use quantum encryption to lock the lapenshard technology to our biosignatures?

0605145903006577-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A lot of people depend on you, Boss. You also have lots of enemies. You need all the firepower you can get!

0605145903006578-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, the world is getting more dangerous by the day.

0605145903006579-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you want to fight even bigger bad guys, don't you need even bigger guns? This lapenshard could power that gun, Boss!

0605145903006580-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You'll use that big gun to end this war. Then, when we have peace, you'll announce the world's first lapenshard reactor...

0605145903006581-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And then, you will be worshipped as the savior of Maple World!

0605145903006582-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, well, well. I'm impressed. You're starting to think almost as big as me.

0605145903006583-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's the perfect plan. Come, $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$! Let us remake the world in our image!!

0605145903006584-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no time to waste! First, and most important, this project needs a name...

0605145903006585-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no time to waste! First, and most important, this project needs a name...

0605145903006586-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no time to waste! First, and most important, this project needs a name...

0605145903006587-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This will be the weapon to end all wars, the Peacemaker!

0605145903006588-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, oh, let me write that down! P... a... c... e...

0605145903006589-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hold on! It's the Peacemaker, not the Pacemaker! You know, peace? The opposite of war?

0605145903006590-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's the whole point of this thing! We aren't creating a weapon that destroys everything in its path. We need to design this tech to specifically fight monsters and the forces of darkness. Get me?

0605145903006592-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Great! Let's get this thing done before $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$ gets back from his business trip!

0605145903006593-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$. Prepare for the final test.

0605145903006594-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$. Prepare for the final test.

0605145903006595-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$. Prepare for the final test.

0605145903006596-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Prepare for boot-up 60. Quantum cryptography systems are online.

0605145903006600-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: 95...! Just a little more, Pacemaker!

0605145903006601-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: 100 percent! $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, gimme a status report!

0605145903006602-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Stability is green. Three-step quantum encryption is locked to our DNA!

0605145903006604-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's complete! The Peacemaker is complete!

0605145903006605-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's complete! The Peacemaker is complete!

0605145903006606-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's complete! The Peacemaker is complete!

0605145903006607-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sometimes my own genius frightens me...

0605145903006608-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is just the beginning, Boss. I'll keep researching on my end, looking for more ways to improve on the tech.

0605145903006609-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We used all of your lapenshard making the Peacemaker. It'll be tough researching without it. But where can we get more samples?

0605145903006610-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, Boss! Maybe this flier has the answer!

0605145903006611-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What's this? "The Frontier Foundation is recruiting adventurers... ...organization charged with studying lapenshards..."

0605145903006613-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess everyone's racing to get control over the lapenshards.

0605145903006614-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why don't you join up with them, Boss? If you send me any samples, I'll work on more improvements for the Pacemaker for you!

0605145903006615-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's not a bad idea... but...

0605145903006616-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, why don't you come with me? It can't be fun, towing the line at a huge company like this.

0605145903006617-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, why don't you come with me? It can't be fun, towing the line at a huge company like this.

0605145903006618-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, why don't you come with me? It can't be fun, towing the line at a huge company like this.

0605145903006619-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's no good, Boss. Someone has to stay behind and make sure Ladin doesn't start working on lapenshard technology.

0605145903006620-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sure, but you don't have to take it all on your shoulders. Let's run off together! Besides, it'll be years before that slimy jerk breaks our encryption—

0605145903006621-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No thanks, Boss! I just got a raise!

0605145903006623-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I actually... kind of like it here. Unlike at our old lab, I have access to cutting-edge tech, and there aren't any rats here. Oh, and there's a taco truck that comes by every Tuesday!

0605145903006624-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You mean, you don't want to come with me...? Well, if you're happy, I'm happy. In fact, you'd only get in my way! Anyway... Um... is someone cutting onions in here...?

0605145903006625-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I understand. Stay here and keep the lapenshard technology safe. I'll head to the Frontier Foundation and see what I can find out.

0605145903006626-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I understand. Stay here and keep the lapenshard technology safe. I'll head to the Frontier Foundation and see what I can find out.

0605145903006627-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I understand. Stay here and keep the lapenshard technology safe. I'll head to the Frontier Foundation and see what I can find out.

0605145903006628-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you think $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$ is getting suspicious, drop a hint that you're making progress on the fusion core. That should keep him nice and distracted.

0605145903006629-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Got it, Boss! Leave it to me!

0605145903006632-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know that $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$ treats you well and even pays you. Thank you for sticking with me in spite of all that.

0605145903006633-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What're you saying? You'll always be the boss, Boss!

0605145903006634-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When all this is over, I'll give you a boatload of back pay! And a bonus, too!

0605145903006635-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... I doubt that's a promise $male:he'll,female:she'll$ be able to keep. Anyway, that's the end of the recording.

0605145903006636-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So, how goes the decryption efforts...

0605145903006638-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The files on Pacemaker are locked up tight. $MyPCName$ wasn't messing around with this encryption.

0605145903006639-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It'll take a hundred years to crack the encryption through brute force. We need DNA from either $MyPCName$ or $male:his,female:her$ bratty assistant.

0605145903006640-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This better not be a repeat of our last deal, $npcName:11003295[gender:0]$.

0605145903006641-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't you worry your little head. We can afford to take our time and get it right. Besides, Aisha isn't going anywhere anytime soon...

0605145903006642-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... I don't think I'm improving at all... This isn't going to work...

0605145903006643-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... I don't think I'm improving at all... This isn't going to work...

0605145903006644-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... I don't think I'm improving at all... This isn't going to work...

0605145903006645-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hitting a stationary target is easy. I've got to step up my training somehow...

0605145903006647-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What gives?! Who threw this at me?

0605145903006650-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've gotten pretty tough since I last saw you. I've heard tales of your exploits.

0605145903006651-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've gotten pretty tough since I last saw you. I've heard tales of your exploits.

0605145903006652-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've gotten pretty tough since I last saw you. I've heard tales of your exploits.

0605145903006653-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You pop in after everything you've done, acting like nothing's happened?! You owe me an explanation! Why did you do it, $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$?!

0605145903006654-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Woah, turn down the volume, kid. You know, there are some things we adults have to keep to ourselves.

0605145903006655-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What things? You betrayed the Green Hoods and handed one of the lapentas over to the forces of darkness! So if you've really got a way to justify your actions, I'd love to hear it!

0605145903006656-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh, I can see you're very upset. But look, don't worry about the lapenta. What I gave them was barely even a fragment. I mean, sure, it came in pretty handy...

0605145903006657-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Look, $MyPCName$, I get where you're coming from. But even if you handed me over to the Green Hoods right now, that wouldn't soothe your little anger issue.

0605145903006658-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Turn you in?! You're a traitor! I ought to shoot you right where you stand!

0605145903006659-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Whoa, hey buddy, could you like, not? Besides, you couldn't hit me with that thing if you wanted to.

0605145903006660-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You probably couldn't hit anybody in the crew I roll with at your current skill level. You've got a lot of growing to do.

0605145903006661-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't get me wrong, you've made some real progress with your training. But considering what you're going to be up against in the days ahead? Phew, forget it! Anyway, that's why I came to train you myself.

0605145903006662-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you kidding me? You came here to train me?! For what?

0605145903006664-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Because someday soon I'm gonna need you to stop me, kiddo.

0605145903006666-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Listen kid, I'm not here to talk about the Green Hoods or the forces of whatever. That'd take all day.

0605145903006667-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Since you're clearly doing such a good job training on your own, why don't we make a deal?

0605145903006668-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You quit it with all the questions, and I'll help awaken a new power inside of you that you never thought was possible.

0605145903006670-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to get stronger, and I can't deny there's a lot I could learn from you... But you're asking me to give up on getting answers to the questions I've been wrestling with since you vanished! Sigh...

0605145903006671-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to get stronger, and I can't deny there's a lot I could learn from you... But you're asking me to give up on getting answers to the questions I've been wrestling with since you vanished! Sigh...

0605145903006672-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to get stronger, and I can't deny there's a lot I could learn from you... But you're asking me to give up on getting answers to the questions I've been wrestling with since you vanished! Sigh...

0605145903006674-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hah, called it. Looks like you do want to get better after all.

0605145903006675-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You wouldn't understand my reasons... But I have to get stronger. I want to become more than just a member of the Green Hoods defending Henesys from harm. I want to protect the entire world.

0605145903006676-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Heh. Of course. Only way you're gonna defeat me.

0605145903006677-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And listen, about that whole getting stronger thing, I've got you covered. Take another gander at that little crystal I tossed you earlier.

0605145903006678-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait a second! Is this what I think it is?

0605145903006679-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Man, word travels fast. Yup, that's a lapenshard all right. The miraculous stone that awakens new power in those who seek it.

0605145903006680-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What most people don't get is that you're not going to get any stronger just holding onto the darn thing.

0605145903006681-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The lapenshard is just a catalyst to draw out your full potential. You've got to put in the training yourself, the stone just speeds things along.

0605145903006682-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So what say we tackle years of training in a few short hours with your little friend there?

0605145903006684-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$, you said you want me to become stronger in order to stop you? What do you mean by that? I don't understand—

0605145903006685-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$, you said you want me to become stronger in order to stop you? What do you mean by that? I don't understand—

0605145903006686-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$, you said you want me to become stronger in order to stop you? What do you mean by that? I don't understand—

0605145903006687-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Come on, kid. It's barely been a couple of minutes and you're already going back on our deal? You'll understand when the time comes. Right now you've gotta focus on getting stronger.

0605145903006688-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you really want me to train you, you'd better get focused. We're about to cover 100 years worth of advanced archery technique in a handful of hours.

0605145903006689-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That means this'll be 100 times more difficult than your average training lesson. If you don't have the determination, there's no way you're going to keep up.

0605145903006690-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So forget all those burning questions, and concentrate on getting stronger. Think you can do that?

0605145903006691-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You don't have to worry about me, $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$. I've never been more determined about anything.

0605145903006692-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You don't have to worry about me, $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$. I've never been more determined about anything.

0605145903006693-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You don't have to worry about me, $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$. I've never been more determined about anything.

0605145903006694-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank goodness. Then we can get started.

0605145903006695-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I am sorry things had to be this way, kid.

0605145903006696-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Haster... what really happened with you?)</font>

0605145903006699-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now, before we start, you need to forget everything the Green Hoods taught you. From here on out, you've got to forge your own path.

0605145903006700-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... Your posture's pretty good, and your concentration's all right.

0605145903006701-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... Your posture's pretty good, and your concentration's all right.

0605145903006702-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... Your posture's pretty good, and your concentration's all right.

0605145903006703-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Neat trick infusing your arrows with wind and fire magic, that took me years to master. Funny you favor the same elements as me.

0605145903006704-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well... I think that about covers it. There's nothing else for me to teach you.

0605145903006706-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Weren't you listening, kid? They're yours now. It's time you forged your own path. Anyways, good job $MyPCName$. I'm proud of you.

0605145903006707-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... I guess this means our training is over.

0605145903006708-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... I guess this means our training is over.

0605145903006709-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... I guess this means our training is over.

0605145903006710-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeah, that's basically what I just said. I've got to praise your dedication. For a while there I thought we'd be here all week.

0605145903006711-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You made those exercises look easy when they were anything but—in large part thanks to the power of that lapenshard. Sure speeds things along, but you really ought to wonder if there's a catch...

0605145903006712-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You might have guessed, but the bad guys will be after the lapenshards too. That's how it goes with all these magical shortcuts to power.

0605145903006713-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$, enough talking around it. It's time for answers!

0605145903006714-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeesh. Way to kill the vibe. Why so serious all of a sudden?

0605145903006715-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeesh. Way to kill the vibe. Why so serious all of a sudden?

0605145903006716-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeesh. Way to kill the vibe. Why so serious all of a sudden?

0605145903006717-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Training's over, so you can't hold that over me! Now tell me, where have you been all this time?! Why did you betray us?!

0605145903006718-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You nock an arrow and aim it at Haster.)</font>
You'd better tell me right now, otherwise this next arrow is going through your shoulder!

0605145903006720-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sheesh... I was hoping to say a friendly goodbye, with smiles all around.

0605145903006721-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's not really going to work with you being knocked out though. Why've you gotta be so self-righteous, kid?

0605145903006722-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I mean tell me, would you really want to save the world if it meant sacrificing the people living on it? Or would you rather they all live just long enough for you to witness the end of the world together?

0605145903006723-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: 'Cuz I gotta say, I don't know the answer myself. I don't know whether I'm on the right side of this thing. Maybe that's why I want someone who can stop me—and the people I'm working with.

0605145903006724-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... I just figured I owed it to you to ask.

0605145903006725-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If anybody out there's gonna stick an arrow between my eyes, I want it to be you.

0605145903006726-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When and if that day ever comes... Promise me you won't hesitate, okay kid?

0605145903006727-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ow, my head... Looks like $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$'s already gone. I didn't even get a chance to say goodbye...

0605145903006728-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ow, my head... Looks like $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$'s already gone. I didn't even get a chance to say goodbye...

0605145903006729-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ow, my head... Looks like $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$'s already gone. I didn't even get a chance to say goodbye...

0605145903006730-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And all he left me is this stupid note? That doesn't settle anything... What about my answers?

0605145903006731-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait... This isn't a note from $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$...

0605145903006732-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: "Calling all adventurers, the Frontier Foundation wants you! Recently established by order of the royal court, we are the official body responsible for procuring and regulating the use of lapenshards. It is our solemn duty to prevent these powerful artifacts from falling into the wrong hands. Join us today and help usher in a safer, brighter world!"

0605145903006733-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frontier Foundation? Is this some kind of recruitment pamphlet? But why did Haster leave this for me to find?

0605145903006734-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess... $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$ wants me to go there? I could learn more about the lapenshards... He did hint that there's more to them than meets the eye.

0605145903006735-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess... $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$ wants me to go there? I could learn more about the lapenshards... He did hint that there's more to them than meets the eye.

0605145903006736-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess... $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$ wants me to go there? I could learn more about the lapenshards... He did hint that there's more to them than meets the eye.

0605145903006737-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Training with the lapenshard was such a rush... It was like the wind was moving through my body. I can't even remember a moment where I felt tired. It's a shame the thing crumbled into dust after we had finished.

0605145903006738-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$, do you want me to go after the shards so that our paths will cross again? Or is it just that you think pursuing them will make me stronger?

0605145903006739-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh. Well, standing around talking to myself isn't going to accomplish anything. I should get going.

0605145903006740-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thanks for showing me the way, $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$. I'll forge my own path from here on out.

0605145903006741-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Calibre Shore... It's been awhile. It's amazing how little things have changed.

0605145903006742-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Calibre Shore... It's been awhile. It's amazing how little things have changed.

0605145903006743-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Calibre Shore... It's been awhile. It's amazing how little things have changed.

0605145903006744-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But after all this time, I wonder if I'm really all that stronger.

0605145903006745-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: After all I've been through, I thought that my skills had grown immensely. And yet it feels like I've gone as far as I can.

0605145903006746-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can't see a way forward... Perhaps my teacher will be able to show me the path.

0605145903006751-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How dare you show your face here after murdering Master Arazaad?

0605145903006752-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I thought you looked familiar. You're $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$'s pupil.

0605145903006753-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Allow me to pose a question of my own. Why have you come back here? Are you after the lapenshards as well?

0605145903006755-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's better that you don't know.

0605145903006756-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll be direct, then. Stay out of my way. If you interfere with my plans...

0605145903006757-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will have no choice but to strike you down, no doubt alongside your teacher.

0605145903006758-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$ will certainly attempt to protect the lapenshards... He is blind to the truth. His ignorance will lead to destruction.

0605145903006759-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I must prevent that outcome, no matter the cost. Even if it means I have to cut down an old friend.

0605145903006760-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: "Old friend?" Have you no shame? I have no idea what you're talking about, but I can't let you leave here, traitor.

0605145903006761-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: "Old friend?" Have you no shame? I have no idea what you're talking about, but I can't let you leave here, traitor.

0605145903006762-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: "Old friend?" Have you no shame? I have no idea what you're talking about, but I can't let you leave here, traitor.

0605145903006763-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will avenge Arazaad's murder and your betrayal of my master with my own blade!

0605145903006764-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My betrayal? It was Arazaad who betrayed us. Your blind loyalty to the man is pathetic. He was a rat, and as everyone knows, the only good rat is a dead one.

0605145903006765-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I had not planned to end your life tonight, but if you raise your blade against me, you leave me no choice.

0605145903006766-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So be it. Come at me.

0605145903006767-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(...Can you really take on a member of the Eight Blades on your own? Can you really defeat $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$?)</font>

0605145903006768-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(No... Now is not the time for self doubt. You must be victorious!)</font>

0605145903006773-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did I just...? It can't be.

0605145903006774-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No... It's unmistakable. This power flowing through my body is that of the Pelgia! But my teacher always said that the ways of blade magic were lost to those who chose to practice the runic arts...

0605145903006775-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Could it be that the latent power of the lapenshards scattered here caused our powers to resonate in one another?

0605145903006776-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then... perhaps I finally have the power to wake the rune giant.

0605145903006777-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait a moment... Does that mean that you...?

0605145903006778-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, I'm sure you can feel it by now.

0605145903006779-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, I'm sure you can feel it by now.

0605145903006780-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, I'm sure you can feel it by now.

0605145903006781-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You have obtained my power, and I yours. If the clashing of our blades awakened the lapenshards, then you must seek power just as I do.

0605145903006782-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That is what a lapenshard is. A crystal capable of granting power to those that seek it. A seed of destruction.

0605145903006783-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I never asked for the power of a bunch of foolish traitors!

0605145903006784-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Foolish? Foolish?! Those who pursue the limits of the runic arts seek knowledge's boundless power, while you sit around playing with your sword!

0605145903006785-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Pelgia's arrogance has led to an entire population of Runeblades blind to the power of the rune. So many Runeblades have sought out the power of darkness after realizing the limitations of their bladecraft. If they had only embraced the runic arts, they could have achieved enlightenment!

0605145903006786-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Someone so ignorant does not deserve such power.

0605145903006787-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Besides, this world only needs one heir to the twin arts!

0605145903006791-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmph... Luck is on your side today. $MyPCName$, is it? I'll be sure to remember that.

0605145903006792-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have no doubt you will surpass your master... So when the time comes, I'll be sure to kill you first. Until then...

0605145903006793-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, what's going on? It was a surprise just to see you here, but to find you fighting with Holstatt? What happened?

0605145903006794-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, what's going on? It was a surprise just to see you here, but to find you fighting with Holstatt? What happened?

0605145903006795-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, what's going on? It was a surprise just to see you here, but to find you fighting with Holstatt? What happened?

0605145903006796-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$, we should return to the fortress for now. I don't like the look of these energies.

0605145903006797-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This must be the "great resonance" we learned about from the Frontier Foundation. It's amazing to witness it firsthand.

0605145903006798-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I sense an unusual power emanating from you...

0605145903006799-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We should return to the fortress and talk. There is much we must discuss.

0605145903006800-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not five minutes back on the island and you stumble into a battle with $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$. Do you have terrible luck or what?

0605145903006801-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not five minutes back on the island and you stumble into a battle with $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$. Do you have terrible luck or what?

0605145903006802-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not five minutes back on the island and you stumble into a battle with $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$. Do you have terrible luck or what?

0605145903006803-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was astonished to see $MyPCName$ holding $male:his,female:her$ own against him.

0605145903006804-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, $MyPCName$'s performance was impressive. But I worry... In $male:his,female:her$ current state, it's a wonder $male:he,female:she$ hasn't collapsed.

0605145903006806-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The power of both Jibricia and Pelgia are united within you, yet you show no signs of illness...

0605145903006807-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That is to say, you have somehow achieved a state sought after by every Runeblade since the dawn of time. You have become an heir to the twin arts—a Rune Sage.

0605145903006808-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, you probably haven't heard of the Rune Sages, considering they're a myth. We tend not to waste valuable training time with myths.

0605145903006809-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The reason the Runeblades split into sects was not merely a matter of specialization. But rather, it was due to the limitations of the human body.

0605145903006810-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To reach the pinnacle of bladecraft or the runic arts, one must unlock an immense power—one that cannot be reconciled with the power of the other art. You cannot master one and still seek the other; the body simply cannot withstand that much power.

0605145903006811-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It is said that one of Arazaad's ancestors managed to achieve the state of Rune Sage, but that the resultant strain upon his body led to his demise.

0605145903006812-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So how did both $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$ and $MyPCName$ manage to reach that state and emerge unscathed?

0605145903006813-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My money's on the influence of the lapenshards...

0605145903006814-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The lapenshards...? $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$ said he had come to Calibre to search for them. What exactly are they?

0605145903006815-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There is much that remains a mystery about the lapenshards. What we do know is that their power is connected to the lapentas.

0605145903006816-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Those strange crystals are said to grant power to those who desire it. Not long ago, they began appearing throughout the world. No one knows precisely how or why.

0605145903006817-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, speaking of the lapenshards, the royal court has requested Terrun Calibre's aid.

0605145903006818-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, speaking of the lapenshards, the royal court has requested Terrun Calibre's aid.

0605145903006819-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, speaking of the lapenshards, the royal court has requested Terrun Calibre's aid.

0605145903006820-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They have asked that we provide assistance to the Frontier Foundation, a newly established organization responsible for securing the lapenshards and regulating their usage.

0605145903006821-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: According to their researchers, the origins of the runic arts are in some way connected to the lapentas. They believe we may be able to provide insight on tracking the lapenshards' energies.

0605145903006822-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The lapenshards' powers could be of use to us. While you were gone, we detected an unusual energy along the Calibre Shore.

0605145903006823-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Dark powers that, had they gone un-addressed, could have been used to forge a rune of darkness—an object that in the hands of someone like $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$, could do terrible things.

0605145903006824-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And if $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$ is also after the lapenshards, we have no choice but to intervene.

0605145903006825-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I would like you to join us. We will need every skilled Runeblade at our disposal.

0605145903006826-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Further, I'd like to keep an eye on you. I worry the power of the Rune Sage may yet consume you.

0605145903006827-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$, you don't have a crush on your disciple, do you? Haha! I'm jealous!

0605145903006829-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no need to worry about me, I feel fine. Better than fine, actually... I want to continue my training and test the limits of this new power.

0605145903006830-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The next time I face $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$, I want to be ready.

0605145903006831-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Very well then. It seems we're all on the same page.

0605145903006832-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then we'll depart shortly. $MyPCName$, before you join us, I'd like you to go to the infirmary and get checked out by our medics. While you're there, be sure to get some rest.

0605145903006833-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've got it, Elder Blade. I'll catch up soon.

0605145903006836-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...Nevermind. Rest well. We'll speak again soon.

0605145903006839-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now that you're a rune sage, there's no doubt you'll surpass me soon. I can't help but worry, but I'm proud of you.

0605145903006840-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But $npcName:11004028[gender:0]$... I never imagined he would achieve such power. Fate works in mysterious ways...

0605145903006841-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $map:63000020$ is awfully quiet when nobody's around. Makes you feel lonely.

0605145903006842-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $map:63000020$ is awfully quiet when nobody's around. Makes you feel lonely.

0605145903006843-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $map:63000020$ is awfully quiet when nobody's around. Makes you feel lonely.

0605145903006844-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I guess it's only appropriate for the solitary Gray Wolf.

0605145903006845-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... that persona is kind of pathetic when you think about it. Is that really all I am? A wild dog without a pack, knowing only the hunt and destined for solitude?

0605145903006846-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: After all this time I'm back in my hometown, and there's no one to greet me. It's ironic... You spend your whole life fighting for others, and you end up alone...

0605145903006847-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What was it all for, anyway? Sure I managed to keep my neighborhood safe—but I couldn't protect the world beyond it. There have been so many people I couldn't save...

0605145903006848-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In the end, I was only as tough as the local bullies.

0605145903006849-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was a big fish in a small pond, but I've moved outside the pond now.

0605145903006850-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was a big fish in a small pond, but I've moved outside the pond now.

0605145903006851-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was a big fish in a small pond, but I've moved outside the pond now.

0605145903006852-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And now I'm just another fish.

0605145903006853-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There is no simple training regimen that will make me stronger. Not as strong as I need to become. I need to make a leap, but I don't even have someone to show me the way.

0605145903006854-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's got to be some path forward...

0605145903006855-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font size='40'>Nothing puts things in perspective like a good fight.</font>

0605145903006859-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I should be asking you that. This is Blackstar's turf. I came because I heard the Wolf had returned to its den.

0605145903006860-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess Blackstar really does have eyes and ears in this place. Would you believe me if I told you I was here to take down your dear old dad and dissolve the organization?

0605145903006861-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course not. You'd have to beat me in order to do that.

0605145903006862-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't worry. I didn't come looking for a fight. I'm just here to think.

0605145903006863-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You, think? Is that a joke?

0605145903006864-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What, beating people with your fists wasn't enough? You've moved on to emotional abuse?

0605145903006865-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hahaha. You're serious then, aren't you?

0605145903006866-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've piqued my interest. Let's chat, you and I.

0605145903006867-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I didn't realize Blackstar had opened up a psychological counseling center... What is this world coming to?

0605145903006868-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... Sure. I'm not getting anywhere talking to myself. It'd be nice to have an outside perspective.

0605145903006869-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to become stronger. I took up the mantle of the Gray Wolf to protect the weak. But out there in the real world, I'm the one that's weak.

0605145903006870-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to become stronger. I took up the mantle of the Gray Wolf to protect the weak. But out there in the real world, I'm the one that's weak.

0605145903006871-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to become stronger. I took up the mantle of the Gray Wolf to protect the weak. But out there in the real world, I'm the one that's weak.

0605145903006872-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...That's it? That's what you're moping about? I thought you were going to say something more interesting.

0605145903006873-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I thought you were going to at least try to be supportive.

0605145903006874-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What were you doing all this time, sitting around with friends and talking about feelings? I heard you were off fighting evil and saving the world. Was that just an exaggeration?

0605145903006876-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wolf, you've grown complacent listening to all those excuses in your head. You're starting to believe your own lies.

0605145903006877-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You say you want to protect the weak?

0605145903006878-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: People like us don't fight out of some self-righteous sense of duty. We fight because there's nothing we love more in this world. The pumping adrenaline, the elation of crushing your foes with nothing more than your own raw power and skill. Ours is an endless quest to prove ourselves to the cosmos.

0605145903006879-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All these lofty ideals are just a justification to fight. What you truly want is to become stronger, to fight better. Tell me I'm wrong.

0605145903006881-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've got a way with words for such a meathead.

0605145903006882-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've got a way with words for such a meathead.

0605145903006883-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've got a way with words for such a meathead.

0605145903006884-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Maybe you're right. If saving the world was really all I was after, I guess I would have joined the Royal Knights.

0605145903006885-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But if you have the capacity to do something that no one else can, something good—then you owe it to the world to do it. Protecting the world is my calling. There's nothing I want more than to get better at it.

0605145903006886-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So what you're saying is, your goal can only be reached by getting stronger? That sounds awfully like something I said just moments ago.

0605145903006887-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So you want to get tougher? Then let's talk about something else.

0605145903006888-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Forget Blackstar, forget saving the world. Let's talk purely about martial arts.

0605145903006889-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... If we're going to have a conversation about martial arts, a fist is worth a thousand words. Like you said, there's nothing greater than the thrill of the fight.

0605145903006890-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hah. You haven't accepted any suspicious drinks, have you? I want a fair fight this time.

0605145903006892-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess you really deserve your title as the champion of $map:63000020$. I was sure I'd crush you easily, but you turned out to be a formidable opponent.

0605145903006893-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess you really deserve your title as the champion of $map:63000020$. I was sure I'd crush you easily, but you turned out to be a formidable opponent.

0605145903006894-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess you really deserve your title as the champion of $map:63000020$. I was sure I'd crush you easily, but you turned out to be a formidable opponent.

0605145903006895-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I could say the same of you. You were better than I expected, $MyPCName$.

0605145903006896-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You were right. When I abandoned any pretenses, and gave in completely to the thrill of the fight, I was able to move and strike more swiftly and effortlessly than ever before.

0605145903006897-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You were right. When I abandoned any pretenses, and gave in completely to the thrill of the fight, I was able to move and strike more swiftly and effortlessly than ever before.

0605145903006898-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You were right. When I abandoned any pretenses, and gave in completely to the thrill of the fight, I was able to move and strike more swiftly and effortlessly than ever before.

0605145903006899-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I think... I think I finally see a way forward!

0605145903006900-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Heh... Perhaps I was too quick to judge. You were right too. A fist guided by purpose possesses tremendous power.

0605145903006901-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've only ever thought of getting stronger for strength's sake. I've never considered what my power was for.

0605145903006902-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I think it's time I left this place and went on an adventure of my own. Perhaps I'll grow as you have if I discover my own sense of purpose.

0605145903006903-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I too had hit a wall with my training and the limits of my potential. It seems that this stone has shown us both the way forward.

0605145903006907-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This crystal is called a lapenshard—it's a mysterious object that's supposed to grant new powers to those who want to be strong.

0605145903006908-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't believe in miracles, but it's proven more effective than any supplement I've ever taken.

0605145903006909-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This lapenshard is the reason I've come to you. The boss ordered me to bring it to you when he learned you were back.

0605145903006910-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You see, he has a new mission for the Wolf. You are to join the Frontier Foundation, the organization regulating the use of the lapenshards, and serve as an informant for Blackstar.

0605145903006911-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Join the "Frontier Foundation?" Why would I want to do a thing like that?

0605145903006912-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've already told you. By imperial decree, the Foundation is the organization in charge of regulating the use of these mysterious gems. And they've shown themselves to be very unhappy with Blackstar profiting from their sale.

0605145903006913-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... you want me to be a mole in their organization?

0605145903006914-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's right. The Foundation is openly recruiting adventurers. They would never suspect you for a member of Blackstar.

0605145903006915-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyways, that's what the boss said.

0605145903006916-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now I'll give you my own opinion.

0605145903006917-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now I'll give you my own opinion.

0605145903006918-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now I'll give you my own opinion.

0605145903006919-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He pulls a device from his pocket, drops it on the floor, and steps on it.)</font>
<font size='40'>Crunch.</font>

0605145903006920-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What are you doing?! That looked expensive! Why'd you break it?

0605145903006921-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's just one of Blackstar's many listening devices. We've got them all over the world.

0605145903006922-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The boss told me to place this on you. He intended to use you as a mole in the Frontier Foundation whether you agreed or not.

0605145903006923-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
It's too bad it broke during our fight.
<font color="#909090">(He grins.)</font>

0605145903006925-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Go to the Frontier Foundation. Not because it's what my father wanted, but because there you can learn more about the lapenshards which have opened new paths for the both of us.

0605145903006926-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And because you'll grow stronger in the fight against those who want to misuse them.

0605145903006927-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And I will follow my own path, growing stronger in the search for my own purpose.

0605145903006928-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And the next time we meet, we'll finish this fight of ours.

0605145903006929-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm. I have to admit, you're an okay guy.

0605145903006930-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Get out of here. Blackstar suits will be here soon.

0605145903006931-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thanks. I'll see you later, I guess!

0605145903006932-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As we anticipated, my brother has released the Wolf from its leash. We will proceed accordingly.

0605145903006933-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hah. Everything went just like you said it would. I'm impressed $npcName:11003182[gender:0]$.

0605145903006934-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was merely a pawn, ensuring the course of your own great designs.

0605145903006935-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... You know just what people want to hear, don't you?

0605145903006936-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm looking forward to our little Wolf friend's progress. That muscly brother of yours, too.

0605145903006938-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are these all adventurers looking to join the foundation? There's so many of them.

0605145903006939-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are these all adventurers looking to join the foundation? There's so many of them.

0605145903006940-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are these all adventurers looking to join the foundation? There's so many of them.

0605145903006941-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I should have a look around...

0605145903006945-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.

0605145903006946-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.

0605145903006947-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
