0605145903006948-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Before she begins, there is one matter I wish to clarify... If the young miss should say something unusual, please do not take offense. It is not her intent to be rude...

0605145903006949-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Pemberton, I don't remember deciding there would be any speeches at this event! This is not some common gala!

0605145903006950-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is a solemn occasion. We are here to forge a pact between our family, these adventurers, and myself. We are here to issue a proclamation to the world!

0605145903006951-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...Ahem. Welcome, adventurers, my honored guests—you who go forth boldly to serve as the eyes, ears, hands, and feet of this great new endeavor.

0605145903006952-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I am Lady Beatrice, director of the Frontier Foundation.

0605145903006953-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I trust the tea and hors d'ouevres were to everyone's liking? They were prepared by a world-class chef, after all.

0605145903006954-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I'm afraid we don't have time for such niceties. The matter at hand is most serious.

0605145903006955-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As you all know, an unprecedented phenomenon is occurring throughout this world. These so-called lapenshards, these mysterious crystals, are cropping up everywhere you look.

0605145903006956-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've all no doubt heard the stories—a miraculous stone granting power to those in want. You might have guessed that these crystals are, as their name denotes, miniatures of the very same lapentas created by the sages in times past.

0605145903006957-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You might be thinking, "these mere fragments surely cannot match the power of an unblemished lapenta!" Yes, that much is true. But they are still powerful enough to throw this world into crisis.

0605145903006958-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: These crystals' minute size makes them trivial to gather and transport, and so they make their way rapidly across the land, empowering dangerous villains and causing strange and dangerous phenomena.

0605145903006959-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Funded by the gracious contributions of Tria's aristocracy—including Prime Minister Vidrem, and some of my own allowance—this Frontier Foundation was established to prevent exactly such situations as these.

0605145903006960-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The mission of the Frontier Foundation is simple. We travel far and wide to collect the lapenshards and gather them here, where we can carefully regulate them and prevent their misuse.

0605145903006961-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It is for this duty you were recruited. We have invited experts on the lapentas from all over. Allow me to present Terrun Calibre and Guidance, both friends to the royal court.

0605145903006962-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well met, adventurers. My name is $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$ and I am a Runeblade of Terrun Calibre. It's an honor to be working alongside you.

0605145903006963-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Uh... Hi. I'm, uh, $npcName:11004029[gender:0]$... of... Guidance...

0605145903006964-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Speak up, brother $npcName:11004029[gender:0]$. They can't hear you. Brother, are you shaking?

0605145903006966-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, um, hi! I'm $npcName:11003977[gender:1]$. I'm also from Guidance. You might have noticed we're not humans. We don't bite. We're just a little different, like Balon of the Seven Heroes.

0605145903006967-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Aren't you going to say something Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$...? Um... Brother? You look pale. Remember your breathing! In through the nose, out through the mouth!

0605145903006968-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well then... We have invited this assembly of experts to the foundation because we believe their knowledge of rune magic and animus will prove valuable toward locating the lapenshards.

0605145903006969-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait a moment... Pemberton, do my eyes deceive me? Is that...?

0605145903006970-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah! You are correct, miss. That is the young $male:man,female:lady$ you've been looking for...

0605145903006972-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!

0605145903006973-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!

0605145903006974-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!

0605145903006977-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I could never forget the face of my savior! Oh brave warrior, guardian of my tender flesh...

0605145903006978-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I quite understand your confusion, $MyPCName$. The young miss was but one of the many people you saved on that day.

0605145903006979-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I speak of course of the attack on Tria.

0605145903006980-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The young lady receives regular treatment in Tria for a chronic illness. She was undergoing such a treatment the day Tria was besieged.

0605145903006981-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Who could have anticipated such an attack? The war against the dark host always seemed such a distant matter.

0605145903006982-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Seeing that great army beyond the city walls, I truly believed it was the end. Though we were prepared to evacuate, there was no route of escape.

0605145903006983-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And then I saw you, $MyPCName$, standing against that indomitable horde.

0605145903006984-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course everyone who fought for Tria that day was a hero. But without you there to defend the royal court, I shudder to think what might have happened.

0605145903006985-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ever since that day the young miss has been looking for you, $MyPCName$. Oh, but I don't mean to imply she's obsessed...

0605145903006986-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've been formulating a plan to acquire you for my own... Hehe...

0605145903006987-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's not at all a creepy thing to say.

0605145903006988-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh! But I'm making a scene. Now, everyone, this concludes our commencement ceremony!

0605145903006989-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Adventurers, please join with your assigned groups and begin your missions. You will find all the pertinent details on your handouts.

0605145903006990-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, oh arbiter of my fate—a moment of your time please.

0605145903006992-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As one of our most elite adventurers, you will serve under the direct control of the foundation director—that's me. In other words I will be entrusting you with the Foundation's most urgent mission.

0605145903006993-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will come for you, after preparations are complete... Hehe.

0605145903006994-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.

0605145903006995-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.

0605145903006996-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.

0605145903006997-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have to say, your plan was pretty detailed. Pairing them up based on their traits and abilities was a smart move. I'm surprised you were able to size them up so quick... Were you trained as a tactician?

0605145903006998-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Something like that! I'm pretty quick-witted, but it was actually Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ who came up with the assignments. Err... $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$?

0605145903006999-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh my... that $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ is so timid. Come over here and make some friends!

0605145903007000-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not here to make friends. Get ready to go, we have our own assignments.

0605145903007001-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Aw! This is the perfect opportunity for Guidance to make a good first impression, and this is how you're using it? Oh! Our elite adventurer is here!

0605145903007004-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You may lead the briefing, oh Moonlight Blade. I am satisfied simply to have $MyPCName$ in my servitude. Hehehe...

0605145903007005-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeesh. This is hard to watch. Reminds me of when you were younger, eh Eupheria? Whenever we were supposed to be training, you'd be off in your own world staring at $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$. Ow! What was that for?!

0605145903007006-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Close your mouth or I will cut out your tongue.

0605145903007007-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...Right. $MyPCName$, barring any further outbursts, I will now explain your personal assignment for the foundation.

0605145903007008-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.

0605145903007009-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.

0605145903007010-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.

0605145903007011-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Since their appearance, there have been a number of incidents surrounding the lapenshards.

0605145903007012-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: These incidents can largely be divided into two categories.

0605145903007013-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The first is the unauthorized distribution and misuse of the lapenshards.

0605145903007014-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of special concern is the issue of evildoers and enemies of the common good who seek the lapenshards in the hopes of unleashing their power.

0605145903007015-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The adventurers we have just dispatched were tasked with preventing the acquisition and sale of lapenshards throughout the world.

0605145903007016-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The second class of incidents involve climate anomalies localized to specific regions.

0605145903007017-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: At first glance, these incidents are nothing more than extreme weather phenomena. But they all began at about the same time the lapenshards appeared, and it is my belief that they have persisted far too long to be natural in cause.

0605145903007018-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Two such cases seem especially suspicious. To the south, the seas churn wildly, endangering any ships who sail them. To the northeast in the chilly mountains of El Nath, an unending blizzard rages cold enough to cause hypothermia in mere minutes.

0605145903007019-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It is my firm belief that these occurrences are connected to the lapenshards. Of course, we'll need to analyze each situation in order to determine the appropriate course of action.

0605145903007020-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just bring a sample of any shards you find in the affected area, and I'll analyze it down to the microscopic level. Teehee. Oh, and there's something I want to talk to you about when we're done here...

0605145903007021-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You give her a glib smile and a thumbs up.)</font>

0605145903007022-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, it will be your personal assignment to investigate these strange phenomena, determine if they are indeed tied to the lapenshards, and, if possible, determine how best to end them.

0605145903007023-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ and I will go on ahead and investigate the blizzard in El Nath. Our fur and feathers offer us some protection from the extreme cold.

0605145903007024-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I'll leave the ocean disturbances to you. I imagine you won't have too much trouble with the intelligence we've already gathered.

0605145903007025-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Already? Outstanding. I see my allowance is not wasted.

0605145903007026-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well then, I leave Maple World's safety in all of your capable hands. Especially yours, $MyPCName$.

0608142103007032-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm sorry for not introducing myself sooner. I'm $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, a Psion called to provide my expertise to the foundation.

0608142103007033-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If the Foundation was looking for someone with experience in magical objects like the lapenshards, they've found an expert in me!

0608142103007034-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: By the way, there's something else I want to discuss with you. Do you have a moment?

0608142103007035-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Foundation charter stipulates that adventurers carrying out special assignments on behalf of the organization are given special dispensation to make use of the lapenshards.

0608142103007036-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's only part of why I wanted to talk to you. Hehehehe...

0608142103007037-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(What's with the creepy look on her face?)</font>

0608142103007038-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You smell like lapenshard. Or rather, I sense the energy of a lapenta emanating from your body.

0608142103007039-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't know how or where you obtained such a power, but... That makes you a very interesting specimen, $MyPCName$.

0608142103007040-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I would be very interested to see what you are capable of with even more powerful lapenshards.

0608142103007041-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As you already know, the Frontier Foundation's primary purpose is acquiring and regulating the lapenshards. But what does regulation entail, anyway?

0608142103007042-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'd say that conducting research on the possible weaponization of lapenshards through the creation of a super-powered army falls under that umbrella.

0608142103007043-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehehe... What do you say, $MyPCName$? Why don't you think of this as another special assignment for the Foundation's favorite adventurer! Collect the lapenshards, use them to your heart's content, and let me study their effects on you!

0608142103007044-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no better way to learn about what different lapenshards can do than through trial and error, right? Here, why don't you try this one on for size and see what happens?

0608142103007045-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm sorry for not introducing myself sooner. I'm $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, a Psion called to provide my expertise to the foundation.

0608142103007046-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, were you able to use the lapenshard I gave you? Tell the truth now!

0608142103007047-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe. You didn't have any trouble did you?

0608142103007048-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Surely someone oozing with as much lapenta energy as you are can manage that little fragment.

0608142103007049-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Fine, don't tell me! However you decide to use the lapenshards, the Foundation is counting on you.

1118071205001679--.name: The knight captain was looking for you. It seemed urgent!

1118071205001682--.name: We've been trying to plan our next steps, but not everyone in our camp sees eye-to-eye.

1118071205001683--.name: Some of us want to hunt $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ down, but others have pointed out that we barely have enough troops to hold the $map:02000146$.

1118071205001684--.name: Of course, then there's the fact that $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ wasn't acting alone. He still has his spies in Dark Wind and the guard. Getting rid of them has to be our first priority.

1118071205001685--.name: But I don't know who among my own people we can trust... so my only option is to place this operation in your hands.

1118071205001687--.name: I'm glad to hear it. Now, the Royal Guard has taken an interest in the $map:02000146$...

1118071205001688--.name: Speak with $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ and see if he has any guidance on where to start.

1118071205001692--.name: That's great. I can't think of anyone better for the job.

1118071205001693--.name: Between $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s betrayal and the caravan attack, someone must have left behind some sort of evidence.

1118071205001694--.name: I'd start with either of those leads.

1118071205001696--.name: My $npcName:11001912[gender:0]$ is out at $map:52000073$ as we speak.

1118071205001697--.name: I'll join up with him, then.

1118071205001698--.name: If you leave now, you should be able to catch him.

1118071205001700--.name: Ah, the great $MyPCName$! How may I help you?

1118071205001702--.name: Yes, yes, of course. I was just about to begin my examination of the room.

1118071205001704--.name: Why don't we split the room into sections?

1118071205001705--.name: Very good. I shall begin my search near the door.

1118071205001710--.name: This is a blueprint of the building. But look here! There's a gap in the floor plan... A hidden room, perhaps?

1118071205001711--.name: There's a gap in the floor plan... A hidden room, perhaps?

1118071205001712--.name: Just as expected. What did you find?

1118071205001714--.name: The ashes on this file are still fresh. Someone was here recently...

1118071205001715--.name: $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s minions are trying to get rid of the evidence. It seems we came here too late...

1118071205001716--.name: Let's see who else has been here.

1118071205001717--.name: $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ is in charge of security. We might try asking him.

1118071205001718--.name: I suspect $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ would know who else has been here.

1118071205001720--.name: Has anyone else been here recently?

1118071205001722--.name: What do you know about the secret room upstairs?

1118071205001723--.name: Secret what now? Never heard of it!

1118071205001724--.name: I-I swear I knew nothing! If I knew about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s plot, I'd have reported it!

1118071205001725--.name: I hardly ever got to set foot in $map:52000073$. Of course I didn't know about any secret hidey holes...

1118071205001726--.name: I-I'm just a common member of Dark Wind. Working hard to keep the city safe. That's all!

1118071205001727--.name: I've got nothing to do with this.

1118071205001731--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He's piecing together the $item:30000600$.)</font>
Most interesting... If I've got these bits in the right order, it's a hit list. You and $npcName:11000064$ are on here...

1118071205001732--.name: Here it says something about... the $map:02000310$? But the bits after this have been burnt away.

1118071205001733--.name: The $map:02000310$... That's where $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ is being held!

1118071205001734--.name: That's right! And it's $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ who provided the evidence we needed to go after $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

1118071205001735--.name: I need to get to the $map:02000310$.

1118071205001739--.name: They got $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. The winged one... and minions...

1118071205001740--.name: I overheard them talking. They were heading to $map:02000134$.

1118071205001741--.name: If you hurry, you might still catch them.

1118071205001743--.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems that you were too late.)</font>

1118071205001746--.name: How goes the hunt for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies?

1118071205001747--.name: (Tell him about the hunt thus far.)

1118071205001751--.name: $npc:11000064[gender:0]$ is in the $map:52000074$ with $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. Did you need him for something?

1118071205001754--.name: But $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ isn't the only target, is he?

1118071205001755--.name: Don't worry. We won't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s goons get near $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.

1118071205001756--.name: But you're sure that $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ still has spies in Dark Wind? What a pain.

1118071205001759--.name: I was hoping it was just a rumor. Our agents don't know who they can trust anymore.

1118071205001760--.name: For all I know, the spies themselves could be spreading the rumor to demoralize us.

1118071205001761--.name: $npc:11000076$ thinks Dark Wind needs a new captain to give us direction. He suggested $npc:11000064[gender:0]$.

1118071205001762--.name: True, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is Captain $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s rightful successor... but we've been hunting him for a long time. It's hard to view him as a friend, even now.

1118071205001764--.name: We've got to learn how to trust each other again. It would be good for Dark Wind to have a captain we can put our faith in.

1118071205001765--.name: I think $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is a fine choice. Of course, we should find out if he actually wants the job first.

1118071205001767--.name: I'm glad you think so. Why don't you go ask $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ for me?

1118071205001769--.name: I wish $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would accept the reality of the situation... Sorry, what's the matter?

1118071205001770--.name: Dark Wind needs a new captain.

1118071205001771--.name: And you want to know if I'm up for the job. Great. If you ask me, $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ would make a much better captain.

1118071205001772--.name: Sure, he left Dark Wind to form Humblis, but he's spent plenty of time working with the members of both groups.

1118071205001773--.name: If you're serious about this, then go speak with $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.

1118071205001774--.name: I'll go see what he thinks.

1118071205001775--.name: Thanks. To be honest, I'm not ready to do anything like lead Dark Wind. Not until I've finished with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

1118071205001776--.name: I know where my focus belongs.

1118071205001777--.name: Good timing. There's something we need to—Hold on. You look too eager. What's up?

1118071205001778--.name: How would you feel about leading Dark Wind?

1118071205001779--.name: I left Dark Wind because $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ was framed and $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ was a tyrant. Now that that's done with, I wouldn't mind going back...

1118071205001780--.name: But I never thought about becoming the boss. If the others want me in charge, then I'll think about it.

1118071205001781--.name: Now, on to other business. You aren't the only one who's been looking for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies. And Humblis, I'm pleased to say, has delivered.

1118071205001782--.name: Some of the traitors have vanished into the woodwork, but there's a group of them still in Dark Wind. As it turns out, you're the next target on their list.

1118071205001783--.name: I thought that might be the case.

1118071205001784--.name: So, how do you feel about being used for bait?

1118071205001788--.name: You know the guy they've got working security at Dark Wind headquarters? $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$? It turns out he's an incurable blabbermouth.

1118071205001789--.name: We can use that mouth of his to our advantage! We'll let slip that you're investigating their secret hideout—alone—and we'll simply wait for word to reach $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.

1118071205001790--.name: They know you're no pushover, so they'll come to the $map:52000070$ in force. Of course, Humblis will be lying in wait...

1118071205001791--.name: It's your time to shine. Why don't you have a little "chat" with $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$?

1118071205001795--.name: Good! I bet he's told half of Dark Wind by now.

1118071205001796--.name: We've waited long enough. They're probably waiting to ambush you in the $map:52000070$. Don't worry, Humblis has your back.

1118071205001798--.name: Yeah, me neither! You better get to the $map:52000070$.

1118071205001800--.name: So, in the secret room... that was hidden behind a secret entrance... there was a second secret door?

1118071205001801--.name: Anyway, it all worked out in the end. A lesser $male:man,female:woman$ wouldn't have survived that.

1118071205001802--.name: I'll make sure $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies get a nice, cozy jail cell to share. It's a shame Dark Wind couldn't take care of this themselves...

1118071205001803--.name: We need to help Dark Wind regroup.

1118071205001804--.name: I'll give this whole "captain" business some thought. In the meantime, there's no need for Humblis anymore, so me and mine will be rejoining Dark Wind.

1118071205001805--.name: I'll talk to $npc:11000119[gender:0]$. You let your friends know that their spy troubles are over.

1118071205001810--.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ will want to hear about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies. Why don't you deliver the news yourself?

1118071205001811--.name: It's about time we had some good news.

1118071205001814--.name: If I know $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$, he's already decided to do it.

1118071205001815--.name: And I'm glad that his spies are gone, but $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is still out there.

1118071205001816--.name: The forces of darkness have infiltrated every corner of Maple World. Dark Wind only represented a fraction of their power.

1118071205001819--.name: $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ has disappeared. A witness says that she wasn't alone...

1118071205001820--.name: And the person who was with her... The witnesses described the same man who took $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.

1118071205001821--.name: If $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ really has been kidnapped, then it's surely a trap to lure out $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. I tried to tell him as much, but he wouldn't listen. He's already taken off to save her.

1118071205001822--.name: I don't have time to muster my forces. Go ahead of my knights and give $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ some backup.

1118071205001823--.name: One of the witnesses say a new passageway to the Land of Darkness opened up. That's where $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ was headed.

1118071205001824--.name: Hurry. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ needs all the help he can get.

1118071205001825--.name: $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. That... that demon was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. And $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ was with him!

1118071205001826--.name: What happened to him? And why is $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ just going along with him?

1118071205001827--.name: I was ready to fight $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ stopped me.

1118071205001828--.name: She told me not to follow her, then disappeared into the Land of Darkness. $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... He must have tricked her somehow!

1118071205001830--.name: You have to promise not to tell anyone about this. The others will think that $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ defected, but I know that can't be true. And if they see her with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$...

1118071205001831--.name: We can't let anyone send a search party, either. If anyone asks, tell them... I don't know! Tell them she went on a vacation!

1118071205001832--.name: I'm asking a lot, but I need you to trust me.

1118071205001836--.name: So there's no need to send any search parties!

1118071205001837--.name: Hm. If you say she's safe, I suppose that's good enough for me.

1118071205001839--.name: We split up. He isn't back yet?

1118071205001840--.name: No. I kinda need to talk with him and $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ about picking a new leader for Dark Wind.

1118071205001841--.name: I'll go find him for you.

1118071205001842--.name: That'd be great. The sooner we can get Dark Wind on its feet, the better.

1118071205001843--.name: We gotta pick a new leader soon...

1118071205001845--.name: <font color="#909090">(Where did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ go? If anyone knows the answer, it would be $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.)</font>

1118071205001846--.name: <font color="#909090">(Where did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ go? If anyone knows the answer, it would be $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.)</font>

1118071205001847--.name: There's no doubt in my mind. That idiot went into the Land of Darkness to find $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$.

1118071205001848--.name: He's trying to keep you safe by leaving you behind. I'll get my people together and look for him.

1118071205001849--.name: Don't worry about this. I'll loop $npcName:11000266[gender:0]$ in on the situation.

1118071205001850--.name: I think this situation warrants a more... unconventional approach.

1118071205001851--.name: I think this situation warrants a more... unconventional approach.

1118071205001852--.name: It won't take long for the others to notice that $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s missing. Our new friends will start to talk.

1118071205001853--.name: I'll do my best to keep our search on the down-low, but Humblis isn't a thing anymore. It's hard to move people around when the other half of Dark Wind is watching you.

1118071205001854--.name: Let me guess. You want me to lead the search.

1118071205001856--.name: I don't use her often, but I know someone who has proven useful in cases like this. Her methods are... eccentric.

1118071205001857--.name: Seek her out at the $map:03000103$. You'll know her when you see her.

1118071205001859--.name: You're looking for someone, aren't you? Yes, I can see him. I can help you find your little blond friend... for a price.

1118071205001860--.name: I've been itching for some of my special potion, yes? But the dark magic is so thick in the air, I've been wallowing in it. I'm much, much too relaxed to move now.

1118071205001861--.name: Bring me the ingredients for my potion, and I will show you the one you seek. A fair bargain, no?

1118071205001863--.name: Good, good! Bring me sharp $itemPlural:30000614$, a wriggly pile of $itemPlural:30000615$, and fluttery $itemPlural:30000616$!

1118071205001865--.name: Fine, fine, yes. These are very good.

1118071205001866--.name: The one you seek went where mortals should not tread. That place is dangerous, and dripping in delicious shadows! Will you join him?

1118071205001868--.name: The fool has foolish friends! The darkness will swallow you alive, child. But if it's what you want, I'll be happy to send you to your doom!

1118071205001869--.name: Ready to throw your life away? I am happy to send you back to the $map:52000076$.

1214225905001874--.name: You're as reckless as he is. Who am I to deny you your doom?

1214225905001875--.name: Yes, cower. No need to die so young...

0529145205001894--.name: I want to give you my thanks. Not just on my own behalf, but on behalf of all of the guards. Without your help, we would have lost $map:02000001$.

0529145205001896--.name: Like the empress said, we need to prepare a counter attack. I hope we can count on you.

0529145205001898--.name: I stand as a pillar of the empire. I'll mourn the dead in my own time, but for now, it's my job to set an example for my men.

0412151805001876--.name: Goldus Bank, shmoldus bank. You'd think a fancy place like this would have a sturdier safe.

0412151805001877--.name: Let's clean this place out before the cops get here!

0412151805001878--.name: Grab all the loot you can!

0412151805001879--.name: Necklaces are nice. Diamonds are ace. But nothing beats cold, hard cash.

0412151805001880--.name: Well now, aren't you in a chipper mood today?

0412151805001881--.name:
I'm just happy to see your smiling face.
<font color="#909090">(You slide a tall stack of mesos to her.)</font>

0412151805001882--.name: And you always know just how to make me smile. My darling granddaughter will eat good tonight.

0412151805001883--.name: On that note, I better go spread the wealth, eh?

0412151805001884--.name: We're so lucky to have you.

0412151805001885--.name: Never let it be said that we don't look out for our own here.

0412151805001886--.name: If we don't, who will? Consider this a tax refund.

0412151805001887--.name: Well, when you put it that way...

0419144305001888--.name: You must hurry to the forward camp, $MyPCName$. There are wounded...

0419144305001889--.name: It's $npc:11003328$'s scouting party. They came limping back into camp...

0419144305001890--.name: Quickly, you must tend to the wounded!

0419144305001892--.name: How do you feel? Is that better?

0914154505001928--.name: It looks like I have to clean this place up myself. Again.

0612164305001901--.name: Yaaawn! What a good nap... Why'd you have to go and wake me up?

0612164305001902--.name: I picked up the trash. It's your turn to get the archery range set up.

0612164305001904--.name: But $npcName:11003380[gender:1]$ herself said we all have to do it!

0612164305001905--.name: Hey, I've got a great idea. Why don't you do it and tell her I did?

0612164305001906--.name: It's not like I don't want to help you or anything. I'm just feeling stiff. Need to stretch out those joints before I get out of bed, you know?

0612164305001908--.name: Fine, fine, I'll do it. Guess I'll be too tired later to show you that archery trick we were talking about...

0612164305001909--.name: Oh well. I guess you didn't really want to learn it, after all...

0612164305001910--.name: N-no! You rest up. I'll get everything set up!

0612164305001911--.name: That's more like it. Wake me up when you're done, all right?

0612164305001912--.name: But what if $npcName:11003380[gender:1]$ sees you sleeping in?

0612164305001913--.name: Yeah, yeah, like I'm scared of my little sister. Don't sweat it.

0612164305001914--.name: I'm trying to get some shut-eye here.

0621005905001916--.name: Ugh... I couldn't sleep last night, and now... I feel...

0621005905001917--.name: Just hold on. I'll get you back to the training yard. Surely someone there can save you!

0621005905001920--.name: P-please, brother! You must help me! I think my friend... he's going to...!

0621005905001922--.name: Yes. One of the other squires is extremely ill. If he isn't treated, I'm afraid he might...

0621005905001923--.name: You want something from me. Of course. Not like I got anything better to do.

0621005905001924--.name: <FONT color='#909090'>(He narrows his eyes at you and gives an annoyed sigh.)</FONT>

0621005905001925--.name: Problem is, healing magic isn't exactly my... thing. I'm sure $npcName:11003330[gender:1]$ would just loooove to help, though!

0621005905001926--.name: There's no time. Please, hurry! This way!

0621005905001927--.name: Twist my arm, why don't ya! I mean... As you wish, my $male:brother,female:sister$.

0518171205002251-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Huh, a letter from $npcName:11001540$. It's been a while. According to this, he's found something interesting and he wants to meet. Well, it's been a while since you paid a visit to your old stomping grounds...)</font>

0518171205002252-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey! Over here! I was worried you might've gotten lost.

0518171205002253-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey! Over here! I was worried you might've gotten lost.

0518171205002254-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's pretty funny. This is my home turf, pal. I know this place like the back of my hand. I could tell you how many telephone poles there are.

0601131705004098-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In your letter you said something about coming across something interesting. What did you mean?

0622125005004237-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You realize that these days nothing sparks my interest unless it's worth at least 100 million on the Black Market, right?

0601131705004099-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeah, sure, you're a reaaaal big shot. But seriously, I brought you here to show you something important. Let's talk inside.

0601131705004101-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you out of your mind? You know what this place is, don't you?

0518171205002255-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Haha. Yeah, along time ago maybe. This place used to be a Dark Wind hideout. They say even wild monsters kept their distance out of fear.

0518171205002256-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then what could possibly be so important that you think I'm going in there?

0601131705004104-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Chill out. This place has been abandoned for ages. It's our hideout now.

0601131705004106-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did you actually meet some people willing to tolerate you? I didn't think I'd ever see you with friends in my lifetime.

0518171205002258-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shut up... Let's go inside. I have something to show you.

0518171205002259-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It'd better be good, considering how much you've talked it up!

0518171205002260-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hah. Just try not to have a heart attack, all right?

0622130105004282-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Puhaha! You should see the look on your face.

0622130105004283-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... It's almost like you saw a ghost or something.

0622130105004284-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, $MyPCName$. Long time no see. How've you been?

0622130105004285-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That Jonathan... I guess he really did find something interesting. I can't believe you're both here...

0518171205002264-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Something's different about you, $MyPCName$. You seem more... Intense.

0518171205002265-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's what I was going to say!

0518171205002266-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hah. Did I get tougher? Is that what you're trying to say? Yes, yes, I am 1200% more awesome now. A whole lot's happened since I saw you guys. Shall I regale you with tales of my heroism?

0518171205002267-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Err... I was just going to ask if you got a haircut or something.

0518171205002269-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, did you have a run-in with $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ too?! When we came to, we couldn't help but worry if he'd gotten to you.

0518171205002270-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I think I'm the one who should be asking the questions here. After what $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ said, I thought you guys were dead!

0518171205002271-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ tried to take them out, but he botched the job.

0518171205002273-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When I found them they were both pretty cut up, but they managed to pull through. After they recovered we roamed around a bit, trying to steer clear of Blackstar. Eventually we ended up here. Thanks to these guys I'm basically a fugitive now...

0518171205002275-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey! Seeing as we're all together again, I think this calls for a little celebration!

0518171205002276-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know you've got important hero-y stuff to do, but why don't you just take a load off for bit?

0518171205002277-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know you've got important hero-y stuff to do, but why don't you just take a load off for bit?

0518171205002278-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeah! Let's raid the juice bar! I know you've been busy with all your hero stuff recently, but you've gotta take a break now and then to celebrate the little things!

0601131705004107-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003273[gender:1]$... Do you realize who you're talking to?

0518171205002279-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, guys, I don't know how long that stuff's been sitting on the shelf...

0518171205002280-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't be such a partypooper, juice doesn't go bad! Besides, a day like this is the perfect time to get our drank on. No one's leaving here 'til that juice is gone!

0601131705004109-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: C'mon Jonathan. Get over here and have a seat! I'm guessing you haven't partied with these guys before. I'll tell you right now, they can handle their sugar. So don't hurt yourself trying to keep up.

0518171205002284-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They're both completely passed out... Talk about a sugar crash.

0518171205002285-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They haven't changed a bit! I can't believe we really made it through all that juice. The bottles are empty.

0601131705004110-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I could barely keep up—I'm still super jittery here... I've gotta tell you, Jonathan. You've gotta be careful when you hit the juice with these ones. Sometimes, they scare me more than the forces of darkness.

0518171205002286-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: While they're out, there's something I need to talk to you about. Follow me.

0518171205002287-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Why's he so serious all of the sudden?)</font>

0518171205002289-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've heard a lot of things since you've been gone.

0518171205002290-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've heard a lot of things since you've been gone.

0518171205002291-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've heard a lot of things since you've been gone. Information you'd be quite interested to hear.

0614162605004236-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
Take a look at this picture.
<font color="#909090">(He shows you a photograph of a young man exchanging colorful crystals for an impressive amount of cash.)</font>

0518171205002295-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is what I called you here to talk about. Do you happen to recognize those crystals he's holding?

0518171205002296-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They look like ordinary crystal fragments. Who in their right mind would pay so much for them though?

0518171205002300-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Strange crystals that showed up out of nowhere. People have been finding them all across the globe.

0518171205002301-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't know how they work, but word is the lapenshards grant you special abilities. People have been making a killing selling them to criminal-types in dark alleys.

0608135405004120-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Strength is everything in this world, and now people are selling a shortcut to power.

0518171205002302-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Obviously, there's no way Blackstar will miss out on an opportunity like this.

0518171205002304-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then I know what I have to do!

0518171205002306-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll use those lapenshards to draw out $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$, and then I'll end him for good.

0518171205002307-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can't believe he has the nerve to show his face around here... I'll make $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ pay for what he's done.

0518171205002308-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just stop and think for a second. Criminals are going crazy for these lapenshards because they make you stronger, and $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ is sitting on a mountain of them. He's not just some petty thug anymore.

0518171205002309-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just stop and think for a second. Criminals are going crazy for these lapenshards because they make you stronger, and $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ is sitting on a mountain of them. He's not just some petty thug anymore.

0518171205002310-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just stop and think for a second. Criminals are going crazy for these lapenshards because they make you stronger, and $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ is sitting on a mountain of them. He's not just some petty thug anymore.

0518171205002312-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know you're some kind of big hero now, but believe me, you can't take on $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ in your current state.

0518171205002313-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You're kidding, right? Do you realize I basically fight giant demons and monsters on a regular basis these days?

0518171205002314-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: "Here lies $MyPCName$. Defender of Maple World and vanquisher of the immortal demon lord Infernog. Sadly, $male:he,female:she$ was no match for the great and terrible fiend known only as '$npcName:11001927[gender:0]$'."

0518171205002315-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not kidding. You haven't seen what a single lapenshard can do. I don't even know how many he's got.

0611132605004207-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Okay then, Mr. Know-it-all, what should I do?

0611132605004208-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ betrayed me, and tried to kill my crew. That's not something I can just let slide.

0611132605004209-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Haven't you been listening to what I've been saying? All sorts of people have been using the lapenshards for a quick power boost...

0611132605004211-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes. You should use the lapenshards yourself.

0611132605004212-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's not like only bad guys can use them... I wanted to get stronger, too. It wasn't easy, but I got my hands on a lapenshard.

0611132605004213-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Jonathan... Are you saying you used a lapenshard and now you're super strong?

0611132605004214-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Haha... Unfortunately, it seems I wasn't compatible. I did everything I could think of, but I couldn't get the lapenshard to work.

0611132605004215-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess I wasn't meant for that kind of power.

0611132605004216-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's pretty lame man, sorry. So what now?

0611132605004217-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I still have the lapenshard.

0611132605004219-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I figure just because it didn't work for me, doesn't mean it won't work for you.

0611132605004221-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So I want you to have it.

0611132605004222-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: R-really? Are you sure about this?

0611132605004224-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll teach you some cool new skills I picked up.

0518171205002316-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just remember. $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ may be out there living the high life...

0518171205002317-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But that doesn't mean you can't have the last laugh.

0518171205002318-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I think I'm ready. It's time to make my move.

0518171205002319-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I think I'm ready. It's time to make my move.

0518171205002320-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I think I'm ready. It's time to make my move.

0518171205002321-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You definitely seem stronger than before.

0611132605004225-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Must be all that lapenshard power flowing through your body.

0518171205002322-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: With your new power and what I've taught you, I guess you might be ready to take on $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$.

0518171205002323-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You probably guessed as much from the fat stack of mesos he was counting in the photo, but $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ has gotten pretty big in the criminal underworld.

0518171205002324-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You probably guessed as much from the fat stack of mesos he was counting in the photo, but $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ has gotten pretty big in the criminal underworld.

0518171205002325-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You probably guessed as much from the fat stack of mesos he was counting in the photo, but $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ has gotten pretty big in the criminal underworld.

0518171205002326-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To track him down, we have to figure out who he's selling the lapenshards to. I can't think of a better place to get that kind of intel than the organization responsible for regulating them.

0608135405004121-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: An organization in charge of regulating lapenshards? Is that a thing?

0608135405004122-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They're called the Frontier Foundation. They were established by the royal court to stop exactly the kind of under-the-table lapenshard dealing that Kyle's involved in.

0608135405004123-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'd be willing to bet they know a lot about what he's been up to. They're probably even tracking Blackstar's movements.

0608135405004124-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go pay them a visit!

0518171205002327-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Listen... All this help I've been giving you doesn't come free.

0608135405004126-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You're just messing with me, right Jonathan?

0518171205002328-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not. In fact I've already calculated my price.

0518171205002330-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: (I guess he has done a lot for me...)

0518171205002331-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: (I guess he has done a lot for me...)

0518171205002332-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: (I guess he has done a lot for me...)

0518171205002333-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Even if he asks for a lot of money, I have to consider it.)</font>

0518171205002334-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... fine, tell me about your price.

0518171205002335-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You might not like it, but it's non-negotiable.

0608135405004127-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(...Just how much is he going to ask for?)</font>

0518171205002344-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have to tell you Jonathan, you're an interesting guy.

0622125005004238-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I thought it was obvious, but I've considered you a brother since the moment you took me and my friends in!

0622125005004239-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...Brother? You say that so casually. I only did what anyone would've done.

0622125005004240-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What are you talking about? What you've done for us goes way beyond that!

0622125005004241-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems like Jonathan has spent so much of his life in the criminal underworld that he doesn't understand things like loyalty and friendship are earned, not traded.)</font>

0622125005004242-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Perhaps the best way you can repay his kindness is to help him learn what friendship is really about.)</font>

0518171205002345-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've gotta get going, but we'll all see each other again someday.

0518171205002346-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've gotta get going, but we'll all see each other again someday.

0518171205002347-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've gotta get going, but we'll all see each other again someday.

0622125005004243-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, are you really leaving so soon?

0622125005004244-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But we've barely just reconnected! And we've been stuck here hiding out forever! Can’t you stay a while longer?

0622125005004245-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You haven't even told us half your adventuring stories! You can't leave us hanging! Who knows when we'll see each other next?

0622125005004246-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hahaha. I'm afraid you'll have to live with the suspense. Sorry.

0622125005004247-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I really do have to get a move on, but I promise I'll be back as soon as I can.

0622125005004248-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Until then, look after each other and stay out of trouble!

0524162105002351-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right... Now what was it Blackeye said about recovering my memories? I should start by picturing somewhere familiar.

0608135405004129-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They've begun popping up all over the world. From the moment they were discovered, Dark Wind has been researching them.

0608135405004130-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've been able to confirm that a number of individuals have been granted unusual power through the use of the lapenshards. By analyzing this power, we came to a determination.

0524162105002355-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The lapenshards bear the power of the lapentas. It was for this that they were named.

0524162105002356-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Granted, their power is far weaker than that of the lapentas in their original state. Still, they're quite powerful and possess similar traits to the lapentas.

0524162105002358-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is a red lapenshard. Unlike the red lapenta, it doesn't control time itself, but its abilities derive from that same power.

0524162105002359-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This shard was a Dark Wind research sample.

0524162105002361-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sadly, it disappeared from the lab. Perhaps lost due to clerical error, or stolen by a skilled thief. (He winks.)

0608135405004131-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Who can say what happened to it?

0524162105002363-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In any case, because it's power is tied to mastery of time, I was hoping it might help you in your quest to unlock your forgotten memories.

0524162105002364-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In any case, because it's power is tied to mastery of time, I was hoping it might help you in your quest to unlock your forgotten memories.

0524162105002365-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In any case, because it's power is tied to mastery of time, I was hoping it might help you in your quest to unlock your forgotten memories.

0524162105002366-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Here are copies of the research we conducted on the lapenshard as well. Perhaps it'll be of use in drawing out the shard's power.

0524162105002367-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I hope you find what was taken from you.

0524162105002368-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Could it really help me restore my lost memories?

0524162105002369-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want to remember, at any cost!

0524162105002370-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Please give me the power to remember the memories stolen from me.

0524162105002371-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shadow Crow! He's talking with someone...

0524162105002372-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shadow Crow! He's talking with someone...

0524162105002373-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shadow Crow! He's talking with someone...

0524162105002374-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you don't want any trouble, you'll hand the child over now.

0524162105002375-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The child will never be yours.

0524162105002376-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll sooner die than allow it!

0524162105002377-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A pity. Very well. I find your terms agreeable.

0524162105002382-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My head... I don't understand. What is this memory?

0524162105002383-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait... Is that me as a child?

0524162105002385-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't cry... You need to be strong now...

0524162105002389-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why do I feel like this?

0524162105002390-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why do I feel like this?

0524162105002391-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why do I feel like this?

0524162105002392-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So much rage... burning inside of me.

0524162105002396-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You want to kill me, don't you child? Good, let the hate flow through you.

0524162105002397-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Soon we'll see if you have what it takes.

0608135405004135-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It was a memory of my past, I'm sure of it.

0524162105002405-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Have I really spent my whole life committing terrible acts for the man who destroyed my family?

0524162105002406-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What do I do with all this rage?

0524162105002411-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I remember every single skill he taught me. But that technique...

0524162105002416-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$ taught me everything I know. But he didn't teach me everything he knows.

0524162105002418-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He kept the most powerful skills from me... He was afraid I would use them to kill him...

0524162105002419-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He was right to hide them.

0524162105002420-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But now that I've seen his technique...

0524162105002421-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know how to use it.

0524162105002425-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will strike you down with your own technique.

0524162105002426-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Word is you've been practicing a new technique.

0524162105002427-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Word is you've been practicing a new technique.

0524162105002428-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Word is you've been practicing a new technique.

0524162105002429-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: From the way it was described to me, it sounded very similar to a technique I learned long ago—though I'm not sure where.

0524162105002431-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I did. But I decided it was far too cruel for the kind of rogue I want to become.

0524162105002432-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To that end, I took steps to ensure the technique was outlawed.

0608135405004136-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That was not an easy decision. It is a very powerful technique. Any rogue would be tempted by its allure.

0608135405004137-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Even so... Perhaps in your hands, that technique may one day be used to save the world.

0524162105002434-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It would also be the perfect way to deal with our shared enemy.

0524162105002435-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Also... I looked into your request.

0524162105002436-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Also... I looked into your request.

0524162105002437-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Also... I looked into your request.

0524162105002438-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The details are sketchy, but we have received reports regarding $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$'s activities.

0524162105002439-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So, he's finally come out of hiding!

0524162105002441-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Our sources indicate he and his Rooks have been collecting lapenshards throughout the world. We suspected he wouldn't ignore this chance.

0524162105002442-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then we have to find him!

0524162105002444-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Dark Wind is continuing its research into the lapenshards, but there is still more we must learn before we can track down $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$ and his followers.

0524162105002445-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Dark Wind is continuing its research into the lapenshards, but there is still more we must learn before we can track down $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$ and his followers.

0524162105002446-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Dark Wind is continuing its research into the lapenshards, but there is still more we must learn before we can track down $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$ and his followers.

0608135405004138-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: After your firsthand experience with the lapenshards, you no doubt see there are those that will come covet that power.

0524162105002449-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a place called the Frontier Foundation.

0601144305004115-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The world's foremost authority on lapenshards. They were established by the royal court. Recently, they began recruiting adventurers...

0524162105002450-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We could learn a lot about the lapenshards from them, if we play our cards right. We might even learn what the forces of darkness hope to achieve using the lapenshards. Also...

0608135405004141-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We may uncover information about $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$'s current whereabouts.

0608135405004142-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The sooner I get my hands on $npcName:11003185[gender:0]$, the better!

0524162105002451-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then what do you say to joining the Frontier Foundation?

0608135405004143-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you even have to ask?

0525125305002452-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's been a while since I've been home... Maybe I should pay Rien a visit and make sure Lilin hasn't gone totally nutso living alone out there. I'd better head to Lith and charter a boat.

0525125305002453-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... It's been so long since I left $map:52000104$, but what's really changed? I feel like my power has peaked...

0623120505004292-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Gah, who left these stupid crystals lying all over the floor? If I step on one more ugly rock, I'm going to smash something!

0608135405004145-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... It's been so long since I left $map:52000104$, but what's really changed? I feel like my power has peaked...

0608135405004146-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's getting harder to control my anger... How long can I really keep the god of rage at bay?

0525125305002456-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I'd never tell her this, but she's smart and collected. She always knows what to do. Maybe she could help me with my current predicament.

0525125305002458-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So why haven't you gone to see her?

0525125305002461-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I still haven't found the old man, and I'm probably not even tough enough to beat him if I did. How am I supposed to face her like this?

0525125305002463-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well that's a mean thing for me to say!

0525125305002470-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What am I doing here? Well I'll tell you—

0525125305002472-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's the stupidest thing you've said yet.

0525125305002473-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then how did you know I was here, huh?!

0525125305002474-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: W-well, I did ask an information dealer to track you down.

0525125305002475-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's how I found out you were coming to $map:02000062$...

0525125305002476-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, okay then. So what you're saying is...

0525125305002478-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't be such a brat! You're acting like I'm the one in the wrong.

0525125305002480-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Where the heck have you been? You don't visit, you don't write. For all I know you could've been dead in a ditch somewhere. I was worried.

0525125305002481-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This whole time I was sitting there waiting on that island like an idiot! For no reason!

0525125305002483-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why don't we go home for now? I'll catch you up on everything.

0525125305002484-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did you make up that whole story as an excuse because you don't want to come home? Just tell me the truth.

0525125305002485-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did you make up that whole story as an excuse because you don't want to come home? Just tell me the truth.

0525125305002486-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did you make up that whole story as an excuse because you don't want to come home? Just tell me the truth.

0525125305002488-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003174[gender:0]$... there's something I want to discuss with you.

0525125305002490-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why are you acting so serious all of the sudden?

0525125305002491-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Have you seen one of these stones before?

0525125305002493-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I stumbled over it earlier, and I just got so mad... There's something about it. Ever since then, I feel like this power is boiling inside me. I'm afraid it's going to blast its way out.

0525125305002495-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I thought... maybe you would know what to do.

0525125305002496-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you can't control that power inside you...

0525125305002497-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then why don't you just let it out?

0525125305002499-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Aren't you the one who told me to repress my rage?!

0525125305002502-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You know something about this rock, don't you?

0525125305002504-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've already analyzed that "rock" and your current state.

0525125305002509-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The lapenshards are mysterious crystals that started showing up all over the world recently. They seem to be connected somehow to the lapentas. But more importantly...

0525125305002510-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: From what I've heard, people are using the lapenshards to become stronger or unlock strange new powers. People are going crazy for them.

0525125305002512-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This little stone can do all that?

0525125305002513-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...It's not a stone, it's a lapenshard!

0525125305002514-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And I believe it's beginning to awaken the god of rage's power sealed away inside of you.

0525125305002515-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Isn't that like, the opposite of good?

0525125305002516-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't worry. I have an idea.

0525125305002517-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: While I was waiting for SOMEONE to come home to $map:52000104$, I read through grandpa's old books on the god of rage. At least the parts I could translate.

0525125305002518-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a lot in there about how the god of rage fought. I know this is going to sound weird, but...

0525125305002520-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Considering your current state, I think it's time for an unconventional approach.

0525125305002521-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Considering your current state, I think it's time for an unconventional approach.

0525125305002522-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Considering your current state, I think it's time for an unconventional approach.

0525125305002523-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you can master the techniques employed by the god of rage...

0525125305002524-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You might be able to control the rage that comes with that power.

0608135405004148-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait, so you're saying I get to unleash my god-power, without having to worry about trying not to rage out all the time?

0525125305002525-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes. Of course, it's only a theory.

0601154605004116-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Train me, oh wise reader of stuffy old books!

0525125305002530-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We'll travel to one of Rien's remote islands.

0525125305002534-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So hey, why are we going to some remote island again?

0525125305002535-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: According to grandpa's books, the god of rage never actually did battle with anybody directly...

0525125305002536-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When he wanted to do someone harm, he'd sink the entire island they lived on into the sea.

0525125305002537-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No way... You're saying I get to—f

0525125305002539-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The goal of this training exercise is to destroy the island itself.

0622125005004250-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I think that small islet over there is a good place to start.

0622125005004252-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#00aaef">The next day...</font>
This island's a little bigger. Let's try this one today.

0622125005004254-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#00aaef">One day later...</font>
How about we start with this one today?

0622125005004255-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font size="40">Wahahaha! I AM BECOME RAGE, DESTROYER OF ISLANDS!</font>

0525125305002541-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've destroyed all of the islets around $map:52000104$...

0525125305002542-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've destroyed all of the islets around $map:52000104$...

0525125305002543-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've destroyed all of the islets around $map:52000104$...

0525125305002550-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Where did you get such a stupid idea?

0525125305002551-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm so glad we're not related...

0525125305002552-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well then, what am I supposed to destroy today? I want to start my training!

0525125305002554-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You're just like the god of rage in the old stories.

0525125305002556-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But now our real work begins.

0525125305002557-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But now our real work begins.

0525125305002558-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But now our real work begins.

0525125305002559-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait what? Then what was all that training I've done up until now?

0525125305002560-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The training was to help you channel your rage constructively. It was based on what I read in grandpa's books, but there was only so much I was able to translate.

0525125305002561-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm relieved that you were able to keep a handle on your rage during your training, for the most part...

0525125305002564-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What's that? A type of bread?

0525125305002565-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003174[gender:0]$, I don't see how me going to some stuffy party is going to help anything.

0525125305002566-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003174[gender:0]$, I don't see how me going to some stuffy party is going to help anything.

0525125305002567-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003174[gender:0]$, I don't see how me going to some stuffy party is going to help anything.

0525125305002568-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, how long do you plan to sit around $map:52000104$?

0525125305002570-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Right now there are bad guys all over the world rushing to get their hands on the lapenshards and use them for who knows what! You can stop them.

0525125305002571-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frontier Foundation—the organization in charge of regulating the lapenshards—is looking for adventurers to help them. You're going to join them.

0525125305002572-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And while you're there, you're going to make friends with the higher ups—people who can help us with our search for grandpa.

0525125305002573-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(So that's what she's really after...)</font>

0608135405004149-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So what's the deal with this Frontier Foundation?

0608135405004150-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They're the foremost authority on studying the lapenshards and preventing them from ending up in the wrong hands. You could learn a lot about the lapenshards there, and maybe how to better unlock your power.

0608135405004151-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want you to go there, learn about the lapenshards, shmooze with the people in charge, and get their help finding grandpa!

0608135405004152-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Yeesh, $npcName:11003174[gender:0]$ is really set on this...)</font>

0528143105002588-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right! I'll find the old man for sure this time.

0528143105002589-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right! I'll find the old man for sure this time.

0525125305002577-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right! I'll find the old man for sure this time.

0525125305002582-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Is there something off with your inner rage?

0525125305002584-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Next time, before I come home... I'm going to write you a letter.

0525125305002585-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So there's no need to come looking for me, all right? See you then!

0528170005002452-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ooh! A letter from Kaitlyn! It seems like she wants to catch up! I should return to Ellinel and talk to her!

0528170005002453-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sorry I haven't been in touch, my life's been pretty crazy lately!

0528170005002454-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sorry I haven't been in touch, my life's been pretty crazy lately!

0528170005002455-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Tria got attacked, I rode on an airship, a big scary demon got summoned to destroy the world... It's been a whirlwind.

0528170005002456-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But today I get to unwind and have a barbecue with my best friend Kate!

0528170005002457-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Best friend? Who said we were best friends?

0528170005002458-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmph! Don't act like we're on the same level! I'm way out of your league!

0528170005002460-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I wonder when our meal will be done cooking. Is it supposed to be wriggling like that?

0528170005002461-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey! Are you even listening to me?!

0528170005002462-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... if only Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ were here...

0528170005002463-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... if only Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ were here...

0528170005002464-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... if only Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ were here...

0528170005002465-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm really worried... Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is growing weaker by the day.

0528170005002466-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Somehow outsiders made their way into the school, and rifled through the place looking for something. The academy is still a mess.

0528170005002467-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A lot of students left after that. These days the library is completely empty...

0528170005002468-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: S-so... I was thinking, maybe you should come back to the academy... Just to help me sort everything out.

0528170005002469-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you think I should turn up the heat?

0528170005002471-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ahem... Like I was saying, there's something I want to discuss with you.

0528170005002473-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, maybe we should lower the spit so it's closer to the fire?

0528170005002475-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmm... I wonder if there any spells to make meat cook faster? Kate, do you know any?

0528170005002480-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, I'm sorry Kate. You must be starving too. I'm a little mad myself. But I just can't understand why it's not cooking...

0528170005002482-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Your stomach growls ravenously.)</font>
Ugh... I don't think I'm going to make it...

0528170005002484-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: After everything you've been through, I assumed you had changed—but you're just the same as always! Sigh. Well, I might as well tell you what happened...

0528170005002485-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(If things continue like this, you'll have no choice but to use magic...)</font>

0528170005002490-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Rock candy? It's so shiny and colorful...

0528170005002492-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Hmm... You can't tell how long it's been on the ground, but a little bacteria's supposed to be good for you, right?)</font>

0528170005002493-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(If you don't do something soon you'll literally starve to death! So what if it gives you a stomachache later? As long as it does something for your hunger...)</font>

0528170005002495-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: —and that's everything that happened... Err, you what?

0528170005002496-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait, that stone you're holding is a... Huh?!

0528170005002502-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you a complete and utter imbecile?! That was a lapenshard! I can't believe you ate that!

0528170005002503-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Om, nom, nom... A lapen... what?

0528170005002506-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090"> (Kaitlyn coughs violently as the smoke begins to clear.)</font>
What's going on?

0528170005002507-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090"> (Kaitlyn coughs violently as the smoke begins to clear.)</font>
What's going on?

0528170005002508-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090"> (Kaitlyn coughs violently as the smoke begins to clear.)</font>
What's going on?

0528170005002510-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All this mana! Are you okay?!

0528170005002512-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no way your body can handle that much mana... I'll need to devise a spell to siphon some of it away... Just hold on!

0528170005002514-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
You... You're really okay? Look at me for a second!
<font color="#909090">(Kaitlyn leans in and inspects your pupils.)</font>

0528170005002515-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
You... You're really okay? Look at me for a second!
<font color="#909090">(Kaitlyn leans in and inspects your pupils.)</font>

0528170005002516-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
You... You're really okay? Look at me for a second!
<font color="#909090">(Kaitlyn leans in and inspects your pupils.)</font>

0528170005002517-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've never felt this much mana flowing through my body! It feels all buzzy! And... I'm suddenly remembering spells I never bothered to write down in class!

0528170005002521-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: L-let's return to the academy so I can look you over.

0622125005004257-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey! Professor Einos's lab! It's been a while. Hehe!

0622125005004258-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As you know, the professor isn't well. He's resting in the infirmary.

0622125005004259-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've been using his lab in the interim—just until the Professor gets better.

0622125005004260-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I see... Then I guess that makes this your lab!

0622125005004261-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough! Get undressed, I need to inspect you.

0528170005002526-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's... nothing out of the ordinary?

0528170005002527-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: With that much mana flowing through you, you should've exploded like an over-inflated meat balloon! But... instead you're just stronger...

0528170005002528-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What? Why did you think there would be anything wrong? All I did was eat some rock candy...

0528170005002530-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That wasn't some "rock candy" you found lying on the ground, it was a magical crystal called a lapenshard!

0528170005002531-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Huh? Oh right, I remember you saying something like that earlier...

0608135405004153-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... I can't believe how scared you got. You're a real hoot, Kate.

0528170005002533-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You took one of the mysterious crystals that've started cropping up around the world, that no one has fully studied, and you're instinctive response was to put it in your mouth...

0528170005002534-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I heard of people unlocking new powers using the lapenshards, but... By eating them? You must be the first.

0528170005002536-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yaaaaaawn. Who cares about all that?

0528170005002537-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've never felt this strong before. This is awesome!

0528170005002541-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well... Considering the circumstances... Why don't you join the Frontier Foundation and find out just how the lapenshard has affected you?

0608135405004155-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frontier Foundation is an organization founded by the royal court to study the lapenshards. I'm sure you could learn loads about the lapenshards there.

0528170005002543-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And according to some people who had visited the Foundation...

0528170005002544-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They're actively recruiting adventurers to assist them.

0528170005002545-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know you've played a big role in the war against the forces of darkness...

0528170005002546-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know you've played a big role in the war against the forces of darkness...

0528170005002547-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know you've played a big role in the war against the forces of darkness...

0528170005002548-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But they remain a pressing threat to all of Maple World.

0528170005002549-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So if you were able to grow stronger using the power of the lapenshards, there's no reason for scholarly mages such as my self to stay cooped up in a room doing research.

0528170005002550-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We could be out there helping protect the world!
