0528170005002554-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well—what do you think of my idea?

0528170005002555-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Kate! You've turned into a real brainiac while I was gone!

0528170005002557-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You know, I always thought you'd make a good professor! Now you're really acting the part!

0528170005002559-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: With things as they are, shouldn't I be doing my part to help out?

0528170005002561-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, if Professor Kate thinks I should go to the Frontier Foundation, then that's where I'll go! Hehe!

0528170005002562-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, if Professor Kate thinks I should go to the Frontier Foundation, then that's where I'll go! Hehe!

0528170005002563-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, if Professor Kate thinks I should go to the Frontier Foundation, then that's where I'll go! Hehe!

0528170005002564-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't feel lonely while I'm gone!

0528170005002566-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sure! I'll send you a letter when I get there!

0528170005002568-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Kaitlyn mutters to herself.)</font>
<font size="20">Could I use the lapenshards to treat Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?</font>

0529171905002569-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's been a while since I've been home to see everyone. Now that things have cooled down, why don't I pay a visit to Halo Mountain?

0529171905002570-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So that's what happened? You've been through quite a lot.

0529171905002571-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So that's what happened? You've been through quite a lot.

0529171905002572-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, you're safe here, so why don't you take a nice long rest?

0529171905002574-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Seeing your old friends now, you can't help but feel more at ease.)</font>

0529171905002575-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: While you were gone some exciting stuff happened to us, too!

0529171905002576-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's been some odd goings-on in the world, and Guidance received an official request from the royal court to help investigate.

0529171905002579-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why don't we let $MyPCName$ get some rest right now? We can discuss that matter later.

0608135405004156-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Odd goings-on? A request from the royal court? What happened?

0608135405004157-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Odd goings-on? A request from the royal court? What happened?

0529171905002582-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Odd goings-on? A request from the royal court? What happened?

0529171905002584-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm just fine so... why don't... you... tell...

0529171905002585-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Why do you suddenly feel so... out of it...?)</font>

0529171905002586-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Maybe if you just rest your eyes...)</font>

0529171905002595-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Listen carefully, $MyPCName$. I called you here for a good reason... There's something important I must tell you.

0529171905002597-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Recently, I felt an unusual power... It was similar to another power I have not sensed for a very long time...

0611152405004228-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm afraid that your exposure to that energy has awakened the power of the Munakra that was sealed inside of you... If that power continues to grow, your body won't be able to handle the strain...

0529171905002598-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What?! What is this energy you're talking about? And what do you mean that the power of the Munakra is growing?

0529171905002599-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I felt the faint echo of the lapentas. $MyPCName$... did you not feel it as well?

0529171905002600-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The echo of the lapentas? Well, I supposed I've felt something during my recent travels...

0611152405004229-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I have no idea if it was the power of a lapenta...

0611152405004230-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No... What I felt was too weak to be a lapenta.

0611152405004231-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: More likely it was... a tear of the sages. I believe they are called "lapenshards," owing to their connection to the lapentas.

0611152405004232-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Mysterious gems which grant power to those who seek it. But in your state, perhaps a death sentence...

0611152405004233-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The power of the Munakra resonates with the lapenshards, growing stronger. It crashes against the shackles that bind it. If it breaks through by force, you will not survive the resulting shock.

0529171905002602-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We must unseal the Munakra's power ourselves before this happens.

0529171905002603-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How do we free the power of the Munakra?

0529171905002605-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You must desire the power of the Munakra. But you must also possess the will to use it.

0529171905002606-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That determination... That clarity of purpose... Without these things, you will never free the power inside you.

0529171905002608-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...If you are unworthy, this place will be the last you ever see.

0529171905002609-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I don't know if I have determination, or a "clarity of purpose."

0529171905002610-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I don't know if I have determination, or a "clarity of purpose."

0529171905002611-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I don't know if I have determination, or a "clarity of purpose."

0529171905002612-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But if I can help protect the people of this world from harm...

0529171905002614-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's the only way I know to honor Master $npcName:11001556[gender:0]$.

0529171905002615-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe you have the necessary determination.

0529171905002616-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe you have the necessary determination.

0529171905002617-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe you have the necessary determination.

0529171905002618-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Let's us free the power of the Munakra.

0529171905002625-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How do feel? Do you know how long you were out?

0529171905002627-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I sense the flow of chi within your body has grown significantly stronger...

0529171905002629-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Lucky for you, we succeeded in releasing the power of the Munakra.

0529171905002630-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Lucky for you, we succeeded in releasing the power of the Munakra.

0529171905002631-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Lucky for you, we succeeded in releasing the power of the Munakra.

0529171905002632-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Y-you?! You're here? You can move around the real world now?

0529171905002633-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shh... You're the only one who can see me. I owe you my thanks.

0529171905002634-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now... We can be together forever. Now, my power is yours.

0529171905002640-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why are you over there muttering in the corner? You're starting to scare me!

0529171905002643-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003954$... Aren't you worried about people finding out about you?

0529171905002644-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now's not the time to talk about me.

0529171905002645-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There'll be time for that later.

0529171905002647-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, perhaps you should rest a while longer.

0529171905002648-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, perhaps you should rest a while longer.

0529171905002649-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, perhaps you should rest a while longer.

0529171905002650-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11001558[gender:1]$ and I will make the necessary arrangements for our trip.

0529171905002653-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's an organization researching objects known as "lapenshards."

0529171905002654-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They call themselves the Frontier Foundation.

0529171905002655-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They have requested that Guidance aid in their investigation, and we have accepted.

0529171905002658-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sorry, I think Junta's gotten a little ahead of himself. First we should start by explaining the lapenshards.

0529171905002659-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Basically, they're these crystals that started showing up all over out of the blue—

0529171905002660-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I already know about the lapenshards...

0529171905002662-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How? You've been lying here unconscious for days!

0529171905002663-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Where did you hear about the lapenshards?

0529171905002667-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... You don't need me to tell you about the lapenshards?

0529171905002668-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... You don't need me to tell you about the lapenshards?

0529171905002669-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So... You don't need me to tell you about the lapenshards? This is serious business!

0529171905002671-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's fine. I know what the lapenshards are.

0608135405004158-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I want to hear more about that Foundation...

0608135405004159-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frontier Foundation is an organization founded by the royal court to research and regulate the lapenshards. They've gathered some of the greatest minds in the world to aid them.

0529171905002672-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... We would like you to join the Frontier Foundation. But not as a member of Guidance—as an independent adventurer, a free agent.

0529171905002673-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When the Foundation reached out to us about lodging accommodations, we uh... had not anticipated your return. You're going to need your own room.

0608135405004161-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: (That's brother Junta for you. Always so considerate.)

0529171905002675-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I still have some things to take care of. Why don't you two go on ahead?

0529171905002676-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll follow after you when I can.

0608135405004162-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...All right. We'll be waiting at the Frontier Foundation.

0622125005004262-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I have been tucked safe away inside you all this time.

0622125005004263-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I have been tucked safe away inside you all this time.

0622125005004264-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I have been tucked safe away inside you all this time.

0622125005004265-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now it's my turn to keep you safe.

0622125005004266-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You can call on my power any time.

0622125005004268-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It's comforting to know that wherever you go from here, you'll have an ally in $npcName:11003951$.)</font>

0531154605003762-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's a fine blade you've got.

0531154605003763-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's nice to meet a fellow swordsman.

0531154605003764-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Swordsman...? I guess you could call me that.

0531154605003765-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(But you're not the only other person with a sword here... What about the $npcName:11003959[gender:1]$?)</font>

0531154605003766-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It looks like that guy's got a sword too...

0531154605003768-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I would hardly call that brutish, lumbering weapon a sword.

0531154605003769-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I noticed you use a shield. That's actually why I was hoping to talk to you.

0531154605003770-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Where I come from, that would be quite... unusual.

0531154605003771-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I see... Well, I'm pleased to meet you too.

0531154605003772-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So you really just use a sword then?

0531154605003773-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I supplement my bladecraft with runic magics. Together the two arts accommodate for each other's shortcomings.

0531154605003775-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, can I ask you something, from one swordsman to another?

0531154605003777-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you consider your sword a tool to protect lives, or end them?

0608135405004164-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Perhaps that was too difficult a question to ask a complete stranger...)</font>

0608135405004165-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I was just curious what a swordsman from a different background would think.

0531154605003778-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ..."Sometimes in order to defend lives, you must first be willing to end them."

0531154605003780-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Someone I knew said that once.

0531154605003781-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sometimes I find myself at a crossroads, and I struggle with the question of how my blade should be employed...

0531154605003782-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm afraid I don't have an easy answer for you.

0531154605003783-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...Why not take the path you believe is right?

0531154605003784-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Whether with a sword or shield...

0531154605003785-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe it's my duty to do everything in my power to protect the people I hold dear.

0531154605003786-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I strive every day to become a person capable of doing just that.

0531154605003788-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(He seems to be in deep thought.)</font>

0608135405004168-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, I'm sorry. I was... thinking...

0608135405004169-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well... I'd better get going. It was good talking with you. Bye.

0608135405004171-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Can't you stay and chat awhile longer?

0531154605003907-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11001573[gender:0]$...? Wasn't he one of the Seven Heroes?

0531154605003908-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yeah! What an endorsement, right?! Just say the word and I'll grab my magic supplies...

0531154605003911-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wow! Someone call the Natural History Museum, I'm standing with a real-live $male:caveman,female:cavewoman$!

0531154605003913-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Tracking magic, really? That stuff is soooooo last century. You're living the AGE OF SCIENCE!

0531154605003914-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: With my patented Geospatial Identification and Acquisition System, you could track the fleas on a dog halfway across the globe!

0531154605003915-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Finding a person with it would be a piece of cake!

0531154605003918-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Magic's been around for thousands of years precisely because it's so great! You can solve any problem with magic! Anyone who doesn't recognize its greatness must be a real stupid-head!

0531154605003921-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You know, I have a hard time taking anything seriously when it's coming from somebody who's stuffed their spell bag full of complimentary muffins...

0705122805004302-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Yeesh this guy and his sad face is really killing the mood...)</font>

0531154605003956-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Yeesh this guy and his sad face is really killing the mood...)</font>

0531154605003924-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Yeesh this guy and his sad face is really killing the mood...)</font>

0531154605003927-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did you guys stop by the appetizer table? Everything on it is amazing! I can't believe all that food is free!

0531154605003928-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Who is this lady, and why is she bothering you?)</font>

0531154605003929-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh yeah, that's really interesting. Hey, I think I'm gonna go over there now—

0531154605003932-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why would you even ask that? Sighing incessantly to oneself is a clear sign that someone's having a great time! That was sarcasm by the way.

0531154605003933-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Err... I've been trying to track someone down, but I'm not having a whole lot of luck.

0531154605003934-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If only there were some kind of magic locator spell I could use to find him...

0531154605003937-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You came to the right lady! I've got just the spell!

0531154605003938-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: HAH! Puh-lease. If you're looking to find someone, I'm your $male:guy,female:gal$. You want trusty tech on your side, not some iffy cantrip.

0705122805004303-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(This girl seems like a real space cadet. She's definitely going to need saving at some point. You should introduce yourself!)</font>

0531154605003963-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: By any chance... have you ever heard of the Gray Wolf?

0531154605003964-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Scourge of the Streets, the fist that toppled a hundred warriors? That's me!

0531154605003966-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Gray Wolf...? Come to think of it, I have heard about you.

0531154605003967-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You probably haven't heard yet, but I even went up against $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$</font>, the champion of $map:63000020$!

0531154605003968-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The battle ended in a draw, but I totally almost had him.

0531154605003970-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I heard that my tutor fought him once. Their duel ended in a draw as well.

0531154605003972-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do I... know you from somewhere?

0531154605003975-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In any case, you must be an amazing fighter.

0531154605003976-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To be on the same level as my tutor...

0531154605003982-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your face is turning red. Are you feeling well?

0531154605003985-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You can't just grab somebody's hand like that!

0531154605003988-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I only intended to shake it...

0531154605003990-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: J-just be more careful in the future!

0531154605003992-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Whew... Your heart is still racing!)</font>

0705122805004304-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You can't help but marvel over the decadence of this place. It's nothing like your humble hermitage on Mount Halo.)</font>

0531154605004025-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: J-just be more careful in the future!

0531154605004027-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Why does he seem so flustered?)</font>

0705122805004305-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wow! Whoever owns this place must be loaded!

0531171305004058-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wow! Whoever owns this place must be loaded!

0531171305004028-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wow! Whoever owns this place must be loaded!

0531171305004029-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just look at all this fancy stuff!

0531171305004030-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Just one of those gilded candelabras could net you a few million mesos on the black market, EASY. And it's not like anyone would even miss them...)</font>

0531171305004033-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What do you think you're doing?

0531171305004035-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh I was just admiring the craftsmanship of this candelabra. So elegant—and lighter than you'd think!

0531171305004036-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Crap, this chick is on to me...)</font>

0531171305004037-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, I'd better return it to where I found it before I drip candle wax everywhere. If you'll excuse me...

0531171305004042-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why not help me out? I could carry a lot more with an extra set of hands. I'll even cut you in at a generous 40%, how about it?

0531171305004043-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a lot of money to be made in a place this swanky!

0531171305004044-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I'm sorry, but I no longer work in the shadows.

0531171305004047-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Work in the shadows? Are you talking about hitjobs?

0531171305004049-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Surely I could persuade you to take one last contract, for the right price...

0531171305004052-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I promised myself I would never take on a job like that again.

0531171305004053-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Find someone else for your dirty work.

0531171305004054-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Yikes... That death-stare. She's not messing around...)</font>

0531171305004055-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Heh, I was joking. Lighten up!

0531171305004056-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I haven't met anyone this serious since Jonathan...

0531171305004057-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...? I don't know who that is but I feel insulted.

0531171305004060-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...I'll take care of my problem on my own.

1023143105004331-JobChange_02-.name: $MyPCName$! I'm sorry to call you back so soon. I'm sure you're eager to explore this place...

1023143105004332-JobChange_02-.name: The thing is, I have new information you're going to want to hear about! I'm waiting for you in $map:02020041$.

1023143105004334-JobChange_02-.name: Ah, there you are! Thanks so much for dropping by.

1023143105004335-JobChange_02-.name: Looks like everyone is keeping busy.

1023143105004336-JobChange_02-.name: And I see a few familiar faces...

1023143105004337-JobChange_02-.name: Well, of course we're all busy! We don't know anything about this place. There's so much to learn.

1023143105004338-JobChange_02-.name: Anyway, how can I help you?

1023143105004339-JobChange_02-.name: Oh, right. I called you here for a reason.

1023143105004340-JobChange_02-.name: The ship's sensors picked up something that looks like lapenta energy.

1023143105004342-JobChange_02-.name: And it's not just one signal, either. Our radar is picking up multiple sources. And frankly... the intensity is unlike anything we've seen before...

1023143105004343-JobChange_02-.name: That's incredible. Have your researchers figured how it got here?

1023143105004348-JobChange_02-.name: All of my researchers are kinda busy at the moment.

1023143105004349-JobChange_02-.name: We need to take soil samples. And barometric readings! Metallurgical analyses! I just don't have enough hands to do everything. And, well, Lanemone may be our resident lapenshard expert, but I don't know if I can trust her with this...

1023143105004350-JobChange_02-.name: Considering all that, I don't know when I'll have anyone free to check it out...

1023143105004351-JobChange_02-.name: The signal's location is on your radar, right?

1023143105004352-JobChange_02-.name: Oh, yes! The signals are very strong, so it was easy to pinpoint them.

1023143105004354-JobChange_02-.name: I'll check it out for you. Just mark down the location on my map.

1023143105004355-JobChange_02-.name: Really? You'd do that for me?

1023143105004356-JobChange_02-.name:
I'll get the coordinates for you right away.
<font size="20">My hero...!</font>

1023143105004357-JobChange_02-.name: What was that last thing you said?

1023143105004358-JobChange_02-.name: Ahem! I said, the strongest signal is coming from these coordinates.

1023143105004359-JobChange_02-.name: Please be careful! There's no way of telling what you'll find out there.

1023143105004363-JobChange_02-.name: <font color="#909090">(The energy here is weak, but it's definitely different from anything else in the area.)</font>

1023143105004364-JobChange_02-.name: Could this really be lapenta energy? In a place like this?

1023143105004365-JobChange_02-.name: These are definitely the coordinates $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ gave me. We don't know anything about Kritias... This could be something else entirely. Something new.

1023143105004367-JobChange_02-.name: Well, I won't learn anything by standing out here!

1023143105004372-JobChange_02-.name: This light... No, this isn't light. It's power. A familiar power...

1023143105004373-JobChange_02-.name: Look at this place. Nobody's been here for a very long time.

1023143105004374-JobChange_02-.name: I've definitely never been here. So why do I feel like I know this energy?

1023143105004375-JobChange_02-.name: I'm sure this is the place $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ picked up on her radar.

1023143105004376-JobChange_02-.name: Then this must be the lapenta energy.

1023143105004379-JobChange_02-.name: Might as well get started. Now, what did $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ say...

1023143105004383-JobChange_02-.name: I feel... drawn in by the energy...

1023143105004384-JobChange_02-.name: <font color="#909090">(You're lost in the undulating light of the energy.)</font>

1023143105004385-JobChange_02-.name: So pretty. Maybe I should... touch it...

1023143105004392-JobChange_02-.name: I reached out to touch the light, and then...

1023143105004393-JobChange_02-.name: I don't remember. But I sense some kind of power from my sword.

1023143105004394-JobChange_02-.name: It's strong. Stronger even than when I was training under my master.

1023143105004395-JobChange_02-.name: Is it related to this lapenta energy?

1023143105004396-JobChange_02-.name: In any case, something's changed within me.

1023143105004398-JobChange_02-.name: For now, I should let $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ know what happened here.

1023143105004403-JobChange_02-.name: I thought... I thought I was in control of it... Thanks to my training with $npcName:11003921[gender:1]$...

1023143105004404-JobChange_02-.name: This isn't control. No... No, I've become one with the rage!

1023143105004406-JobChange_02-.name: Okay. C'mon. I gotta get ahold of myself here.

1023143105004407-JobChange_02-.name: Hmph. For now, I better report back to $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$.

1023143105004411-JobChange_02-.name: One minute, I was looking at a pretty light. The next, my hand's reaching out on its own...

1023143105004413-JobChange_02-.name: It's almost like there's a ton of mana swirling around inside of me. Wait, no, that's exactly what it is!

1023143105004414-JobChange_02-.name: This is like that time I ate Kate's rock candy, times a thousand!

1023143105004415-JobChange_02-.name: Well, I don't understand it, but I bet Kate will flip out when I tell her about this.

1023143105004417-JobChange_02-.name: Well, first things first. I better tell $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ about this. Kate can wait.

1023143105004421-JobChange_02-.name: My hand moved towards the light, as though guided by a higher power, and then...

1023143105004422-JobChange_02-.name: I feel as though I've been touched by the light. Is this lapenta energy a gift?

1023143105004425-JobChange_02-.name: For now, I should let $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ know what happened here.

1023143105004428-JobChange_02-.name: My bow and arrows feel... supercharged, somehow.

1023143105004429-JobChange_02-.name: No. It's not my bow. It's me!

1023143105004430-JobChange_02-.name: I can feel it thrumming through my hands. Spreading through the bowstring...

1023143105004431-JobChange_02-.name: This is even stronger than the lapenshard power I got from $npcName:11003932[gender:0]$!

1023143105004432-JobChange_02-.name: Is it because of the lapenta energy in this place?

1023143105004434-JobChange_02-.name: Or maybe I'm just imagining things! Anyway, I better get back to $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$.

1023143105004438-JobChange_02-.name: I just realized the solution to a formula I've been working on for years. And another... And I've got ideas for a dozen new machine designs!

1023143105004439-JobChange_02-.name: It's like every cell in my brain grew an additional brain. My genius just got kicked up to eleven!

1023143105004440-JobChange_02-.name: The fusion core was just the beginning. My next creation will blow it out of the water!

1023143105004441-JobChange_02-.name: Heh. I could get used to this.

1023143105004443-JobChange_02-.name: Dang it! I don't have time to go on an engineering binge right now.

1023143105004444-JobChange_02-.name: I've gotta get back to $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$ and let her know what's up.

1023143105004445-JobChange_02-.name: When this is all over, I'm locking myself in my lab for a year...

1023143105004447-JobChange_02-.name: I feel something burning inside. Something powerful...

1023143105004449-JobChange_02-.name: $npcName:11003759[gender:0]$... Why can't I get him out of my head?

1023143105004450-JobChange_02-.name: It's like I can suddenly visualize my revenge against him...

1023143105004453-JobChange_02-.name: I've got to pull myself together.

1023143105004454-JobChange_02-.name: For now, I should report back to $npcName:11004341[gender:1]$.

1023143105004457-JobChange_02-.name: What is this? It's like... memories are flooding back into my mind...

1023143105004458-JobChange_02-.name: And power! This is like the power that $npcName:11004235[gender:0]$ gave me, but stronger. Much stronger...

1023143105004459-JobChange_02-.name: It's surging through my body. How can this be?

1023143105004460-JobChange_02-.name: My senses are enhanced a thousandfold.

1023143105004463-JobChange_02-.name: I must focus. $npcName:11004315[gender:1]$ is waiting for my report.

1023143105004466-JobChange_02-.name: I put my hand into the energy field without thinking. And...

1023143105004467-JobChange_02-.name: Rune power and lapenta power together are pulsing through me. Through my blade.

1023143105004468-JobChange_02-.name: All this, just from touching a little light...?

1023143105004470-JobChange_02-.name: I'm getting ahead of myself here.

1023143105004471-JobChange_02-.name: For now, I'd better head back and make my report.

1023143105004489-JobChange_02-.name: I lost control for a minute there. Put my hand right into that weird light...

1023143105004490-JobChange_02-.name: And now, my fist feels powerful... Like it's burning.

1023143105004491-JobChange_02-.name: It's the same power I feel from the lapenta energy in this place!

1023143105004493-JobChange_02-.name: Ugh... I can't make sense of this.

1023143105004494-JobChange_02-.name: For now, I should report what happened here...

1023143105004474-JobChange_02-.name: I feel two powers raging within my body. One of them is the power of the Munakra. And the other...

1023143105004475-JobChange_02-.name: Is the power of the lapenta?!

1023143105004478-JobChange_02-.name: The two powers I feel right now. You feel them, too?

1023143105004479-JobChange_02-.name: Yes, I felt them as well.

1023143105004480-JobChange_02-.name: I think we absorbed some of the lapenta's power here.

1023143105004482-JobChange_02-.name: How could we just absorb it like this? I'm so confused...

1023143105004484-JobChange_02-.name: You have a responsibility. Your friends are waiting for your report.

1023143105004486-JobChange_02-.name: I should go back to $map:02020041$ for now.

1023143105004498-JobChange_02-.name: Huh. If you're right, then this lapenta energy is related to that incident...

1023143105004499-JobChange_02-.name: Hm. Perhaps we should put a pin in this conversation for now.

1023143105004500-JobChange_02-.name: But why? It was just—$MyPCName$! I didn't see you there!

1023143105004501-JobChange_02-.name: There's something different about you. Did you change your hair? No, that's not it...

1023143105004502-JobChange_02-.name: My, my. There certainly is something different about $male:him,female:her$.

1023143105004503-JobChange_02-.name: What exactly happened to you, hm? You appear to be radiating lapenta energy.

1023143105004504-JobChange_02-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell the story of what happened in the cave.)</font>

1023143105004505-JobChange_02-.name: Interesting. You actually made direct contact with the energy.

1023143105004508-JobChange_02-.name: $MyPCName$, when your power met the lapenta energy, both forces resonated with each other. That's the only explanation I can give you.

1023143105004509-JobChange_02-.name: I suspect that the resonance brought about many changes in you. Of course, you could say that more certainly than I.

1023143105004513-JobChange_02-.name: So that's what happened to me.

1023143105004514-JobChange_02-.name: It does seem like you're stronger than you were before. Much stronger.

1023143105004515-JobChange_02-.name: That's right! Even I can feel it, $MyPCName$.

1023143105004516-JobChange_02-.name: <font color="#909090">(You do feel lighter than you did before. And full of vigor!)</font>

1023143105004517-JobChange_02-.name: In that case... Let's see what this crazy continent has to throw at me!

1023143105004518-JobChange_02-.name: Hm... $MyPCName$? Can I speak with you a moment?

1023143105004523-JobChange_02-.name: Ambient lapenta energy... Was this continent summoned by the blackshard explosion?

0621020511003052-ShadowCataclysm-.name: The empress is looking for you. Please see her straight away.

0621020511003053-ShadowCataclysm-.name: The empress is looking for you. Please see her straight away.

0621020511003054-ShadowCataclysm-.name: It is good to see you again, my loyal subject.

0621020511003055-ShadowCataclysm-.name: I've finally received news from one of our scouting parties. My agents have discovered the source of my earlier foreboding deep within the Land of Darkness.

0621020511003056-ShadowCataclysm-.name: Followers of the ancient and powerful Demon King have lifted the earth and bent space itself, revealing deep pockets of darkness that we didn't even know existed.

0621020511003057-ShadowCataclysm-.name: New enemies are coming from this darkness. The average adventurer stands no chance against such monsters...

0621020511003058-ShadowCataclysm-.name: But we can't afford to ignore the darkness. Not anymore. Someone needs to face the enemy head on and uncover their plot.

0621020511003059-ShadowCataclysm-.name: Who is this new Penumbran Host? What are they after? $MyPCName$, only a hero of your caliber could hope at succeeding in such a task.

0621020511003060-ShadowCataclysm-.name: Please venture into the Land of Darkness beyond the $map:02000146$. Learn what, exactly, is happening in that evil place. Should you accept this mission, I would like to offer you a gift.

0621020511003061-ShadowCataclysm-.name: Please venture into the Land of Darkness beyond the $map:02000146$. Learn what, exactly, is happening in that evil place. Should you accept this mission, I would like to offer you a gift.

0621020511003062-ShadowCataclysm-.name: What do you say? Will you walk the Land of Darkness in the name of your empress?

0621020511003063-ShadowCataclysm-.name: The Land of Darkness won't know what hit it.

0621020511003064-ShadowCataclysm-.name: Thank you for taking this seriously, as always. I want you to have this. You will need it to overcome the darkness.

0621020511003065-ItemSocketSystem-.name: It's been too long. How have you been?

0621020511003066-ItemSocketSystem-.name: I've heard some interesting rumors that might interest you. Something that could increase your power significantly. Do you want to learn more?

0621020511003067-ItemSocketSystem-.name: I've heard some interesting rumors that might interest you. Something that could increase your power significantly. Do you want to learn more?

0621020511003068-ItemSocketSystem-.name: It seems there are gemstones that you can place in your equipment to make it more powerful. These gemstones vary in color and shape, which will tell you what kind of bonuses the gemstone will give you.

0621205211003077-ItemSocketSystem-.name: Some gemstones can be upgraded to grant exceptional power. You'll need gemstone motes to do so, which you can get by dismantling your unneeded gemstones.

0621020511003069-ItemSocketSystem-.name: But you can't use gemstones on every piece of equipment! Only gear with sockets have room for gemstones. It may be challenging to find such equipment...

0621020511003070-ItemSocketSystem-.name: There's still so much we don't know about gemstones. If you happen to find any, please try them out and let me know what you find!

0621020511003071-ItemSocketSystem-.name: Oh, here is an item with a gemstone slot and a spare gemstone. Try it for yourself. It's sure to be a good experience!

0201153011005083-PirateOcean-.name: Excuse me! I've been sent to ask you to see the empress. She's waiting for you at $map:52000087$.

0201153011005085-PirateOcean-.name: Excuse me! I've been sent to ask you to see the empress. She's waiting for you at $map:52000087$.

0207133011005238-PirateOcean-.name: In these troubling times, we've come to rely on your wisdom and courage more and more. That's why I've called you here. I want your advice.

0207133011005239-PirateOcean-.name: So far, none of our scouting missions have uncovered any information about $npc:11001851[gender:1]$ and her forces of darkness. I'd put more people on the investigation, but my army is busy securing and repairing $map:02000001$.

0207133011005240-PirateOcean-.name: But you... you are astonishingly resourceful. Do you have any suggestions for how we could proceed?

0207133011005243-PirateOcean-.name: You're right, of course. We should be searching far beyond the borders of $map:02000001$, but we still have a problem with manpower...

0207133011005244-PirateOcean-.name: We could ask sailors and explorers for help.

0207133011005245-PirateOcean-.name: I've given that some thought, but it's dangerous work. It would be difficult to ensure that we only hire people who are up to the task, and I won't send unprepared novices to their doom.

0207133011005246-PirateOcean-.name: We could ask sailors and explorers for help.

0201153011005098-PirateOcean-.name: Explorers! Of course! They've seen more of Maple World than anyone else. It's possible they've encountered signs of the darkness in their travels.

0201153011005099-PirateOcean-.name: I'll check in with the sailors at $map:02000062$.

0201153011005100-PirateOcean-.name: Very good. I leave this in your capable hands, $MyPCName$.

0201153011005101-PirateOcean-.name: I'm so very glad I asked for your thoughts on this matter. I hope your meeting in $map:02000062$ goes well.

0201153011005102-PirateOcean-.name: Well, if it isn't $MyPCName$. You've got a reputation for yourself, you know.

0201153011005103-PirateOcean-.name: You're looking pretty fit. Have you ever considered joining the Adventurer's Guild?

0201153011005106-PirateOcean-.name: All right. How can I help?

0201153011005107-PirateOcean-.name: I've seen captains with twenty years at sea who were more green than you. I think you'd fit right in. Now, about your membership dues...

0201153011005109-PirateOcean-.name: You're looking pretty fit. Have you ever considered joining the Adventurer's Guild?

0201153011005110-PirateOcean-.name:
It's the life of a sailor for me! Row the oars! Put your backs into it!
<font color="#909090">(He's humming to himself...)</font>

0201153011005112-PirateOcean-.name: Ah! When did you get here?

0202134311005205-PirateOcean-.name:
It's the life of a sailor for me! Row the oars! Put your backs into it!
<font color="#909090">(He's humming to himself...)</font>

0202134311005207-PirateOcean-.name: Ah! When did you get here?

0202134311005208-PirateOcean-.name:
It's the life of a sailor for me! Row the oars! Put your backs into it!
<font color="#909090">(He's humming to himself...)</font>

0202134311005210-PirateOcean-.name: Ah! When did you get here?

0201153011005113-PirateOcean-.name: All kinds of rumors make their way here. This is a hub for explorers and adventurers, after all. So, ask me your questions.

0201153011005114-PirateOcean-.name: Have you heard anything about the forces of darkness?

0201153011005115-PirateOcean-.name: Of course I have! Did you know that they attacked both $map:02000001$ and $map:02000100$? That's some pretty fresh information right there.

0201153011005116-PirateOcean-.name: You don't say. Have you anything about $npcName:11001851[gender:1]$?

0201153011005117-PirateOcean-.name: I'm sure I heard that name before. Isn't $npcName:11001851[gender:1]$ the one who led the attack on the caravan some time ago?

0201153011005118-PirateOcean-.name: Well, it sounds like you already know more about this than I do. But you aren't out of luck just yet. It turns out that the world's greatest explorer, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$, is in town. I bet he knows something.

0201153011005120-PirateOcean-.name: He's in the $map:52000095$, next room over. You can visit him if you want, just... don't do anything to upset him. His ship was sunk by pirates, and he's still recovering.

0201153011005121-PirateOcean-.name: $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ is in the $map:52000095$, next room over. You can visit him if you want, just... don't do anything to upset him. His ship was sunk by pirates, and he's still recovering.

0201153011005122-PirateOcean-.name:
M-my ship... no...!
<font color="#909090">(He's trembling in his sleep.)</font>

0201153011005123-PirateOcean-.name: Wake up, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. You're having a nightmare!

0201153011005124-PirateOcean-.name: Ah! Oh... Oh, it was just a dream...

0201153011005125-PirateOcean-.name: Thanks for waking me. Better to be awake and in pain then reliving those memories... So, what can I do for you?

0201153011005126-PirateOcean-.name: Have you seen the forces of darkness in your journeys?

0201153011005127-PirateOcean-.name: I've seen lots of strange and dark things. Can you be a little more specific?

0201153011005129-PirateOcean-.name: I can't say I know the name. Sorry I couldn't be... Now, wait a minute. There is one thing, but it may not be helpful...

0201153011005131-PirateOcean-.name: There's a good friend of mine, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$. She's a lovely lady—well, siren, if I'm being specific—who lives on $map:02000391$. Last time I was out her way, she told me a great disaster was looming over Maple World.

0201153011005132-PirateOcean-.name: I wanted to ask her more, but I had to set sail before low tide. I promised I'd be back soon... and the very next day, pirates sunk my ship. I've been holed up here licking my wounds ever since.

0201153011005133-PirateOcean-.name: Sirens have a strange power. The ocean speaks to them. These forces of darkness you mentioned... Could be that they're the ones who cause the disaster in $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$'s prophecy.

0201153011005135-PirateOcean-.name: The sea route to $map:02000391$ isn't exactly straightforward. Even if you got there, the sirens don't exactly have a glowing opinion of humans. If only I could go with you...

0201153011005136-PirateOcean-.name: There's got to be a way for me to meet her.

0201153011005137-PirateOcean-.name: Well... Take this compass. Show it to $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ and tell her you're my friend. She'll help you get along with the others. As for actually getting to $map:02000391$, you'll need $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$'s help.

0201153011005138-PirateOcean-.name: $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ used to be $npc:23000015$'s navigator, but he gave up the pirating lifestyle. Now he's in hiding somewhere in $map:02000182$. Tell him I sent you.

0201153011005139-PirateOcean-.name: Thanks for all of your help.

0201153011005140-PirateOcean-.name: Don't mention it. To tell the truth, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$'s words have been weighing on me. If you can help stop this disaster, then I wish you all the luck in the world.

0201153011005141-PirateOcean-.name: $npc:11003082[gender:0]$ is in hiding somewhere in $map:02000182$. Tell him I sent you. He'll get you to $map:02000391$.

0201153011005142-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(This log cabin looks suspicious. You hear something drop inside.)</font>

0201153011005143-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(Go inside the cabin. $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ might be inside.)</font>

0201153011005144-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(Go inside the cabin. $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ might be inside.)</font>

0201153011005147-PirateOcean-.name: Yes, but whatever it is, I didn't do it! And I got no money, so don't bother robbing me, neither!

0201153011005149-PirateOcean-.name: $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ sent you! I heard he got sunk. Glad to hear he's still kicking around.

0201153011005150-PirateOcean-.name: I know the pirate that scuttled $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. He thinks $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ is real pretty, but $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ only talks to $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. This made him real mad...

0201153011005152-PirateOcean-.name: $npc:23000015$! Vicious, bad, mean! He sent his men to $map:02000391$ to drag $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ away!

0201153011005154-PirateOcean-.name: Don't be crazy! Pirates are strong. And plenty. $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ can take care of herself. And if not... she has a real mean sister!

0201153011005155-PirateOcean-.name: Even if she doesn't need my help, I need hers.

0201153011005156-PirateOcean-.name: What'd I just say about being crazy? I tried telling her what happened to $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$, I barely got out of $map:02000391$ alive. My ship's all tore up now...

0201153011005157-PirateOcean-.name: If we go now, pirates attack us, and we sink. Glub glub glub.

0201153011005158-PirateOcean-.name: Get ready to sail. In the meantime, I'll get rid of the pirates.

0201153011005159-PirateOcean-.name:
Fine! But you help, too. Get $itemPlural:30000725$ from $npcPlural:21000232[gender:0]$. Need to keep ship ship-shape!
The things on the ship are not enough. I need more.

0201153011005160-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(Why can't anyone ever just say, "Sure, hop on my boat?")</font>

0201153011005161-PirateOcean-.name: Beat up pirates in $map:02000182$. Get $itemPlural:30000725$. Do this, then we worry about surviving the trip...

0201153011005162-PirateOcean-.name: Beat up pirates in $map:02000182$. Get $itemPlural:30000725$. Do this, then we worry about surviving the trip...

0201153011005163-PirateOcean-.name: This is good. Enough to get us through if we sink again. While you were gone, I fixed up ship. Good to go!

0201153011005164-PirateOcean-.name: We sail to $map:02000391$ when you're ready.

0201153011005165-PirateOcean-.name: There'll be lots of pirates at $map:02000391$. Hope you get to $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ in one piece.

0201153011005167-PirateOcean-.name: I steer the ship. That's plenty! The rest is up to you.

0201153011005169-PirateOcean-.name: Where do I go to board the ship?

0201153011005170-PirateOcean-.name: Outside cabin. There's the boat. Walk through the black door. Or I can push you through it!

0201153011005174-PirateOcean-.name: She wants you to come to $map:02000388$. Lots of pirates. Wants to steal their ship.

0201153011005175-PirateOcean-.name: Why don't they use your ship?

0201153011005176-PirateOcean-.name: Seas too rough there. My ship will sink. Needs a bigger ship. But this is too much! $npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ just wants to teach a lesson for flirting with $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$!

0201153011005178-PirateOcean-.name: You're scary, too! Do what you want. I'm not going.

0201153011005180-PirateOcean-.name: $map:02000063$. In cave, behind waterfall. Good luck...

0201153011005181-PirateOcean-.name: $map:02000388$ is in $map:02000063$. In cave, behind waterfall. Good luck...

0202145711005212-PirateOcean-.name: $npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ said you'd get lost. Gave me a charm. It will make you dizzy, but you'll get there.

0201153011005182-PirateOcean-.name: $npcName:24002931$... is agitated. But in time, he will grow calm again, thanks to you.

0201153011005183-PirateOcean-.name: Clear away these mists and let us parley.

0201153011005185-PirateOcean-.name: What is it we're doing here?

0201153011005186-PirateOcean-.name: O great waves, lend us your strength! Sweep away these dark mists!

0201153011005187-PirateOcean-.name: I shall use sea magic to cleanse this place of evil mists. Then it will be safe to speak with $npcName:24002931$. Shall we begin?

0201153011005189-PirateOcean-.name: Clear away these mists and let us parley.

0201153011005191-PirateOcean-.name: What is it we're doing here?

0201153011005192-PirateOcean-.name: O great waves, lend us your strength! Sweep away these dark mists!

0201153011005193-PirateOcean-.name: I shall use sea magic to cleanse this place of evil mists. Then it will be safe to speak with $npcName:24002931$. Shall we begin?

0201153011005195-PirateOcean-.name: I can smell the sea on you. Did you find what you were after?

0201153011005197-PirateOcean-.name: See, I knew he would help you!

0201153011005198-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(The vision $npcName:24002931$ showed you... The great disaster...)</font>

0201153011005199-PirateOcean-.name: You don't mind if I go around telling everyone you're an honorary member of the Adventurer's Guild, do you? We could use the buzz!

0201153011005200-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(The other divine creatures... The Mage of Light...)</font>

0201153011005201-PirateOcean-.name: Hold on, let me get my camera. I'm going to get your picture and post it on... Um, $MyPCName$? Are you listening?

0201153011005202-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(What does it mean? You need to contemplate this...)</font>

0201153011005204-PirateOcean-.name: Did you get hit in the head or something? You're totally spacing out.

0201153011005206-PirateOcean-.name: Better, but still in no shape to get out of bed. He's still in the $map:52000095$ if you want to check in on him.

0201153011005207-PirateOcean-.name: I think $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ is getting better, but he's still in no shape to get out of bed. He's still in the $map:52000095$ if you want to check in on him.

0201153011005208-PirateOcean-.name: I've been counting the minutes 'til your return! Not much else to do in here, after all. Did $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ give you a lift? How is $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$? Did she tell you about the looming disaster?

0201153011005209-PirateOcean-.name: Not so fast! One question at a time, please.

0201153011005210-PirateOcean-.name: Right, right! I'm used to finding answers for myself. Feels strange, relying on someone else to tell me what's going on... Okay, tell me how it went.

0201153011005212-PirateOcean-.name: You met $npcName:24002931$? The $npcName:24002931$?! That's the guardian of the sea! Do you know what any sailor worth his salt would give to be in your shoes?!

0201153011005213-PirateOcean-.name: What did you two talk about? Was it what you were looking for? They say there's nothing $npcName:24002931$ doesn't know.

0201153011005214-PirateOcean-.name: It... wasn't what I was looking for.

0201153011005215-PirateOcean-.name: Oh. Well, that's too bad. You should've asked for winning lottery numbers instead, I suppose...

0201153011005216-PirateOcean-.name: Also, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ says you need to get better so you can visit again.

0201153011005217-PirateOcean-.name: I'll do my best. $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ is a pal, a real pal. But how big was $npcName:24002931$, anyway? I wonder if she'll let me meet him someday...

0201153011005218-PirateOcean-.name: A real pal, huh? $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ will be disappointed...

0201153011005219-PirateOcean-.name: What was that? Sorry, I think I got overexcited. I better get some rest... Thanks for letting me live vicariously through you, even if just for a little bit.

0201153011005220-PirateOcean-.name: I've had a lot of time to look back on my life. And... I feel sad. If I had a strong friend like you, just think of all the amazing new places I could have discovered.

0201153011005221-PirateOcean-.name: We should go adventuring together when you're better.

0201153011005222-PirateOcean-.name: Count on it! We do that, and I'll put your name in the next edition of $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s World Tour!

0201153011005223-PirateOcean-.name: Well, I'd better be on my way.

0201153011005224-PirateOcean-.name: Of course, of course. Official business and all that. Sorry you didn't find what you want, but I'm glad we got the chance to meet.

0201153011005225-PirateOcean-.name: Of course, of course. Official business and all that. Sorry you didn't find what you want, but I'm glad we got the chance to meet.

0201153011005226-PirateOcean-.name: I'm pleased to see you. Did you learn anything new about our enemies?

0201153011005227-PirateOcean-.name: I didn't find anything about the forces of darkness.

0201153011005228-PirateOcean-.name: That's unfortunate. My own people have been busy repairing the damage from the last battle...

0201153011005229-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(The empress was definitely in $npcName:24002931$'s vision...)</font>

0201153011005230-PirateOcean-.name: All we can do is keep searching. I have faith that we'll find some new evidence soon.

0201153011005231-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(But it was just a vision. You must proceed carefully.)</font>

0201153011005232-PirateOcean-.name: I'll contact you the moment we have new information, of course.

0201153011005233-PirateOcean-.name: <font color="#909090">(You can't tell anyone for now. Certainly not the empress.)</font>

0201153011005234-PirateOcean-.name: Thank you for always doing your best, $MyPCName$.

0201153011005235-SnowKingdom-.name: I have a new mission for you, $MyPCName$. In fact, you were requested by name.

0201153011005236-SnowKingdom-.name: $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ sent a report that the forces of darkness have been sighted in the tundra of northern Victoria Island. He would like your help in assessing the situation.

0201153011005237-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm inclined to agree with him. $MyPCName$, will you help $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ in hunting down the forces of darkness?

0201153011005239-SnowKingdom-.name: Are we sure it's really them this time?

0201153011005240-SnowKingdom-.name: Thank you. $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ has set up a $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$.

0201153011005241-SnowKingdom-.name: $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ witnessed it with his own eyes. I'm sure his report is accurate—but he's not used to fighting in the snow.

0201153011005242-SnowKingdom-.name: I'll give him some backup, then.

0201153011005243-SnowKingdom-.name: $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ has set up a $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$. I'm counting on both of you to track down the forces of darkness.

0201153011005244-SnowKingdom-.name: I see you received my summons!

0201153011005246-SnowKingdom-.name: Ah... It's just a scratch. Anyway, thanks for coming.

0201153011005247-SnowKingdom-.name: My men are in sorry shape. We aren't trained for arctic combat, and we took a beating in our last battle. We need to regroup, but I don't want to risk losing the trail. That's why you're here.

0201153011005249-SnowKingdom-.name: We were scouting out the $map:02000260$ after hearing some suspicious rumblings, and we encountered monsters in a hidden cave. We were about to pursue, but...

0201153011005251-SnowKingdom-.name: He appeared from nowhere. I don't know who he is, but he attacked both the monsters and my soldiers, demanding that no one interfere in his fight. The way he wielded that sword...

0201153011005252-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm not sure where his allegiance lies. He didn't seriously injure any of my men, and it was clear that he was no friend to the forces of darkness...

0201153011005253-SnowKingdom-.name: Is that how your arm got hurt?

0201153011005254-SnowKingdom-.name: It is. Even the slightest wound can turn deadly in this cold, so I need to stay here and make sure my men are attended to. But while we're stuck here, our latest clue is getting away...

0201153011005255-SnowKingdom-.name: I'll check out this cave of yours.

0201153011005256-SnowKingdom-.name: I knew I could count on you. The ice cave is hidden behind some snowcapped trees on the mountainside of $map:02000260$. Be sure to search the place thoroughly.

0201153011005257-SnowKingdom-.name: I knew I could count on you. The ice cave is hidden behind some snowcapped trees on the mountainside of $map:02000260$. Be sure to search the place thoroughly.

0201153011005258-SnowKingdom-.name: <font color="#909090">(There's a cold wind coming from behind the trees. This must be the place $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ spoke of.)</font>

0201153011005259-SnowKingdom-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s ice cave should be just beyond this tree.)</font>

0201153011005262-SnowKingdom-.name: I had a run-in with the forces of darkness.

0201153011005263-SnowKingdom-.name: Then there's something here that has their interest. Did anything else happen?

0201153011005265-SnowKingdom-.name: And yet you're uninjured. Even against you, I doubt he could have been defeated so easily...

0201153011005266-SnowKingdom-.name: He saved me from an ambush.

0201153011005267-SnowKingdom-.name: Then he is an enemy of the forces of darkness, after all. He must know something that we don't...

0201153011005268-SnowKingdom-.name: This swordsman could be a valuable ally. Unfortunately, he doesn't seem interested in accepting our help...

0201153011005269-SnowKingdom-.name: Not everyone is a team player.

0201153011005270-SnowKingdom-.name: Well, there's little to be done about that. More to the point, were you able to explore the deep end of the ice cavern? We couldn't get very far.

0201153011005271-SnowKingdom-.name: There's a narrow valley at the end, but the cold is too bitter to go further.

0201153011005272-SnowKingdom-.name: Hmm... They say the cold of this place is legendary. Now we know why. It's said that only the citizens of the snow kingdom could... That's it!

0201153011005273-SnowKingdom-.name: The cold seems to have slowed my wits! The snow kingdom vanished a while ago, but some of its citizens still belong to the empire. That includes $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ over there!

0201153011005274-SnowKingdom-.name: Isn't that the weapon merchant from $map:02000001$...?

0201153011005275-SnowKingdom-.name: Correct. He's come to help keep us supplied. But before he came to the capital, he lived in the snow kingdom that used to be here. There's a chance he know a way to get past the bitter cold.

0201153011005277-SnowKingdom-.name: I think that would be for the best. I'll leave this to you.

0201153011005278-SnowKingdom-.name: $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ may be our only hope for continuing the investigation.

0201153011005280-SnowKingdom-.name: I was hoping you could help me with something...

0201153011005282-SnowKingdom-.name: Don't play games with me. I've seen you wandering around $map:02000001$ before! I never forget a potential customer.

0201153011005283-SnowKingdom-.name: I was hoping you could help me with something...

0201153011005284-SnowKingdom-.name: ...That passage leads to the $map:52000083$, and the cold that stopped you is the magic of $npc:11003069[gender:1]$...

0201153011005286-SnowKingdom-.name: I volunteered to help the captain for a reason. I wanted a chance to see my queen again. But that snowstorm... I'm not strong enough to get through it. Each snowflake felt like the tears of $npc:11003069[gender:1]$, grieving the loss of her kingdom and $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...

0201153011005287-SnowKingdom-.name: Must you really go in there? If $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ is using this kind of magic, then she wants to be alone.

0201153011005288-SnowKingdom-.name: All the more reason for me to go.

0201153011005290-SnowKingdom-.name: The forces of darkness are here, too. Your queen is in danger.

0201153011005291-SnowKingdom-.name: Then... then there's no other option. Do you promise you'll save her?

0201153011005292-SnowKingdom-.name: I will, but first I need to get through the blizzard.

0201153011005294-SnowKingdom-.name: Normally, you'd need enough magic power to match $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ if you wanted to get through the blizzard. Luckily for us, I know of a special potion that should do the trick.

0201153011005295-SnowKingdom-.name: Yetis aren't usually good with potions. Our sense of smell is too weak to find herbs, you see. But $npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ is special. He can find herbs with his skinny little fingers and use them to make all kinds of medicine.

0201153011005297-SnowKingdom-.name: $map:02000263$. He's a little guy. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.

0201153011005298-SnowKingdom-.name: $map:02000263$. He's a little guy. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.

0201153011005301-SnowKingdom-.name: Wh-what? Who're you? What do you want? Do you even know what you're asking?

0201153011005302-SnowKingdom-.name: I need to get through $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard and make sure she's okay.

0201153011005303-SnowKingdom-.name: $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ sent you, didn't he? Always sniveling about queen this and royal duty that.

0201153011005304-SnowKingdom-.name: Is it wrong for him to be worried?

0201153011005305-SnowKingdom-.name: He's worrying over nothing! Stubborn oaf...

0201153011005306-SnowKingdom-.name: Sure, she was a fine queen, when times are good. But it all fell apart overnight! The kingdom vanished, and the king and queen with it. The cold wasn't the worst part... The worst part is how we all scattered.

0201153011005307-SnowKingdom-.name: So she wants to hole herself up and mope, when we're the ones who suffered because of her? Fine by me! I'll be happy if I never see her again!

0201153011005308-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm not asking you to see her. I just need your help.

0201153011005309-SnowKingdom-.name: Not interested! That potion is a pain in the tush to make. It's hard to get the ingredients.

0201153011005310-SnowKingdom-.name: The forces at work here are a threat to all of Maple World!

0201162411005083-SnowKingdom-.name: If they're such a big threat, why are they wasting their time in the remains of some has-been kingdom?

0201162411005084-SnowKingdom-.name: That's what I need to find out. Can you make the $item:20000451$?

0201162411005085-SnowKingdom-.name: Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. Grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.

0201162411005086-SnowKingdom-.name: Come back before I change my mind.

0201162411005087-SnowKingdom-.name: Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. Grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.

0201162411005088-SnowKingdom-.name: Another few minutes and I was going to wander off. Hand over the stuff.

0201162411005090-SnowKingdom-.name: Those'll do. Go stand over there. Need room to work.

0201162411005091-SnowKingdom-.name: The $item:20000451$ is complete. It will let you endure the blizzard. But remember, potions don't last forever. This one especially!

0201162411005092-SnowKingdom-.name: Drink it right before you enter $map:52000082$. If you use it too soon, it'll wear off and you'll wind up a popsicle.

0201162411005095-SnowKingdom-.name: How long does the potion last?

0201162411005096-SnowKingdom-.name: Good thing I made a big batch. Here's a refill. Remember, it won't last long, so hurry!

0201162411005097-SnowKingdom-.name: It's in your bag. I'm not a charity, you know! Only one potion at a time!

0201162411005098-SnowKingdom-.name: Your bag is crammed full of garbage. Make some room.

0201162411005099-SnowKingdom-.name: Not long. That's all I can say. If I were you, I'd drink it right before going into $map:52000082$.

0201162411005100-SnowKingdom-.name: You and that swordsman saved me. I'll never forget your kindness... But how did you make it through the blizzard?

0201162411005101-SnowKingdom-.name: I had help from some yetis.

0203155711005213-SnowKingdom-.name: The yetis look like big oafs, but they're actually very resourceful. $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ were fond of them. I was hoping to get help from one of them...

0203155711005214-SnowKingdom-.name: If he were here, $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ might have made a different choice. I tried sending for him, but I never got a response. $map:02000001$ must be terribly far away...

0203155711005215-SnowKingdom-.name: A yeti in $map:02000001$... Do you mean $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$?

0203155711005216-SnowKingdom-.name: Yes! He sells weapons there. Before the kingdom fell, he was the gatekeeper of $map:52000086$ for a very, very long time. I'm surprised you know him!

0203155711005217-SnowKingdom-.name: He's in $map:52000080$ at this very moment.

0203155711005218-SnowKingdom-.name: Then... he did come! We still have a chance to protect $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ from that specter. $npcName:11003060$ may be able to stop her from opening the $map:52000085$...!

0203155711005219-SnowKingdom-.name: I... sure. We could probably make that happen.

0201162411005112-SnowKingdom-.name: We need to get $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ and go to the $map:02000381$! But... I can hardly walk in this state...

0201162411005113-SnowKingdom-.name: Let me go in your place.

0201162411005114-SnowKingdom-.name: But... This is for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$... I can't ask an outsider...

0201162411005115-SnowKingdom-.name: I needed to go to $map:02000381$ with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ anyway.

0201162411005116-SnowKingdom-.name: But... What business could you have there...?

0201162411005117-SnowKingdom-.name: I need to investigate the specter for myself.

0201162411005118-SnowKingdom-.name: I understand. I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. It's the least I can do to thank you...

0201162411005119-SnowKingdom-.name: It's no problem. You should get some rest.

0201162411005120-SnowKingdom-.name: Thank you. Let me know when you're ready...

0201162411005123-SnowKingdom-.name: O winds of the blizzard, open a path through the heavens...!

0201162411005124-SnowKingdom-.name: My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.

0201162411005126-SnowKingdom-.name: I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. Let me know when you're ready.

0201162411005129-SnowKingdom-.name: O winds of the blizzard, open a path through the heavens...!

0201162411005130-SnowKingdom-.name: My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.

0201162411005132-SnowKingdom-.name: W-well? Is the queen all right?

0201162411005133-SnowKingdom-.name: I need you're help. We have to get to the $map:02000381$.

0201162411005134-SnowKingdom-.name: I-is that where the queen is? What is going on?

0201162411005136-SnowKingdom-.name: Then we really do have to hurry. Something big is going on.

0201162411005137-SnowKingdom-.name: The $map:02000382$ is the only way to reach the $map:52000086$. The snow kingdom is lost, but its secret treasure is still there. Our wise ancestors locked it up so that its power couldn't be used against the world...

0201162411005138-SnowKingdom-.name: The Frozen Crystal... It's in a vault in the $map:02000383$, locked away by perfect yeti engineering. Only the queen can open up the path through the $map:02000382$ to get there.

0201162411005139-SnowKingdom-.name: The vault itself can only be opened by both the king and queen together. And they'd never do so willingly, since they know how dangerous the treasure is.

0201162411005140-SnowKingdom-.name: But now the kingdom is gone... and so is the king. And this specter promised the queen that he could somehow reunite her with $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...

0201162411005141-SnowKingdom-.name: If $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ is alive, then the vault can be opened?

0201162411005142-SnowKingdom-.name: Yes. That's why we have to stop $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ at the shrine. I don't think she'll like us thwarting her plan to meet $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ again...

0201162411005143-SnowKingdom-.name: That seems pretty selfish of her.

0201162411005144-SnowKingdom-.name: For as long as our kingdom was around, every queen had her king, and every king was made for his queen. They are two halves to the whole. To be separated from each other is unbearable... I'm sure $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ would do the same thing in her shoes.

0201162411005145-SnowKingdom-.name: That's why I have to protect her! She already lost too much. Even if it's her fault that we have no kingdom or king, she's suffered enough...

0201162411005146-SnowKingdom-.name: There's a path on the slope over $map:02000260$ that leads to the $map:02000381$. The $map:02000382$ is there... somewhere. I'll meet you in the mountains.

0201162411005147-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm not sure how to get there...

0201162411005148-SnowKingdom-.name: All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0201162411005150-SnowKingdom-.name: How do I get there again?

0201162411005151-SnowKingdom-.name: Can't you just take me there?

0201162411005152-SnowKingdom-.name: There's a path on the slope over $map:02000260$ that leads to the $map:02000381$. Halfway up, you'll see a bunch of trees near the stairs. Search the snow wall and you'll see a small cave that shines with blue light. Go in there.

0201162411005153-SnowKingdom-.name: All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0201162411005154-SnowKingdom-.name: I can't say I wasn't expecting this... but I can't just give up.

0201162411005155-SnowKingdom-.name: We have no idea how much danger the Frozen Crystal is in or what dangers $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ will meet at the $map:02000383$.

0206165611005231-SnowKingdom-.name: $MyPCName$... I appreciate everything you've done for me... But are you sure you've got time to fix the problems of a kingdom that already fell?

0206165611005232-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm pretty sure the forces of darkness are here, so this is my business, too.

0206165611005233-SnowKingdom-.name: Then... will you go to the $map:02000383$ with me? I need to keep looking for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$.

0206165611005235-SnowKingdom-.name: Thank you. Let me know when you're ready to leave.

0201162411005157-SnowKingdom-.name: Let me know when you're ready to leave.

0201162411005158-SnowKingdom-.name: The $map:52000086$... It's hidden by a veil of frost beyond $map:02000263$. But the door should appear to us, now that $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ opened the way.

0201162411005160-SnowKingdom-.name: Give me a moment. I'll find the door...

0206165611005236-SnowKingdom-.name: Found it. At the top of $map:02000263$. The door to the $map:52000086$ is there.

0206165611005237-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm not sure how to get there...

0201162411005165-SnowKingdom-.name: All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0201162411005167-SnowKingdom-.name: How do I get there again?

0201162411005168-SnowKingdom-.name: Can't you just take me there?

0201162411005169-SnowKingdom-.name: Find the tallest, steepest part of $map:02000263$. The door to the $map:52000086$ is there.

0201162411005170-SnowKingdom-.name: All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0201162411005171-SnowKingdom-.name: It seems you've been busy. Good to have you back.

0201162411005172-SnowKingdom-.name: I've been buried in mission briefings and paperwork this entire time. I wish I could have been out there in the field, with you...

0201162411005173-SnowKingdom-.name: (Fill him in on everything that happened.)

0201162411005174-SnowKingdom-.name: I never thought I'd hear the names $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ again. Everyone thought they vanished along with their kingdom.

0201162411005175-SnowKingdom-.name: I suspect this specter is allied with the forces of darkness. There's a plot brewing. And how does the $npcName:11003062[gender:0]$ fit into all of this...?

0201162411005176-SnowKingdom-.name: I have no idea what became of him.

0201162411005177-SnowKingdom-.name: He's certainly a match for either of us in a fight. It seems you're especially worried about him...

0201162411005178-SnowKingdom-.name: <font color="#909090">(He knew something about the specter...)</font>

0201162411005179-SnowKingdom-.name: Anyway, all sorts of powerful beings are coming out from the woodwork. It's as if the enemy is moving their pieces into position. Meanwhile, we don't even know what game we're supposed to be playing...

0201162411005180-SnowKingdom-.name: Ah, one last thing. We've been recalled to $map:02000001$. My troops and I will be departing soon.

0201162411005181-SnowKingdom-.name: Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.

0203155711005221-SnowKingdom-.name: I've been buried in mission briefings and paperwork this entire time. I wish I could have been out there in the field, with you...

0203155711005222-SnowKingdom-.name: (Fill him in on everything that happened.)

0203155711005223-SnowKingdom-.name: I never thought I'd hear the names $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ again. Everyone thought they vanished along with their kingdom.

0203155711005224-SnowKingdom-.name: I suspect this specter is allied with the forces of darkness. There's a plot brewing. And how does the $npcName:11003062[gender:0]$ fit into all of this...?

0203155711005225-SnowKingdom-.name: I have no idea what became of him.

0203155711005226-SnowKingdom-.name: He's certainly a match for either of us in a fight. It seems you're especially worried about him...

0203155711005227-SnowKingdom-.name: <font color="#909090">(Something about his swordsmanship... It was somehow familiar...)</font>

0203155711005228-SnowKingdom-.name: All sorts of powerful beings are coming out from the woodwork. It's as if the enemy is moving their pieces into position. Meanwhile, we don't even know what game we're supposed to be playing...

0203155711005229-SnowKingdom-.name: Ah, one last thing. We've been recalled to $map:02000001$. My troops and I will be departing soon.

0203155711005230-SnowKingdom-.name: Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.

0201162411005182-SnowKingdom-.name: Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.

0201162411005185-SnowKingdom-.name: I'm fine now. $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ took care of me.

0201162411005186-SnowKingdom-.name: The queen was real quiet for a while. When she finally spoke up, she thanked me for all the help. She's grateful to you, too. Honestly, I was dumbstruck at being thanked by the queen herself!

0201162411005187-SnowKingdom-.name: I don't know what happened to the king. I don't even know if that guy was really $npc:11003075[gender:0]$... I can't imagine how the queen feels about this. It's enough to break a yeti's heart.

0201162411005188-SnowKingdom-.name: You should be proud. You did good work.

0201162411005189-SnowKingdom-.name: Thanks... But I couldn't've done it without you. I'll be doing my best to cheer my queen up from now on.

0201162411005191-SnowKingdom-.name: You're right! I don't got to do this alone. There's no point feeling bad about the kingdom we lost. Now we got to appreciate those of us who stuck around.

0201162411005193-SnowKingdom-.name: And I'm rooting for you, too! Don't be a stranger. Come visit me at my stall in $map:02000001$ sometime, okay?

0201162411005194-SnowKingdom-.name: You're going back to $map:02000001$ after all this?

0201162411005195-SnowKingdom-.name: Hey, a yeti's got to make a living! And adventurers like you count on me for my fine craftsmanship. I'll be able to find plenty of time to visit here.

0201162411005196-SnowKingdom-.name: <font color="#909090">(You should return to $map:02000001$ and check in with the empress.)</font>

0201162411005197-SnowKingdom-.name: Well, I'd better get my stuff together. See you back in $map:02000001$!

0201162411005198-SnowKingdom-.name: Well, I'd better get my stuff together. See you back in $map:02000001$!

0201162411005199-SnowKingdom-.name: $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ tells me that your performance on this latest mission has been exemplary.

0201162411005201-SnowKingdom-.name: We may not have learned more about $npc:11001851[gender:1]$, but I'd call this mission a success. The forces of darkness are expanding their operations all over Maple World.

0201162411005202-SnowKingdom-.name: $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ was once a benevolent king. To hear what's become of him, I can't help but think that the forces of darkness were behind the collapse of his kingdom.

0201162411005203-SnowKingdom-.name: We need to keep our ears to the ground. If any new disasters crop up, I'll let you know as well.

0201162411005204-SnowKingdom-.name: I will remember the service you've rendered. Thank you, $MyPCName$.

0519030511005528-Quest2017-.name: Not so fast, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s knights are already... indisposed, and your guards are needed to protect $map:02000001$.

0519030511005529-Quest2017-.name: $map:02000076$'s militia is strong. They wouldn't ask for our help if the situation wasn't dire, minister. We can't turn our backs on them!

0519030511005530-Quest2017-.name: Let us say we do send our forces to help $map:02000076$. Would that not make $map:02000001$ a tempting target? Would you leave the empress exposed to these fiends?

0519030511005531-Quest2017-.name: (There has to be a way to help...!)

0519030511005532-Quest2017-.name: You're right, minister. Still, we must do something. What if we sent a small, elite team to aid $map:02000076$ while the bulk of our forces stayed here?

0519030511005533-Quest2017-.name: Absolutely not. The last thing we need is you taking your best men and gallavanting off into the woods. Your place is here, by Her Imperial Majesty's side!

0519030511005534-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(Court politics! This isn't what you signed up for. It's time to take matters into your own hands. Speak with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$.)</font>

0519030511005535-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(Court politics! This isn't what you signed up for. It's time to take matters into your own hands. Speak with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$.)</font>

0519030511005536-Quest2017-.name: Hmm... Both the minister and the captain bring up good points.

0519030511005539-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ wants to send an elite team. Let me be that team.

0519030511005540-Quest2017-.name: If it were anyone else, I'd call it bravado. But you... You just might be up to the task.

0519030511005541-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, we are in your debt. Go now to $map:02000076$ and do what you can to help those people.

0519030511005542-Quest2017-.name: The scout's portal is still open. Are you ready to go?

0519030511005545-Quest2017-.name: Tell $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ that we will send reinforcements as soon as we have the soldiers to spare. Good luck.

0519030511005546-Quest2017-.name: I'm sure you'll be fine. Imperial portals are famous for being a smooth ride. No portal sickness or your next teleportation is free!

0519030511005547-Quest2017-.name: I was jok—Ah, never mind. I'm ready.
