0519030511005548-Quest2017-.name: Tell $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ that we will send reinforcements as soon as we have the soldiers to spare. Good luck.

0519030511005549-Quest2017-.name: I haven't seen a fight like that in a long time. You have our thanks.

0519030511005550-Quest2017-.name: I believe $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ would like to speak with you.

0519030511005551-Quest2017-.name: I was concerned when you were the only reinforcements we received from $map:02000001$, but it seems the empress knows what she's doing. We're lucky to have you.

0519030511005552-Quest2017-.name: It's too early for us to let our guard down, though. We need to be ready for another attack, and we have to make sure we have enough food and supplies.

0519030511005554-Quest2017-.name: Probably. In the meantime, I'm going to survey the town. See where we were hit hardest.

0519030511005555-Quest2017-.name: Thorough as always, Captain. I leave this in your hands.

0519030511005556-Quest2017-.name: The militia will take things from here. $npc:11000001[gender:0]$, you need to get some rest.

0519030511005557-Quest2017-.name: The militia will take things from here. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$, you need to get some rest.

0519030511005558-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, if you wouldn't mind, I have a request for you.

0519030511005559-Quest2017-.name: This is something of a personal request. I would like you to bring back a certain young man...

0519030511005561-Quest2017-.name: His name is $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$, and he's... my son. He was hurt in the fighting, so he should still be at $map:02000027$.

0519030511005562-Quest2017-.name: He may not be eager to see me. I was... hard on him earlier.

0519030511005564-Quest2017-.name: He spotted the enemy while patrolling $map:02000054$, but he decided to try fighting them himself rather than coming back and reporting their position. Maybe I was being unreasonable, but we can't allow such sloppiness in the militia!

0519030511005565-Quest2017-.name: It's because of his actions that many of our friends were hurt. He was too busy chasing glory to bother doing the right thing. Still, I wonder if I wasn't too harsh...

0519030511005566-Quest2017-.name: All I want is a nice, quiet conversation with my boy. Will you bring $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ to me?

0519030511005568-Quest2017-.name: All I want is a nice, quiet conversation with my boy. Will you bring $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ to me? He should be in $map:02000027$.

0519030511005570-Quest2017-.name: You don't look like you're here as a patient. So, what can I do for you?

0519030511005571-Quest2017-.name: I'm looking for someone in particular.

0519030511005572-Quest2017-.name: As you can see, the hospital is empty today. Pretty amazing, considering that we were just under attack. It's all thanks to my patented first aid kits, you know.

0519030511005574-Quest2017-.name: I haven't seen that troublemaker all day, and thank goodness for that. I'm always patching up some scrape or bruise on that scamp.

0519030511005575-Quest2017-.name: Do you know where I might find $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?

0519030511005576-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000961[gender:1]$ is his friend, though I can't say I understand why. She should be on patrol near the hills.

0519030511005578-Quest2017-.name: While you're at it, would you mind delivering some first aid supplies? The militia could probably use it after that last scrape-up. It's inside the cabinet just over there.

0519030511005579-Quest2017-.name: While you're at it, would you mind delivering some first aid supplies? The militia could probably use it after that last scrape-up. It's inside the cabinet just over there.

0519030511005582-Quest2017-.name: Ah, I'm sorry! I didn't realize you were one of the good guys.

0519030511005583-Quest2017-.name: We were starting to run low on supplies. Is there any way I can repay you?

0519030511005585-Quest2017-.name: Oh no. He hasn't gotten into trouble again, has he? He's a good kid, really! He just gets moody whenever his dad scolds him...

0519030511005586-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is the one who sent me.

0519030511005587-Quest2017-.name: Well, that's good. He's a bit reckless, but there's a reason for it. He wants to live up to his father's legacy as a great hero.

0519030511005588-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ was too hard on him today. Said it would be better if he stayed in the hospital forever rather than risk any more lives with his bravado. I... haven't seen him since, actually.

0519030511005589-Quest2017-.name: He can't have gotten far. I bet you could see him from the top of the hill.

0519030511005590-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$'s injuries weren't too bad, but still, he couldn't have left town. Try asking if the kid hanging out on the top of the hill saw him.

0519030511005591-Quest2017-.name: Mom told me not to talk to strangers...

0519030511005593-Quest2017-.name: Yeah, I know him. Mom says he's a slob.

0519030511005594-Quest2017-.name: Why're you looking for him, anyway? He's usually moping around behind the $map:02000072$...

0519030511005595-Quest2017-.name: I'm trying to find out if $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is still in town.

0519030511005596-Quest2017-.name: That's easy. Just use some binoculars. There's a pair across the waterfall over there.

0519030511005597-Quest2017-.name: Tell me more about these... binoc-ulars.

0519030511005598-Quest2017-.name: Just walk on up to binoculars and use them to see all over the area. If you still can't find him, I think he liked to visit $npcName:11000189[gender:1]$'s cornfield an awful lot, so you can check there, too.

0519030511005599-Quest2017-.name: Just walk on up to binoculars and use them to see all over the area. If you still can't find him, I think he liked to visit $npcName:11000189[gender:1]$'s cornfield an awful lot, so you can check there, too.

0519030511005602-Quest2017-.name: Not you! That $male:handsome guy,female:beautiful girl$ over there. Heheh...

0519030511005603-Quest2017-.name: Hey, I'm plenty $male:hand,female:beau$—ahem. Have you seen $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?

0519030511005604-Quest2017-.name: Well, sure, but he's not here now. He wandered off about... 30 minutes ago, I want to say?

0519030511005605-Quest2017-.name: I'm pretty sure I know where he went. So... shall I tell you?

0519030511005607-Quest2017-.name: Tell me. Don't tell me. It's all the same.

0519030511005608-Quest2017-.name: That's what I thought! But there's no such thing as a free lunch, you know. You need to do something for me first...

0519030511005609-Quest2017-.name: Of course there are strings attached.

0519030511005610-Quest2017-.name: There's no use playing coy with me. I see right through you. And I'll even tell you what you want to know... if you do me a favor first.

0519030511005611-Quest2017-.name: Of course there are strings attached.

0519030511005612-Quest2017-.name: My poor, darling corn plants are in a terrible mood since those monsters invaded town...

0519030511005613-Quest2017-.name: No, no, they look very fresh. The freshest!

0519030511005614-Quest2017-.name: But they're not! Can't you see them drooping because they're so scared? I need a friendly person like you to cheer them up!

0519030511005615-Quest2017-.name: You need me to... cheer up... your corn...

0519030511005616-Quest2017-.name: That's right! All you have to do is walk up to them and use the greet emote. Do that three times, and then we'll talk.

0519030511005617-Quest2017-.name: You do know how to greet, don't you? Just type /greet in the chat window.

0519030511005618-Quest2017-.name: Wow, your greeting is so cool. My corn will grow up big and strong for sure, thanks to you!

0519030511005619-Quest2017-.name: As promised, I will now tell you where to find $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$. Your search is over! Soon, all of the answers you seek will be yours! Without delay! You don't need to wait another moment!

0519030511005621-Quest2017-.name: Right, right. What did he say again? Something something... Dark Wind... reinforcements... something something. And then he just ran off.

0519030511005623-Quest2017-.name: You may think $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is a big, stupid, ugly dummy, but he's got friends in $map:02000100$. It's actually where we met, before I moved here. He's probably hitting up one of them for a connection to Dark Wind.

0519030511005624-Quest2017-.name: And who would he go to for that kind of help?

0519030511005625-Quest2017-.name: I don't know his name, but he's got an unforgettable style. He got kicked out of town for disturbing the peace, so now he lives in $map:02000083$. You'll recognize him by his flashy hat.

0519030511005626-Quest2017-.name: I don't know his name, but he's got an unforgettable style. He got kicked out of town for disturbing the peace, so now he lives in $map:02000083$. You'll recognize him by his flashy hat.

0519030511005627-Quest2017-.name: Hey $male:guy,female:gal$. I'm hun-to-the-gry. You got some mesos for me? Or you just here to gronk up my style?

0519030511005629-Quest2017-.name: Don't be talking that mushroom noise at me, man. I hate mushrooms. So me and my boy, we hate $map:02000076$, too.

0519030511005630-Quest2017-.name: You deaf, $male:man,female:lady$? 'Shrooms make me sick! I don't want nothing to do with $map:02000076$ or that shroomy elder's son!

0519030511005631-Quest2017-.name: You sure know an awful lot about $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$.

0519030511005632-Quest2017-.name: ...Y-yeah, well... Your face is... Hmph. Fine, you got me.

0519030511005634-Quest2017-.name: That chump was asking around $map:02000100$ for people to come help his hotshot dad. Caught the attention of the shady goons holed up in $map:02000243$. You don't wanna mess with those guys, $male:bro,female:lady$.

0519030511005636-Quest2017-.name: I'm sure of it. $npc:24000010[gender:0]$ nabbed him right off the street. $npc:11000502[gender:0]$ is in deep doo doo...

0519030511005637-Quest2017-.name: I'd better start at $map:02000241$ and head down.

0519030511005638-Quest2017-.name: I'd better start at $map:02000241$ and head down.

0519030511005639-Quest2017-.name: Close one. That pushover almost got me... And to think, I let the son of $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ slip through my fingers...

0519030511005640-Quest2017-.name: Well, if it isn't my good friend $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$.

0519030511005641-Quest2017-.name: Scram, weirdo. I'm not in the mood for—Uh oh. Good to see you, $MyPCName$!

0519030511005642-Quest2017-.name: A-as you can see, I've renounced my life of crime! Wh-what brings you here, old buddy?

0519030511005644-Quest2017-.name: I didn't mean anything mean by it. Honest! The kid said he was $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s son. I offered to, erm, to take him home. That's right! I was gonna take him home, but the kid scampered off somewhere!

0519030511005645-Quest2017-.name: And how much of what you just told me is true?

0519030511005646-Quest2017-.name: All of it. Most of it, at least! One of my boys told me he got on a taxi for $map:02000134$.

0519030511005648-Quest2017-.name: Word on the street is that they're making this new miracle medicine over there. We were thinking of getting our hands on the stuff and selling it for a profit. The brat must've overheard us... Guess he didn't hear us talk about the monsters.

0519030511005649-Quest2017-.name: I'm going. If you get in my way...

0519030511005650-Quest2017-.name: I'm not that dumb. If you're involved in this mess at $map:02000134$, I want nothing more to do with it.

0519030511005651-Quest2017-.name: I'm not that dumb. If you're involved in this mess at $map:02000134$, I want nothing more to do with it.

0519030511005652-Quest2017-.name: Ugh... This was supposed to be easy...

0519030511005655-Quest2017-.name: Y-you were tailing me. Is that it?

0519030511005657-Quest2017-.name: Those goons left out the part about the monsters... But that just means this is my chance!

0519030511005658-Quest2017-.name: It's your chance to go home before you get stomped.

0519030511005659-Quest2017-.name: No! I'm not coming back empty-handed. Not again. It's my fault so many were hurt... I've gotta make up for it.

0519030511005661-Quest2017-.name: Please... beat up the monsters here and get the $itemPlural:20000050$ they stole. We can use it to help all the injured folk back home.

0519030511005662-Quest2017-.name: Please... beat up the monsters here and get the $itemPlural:20000050$ they stole. We can use it to help all the injured folk back home.

0519030511005664-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$, you need to go home. Now.

0519030511005665-Quest2017-.name: Okay, but let's make one thing clear. We got these $itemPlural:20000050$ together, okay? I'm the one who tracked them down in the first place, so if anyone gets credit for this, it's me.

0519030511005666-Quest2017-.name: Fine, fine. Can we just go now?

0519030511005667-Quest2017-.name: Since we see eye to eye, yes. Let's get going.

0519030511005668-Quest2017-.name: Since we see eye to eye, yes. Let's get going.

0519030511005670-Quest2017-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She's seriously hurt.)</font>
Help... Help them...!

0519030511005671-Quest2017-.name: We need to get you to safety.

0519030511005672-Quest2017-.name: Forget about me... Get to the $map:52000121$... $npcName:11000001$ and $npcName:11000015$... in trouble...! Wraith in rags... returned...

0519030511005674-Quest2017-.name: He was just... covering for his son...

0519030511005677-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s health was already in decline. I'm not sure when we can expect him to wake up...

0519030511005678-Quest2017-.name: It's my fault. If reinforcements had come earlier...

0519030511005680-Quest2017-.name: Aw jeez, something bad happened, didn't it?

0519030511005682-Quest2017-.name: I'm doing my part as a guard! Today, I'm helping the captain here in $map:02000076$.

0519030511005683-Quest2017-.name: I hear you kicked all the monsters out of town single-handedly! Every time I meet you, you're a little bit cooler. You're my role model.

0519030511005685-Quest2017-.name: I mean it! Someday, I'm going to be a great hero like you! But, uh... That guy who just left. Wasn't that $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s son? He looked hurt... and upset...

0519030511005686-Quest2017-.name: Your concern is touching, $npcName:11001838[gender:0]$, but I think you'd better focus on looking out for yourself. Now, that's enough small talk.

0519030511005687-Quest2017-.name: Yes, Sir! All done with small talk, Sir! Sniff... $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is scary...

0519030511005689-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is right. All these attacks happening at once... They aren't a coincidence. Someone is moving against the empire.

0519030511005690-Quest2017-.name: You can feel it in the air. People are gossiping, wondering where the shadows are going to strike next. And the attacks aren't random, either. They're stirring up memories of a time that most of us would rather forget...

0519030511005691-Quest2017-.name: We cannot simply protect $map:02000001$ while the rest of the empire burns. That is why we have turned our attention to the $map:02000146$. Strange things have happened there. In the present and in the past...

0519030511005692-Quest2017-.name: $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ is in command of the elite force garrisoned there. It seems he's too busy to file a report with us. I'd like you to go there and find out if it's somehow connected to these recent attacks.

0519030511005694-Quest2017-.name: That's what I wanted to hear. When you get there, meet with $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$. I leave this to you.

0519030511005695-Quest2017-.name: Are you really going to the $map:02000146$? Aren't you scared?

0519030511005696-Quest2017-.name: Somebody has to fight the darkness.

0519030511005699-Quest2017-.name: I've just been given my very first solo mission. I'm just like you, now!

0519030511005701-Quest2017-.name: I'm going to take care of some trouble at $map:02000087$. It's nothing dangerous or important like your work, but I've got to start somewhere.

0519030511005702-Quest2017-.name: I'm sure you'll do just fine.

0519030511005703-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11001838[gender:0]$! Don't you think $MyPCName$ has more important things to worry about right now?

0519030511005704-Quest2017-.name: Yes, Sir! Of course, Sir! Whatever you say, Sir! Aw jeez...

0519030511005706-Quest2017-.name: I'll be a real guard next time we meet. Be careful at the $map:02000146$!

0519030511005707-Quest2017-.name: I'll be a real guard next time we meet. Be careful at the $map:02000146$!

0519030511005708-Quest2017-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. I've heard much of your latest exploits.

0519030511005709-Quest2017-.name: As you can see, things are bad here. We've been gathering samples from the undead monsters for study, but it turns out that they don't take kindly to being harvested.

0519030511005710-Quest2017-.name: Even with the reinforcements from $map:02000100$ and $map:02000076$, it's been difficult to collect all of the $itemPlural:20000047$ our scientists need.

0519191811006156-Quest2017-.name: I suggest you speak with $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000026$. He's the resident expert on darkness and what have you.

0519191811006157-Quest2017-.name: He's not exactly in a friendly mood lately. You might bring him some $itemPlural:20000047$ as an... offering, let's say. You can get these samples from the undead monsters around here.

0519030511005712-Quest2017-.name: Meet with $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000026$. He can bring you up to speed on his research. Ah, and collect some $itemPlural:20000047$ for him on the way, if you'd be so kind.

0519030511005713-Quest2017-.name: Ahem! Thanks, but no thanks. I haven't got time to entertain the likes of you.

0519030511005715-Quest2017-.name: This is a welcome surprise. You're actually competent!

0519030511005716-Quest2017-.name: I just happened to need this right now. And you brought a lot of it. Impressive.

0519030511005717-Quest2017-.name: It wasn't that hard to get.

0519030511005718-Quest2017-.name: That's interesting. The others told me that it was too hard to get any more samples. So, were they lying to me? Or...

0519030511005719-Quest2017-.name: Perhaps it is you who is lying in order to impress me.

0519030511005722-Quest2017-.name: Ah, I love people who are easy to rile up. You're the complete opposite of you-know-who.

0519030511005724-Quest2017-.name: Hmph. I thought we could have a little fun, but it seems you aren't much for teasing. We already have one too many dour faces here...

0519030511005726-Quest2017-.name: The sole representative of the lofty academy of $map:02000023$. A man who loves to meddle in my many experiments. A man with a handsome face and an ice-cold personality...

0519030511005727-Quest2017-.name: I think he likes you. Maybe you can keep him from mixing his hocus pocus in with my experiments.

0519030511005728-Quest2017-.name: And you've brought a fresh batch of $itemPlural:20000047$. Excellent. We could make great use of your talents right about now.

0519030511005729-Quest2017-.name: This place used to be the $map:52000115$, a great monument to the Seven Heroes. After the passage to the Land of Darkness opened, however, people have taken to calling it the $map:02000146$.

0519030511005730-Quest2017-.name: This gate is the source of the shadow magic that is spreading across Victoria Island. And now we're even finding $item:20000047$ on the monsters here...

0519030511005731-Quest2017-.name: The way to the Land of Darkness was sealed years ago. For it to reappear like this...

0519030511005732-Quest2017-.name: The fairfolk of $map:02000023$—and many other groups throughout Maple World—fought so hard to close the passage, and now it is all for naught. This represents a threat to everyone everywhere.

0519030511005733-Quest2017-.name: That is why we are trying to understand the nature of this darkness. Simply fighting without understanding will lead us nowhere.

0519030511005734-Quest2017-.name: Let's shed some light on this darkness, then.

0519030511005735-Quest2017-.name: Very clever. Now, if you're done with your wordplay, I need to borrow $MyPCName$. My analysis is complete.

0519030511005736-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, over here. We need to talk.

0519030511005737-Quest2017-.name: It would have taken months for anyone else to analyze these samples. Luckily for you, I am a genius at the fine arts of alchemy and engineering.

0519030511005738-Quest2017-.name: Yes, yes, you're so great. And?

0519030511005739-Quest2017-.name: I'm just making sure we're on the same page about my greatness.

0519030511005740-Quest2017-.name: I've gone through enough of these samples to confirm that a blue glowing substance appears whenever I break down $item:20000047$. It's the weirdest thing...

0519030511005742-Quest2017-.name: This substance has never been catalogued anywhere. Not in Maple World, and not in the Land of Shadows. And believe me, I've checked everywhere.

0519030511005743-Quest2017-.name: One fool even went into the Land of Darkness himself to see if he could find more of the stuff. He had to check into the hospital after meddling with some crystals there.

0519030511005745-Quest2017-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He glances at $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.)</font>
Look here, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. I've hit a dead end. So, if you're going to swoop in and give us a solution with your magic mumbo-jumbo, now's the time!

0519030511005746-Quest2017-.name: Magic doesn't provide easy answers, but I do have something to show you. Have you prepared the $itemPlural:20000016$ I asked for?

0519030511005747-Quest2017-.name: Who do you think I am? Of course I... <font size='20'>Uh-oh.</font>

0519030511005749-Quest2017-.name: No, no. Surely it didn't slip my mind...

0519030511005751-Quest2017-.name: Hey, I need your help. You'll come through for your old friend, won't you?

0519030511005752-Quest2017-.name: The $itemPlural:20000016$ he's talking about are made from the $itemPlural:20000045$ that grow here. Most everything is killed by the dark magic in this place, but those fungi thrive. I've often thought they could be used to make an antidote for shadow poisoning...

0519030511005753-Quest2017-.name: It was a moot point until recently, since the mushrooms don't take to farming. But one day, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ trotted in with an armful of $itemPlural:20000045$. It seems he used his magic to create a garden of the things. Of course magic was the answer...

0519030511005754-Quest2017-.name: Problem is, it turns out the shrooms attract monsters. I was going to complain to $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ about it, but he was already off researching something else.

0519030511005755-Quest2017-.name: It's easy for $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ to blast the beasties with his magic, but most of the schmucks here can't fight to save their lives. So I figured, if he didn't care enough to help out, I might as well get on with my own research...

0519030511005756-Quest2017-.name: But since he needs his pills right now, I need the $itemPlural:20000045$ right now. Go fetch them for me and I'll whip up some $itemPlural:20000016$ in a jiffy!

0519030511005757-Quest2017-.name: The garden's just out front. Pick some $itemPlural:20000045$ so I can make my wonder cure.

0519030511005758-Quest2017-.name: You work fast. Good. I expect nothing less.

0519030511005759-Quest2017-.name: Now to make the $itemPlural:20000016$. I designed the formula to be so easy that an idiot could do it if $male:he,female:she$ had the right materials!

0519030511005760-Quest2017-.name: I do believe the idiot in this analogy is you. Do you feel up to an attempt?

0519030511005762-Quest2017-.name: Find some other idiot to do it.

0519030511005763-Quest2017-.name: That's the spirit! Simply place the $itemPlural:20000045$ into an open mixer. Child's play.

0519030511005765-Quest2017-.name: If you don't get more hands-on in the lab, you'll never make a proper scholar.

0519030511005767-Quest2017-.name: Great. Throw your $itemPlural:20000045$ into an open mixer and go wild. If you lost them somehow, you can pick more from the garden.

0519030511005768-Quest2017-.name: Just throw your $itemPlural:20000045$ into an open mixer and go wild. If you lost them somehow, you can pick more from the garden.

0519030511005769-Quest2017-.name: That looks about right. You did fine, $MyPCName$.

0519030511005770-Quest2017-.name: Satisfactory. $npcName:11003143[gender:0]$ has his... quirks, but his work is reliable. I was relieved to find such a competent researcher here.

0519030511005771-Quest2017-.name: I'm preeetty sure he hates you.

0519030511005772-Quest2017-.name: That's hardly unexpected. Scientists and magicians often don't get along. Most scientists I've met can't stand the thought of a mage such as myself dabbling in their precious research.

0519030511005773-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11003143[gender:0]$ is no exception to this rule. He was shocked when I gave him the blueprints for the mixer... But $npcName:11003143[gender:0]$ and I are scholars, and in that, I consider him a worthy companion.

0519030511005774-Quest2017-.name: Now, I need to file my report. $MyPCName$, won't you join me?

0519030511005776-Quest2017-.name: To $map:52000133$, of course. $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will be eager to learn what we've found. And the people here will be relieved to know that one of the Seven Heroes is keeping an eye on things.

0519030511005779-Quest2017-.name: I'll open a portal, then. Please close your eyes.

0519030511005780-Quest2017-.name: Are you sure? $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will be eager to see you...

0519030511005782-Quest2017-.name: I'll open a portal, then. Please close your eyes.

0519030511005783-Quest2017-.name: It seems $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has brought me a welcomed guest. I'm glad you're here, $MyPCName$.

0519030511005784-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has kept me informed of your many adventures. It is good to see you.

0519030511005785-Quest2017-.name: You may not be aware of this, but as one of the Seven Heroes, $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ holds quite a lot of influence beyond these walls. His power rivaled even the Mage of Light, $npcName:11001812[gender:0]$, at his peak.

0519030511005786-Quest2017-.name: Oh, I'm just an old mage trying to make himself useful in his final years. However, I've still got the curiosity of an academy freshman. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, your report?

0519030511005787-Quest2017-.name: Of course, Headmaster. Let me begin.

0519030511005788-Quest2017-.name: I'm just an old mage trying to make himself useful in his final years. However, I've still got the curiosity of an academy freshman. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, your report?

0519030511005789-Quest2017-.name: I'm glad you decided to join me. I'm sure you'll find my report fascinating.

0519030511005790-Quest2017-.name: I've focused my research on the $item:20000047$ of the monsters inhabiting the $map:02000146$. This DNA exudes a blue, glowing substance. In all of my cross-referencing, I can't find mention of such a substance anywhere.

0519030511005791-Quest2017-.name: The $itemPlural:20000045$ near the $map:02000146$ give off a similar blue light. I originally believed this light was the mushrooms' life force acting to shield it from the poison of the area, but now I have a different hypothesis.

0519030511005792-Quest2017-.name: The $itemPlural:20000045$ are organisms of darkness. Their glow actually spreads dark magic, allowing it to take root in other creatures. I've prepared an experiment to demonstrate.

0519030511005793-Quest2017-.name: Please come with me to my lab.

0519030511005796-Quest2017-.name: It's not far, but let's teleport to save time.

0519030511005797-Quest2017-.name: All right. Let me know when you're ready.

0519030511005798-Quest2017-.name: Please come with me to my lab.

0519030511005801-Quest2017-.name: It's not far, but let's teleport to save time.

0519030511005802-Quest2017-.name: All right. Let me know when you're ready.

0519030511005803-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ believes that the power of darkness is spreading. The fall of the $map:52000115$ and the opening of the $map:02000146$ may be the beginning of something terrible...

0519030511005804-Quest2017-.name: (But why did the crystal react to you like that?)

0519030511005805-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, are you all right? You seem flustered.

0519030511005807-Quest2017-.name: Don't fret. Such incidents are common in this kind of research. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ will get to the bottom of this mystery.

0519030511005808-Quest2017-.name: Now, I have some distressing news: $map:02000023$ is under attack by our dark enemy. Fortunately, we've managed to hold them off for now.

0519030511005810-Quest2017-.name: I've raised a simple magical barrier to protect $map:02000023$. Well, I say simple, but I'm pouring a lifetime of magic into it to keep the thing up. I'm afraid I'm quite stuck here as long as I have to maintain the shield.

0519030511005811-Quest2017-.name: The students and faculty of $map:52000101$ should be more than enough to keep $map:02000023$ relatively safe. But we can't rely on this barrier forever. We need to strengthen our position and prepare a counterattack.

0519030511005812-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, you've faced these invaders in $map:02000100$ and $map:02000076$. This may be your chance to gather vital information on who they are and how they work.

0519030511005814-Quest2017-.name: I expected nothing less. One of our more promising students is heading up our research efforts. I believe she'll be most happy to get your help.

0519030511005815-Quest2017-.name: Thank you for agreeing to help. One of our more promising students is heading up our research efforts. I believe she'll be most happy to get your help.

0519030511005816-Quest2017-.name: You're late! Some of us have things to do, you know.

0519030511005817-Quest2017-.name: Hold it right there. What is that smell?! Zombie drool... Bat musk... And shadow poison! You were with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in this state?!

0519030511005819-Quest2017-.name: Don't question my sense of smell! Ugh. We need to do something about this, and fast.

0519030511005820-Quest2017-.name: The springs here are enchanted to wash away dark magic. Go dunk yourself in it until all the curses wash out.

0519030511005821-Quest2017-.name: What's the hold up? Go! Now! I am not spending another second in your presence until you're squeaky clean!

0519030511005822-Quest2017-.name: What's the hold up? Go! Now! I am not spending another second in your presence until you're squeaky clean!

0519030511005823-Quest2017-.name: I suppose that will do. You don't want dirty hands contaminating your spells and experiments, after all!

0519030511005824-Quest2017-.name: Unless you have Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s naturally perfect hygiene, the least you can do is splash water on that filthy face of yours from time to time!

0519030511005825-Quest2017-.name: The headmaster gave me an absurdly simple job. Honestly, I have more important work to do. That's why I'm sending you to do it, instead.

0519030511005826-Quest2017-.name: ...I'll try not to mess it up.

0519030511005827-Quest2017-.name: The headmaster built his barrier using the academy's standing stones and totems as a foundation. Even for one of the Seven Heroes, it's hard to keep up that kind of magic for long. That's why we need to make sure the totems are in good shape.

0519030511005828-Quest2017-.name: Most of the students of the academy have been sent to make sure the totems are still standing. Some of them never came back. That's the problem.

0519030511005829-Quest2017-.name: And you want me to go find them.

0519030511005830-Quest2017-.name: You're getting it now. $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ was the first to lose contact, so I want you to find her first. She has a tendency to lose things, so hopefully that's all it is. Honestly, that girl...

0519030511005832-Quest2017-.name: Excuse me, but why do you think it's my job to keep track of my idiot peers? $npcName:11000029[gender:1]$ is always trailing behind her like a sad little puppy. She was sent to $map:02000023$ to distribute supplies, so why don't you try asking her?

0519191811006160-Quest2017-.name: I'm not your personal teleport scroll. Do it yourself.

0519191811006161-Quest2017-.name: Do you want my help or not?

0519191811006162-Quest2017-.name: Fine! Close your eyes and I'll send you straight there... if I feel like it.

0519030511005833-Quest2017-.name: Why are you still here? Hurry to $map:02000023$.

0519030511005836-Quest2017-.name: I'm sorry, but I don't have any $npcNamePlural:11000284[gender:1]$ for sale.

0519030511005838-Quest2017-.name: Oh, you mean that $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$! S-sorry. I'm new to this 'shopkeeping' thing...

0519030511005839-Quest2017-.name: But why are you looking for $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$?

0519030511005841-Quest2017-.name: That makes sense. I'm sure she's still working on the job she was given in $map:02000006$.

0519030511005842-Quest2017-.name: She's a little slow, but it's because she wants to do her best. I'm sure she's being really, really thorough! Since you're going there anyway, can you give her this?

0519030511005844-Quest2017-.name: It's a packed lunch with all her favorite foods. Sometimes she gets so focused on her work, she forgets to eat.

0519030511005846-Quest2017-.name: Thanks a lot! $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ is definitely still in $map:02000006$. Please let her know I'm rooting for her!

0519030511005850-Quest2017-.name: I had a feeling this might happen, so I packed an extra. Please be more careful this time. I put my heart into making this lunch!

0519030511005851-Quest2017-.name: Look inside your bag. It's there. You aren't trying to get extra lunches, are you?

0519030511005852-Quest2017-.name: Um... I think you need to make some space in your bag. It's already full!

0519030511005853-Quest2017-.name: She's in $map:02000006$. When she's stumped on a problem, she likes to stand by the water and think. I'd look for her there.

0519030511005854-Quest2017-.name: I'd love to chat, but I'm on academy business.

0519030511005856-Quest2017-.name: This is $npcName:11000029[gender:1]$'s cooking! Thank you for delivering it.

0519030511005857-Quest2017-.name: Well, you're still here. You're no ordinary delivery $male:boy,female:girl$, are you?

0519030511005858-Quest2017-.name: I was sent to check up on you.

0519030511005859-Quest2017-.name: Oh no, really? This is bad. I volunteered to help the headmaster, and now I'm just causing more trouble for everyone else. I'm too much of a dummy to solve this problem...

0519030511005861-Quest2017-.name: The totem was already destroyed when I got here. And the forest was crawling with dark monsters! I thought that witch, $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$, might help me, since she's lived here so long...

0519030511005862-Quest2017-.name: But instead of telling me what to do, she gave me a riddle. I tried to solve it on my own...

0519030511005864-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ runs the $map:02000073$, but she doesn't open her door for just anyone. You need to prove that you've got the forest's best interests at heart.

0519030511005865-Quest2017-.name: And how can I do that?

0519030511005866-Quest2017-.name: Drive the $npcPlural:33000006$ away. They don't belong to this forest. If you show up at her shop covered in the dark magic of her defeated enemies, $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ will have to listen to you!

0519030511005867-Quest2017-.name: Drive the $npcPlural:33000006$ away. They don't belong to this forest. If you show up at her shop covered in the dark magic of her defeated enemies, $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ will have to listen to you!

0519030511005868-Quest2017-.name: Oh, yes, you're coated in it. The icky sticky aura of the shadows. What business brings you to my door, child?

0519030511005869-Quest2017-.name: That fairfolk fool sent you to me, didn't she? Did my riddle unwind her puny mind? Heheh...

0519030511005870-Quest2017-.name: We need to reinforce the magic barrier!

0519030511005871-Quest2017-.name: And I have given her the answer. All she needs to do is solve the riddle.

0519030511005872-Quest2017-.name: I'll solve it. How does it go?

0519030511005873-Quest2017-.name:
Listen carefully, for I shan't repeat myself!
"Two divine creatures lost their hearts when darkness fell. End their pain and redeem the forsaken soul."

0519030511005875-Quest2017-.name: That is the same expression the fairfolk child made. Heheheh...

0519030511005877-Quest2017-.name: Certainly, my dear. Here is the clue: Begone from this place before I use your eyes in my stew! Eheheheh!

0519030511005878-Quest2017-.name: If you're still puzzling over my riddle, why not get help from the fairfolk girl? Between the two of you, you've got one whole wit!

0519030511005881-Quest2017-.name: That's the same thing she told me. Eccentric old bat!

0519030511005882-Quest2017-.name: To be honest, I thought this would be a piece of cake. But none of my solutions worked, and when I went to $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ for help, she mocked me for only getting it half right.

0519030511005883-Quest2017-.name: Why did I volunteer to do this? I was happy before. I had decent grades... But now I feel like a total idiot...

0519030511005885-Quest2017-.name: There's a place called $map:02000089$ near here. It's the home of $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$, a great turtle who was separated from his love. The forsaken soul was... Well, I thought it was something in the $map:02000074$.

0519030511005886-Quest2017-.name: So I did a favor for $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ and I searched everywhere for anything with a hint of magic in the $map:02000074$. And since then... nothing. No clues, no ideas, just nothing.

0519030511005888-Quest2017-.name: No! I did my best, and look where it got me? I just want to give up.

0519030511005890-Quest2017-.name: You stay here and sort out your thoughts. I'm going to take a look around the $map:02000074$.

0519030511005891-Quest2017-.name: You stay here and sort out your thoughts. I'm going to take a look around the $map:02000074$.

0519030511005893-Quest2017-.name: I was about to ask you the same.

0519030511005894-Quest2017-.name: I come here when I need to focus. It's a reprieve from all the idiots who stomp around the campus. They're afraid of the ghosts, you see...

0519030511005896-Quest2017-.name: Ha! I wouldn't be much of a mage if I were afraid of a little haunting or two.

0519030511005897-Quest2017-.name: I answered your question. So what are you doing here?

0519030511005899-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ was quite right to call you fools. I can't believe you couldn't solve such an obvious riddle on your own...

0519030511005901-Quest2017-.name: Yes. And you should feel ashamed that you don't!

0519030511005902-Quest2017-.name: If you tell me, I'll let $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ know you're doing a great job.

0519030511005903-Quest2017-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Her cheeks take on a deep blush.)</font>
W-well! Not that I care, but I might as well tell you. <font size='20'>Just don't forget to tell Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$...</font>

0519030511005904-Quest2017-.name: One of the lost hearts is $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$, but everything else was wrong. The other heart is the $npcName:22000038$ that lives near $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$. When the darkness first arrived, it drove the girant mad.

0519030511005905-Quest2017-.name: To end their pain... You must defeat the $npcName:22000038$ to put it out of its misery. $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ can still be reasoned with, so you should find some peaceful way to ease his suffering.

0519030511005906-Quest2017-.name: And the heart of the forsaken one... There's something here. Take care of the $npcName:22000038$ and $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ first. Then come back here and see if anything has changed.

0519030511005907-Quest2017-.name: I admit, you know your stuff.

0519030511005908-Quest2017-.name: As if I care what you think. Hurry to $map:02000089$, defeat the $npcName:22000038$, and figure out what $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ wants.

0519030511005909-Quest2017-.name: As if I care what you think. Hurry to $map:02000089$, defeat the $npcName:22000038$, and figure out what $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ wants.

0519030511005910-Quest2017-.name: You have endured a difficult battle. Please, rest your body and spirit in my spring.

0519191911006156-Quest2017-.name: Why have you come to see me? Are you friends with the fairfolk child?

0519191911006157-Quest2017-.name: I want to ease your pain.

0519191911006158-Quest2017-.name: There is only one thing in the whole world that could do such a thing. I wish to return to the old days, when my love was still by my side and her flowers bloomed...

0519191911006159--.name: But that is a wish that can never come true. I will ask of you the same thing that I asked of $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$.

0519191911006160--.name: Can you tell me the short version?

0519030511005916-Quest2017-.name: My love passed away not long ago, but she returned to me as the flower blossoming on my shell. I planted the seeds of the flower with care, since her spirit lives on with them. But then the monsters came, trampling everything in sight...

0519030511005917-Quest2017-.name: Can you save my dying flowers?

0519030511005918-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$... Have you ever been in love?

0519030511005921-Quest2017-.name: Then you understand. I had someone I loved who was dearer to me than life itself. But...

0519030511005922-Quest2017-.name: The day the Shadow Gate opened, the lake where we slept boiled like the sea in a raging storm, and she breathed her last breath.

0519030511005923-Quest2017-.name: I carried her as far as I could, not knowing where I was going or why. When I returned to my senses, my tears had become this spring, and a flower had blossomed in my love's place.

0519030511005924-Quest2017-.name: With every blossoming, I planted another flower seed. These seeds soon grew into flowers themselves. A final beauty, left behind by my love that I might remember her. But now, these monsters trample her flowers...

0519030511005925-Quest2017-.name: Can you save my dying flowers?

0519030511005926-Quest2017-.name: Perhaps you will not understand, then. I had someone I loved more than life itself. But...

0519030511005927-Quest2017-.name: The day the Shadow Gate opened, the lake where we slept boiled like the sea in a raging storm, and she breathed her last breath.

0519030511005928-Quest2017-.name: I carried her as far as I could, not knowing where I was going or why. When I returned to my senses, my tears had become this spring, and a flower had blossomed in my love's place.

0519030511005929-Quest2017-.name: With every blossoming, I planted another flower seed. These seeds soon grew into flowers themselves. A final beauty, left behind by my love that I might remember her. But now, these monsters trample her flowers...

0519030511005930-Quest2017-.name: Can you save my dying flowers?

0519030511005931-Quest2017-.name: Can you save my dying flowers?

0519030511005932-Quest2017-.name: I am touched by the kindness of your acts. Thank you.

0519030511005933-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ came to me for a reason. But what about you? What are you looking for?

0519030511005935-Quest2017-.name: A forsaken heart... That reminds me of a mage from days long past. He dabbled in forbidden magic so that he could be with the one he loved. This led to his banishment...

0519030511005936-Quest2017-.name: He lived out his days as a hermit, but he felt no resentment towards the people who banished him. He didn't want his sacrifices to go to waste. Even in the end, he wished for his power to someday be used for good.

0519030511005937-Quest2017-.name: When he passed away, he bound a fragment of his soul to that place. When someone with a good heart seeks his help, this fragment will open and reveal his power.

0519030511005938-Quest2017-.name: I need to get back to the $map:02000074$!

0519030511005939-Quest2017-.name: You have a good spirit and you wield righteous power. I am certain the forsaken heart will open for you...

0519030511005940-Quest2017-.name: You have a good spirit and you wield righteous power. I am certain the forsaken heart will open for you...

0519030511005941-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11003255[gender:1]$ is gone, but she left a note.)</font>

0519030511005942-Quest2017-.name: "$MyPCName$—It seems like you've solved the riddle. Congratulations. You're not a complete idiot. There's some sort of magic coming from the box under this note. When you're done sorting this mess out, let $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ know."

0519030511005943-Quest2017-.name: "P.S., I solved the riddle easily because I'm great. Not because that other student is incompetent."

0519030511005944-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(Is she trying to show off, or is that her twisted way of defending $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$? You can puzzle out Kate's twisted motives after you've checked out the magic box.)</font>

0519030511005945-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(Is she trying to show off, or is that her twisted way of defending $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$? You can puzzle out Kate's twisted motives after you've checked out the magic box.)</font>

0519030511005946-Quest2017-.name: Did you see it? There was a strange light in the sky!

0519030511005947-Quest2017-.name: After the flash of gold in the sky, I started feeling some pretty strong magical vibrations. They felt like the headmaster's barrier! Did you figure out the riddle?

0519030511005948-Quest2017-.name: (Fill her in on everything that's happened.)

0519030511005949-Quest2017-.name: A wooden box is the new totem... Well, I guess I can't complain if it works.

0519030511005950-Quest2017-.name: Thanks for all your help. I would have been sunk if it weren't for you.

0519030511005951-Quest2017-.name: Do you need to report back to the others?

0519030511005952-Quest2017-.name: Um... If it's all the same to you, I want to study this new totem for a bit. Do you mind reporting in for me?

0519030511005954-Quest2017-.name: Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$. He's the magical texts teacher. He should be waiting near the $map:02000035$ in $map:02000023$. While you're there, maybe tell him that my homework is going to be a tiiiiiny bit late...

0519030511005955-Quest2017-.name: Please report to Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ in my place. He should be waiting near the $map:02000035$ in $map:02000023$. While you're there, maybe tell him that my homework is going to be a tiiiiiny bit late...

0519030511005956-Quest2017-.name: Do you have business with me?

0519030511005958-Quest2017-.name: I'm glad she was able to complete her task... even if she had help. It's unfortunate about her homework, though.

0519030511005959-Quest2017-.name: You're helping $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ maintain the barrier, are you not? If that's the case, there's something I need taken care of quickly. You seem like the $male:man,female:woman$ for the job.

0519030511005961-Quest2017-.name: The barrier is busy defending against attacks from the outside, of course. However, it seems to be taking attacks from the inside, as well. We need to find the source of these attacks and snuff it out.

0519030511005962-Quest2017-.name: While reviewing my histories of magic, I came upon references to an old temple called $map:02000312$. The dark fairies worked to create something called a "shadow seed" in that place.

0519030511005963-Quest2017-.name: When the shadow seed is planted in a living creature, the subject loses its identity and becomes a monster filled with bloodlust. Eventually, the subject becomes a shadow itself...

0519030511005965-Quest2017-.name: That kind of magic tends to cling to a place. If a mage had the power and inclination, they could harness that power and do some real harm to $map:02000023$ without ever leaving the barrier. According to my research, the temple should be somewhere in $map:02000024$.

0519030511005966-Quest2017-.name: I have a shipment from the $map:52000103$ that I must attend to. $MyPCName$, will you go to $map:02000024$ and see if you can find this $map:02000312$?

0519030511005967-Quest2017-.name: One of my students, $npcName:11000876[gender:0]$, is already there. Between the two of you, I'm sure you'll puzzle out some way to uncover $map:02000312$.

0519030511005968-Quest2017-.name: One of my students, $npcName:11000876[gender:0]$, is already there. Between the two of you, I'm sure you'll puzzle out some way to uncover $map:02000312$.

0519030511005969-Quest2017-.name: Help has finally come! I knew the professor wouldn't forget me.

0519030511005970-Quest2017-.name: Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ said he'd send someone along to help me, but he didn't say it would be you! Wow!

0519030511005971-Quest2017-.name: When I first got here, I tried asking $npcName:11000293$, the old tree sprite, about $map:02000312$, but he just smiled and said he doesn't remember. I think I know how to jog his memory, though...

0519030511005972-Quest2017-.name: What do you have in mind?

0519030511005973-Quest2017-.name: We've gotta feed him something sweet! Whenever I can't remember what I'm doing, that's what I do. The boxes around here should have $itemPlural:20000052$ for $npcName:11000293$, but the monsters won't let him at them.

0519030511005974-Quest2017-.name: What a good plan. I will get those leaves.

0519030511005975-Quest2017-.name: I'll leave it to you! Once you have the $itemPlural:20000052$, take them straight to $npcName:11000293$. And don't forget to defeat the noisy monsters. We want our tree sprite friend to be distraction-free!

0519030511005976-Quest2017-.name: I'll leave it to you! Once you have the $itemPlural:20000052$, take them straight to $npcName:11000293$. And don't forget to defeat the noisy monsters. We want our tree sprite friend to be distraction-free!

0519030511005978-Quest2017-.name: I am $MyPCName$, and I have your $itemPlural:20000052$.

0519030511005979-Quest2017-.name: Oh... My $itemPlural:20000052$... I was just thinking of these. I couldn't get to them because of all the monsters...

0519030511005980-Quest2017-.name: You can thank me by telling me about $map:02000312$.

0519030511005981-Quest2017-.name: You must be a friend of that other. $npcName:11000876[gender:0]$. Fine. I will try to remember.

0519030511005982-Quest2017-.name: So sweet. I love to eat the leaves. And swim. Swim, swim, swim in the cold water with a belly full of sweets.

0519030511005983-Quest2017-.name: The water here is so fun. Fun to jump from the high waterfall. The high... waterfall...

0519030511005984-Quest2017-.name: I remember! There is a cave. Behind the waterfall. Tiny dark fairies go in and out!

0519030511005985-Quest2017-.name: I remember! There is a cave. Behind the waterfall. Tiny dark fairies go in and out!

0519030511005986-Quest2017-.name: I assume your search for $map:02000312$ was a success.

0519030511005987-Quest2017-.name: Yes, and $npcName:23000039[gender:1]$ was waiting when I got there.

0519030511005988-Quest2017-.name: That is unexpected. I was certain the temple would be empty...

0519030511005989-Quest2017-.name: (Tell him about the battle and the shadow seeds.)

0519030511005990-Quest2017-.name: Incredible. This $npcName:23000039[gender:1]$ is mentioned in many of $map:02000001$'s records.

0519030511005991-Quest2017-.name: My worst fears have been confirmed. Someone is using the dark magic of that place against us.

0519030511005992-Quest2017-.name: The headmaster needs to learn of this immediately.

0519030511005993-Quest2017-.name: Harnessing the power of a forgotten evil to attack the barrier from within... This is far more insidious than any of the attacks coming from the outside. It would be best if you deliver your report in person.

0519030511005994-Quest2017-.name: Okay. Beam me back to the academy!

0519030511005995-Quest2017-.name: Hm? No, no, you should make your own way back there. You... do know how to get back to $map:52000101$, don't you?

0519030511005996-Quest2017-.name: Would you believe me if I said no?

0519030511005997-Quest2017-.name: That is inconvenient. I'd tell you how to proceed, but the mage in charge of the express is quite firm that such details should not be given out freely. All I can give you is a hint...

0519030511005998-Quest2017-.name: Sure. This seems like a great time for another riddle.

0519030511005999-Quest2017-.name: Seek out the littlest mage in $map:02000023$. She will open the way to $map:52000101$.

0519030511006000-Quest2017-.name: It should be no difficulty for someone of your caliber to find the littlest mage in $map:02000023$. I wish you luck.

0519030511006001-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(There's a mischievous twinkle in the cat's eye.)</font>

0519030511006002-Quest2017-.name: Ahem. Pardon me, Madame Kitty, but do you know where I can board the Ellinel Express?

0519030511006003-Quest2017-.name: Ah, my dear $MyPCName$. I was wondering how long it would take for you to figure it out.

0519030511006004-Quest2017-.name: Those foolish fairfolk! Do I look like a conductor to you? Do you see any trains here? And yet they insist on calling my service the "Ellinel Express..."

0519030511006005-Quest2017-.name: You have a lot of opinions for a cat.

0519030511006006-Quest2017-.name: As if we would deal in something so antiquated as a train. We use tidy dimensional portals to get around. We are mages, after all.

0519030511006007-Quest2017-.name: Anyway, are you sure you want to use my portal? It's perfectly safe! Unless you're a trespasser, in which case you'll get dumped into a purgatory dimension for all eternity.

0519030511006009-Quest2017-.name: Well, it was nice knowing you. Just jump into the portal next to me. You'll wind up... somewhere.

0519030511006010-Quest2017-.name: Well, it was nice knowing you. Just jump into the portal next to me. You'll wind up... somewhere.

0519030511006011-Quest2017-.name: You're no help at all. Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is getting... irritable.

0519030511006013-Quest2017-.name: Focus, you two! What happened to the children?

0519030511006014-Quest2017-.name: I'll tell you right away, Professor! As for you, $MyPCName$... We'll talk later.

0519030511006015-Quest2017-.name: One of Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s potions is... missing. Someone left this note in their place.

0519030511006016-Quest2017-.name: "I'm taking this to save $map:02000023$. Signed, Team $MyPCName$"

0519030511006018-Quest2017-.name: I recognize that childish handwriting. It's $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$. It seems he's started a fanclub for you, $MyPCName$.

0519030511006020-Quest2017-.name: We showed the note to his adopted brother, $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$, and then he ran off, too. He's going to need help.

0519030511006021-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$... Do you know exactly which potion the child took?

0519030511006022-Quest2017-.name: He left the store room a mess, Professor. I'd need to go through the whole inventory checklist to see...

0519030511006023-Quest2017-.name: This is troubling. I had a sample of shadow reagents in that room. If the children took that, mistaking it for a potion...

0519030511006024-Quest2017-.name: I'll find them before it comes to that.

0519030511006025-Quest2017-.name: Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ and I will go through our inventory. $MyPCName$, find those kids and bring them home. $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ should still be in $map:02000101$.

0519030511006026-Quest2017-.name: Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ and I will go through our inventory. $MyPCName$, find those kids and bring them home. $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ should still be in $map:02000101$.

0519030511006027-Quest2017-.name: I can't believe him... That troublemaker...

0519030511006028-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$, I presume? I'm here to help.

0519030511006029-Quest2017-.name: Y-you're $MyPCName$! I can't believe it. Please, I'm counting on you!

0519030511006030-Quest2017-.name: Ever since you got here, $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ has been obsessed with being as great as you. It was all fun and games at first, but then he started talking about taking the fight to the forces of darkness...

0519030511006031-Quest2017-.name: Then he said he saw a suspicious shadow while playing hide and seek. I warned him to be careful, since $map:02000101$ really is in danger, but that just made him more excited...

0519030511006032-Quest2017-.name: I'm worried he and his friends went into the forest where they were playing. $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$ will be okay, since she can use some healing magic, but the others...

0519030511006033-Quest2017-.name: I'll search to the north. $MyPCName$, could you search to the south? And if you find them, give them a good talking to!

0519030511006034-Quest2017-.name: I'll search to the north. $MyPCName$, could you search to the south? And if you find them, give them a good talking to!

0519030511006038-Quest2017-.name: I-I was gonna be a hero... B-but my f-f-friends showed up a-a-and...

0519030511006039-Quest2017-.name: Take a deep breath and start from the beginning.

0519030511006040-Quest2017-.name: I didn't mean for them to get hurt. When they wouldn't go away, I told them we'd play hide and seek. But as soon as they hid, there was this... this big boom. I got scared and ran away...

0519030511006041--.name: If there really are bad guys in the forest... what about my friends? I wanted to save everyone, but they're in danger b-because of me...

0519030511006043--.name: W-wow! You can save them for sure! Okay. Let's go into the forest. I know all their hiding spots.

0519030511006044-Quest2017-.name: W-wow! You can save them for sure! Okay. Let's go into the forest. I know all their hiding spots.

0519030511006045-Quest2017-.name:
Thank you very much for saving us, $MyPCName$.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001172[gender:1]$ glares at $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ and clears her throat.)</font>

0519030511006046-Quest2017-.name: Y-yeah, thanks! I'll never do something so stupid again. And I promise I won't, um, borrow anything from the academy again, and... Uh...

0519030511006047-Quest2017-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ hesitates for a long time, until $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$ finally whispers in his ear.)</font>
<font size='20'>I'll never play hero again.</font>

0519030511006048-Quest2017-.name: ...I'll never play—Hey! I'm not playing. I will be a hero someday!

0519030511006050--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm gonna train hard and become a great hero like you! Just watch!

0519030511006051--.name: You remind me of a cadet I know.

0519030511006052-Quest2017-.name: I'll be a hero way before he is. Anyway, thank you very much for helping all of us.

0519030511006053-Quest2017-.name: Oh, about the potion $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ brought. He thought it was some sort of defense tonic, but it was a simple mana potion. Sorry, but I drank it so I could heal my friends...

0519030511006055-Quest2017-.name: Phew! I thought Mr. $npc:11000032[gender:0]$ might get mad if he found out...

0519030511006056-Quest2017-.name: You're lucky it wasn't something bad.

0519030511006057-Quest2017-.name: Hey, are you going back to Ellinel? Then you're gonna talk to the kitty mage, right?

0519030511006059-Quest2017-.name: I'm so jealous. Kitty won't even talk to me! $MyPCName$, ask her what snacks she likes, okay? If I give her something she likes, she'll have to be my friend.

0519030511006060-Quest2017-.name: You're gonna talk to the kitty mage, right? Please ask her what snacks she likes. If I give her something she likes, she'll have to be my friend.

0519030511006062-Quest2017-.name: What kind of snacks do you like?

0519030511006063-Quest2017-.name: I don't have time to worry about snacks right now. The portal to $map:52000101$ isn't working.

0519030511006064-Quest2017-.name: It's not unusual for the portal to shut down from time to time, but this is different. It's as if Ellinel is hidden behind a dark cloud. I can't see anything there.

0519030511006066-Quest2017-.name: Are you crazy? I just told you I can't see what's happening in there! You'd be going in blind!

0519030511006067-Quest2017-.name: That means they need my help.

0519030511006068-Quest2017-.name: You're serious about this, aren't you? Fine. The portal is down, but I should be able to teleport you directly to one of the other mages.

0519030511006070-Quest2017-.name:
Good idea. All right.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003257$ wiggles her nose and twitches her ears, but nothing happens.)</font>

0519030511006071-Quest2017-.name: Something's wrong. I can't sense $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ at all. Did... did something happen to him?

0519030511006073-Quest2017-.name: All right... Yes, I can get a lock on $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. Hurry along, now!

0519030511006075-Quest2017-.name: I never thought I'd be happy to see you...

0519030511006076-Quest2017-.name: Professor $npc:11000032[gender:0]$ and the headmaster are in there. When the darkness came, the professor, he... It's as if he lost his mind...

0519030511006077-Quest2017-.name: The headmaster ordered everyone to evacuate, and then just charged in...

0519030511006079-Quest2017-.name: It's no use. The headmaster sealed himself in. Even I can't break it...

0519030511006081-Quest2017-.name: Aren't you listening to me? It's on your own head if you get hurt!

0519030511006082-Quest2017-.name: The headmaster sealed himself in there. But if you insist on going in... It's on your own head if you get hurt!

0519030511006084-Quest2017-.name: There was nothing in our records about the creature that took $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. As for the professor's sudden change, however...

0519030511006085-Quest2017-.name: Right, right! I've brought every book we have on the subject of shadow seeds, which slowly drain away a victim's life force until they transform into a terrible monster.

0519030511006086-Quest2017-.name: It's similar to the evil work of the dark fairies from so long ago. It may be related to what you saw in $map:02000312$...

0519030511006087-Quest2017-.name: What are you two talking about? I know about shadow seeds, too. They get their power from the goddess of darkness. But she was destroyed in the war, so there's no way there are any shadow seeds left!

0519030511006088-Quest2017-.name: Basing your theories on something that doesn't even exist is deficient. Besides, even if they did exist, there is no way Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ would succumb to such a thing.

0519030511006089-Quest2017-.name: I understand your perspective, $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. But $npcName:11003282[gender:0]$'s captor clearly called him the "Black Moon Key." We can't rule anything out until we know what that means.

0519030511006091-Quest2017-.name: She is bright, but she's still a little young for all this. The best we can do is give her some space.

0519030511006092-Quest2017-.name: I doubt these changes happened overnight. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ surely would have noticed something was wrong... His research notes might hold a clue. $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$, do you have any ideas where we would find them?

0519030511006095-Quest2017-.name: Quite right. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ rarely left Ellinel, but that place was his sanctuary when he needed to think. He liked to go to the very bottom of $map:02000109$, where no one else ever went.

0519030511006096-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, could you go to $map:02000109$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ left any record of his experiments there? $npc:11000033[gender:0]$ and I will work on restoring the Ellinel Express.

0519030511006097-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, could you go to $map:02000109$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ left any record of his experiments there? $npc:11000033[gender:0]$ and I will work on restoring the Ellinel Express.

0519030511006098-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(There's a long, narrow gap in the wall next to the waterfall. You can feel a breeze coming through it.)</font>

0519030511006100-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(It's hard to make out any sound over the water, but there's something ringing on the other side.)</font>

0519030511006101-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(You press your hand against the gap, and the wall falls away to reveal a hidden compartment.)</font>

0519030511006103-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(You press your hand against the gap, and the wall falls away to reveal a hidden compartment.)</font>

0519030511006104-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(You're pretty sure you know whose notebook this is.)</font>

0519030511006105-Quest2017-.name:
"Log 357. This spectrum of blue light only appears near the $map:02000146$.
Measurements of light on $item:20000047$: Central monsters - strong / Outskirt - weak
$item:20000045$ spore. <u>Spreads</u> over wide areas. Thrives well."

0519030511006107-Quest2017-.name:
"Log 358. Observing darkness expansion. Blue light = delivery method?
Spore acts as spreading agent for light, expanding affected regions.
The $map:02000146$ is the epicenter. Shadow poison spreads from there."

0519030511006109-Quest2017-.name:
<font color="#909090">(There's a rough map of the Shadow Gate on this page. A small note is attached above, with many colorful arrows pointing to it.)</font>
"Supplying resources to the infection vector! $map:02000213$"

0519030511006110-Quest2017-.name: "Conclusion... Substances with blue glow ($item:20000045$, $item:20000047$) are infection vectors spreading the reach of the darkness. Spreading from the $map:02000146$ to the outskirts."

0519030511006111-Quest2017-.name: "The $map:02000213$. I'm certain that this is a major source of energy for the blue light. Shadow magic is syphoned from the Land of Darkness and focused here, then funneled into the rest of Maple World."

0519030511006112-Quest2017-.name:
"It reminds me of old writings on the shadow seeds. Could it be the same?
A new thought: What about the soldiers stationed at the $map:02000146$?"

0519030511006113-Quest2017-.name: (Take a closer look at the map.)

0519030511006114-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(This altar is in the cave below the cliff, not far from the center of the area. You have to cut off the source of darkness before it's too late!)</font>

0519030511006115-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(You notice a slight impression in the page–as if someone traced the writing. There's also several warped spots... Teardrops? And what's this?)</font>

0522170111006163-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(A polished blue gem catches your eye. You've seen this somewhere before...)</font>

0522170111006164-Quest2017-.name: It looks like $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ already came by...

0522170111006165-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(You take the $item:30000769$. You can return it to her the next time you see $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. For now, hurry back to the $map:02000146$ and warn $npc:11000076[gender:0]$.)</font>

0519030511006120-Quest2017-.name: <font color="#909090">(You need to hurry back to the $map:02000146$ and warn $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ about the danger he and his men are in.)</font>

0519030511006124-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ went to check out a disturbance with $npcName:11000266[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000007[gender:1]$. Seems there has been some strange shadow magic in the cave beneath the cliff...

0519030511006125-Quest2017-.name: Then I'm already too late. I've got to hurry to the $map:02000213$!

0519030511006126-Quest2017-.name: Then I'm already too late. I've got to hurry to the $map:02000213$!

0519030511006127-Quest2017-.name: Now that that's taken care of... How did you know where to find us?

0519030511006128-Quest2017-.name: You were reckless. You're lucky to be alive!

0519030511006129-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ told me that you'd gone to $map:02000023$ with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. Did the forces of darkness attack there, as well?

0519030511006130-Quest2017-.name: Yes. The first assault was stopped, but...

0519030511006131-Quest2017-.name: It seems nowhere is safe, then. After you left, the monsters here grew more aggressive, and some of my soldiers started suffering from a mysterious illness. Some are even showing signs of undeath...

0519030511006132-Quest2017-.name: It seemed obvious that the disease was being spread by the monsters, so we started tracking their movements to see if we could find a source. That's what led us to the cave.

0519030511006133-Quest2017-.name: We still need to treat the infected. $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ is leading our efforts on that front. I suggest you talk to him.

0519030511006134-Quest2017-.name: We still need to treat the infected. $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ is leading our efforts on that front. I suggest you talk to him.

0519030511006135-Quest2017-.name: I'd love to take credit for saving all these lives—really, I would—but it's $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s $itemPlural:20000016$ that made all the difference. There'd be many, many more infected if it weren't for him.

0519030511006136-Quest2017-.name: But the research took its toll on him. Even I could see it. He developed dark rings under his eyes, and his voice started to grow hoarse. At first, I just thought he didn't have the stomach for field research...

0519030511006138-Quest2017-.name: How is our Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$? Happy to be back at his school of hocus pocus nonsense?

0519030511006140-Quest2017-.name: Cute joke. Really, where is he?

0519030511006141-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ mentioned something about this. He said that the darkness can expand on its own. If left unchecked, its destructive power would be immense.

0519030511006142-Quest2017-.name: I thought it was magic mumbo-jumbo at the time, but it looks like he was on to something. If only I'd listened to him...

0519030511006143-Quest2017-.name: You can feel sorry for yourself after you figure out a treatment for this illness. How's that coming along, anyway?

0519030511006144-Quest2017-.name: $itemPlural:20000016$ can only take us so far. They're less effective the more you take, and they don't actually cure anything—they just stop the disease from spreading or getting worse.

0519030511006145-Quest2017-.name: The situation is even worse than I thought. We need to keep an eye on the entire empire to make sure this doesn't spread.

0723173711007310-Quest2017-.name: We'll continue our research for now. $MyPCName$, you make sure that no more lives are lost. Please.

0723173711007311-Quest2017-.name:
Got it. I'll do my best.
<font color="#909090">(Go back to $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$.)</font>

0519030511006150-Quest2017-.name: We'll continue our research for now. $MyPCName$, you make sure that no more lives are lost. Please.

0519030511006153-Quest2017-.name: How are we supposed to fight back when we don't even know who they are or what they want?

0721122911007287-Quest2017-.name: Give $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ my regards. Until we meet again... Fight with honor!

0721122911007292-Quest2017-.name: Give $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ my regards. Until we meet again... Fight with honor!

0721140711007303--.name: You were gone for a long time. Is $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ well? How's the situation in $map:02000051$?

0721140711007306--.name: It's just as we feared. While I was searching for the ragged wraith in the capital, he was causing trouble to the east...

0721140711007307--.name: I'm sorry. I should have sent you to $map:02000051$ with reinforcements. Maybe this whole sad state of affairs could have been avoided.

0721140711007308--.name: How could you have known? Right now, we need to stop any more lives from being lost.

0721122911007295-Quest2017-.name: I believe so, but we may need your help once again.

0721122911007296-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ is safe for now. At my recommendation, $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ has tightened security around Tria. Even if the forces of darkness were to attack, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ would defend her with his life.

0721122911007298-Quest2017-.name: Don't read anything into it! Anyway, in his latest report, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ asked for you by name.

0721122911007300-Quest2017-.name: I'm not sure, but it sounded urgent. I've never known $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to be so... agitated.

0721122911007301-Quest2017-.name: I'm not sure what he needs, but it sounded urgent. I've never known $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to be so... agitated.

0721122911007302-Quest2017-.name: Don't tell me our enemy is going after $map:02000001$ next...

0713175511006166-Quest2017_2-.name: I wouldn't keep him waiting if I were you. Head to $map:02000001$ as quickly as you can.

0713175511006168-Quest2017_2-.name: I wouldn't keep him waiting if I were you. Head to $map:02000001$ as quickly as you can.

0713175511006170-Quest2017_2-.name: Thanks to your help in the outlying cities, I've been able to keep $map:02000001$ safe and sound. Until last night, that is. $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ has been kidnapped.

0713175511006171-Quest2017_2-.name: It happened without warning. But, with the minister as a hostage, we can't exactly charge in. We need to be subtle.

0713175511006172-Quest2017_2-.name: And you wanted my help with this? Why me?

0713175511006173-Quest2017_2-.name: The leader of the kidnappers calls herself $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$. Have you ever heard that name before?

0713175511006176-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm certain that was the name of one of the ambushers at the $map:63000041$. I think she had a... red cape, was it?

0713175511006177-Quest2017_2-.name: Does the name not ring any bells? Think very carefully.

0713175511006179-Quest2017_2-.name: That sounds like her, yes. I hope I can count on your help resolving this incident.

0713175511006181-Quest2017_2-.name: The red cape and her minions kidnapped $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ and disappeared into the $map:02000252$. I'm gathering my best men for the extraction, but I'd like you to scout out the situation first.

0713175511006182-Quest2017_2-.name: The red cape and her minions kidnapped $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ and disappeared into the $map:02000252$. I'm gathering my best men for the extraction, but I'd like you to scout out the situation first.

0713175511006183-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm happy to report that $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ is safe and sound. But what became of the red cape?

0713175511006185-Quest2017_2-.name: Hm... I suspected as much. Great work.

0713175511006186-Quest2017_2-.name: $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ is waiting for you in the $map:02000065$. Will you meet with him?

0713175511006187-Quest2017_2-.name: Sure, but first I want to know what this attack was all about.

0713175511006188-Quest2017_2-.name: That... isn't something I can really discuss in detail. Even $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ is hesitant to speak freely about it. The only person who can answer your questions is $npc:11000074[gender:0]$.

0713175511006189-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm sure he'd also like the opportunity to thank you. The $map:02000065$ is just at the bottom of these stairs.

0713175511006190-Quest2017_2-.name: $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ is eager to see you. The $map:02000065$ is just at the bottom of these stairs.

0713175511006191-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm not sure how I can thank you for your help.

0713175511006192-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm sure you have many questions. Especially after everything you saw and heard...

0713175511006194-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ is my daughter. She's always had a rebellious streak, but I've done my best to protect her. It's clear that I can no longer do so.

0713175511006195-Quest2017_2-.name: Above all else, I am dedicated to the service of $npc:11000075[gender:1]$. It saddens me, but if I must choose Her Imperial Majesty over my family, then I will.

0713175511006197-Quest2017_2-.name: No matter the personal cost... I am prepared to do what I must. It will not be easy to handle the chaos that she leaves in her wake, but the child cannot be allowed to carry on like this.

0713175511006198-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$... Would you mind giving me some time? For now, please do not let anyone know that $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ was here...

0713175511006199-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$... Would you mind giving me some time? For now, please do not let anyone know that $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ was here...

0713175511006200-Quest2017_2-.name: What a surprise, seeing you here of all places! A pleasant one, of course.

0713175511006201-Quest2017_2-.name: I hate to intrude, but $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$... Would you mind lending me the Scroll of $map:02000001$? I need to reference the writings of the royal mages. I promise I'll return it straight away.

0713175511006202-Quest2017_2-.name: If you came here in person, I'm sure you have a good reason to borrow it. I'm afraid I don't have it at hand, however. I've had it hidden to keep it from... prying eyes.

0713175511006203-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm afraid this can't wait. I also have something I must discuss with you... Fortunately, we have a very helpful person who will no doubt be happy to lend us a hand.

0713175511006204-Quest2017_2-.name: Gee, I wonder who that could be.

0713175511006205-Quest2017_2-.name: I hate to impose, $MyPCName$, but could you fetch the Scroll of $map:02000001$ for me? I'm sure I'll find a way to repay you someday.

0713175511006207-Quest2017_2-.name: It's being kept at $map:02000218$ near the center of $map:02000001$. Go to $npc:11000530[gender:0]$ and tell him that... Ahem... you're "here for the cutie." He will know what you mean.

0713175511006208-Quest2017_2-.name: The Scroll of $map:02000001$ is being kept at $map:02000218$ near the center of $map:02000001$. Go to $npc:11000530[gender:0]$ and tell him that you're... ahem... "here for the cutie." He will know what you mean.

0713175511006209-Quest2017_2-.name: Is there something you need? A portrait, perhaps?

0713175511006210-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm, uh, I'm here for the cutie...?

0713175511006213-Quest2017_2-.name: You look as confused as I feel. Who sent you?

0713175511006214-Quest2017_2-.name: Ah, yes, good old $npc:11000074[gender:0]$. He may look like a stickler, but that man has a sense of humor.

0713175511006215-Quest2017_2-.name: Anyway, I think I know just the cutie you're looking for. Give me a minute. It wasn't exactly easy to find a good hiding place for it...

0713175511006217-Quest2017_2-.name: Okay, here it is. And give $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ my regards, while you're at it.

0713175511006220-Quest2017_2-.name: What sort of pictures do you paint?

0713175511006221-Quest2017_2-.name: Yes, I saw you drop it. You're lucky I was keeping an eye on it. This is an irreplaceable treasure of the empire!
