0713175511006222-Quest2017_2-.name: I think you'll find that it's still in your bag. Did you want two copies? You know that's a one-of-a-kind artifact, right?

0713175511006223-Quest2017_2-.name: How can you walk around with your bag stuffed like that? Make some room and then I'll give you the scroll.

0713175511006224-Quest2017_2-.name: There's nothing in the world I can't paint. But if I had to pick a favorite subject, then I'd say I'm happiest when I'm painting a portrait.

0713175511006226-Quest2017_2-.name: Would you mind coming with me? I have a visitor who I'm certain you'll want to see.

0713175511006228-Quest2017_2-.name: It's $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. He's back! And he's in $map:52000101$ right now!

0713175511006229-Quest2017_2-.name: We can go over the details when we get there, but the gist is that we managed to re-open the portal to Ellinel. When we got to $map:52000135$, we found him inside... unconscious.

0713175511006231-Quest2017_2-.name: You should come with me and see for yourself. Are you ready to go?

0713175511006233-Quest2017_2-.name: Give me some time to get my things.

0713175511006234-Quest2017_2-.name: Certainly. I can wait. Here I am, waiting... Waiting... Are you ready now?

0713175511006237-Quest2017_2-.name: You really should see $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ for yourself. Are you ready to go?

0713175511006239-Quest2017_2-.name: Give me some time to get my things.

0713175511006240-Quest2017_2-.name: Certainly. I can wait. Here I am, waiting... Waiting... Are you ready now?

0713175511006243-Quest2017_2-.name: I see $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ hasn't returned empty-handed. I was hoping you'd be along soon. We could use your help.

0713175511006244-Quest2017_2-.name: I thought so, too. I just happened to run into $MyPCName$ in $map:02000001$. Fortunate for all of us, I'd say.

0713175511006245-Quest2017_2-.name: Fortunate indeed. It's good to see you again, $MyPCName$.

0713175511006247-Quest2017_2-.name: After we found him, we moved him to the $map:52000149$ so that he could recover. I fear he still hasn't regained consciousness...

0713175511006248-Quest2017_2-.name: The $map:52000149$ is just beyond the door behind me. I think it would be good if you checked on $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in person.

0713175511006249-Quest2017_2-.name: The $map:52000149$ is just beyond the door behind me. I think it would be good if you checked on $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in person.

0713175511006250-Quest2017_2-.name: What I'm about to tell you, I've learned from decades of research and the study of obscure tomes. Outside of our world, there are countless other planes of existence. Between these different worlds, binding it all together is a great divine being, who has sent an emissary to each of these worlds.

0713175511006251-Quest2017_2-.name: These emissaries are born with hearts full of both good and evil. When the time comes, they choose one of the two paths. These emissaries are called the Innocent.

0713175511006252-Quest2017_2-.name: And you think Maple World's Innocent is...

0713175511006253-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm not certain, but I think you're on the right track. A man whose magical abilities are endless... Who has vast knowledge of lost civilizations... Who has earned the complete confidence of $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ himself. All signs point to $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.

0713175511006254-Quest2017_2-.name: If $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ were simply a talented mage, then I think things would have happened quite a bit differently during the incident...

0713175511006255-Quest2017_2-.name: Normally, a mage as skilled as $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ should have been able to ward himself against the power of darkness. But that isn't what happened, is it?

0713175511006256-Quest2017_2-.name: According to my records, the Innocents walk a fine line between good and evil. Eventually, each Innocent must choose between the light and the dark, but choosing one doesn't mean that the other simply goes away. I think that the shadow poison caused $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s evil side to temporarily awaken.

0713175511006257-Quest2017_2-.name: If our enemy tried to turn $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s nature against us, then it is clear that they know more about the Innocents than we do.

0713175511006258-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is beloved and respected in $map:02000023$. For now, I'd appreciate it if you kept what happened between him and $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ a secret.

0713175511006259-Quest2017_2-.name: If anyone asks, we'll simply say that $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ was hurt while trying to defend $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ from the forces of darkness. And... as you can see... he still hasn't regained consciousness.

0713175511006261-Quest2017_2-.name: We're all worried... including Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$, who seems to think we haven't noticed her.

0713175511006262-Quest2017_2-.name: He's still alive, at least. There has to be something in $map:02000023$ that can help him.

0713175511006263-Quest2017_2-.name: Many of the creatures of $map:02000023$ possess mysterious powers. The $npcName:22090107$, for instance, drops a jelly with a rather... potent scent. It does have marvelous healing properties, however.

0713175511006264-Quest2017_2-.name: I must stay here and examine the book $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ brought me. Would you mind going to the $map:02000112$ and retrieving the $item:30000179$ on my behalf? I'll open a portal back to $map:02000023$ for you.

0713175511006265-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to stay here and examine the book $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ borrowed. Would you mind going to $map:02000112$ and retrieving the $item:30000179$ on my behalf? I'll open a portal back to $map:02000023$ for you.

0713175511006267-Quest2017_2-.name: I managed to find a lead on an herbal remedy while you were away. Would you mind helping me once more?

0713175511006269-Quest2017_2-.name: Can't you take care of it yourself?

0713175511006270-Quest2017_2-.name: There's a hollow section in the trunk of the $map:02000128$. A certain mushroom grows there in the $map:02000012$. I need that mushroom to make a reagent.

0713175511006271-Quest2017_2-.name: Gather mushrooms from the $map:02000012$ of the $map:02000128$. Be sure to gather plenty, as I'm not sure exactly how much I need.

0713175511006272-Quest2017_2-.name: If you want to do the research while I go out to get the mushrooms, fine. Be my guest. I'm sure the monsters there will find me quite delicious...

0713175511006273-Quest2017_2-.name: Fine, I'll go! Just tell me what to do.

0713175511006274-Quest2017_2-.name: Gather mushrooms from the $map:02000012$ of the $map:02000128$. Be sure to gather plenty, as I'm not sure exactly how much I need.

0713175511006276-Quest2017_2-.name: Thanks to the $item:30000179$ and mushrooms you've brought me, the ritual to reawaken $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is going well. I'm afraid this last ingredient may be a tad... challenging.

0713175511006278-Quest2017_2-.name: There's a certain root that only grows in the $map:02000206$. It thrives on chaos, and it actually has the power to purify dark magic. But there's a problem...

0713175511006279-Quest2017_2-.name: A powerful monster of the forest, $npcName:23000025[gender:0]$, absorbed the $itemPlural:30000190$. The only way to retrieve the root is to defeat him.

0713175511006280-Quest2017_2-.name: Can I rely on you to defeat $npcName:23000025[gender:1]$ of the $map:02000206$?

0713175511006281-Quest2017_2-.name: You aren't surprised to see me, are you? Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ thought you might need my help.

0713175511006282-Quest2017_2-.name: The $map:02000206$ is a dangerous place. I have to admit, I'm surprised you survived.

0713175511006283-Quest2017_2-.name: Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ went on ahead to the $map:02000179$. He's going to start the ritual to heal Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$... I'm here to fetch you.

0713175511006284-Quest2017_2-.name: The $map:02000179$ is a focal point for life magic. Not just anyone is allowed there, so I hope you realize how much of an honor this is. Are you ready to go?

0713175511006287-Quest2017_2-.name: Something wrong with your teleportation spell?

0713175511006288-Quest2017_2-.name: My spell is just fine! There's just something... Some sort of interference...

0713175511006289-Quest2017_2-.name: Ha! As if a little interference could slow me down. We'll just take the scenic route. Are you ready?

0713175511006293-Quest2017_2-.name: Just trust me, okay? Are you ready?

0713175511006295-Quest2017_2-.name: As if a little interference could slow me down. We'll just take the scenic route. Are you ready?

0713175511006299-Quest2017_2-.name: Why are you always wasting my time? Hurry and get ready!

0713175511006300-Quest2017_2-.name: Professor $npc:11000033[gender:0]$? $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?! You aren't supposed to be here!

0713175511006301-Quest2017_2-.name: Things have not exactly gone according to plan.

0713175511006302-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s condition is bad. I must create a magical quarantine to prevent the spread of dark magic in his body, but I'd hoped to move him somewhere safe first. Unfortunately, our teleportation spell was blocked...

0713175511006303-Quest2017_2-.name: It seems you've been paying attention in class, Miss $npcName:11003442[gender:1]$. Most students would not have thought to take a detour through this place.

0713175511006304-Quest2017_2-.name: I bet Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ will be so impressed!

0713175511006305-Quest2017_2-.name: We'll need to walk to reach the $map:02000066$ for a ways. Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$, can you find the entrance to the $map:02000179$?

0713175511006306-Quest2017_2-.name: Yes, but it's dangerous to move $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in his condition. Let me place some additional wards on him to be safe...

0713175511006317-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm ashamed that I've allowed this to happen. But I've no time for self-pity... We have a problem to solve, and I will need all of your help.

0713175511006311-Quest2017_2-.name: Professor! It's okay now. We'll protect you.

0713175511006318-Quest2017_2-.name: The fight to defend the $map:02000066$ will not be an easy one. We'll need reinforcements. $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$, please get in touch with the empire.

0713175511006320-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$, Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. Come with me to the $map:02000066$. He cannot be allowed to set foot in the $map:02000179$.

0713175511006321-Quest2017_2-.name: Wait a moment, Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$! Don't you think you should tell us what's going on?

0713175511006322-Quest2017_2-.name: Are you really one of these... these Innocents? If you chose good, then what was that corrupted... $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ creature?

0713175511006323-Quest2017_2-.name: Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$, there is no time for explanations right now. If we survive this, I'll answer all of your... scholarly questions.

0713175511006324-Quest2017_2-.name: That is, if you're still interested in helping me defend the $map:02000179$...

0713175511006325-Quest2017_2-.name: O-of course I am! But I need to know... Are you really my Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$? Why did you hurt Headmaster $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$?

0713175511006326-Quest2017_2-.name: All that matters right now is resolving the crisis facing $map:02000023$. I take it that you will be staying behind, Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. That leaves you and I to clean up this mess, $MyPCName$. Let's go.

0713175511006327-Quest2017_2-.name: We cannot allow $npc:11000068[gender:0]$ to reach the heart of the $map:02000066$. I will cast a magic shield, but I need you to repel $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$'s attacks.

0713175511006328-Quest2017_2-.name: We cannot allow $npc:11000068[gender:0]$ to reach the heart of the $map:02000066$. I will cast a magic shield, but I need you to repel $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$'s attacks.

0713175511006329-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$, thank you. You've been a great help.

0713175511006330-Quest2017_2-.name: But this fight isn't over. $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ is still out there, and he won't rest until he's got what he's after.

0713175511006332-Quest2017_2-.name: ...is me. The other half of his self. The Innocent who chose the path of life.

0713175511006333-Quest2017_2-.name: Only $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ knew what I truly was. Or so I thought... It seems like someone else knew about the Innocents.

0713175511006334-Quest2017_2-.name: Ever since my work at the $map:02000146$, I've been plagued by nightmares. Sometimes I'd realize that there were gaps in my memory. The frequency and duration of these gaps began to increase...

0713175511006335-Quest2017_2-.name: My last memory before waking up was $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ reporting that one of our elementary students had gone missing. I recall that you were there... but I remember nothing after.

0713175511006336-Quest2017_2-.name: Then, those things $npc:11003146[gender:1]$ asked you about... You don't remember any of it. Or what happened to Headmaster $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$...

0713175511006337-Quest2017_2-.name: We have a lot to tell you...

0713175511006338-Quest2017_2-.name: There's nothing to be done about that. We just have to pick ourselves up and begin again.

0713175511006339-Quest2017_2-.name: My primary concern right now is your condition, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. I'm still not certain how $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ split off from you... or what side effects you may experience as a result.

0713175511006340-Quest2017_2-.name: I should remain here. $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ is my responsibility, and he's got his sights set on this place. I'll send word if I need anything.

0713175511006341-Quest2017_2-.name: Of course. I'll make sure you have everything you could possibly want. Oh, and $MyPCName$, I fear I must call upon your abilities of... persuasion.

0713175511006342-Quest2017_2-.name: Who do you need me to "persuade?"

0713175511006343-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000282[gender:0]$, the owner of the $map:02000019$ in $map:02000215$. He has a particular book I need—the Dimensional Dictionary. Without it, I can't hope to understand some of the writings I've found on the Innocents...

0713175511006344-Quest2017_2-.name: He's infamous for refusing to actually loan out his books. Perhaps you could win him over.

0713175511006347-Quest2017_2-.name: I've already tried! He said something about the "mischievous glint in my elven eyes" and sent me on my way. I fear he is quite determined to have nothing to do with me.

0713175511006349-Quest2017_2-.name: He's known for judging someone solely based on first impressions, so make sure yours is a good one. I'm sure you'll do fine. The $map:02000019$ is in the center of $map:02000215$.

0713175511006350-Quest2017_2-.name: He's known for judging someone solely based on first impressions, so make sure yours is a good one. I'm sure you'll do fine. The $map:02000019$ is in the center of $map:02000215$.

0713175511006351-Quest2017_2-.name: I haven't seen you around here before. No, I would have remembered a weaselly face like yours...

0713175511006352-Quest2017_2-.name: I'd like to borrow the Dimensional Dictionary.

0713175511006354-Quest2017_2-.name: Perhaps you are new to libraries. When you are seeking a book, you begin by asking, "Do you have this book?" To brazenly walk up to me and demand a book without making sure I actually have it... The nerve!

0713175511006355-Quest2017_2-.name: You don't understand! If I don't get that book—

0713175511006356-Quest2017_2-.name: Tut! You'll not take that tone of voice with me in this library! I find it suspicious that you even knew I had the book in stock. Have you been, ahem, casing the joint, you hoodlum? Well, I doubt you'll ever find the book. So there!

0713175511006357-Quest2017_2-.name: If I find it, will you let me borrow it?

0713175511006358-Quest2017_2-.name: A game, is it? Ha! If you find it... then we can talk.

0713175511006359-Quest2017_2-.name: Come to beg me for clues? You are on your own, scoundrel. You're lucky I'm giving you this much of a chance.

0713175511006360-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(You sense a magical aura around this bookcase. You should take a closer look.)</font>

0713175511006362-Quest2017_2-.name: (Look for the source of the voice.)

0713175511006363-Quest2017_2-.name: Over here, ya goon! In the bookcase right in front of ya!

0713175511006365-Quest2017_2-.name: Some moron read me and put me back on the wrong shelf! I'm a high class book, ya know? If the other books from my shelf see me with these pulp novels and penny dreadfuls, I'll be the laughin' stock of the whole dang library!

0713175511006366-Quest2017_2-.name: What do you want me to do about it?

0713175511006367-Quest2017_2-.name: Be a good reader and put me back in my own case, will ya? It's, er, kinda locked, so you'll need to get a key from one of them $npc:21000216$ goons.

0713175511006369-Quest2017_2-.name: You're heavy! I needed to rest my arms.

0713175511006371-Quest2017_2-.name: Likely story, pal! Ya tossed me on the floor and left, like all the other bozos who visit this library!

0713175511006372-Quest2017_2-.name: How'd you get back here, anyway?

0713175511006373-Quest2017_2-.name: Some dumb monster brought me back. Please, ya gotta take me with ya!

0713175511006374-Quest2017_2-.name: Stop wastin' time. I gotta get back to my own bookcase!

0713175511006375-Quest2017_2-.name: Some dumb monster brought me back. More important, how do ya expect me to fit in your bag when it's full of junk?

0713175511006376-Quest2017_2-.name: Hurry. The sooner I'm away from this bookcase, the better!

0713175511006377-Quest2017_2-.name: My friends, my friends! I'm back, ya mugs!

0713175511006379-Quest2017_2-.name: Get a load of this joker! Am I happy now? Ha! Of course!

0713175511006380-Quest2017_2-.name: Anyways, you did me a real solid back there, and I always do good by those what did good to me. So, what do ya need?

0713175511006381-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm looking for the Dimensional Dictionary.

0713175511006382-Quest2017_2-.name: That old thing? It got enchanted so what's nobody can read it no more. Not even old $npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ knows what it says. A real shame, being a book what nobody can read.

0713175511006383-Quest2017_2-.name: It got tucked away in the $map:02000219$, where nobody can so much as look at it. Ya really think the boss'll let ya borrow it? Hmm... Maybe if ya got rid of the enchantment...

0713175511006385-Quest2017_2-.name: That's what I said, innit? Just look around for a weird bookshelf. There's a secret door behind it. That'll take ya where ya need to go.

0713175511006386-Quest2017_2-.name: That's what I said, innit? Just look around for a weird bookshelf around here. There's a secret door behind it. That'll take ya where ya need to go.

0713175511006387-Quest2017_2-.name: There's a glint of pride in your eyes. I don't like it.

0713175511006390-Quest2017_2-.name: I know you can't read the book. Lend it to me, and I'll find a way to get rid of the enchantment. Does that work for you?

0713175511006391-Quest2017_2-.name: So presumptuous! The only one who can remove the enchantment is $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$, and that puffed-up snail already told me that she wouldn't.

0713175511006392-Quest2017_2-.name: So, all I have to do is get $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$ to disenchant the book?

0713175511006393-Quest2017_2-.name: She's lucky I don't give her shell a good cracking. She's the slowest creature in the $map:02000129$, and that's saying quite a lot!

0713175511006395-Quest2017_2-.name: You think you can get $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$'s help when she wasn't even impressed by my winning personality? Well, I won't stop you from making a fool of yourself. She's probably perched high up in the $map:02000129$.

0713175511006396-Quest2017_2-.name: You think you can get $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$'s help when she wasn't even impressed by my winning personality? Well, I won't stop you from making a fool of yourself. She's probably perched high up in the $map:02000129$.

0713175511006397-Quest2017_2-.name: I do so hope you have not come to argue. I have not got time for arguing.

0713175511006398-Quest2017_2-.name: I'd like your help with the Dimensional Dictionary.

0713175511006399-Quest2017_2-.name: Please. I do not have time for such things. I have more important things to worry about.

0713175511006400-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm something of a fixer. If I fix your problem, will you help me with mine?

0713175511006401-Quest2017_2-.name: Let us see how useful you are in that case. I have been robbed. My darling, precious, lovely ladle... has been stolen.

0713175511006402-Quest2017_2-.name: Do you know who stole it?

0713175511006403-Quest2017_2-.name: Some monster or another. You know how it is. They steal this and that and the other thing. They think it is all in good fun. But it is us honest and hardworking snails who suffer for their shenanigans.

0713175511006404-Quest2017_2-.name: A decade ago I would have given those whippersnappers a run for their money. But now I am an old lady and it takes me a day just to cross my front yard.

0713175511006405-Quest2017_2-.name: I will retrieve your ladle, fair snail.

0713175511006406-Quest2017_2-.name: Then follow the water down to the pond. Search in the grass near the stream. That is where they usually drop it.

0713175511006407-Quest2017_2-.name: I know it is a very very far way away. But surely you can go faster than that.

0713175511006408-Quest2017_2-.name: You have already found it. Thank you so very much.

0713175511006409-Quest2017_2-.name: You helped me in my time of greatest need. The least I can do is to hear you out.

0713175511006410-Quest2017_2-.name: (Give her the short version of the story.)

0713175511006411-Quest2017_2-.name: One greedy fool can ruin things for everyone at times like this. I feel sorry that you have been through so much trouble. I will help but you must follow my instructions to a tee.

0713175511006413-Quest2017_2-.name: Go to the $map:02000180$ and defeat $npc:22000007$. Once you have done that he should drop his $item:30000186$. With that in hand you will be able to read the Dimensional Dictionary.

0713175511006415-Quest2017_2-.name: The Dimension Dictionary will only reveal its secrets to one with the power and inclination to defeat the darkness. It does not concern itself with fancy rituals or inane subtlety. In other words it is too good for that greedy librarian.

0713175511006416-Quest2017_2-.name: Return to $npc:11000282[gender:0]$ when you have the $item:30000186$. Most importantly, you must make sure that you are the one to first open the book. Good luck.

0713175511006417-Quest2017_2-.name: Return to $npc:11000282[gender:0]$ when you have the $item:30000186$. Most importantly, you must make sure that you are the one to first open the book. Good luck.

0713175511006418-Quest2017_2-.name: Either you've succeeded and I finally get to read the book, or you've failed and I get to gloat. Either way, I win.

0713175511006420-Quest2017_2-.name: That pompous slug agreed to help you? I can't believe it...

0713175511006421-Quest2017_2-.name: So, how is it done? How can we finally read that accursed book?

0713175511006422-Quest2017_2-.name: I can show you. In the $map:02000219$.

0713175511006423-Quest2017_2-.name: How untrusting you are. Do you really think I wouldn't honor my end of the bargain, after all we've been through?

0713175511006424-Quest2017_2-.name: Yes. Yes, absolutely. That is exactly what I think.

0713175511006425-Quest2017_2-.name: Fine, fine! Let us go to the $map:02000219$. Then you will see that I am a piece of my word.

0713175511006426-Quest2017_2-.name: Fine, fine! Let us go to the $map:02000219$. Then you will see that I am a piece of my word.

0713175511006427-Quest2017_2-.name: Are you certain the enchantment has been removed? The pages are still blank. Is this some sort of trick?

0713175511006428-Quest2017_2-.name: (That's odd. You definitely see writing in the book...)

0713175511006429-Quest2017_2-.name:
Wait... This can't be...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ snatches up the book and examines it frantically)</font>

0713175511006430-Quest2017_2-.name: The enchantment... It only lets one person read it! Did you know this would happen? Is this why you were so insistent on opening the book yourself?

0713175511006432-Quest2017_2-.name: That shriveled old snail...! $MyPCName$, what's written inside? Tell me every word!

0713175511006433-Quest2017_2-.name: This isn't exactly light reading material!

0713175511006434-Quest2017_2-.name: If I ever get my hands on that snail...!

0713175511006435-Quest2017_2-.name: Does this mean that there's no way to read this book... ever...?

0713175511006436-Quest2017_2-.name: I could take it with me to $map:02000023$ and work on it there...

0713175511006437-Quest2017_2-.name: This was your plan from the start! I knew it. I can always tell a thief when I see one...

0713175511006438-Quest2017_2-.name: Do you have any better ideas?

0713175511006439-Quest2017_2-.name: Fine! I shall let you abscond to $map:02000023$ with my precious book!

0713175511006441-Quest2017_2-.name: But when you're done with it, you must return it in pristine condition! And with a transcribed copy! You have no idea how much I paid to add it to my collection...

0713175511006442-Quest2017_2-.name: When you're done with it, you must return it in pristine condition! And with a transcribed copy! You have no idea how much I paid to add it to my collection...

0713175511006443-Quest2017_2-.name: How did your meeting with $npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ go?

0713175511006444-Quest2017_2-.name: He gave me the book. No big deal.

0713175511006445-Quest2017_2-.name: My faith in you was well placed. Thank you!

0713175511006446-Quest2017_2-.name: But why are the pages blank? Oh! It's enchanted...

0713175511006448-Quest2017_2-.name: If that's true, then I will need you to read the book aloud to me while I interpret its meaning... Impossible! This is a reference book, not an adventure novel. What are we going to do?

0713175511006450-Quest2017_2-.name: That's a good point. For all we know, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ could be immune to this sort of magic. Could you go to the $map:02000179$ and see if he has better luck?

0713175511006452-Quest2017_2-.name: Very well. I leave this in your capable hands.

0713175511006453-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$, could you go to the $map:02000179$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has better luck with the Dimensional Dictionary?

0713175511006455-Quest2017_2-.name: Very well. I leave this in your capable hands.

0713175511006456-Quest2017_2-.name: So, what brings you to my remote abode?

0713175511006458-Quest2017_2-.name: Interesting. I don't sense any sort of enchantment on this book at all. It should be simple enough for me to read and interpret.

0723043411007309-Quest2017_2-.name: Leave this with me. I'll have a transcription for you soon.

0713175511006459-Quest2017_2-.name: Even here, I've been keeping a close watch on the shadows that threaten Maple World. I understand that you've read my notes on the spreading darkness.

0713175511006460-Quest2017_2-.name: It all began with the $itemPlural:20000045$. That led me to research the shadow seeds. And then I received a report that dark magic has been found on the divine creatures that call this world their home.

0713175511006461-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to know how far the darkness has spread, and you're the only person I trust to find out for me.

0713175511006463-Quest2017_2-.name: I had a feeling you'd say that. Please deliver this letter to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$. He'll help you come up with a plan of action.

0713175511006465-Quest2017_2-.name: Shall I send you to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ now?

0713175511006472-Quest2017_2-.name: Hmm... Nothing is ever simple, is it?

0713175511006473-Quest2017_2-.name: While there are many divine beasts who have walked Maple World since ancient times, there are two in particular about whom I've received troubling reports. Let's start by looking into $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$, guardian of the lava fields.

0713175511006474-Quest2017_2-.name: It's believed that he's somehow related to $npcName:23100039[gender:0]$ of $map:02000312$... though I'll admit that it's mere speculation based on their similar names.

0713175511006475-Quest2017_2-.name: For now, go to $map:02000079$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$'s condition. I can only hope that he is not corrupted...

0713175511006476-Quest2017_2-.name: Go to $map:02000079$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$'s condition. I can only hope that he is not corrupted...

0713175511006479-Quest2017_2-.name: It's as I feared. Thank you for your trouble...

0713175511006480-Quest2017_2-.name: The next beast to check on is $npcName:23100021$, the great griffin of the $map:02000009$. It's recently started attacking anyone who goes near its domain.

0713175511006481-Quest2017_2-.name: Travel to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100021$'s recent behavior. I look forward to your report.

0713175511006482-Quest2017_2-.name: Travel to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100021$'s recent behavior. I look forward to your report.

0713175511006485-Quest2017_2-.name: That... isn't quite what I expected to hear. Thank you for the information.

0713175511006486-Quest2017_2-.name: While you were away, I received a message from $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. It seems he needs to see you in the $map:02000179$.

0713175511006487-Quest2017_2-.name: I can send you there now, if you'd like.

0713175511006489-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to make myself presentable first.

0713175511006491-Quest2017_2-.name: Is that so? Well, tell me when you're ready...

0713175511006492-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ wishes to see you in the $map:02000179$. It sounded urgent.

0713175511006494-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to make myself presentable first.

0713175511006496-Quest2017_2-.name: Is that so? Well, tell me when you're ready...

0713175511006497-Quest2017_2-.name: The Dimensional Dictionary has taught me so much! I thought it would be useful as a mere reference, but there is so much information in here. Things that even I did not know...

0713175511006498-Quest2017_2-.name: I've learned that when an Innocent chooses his path, the other half of his power doesn't simply become dormant. It becomes its own being. $npc:11003441[gender:0]$, then, is the version of myself that I did not choose.

0713175511006499-Quest2017_2-.name: Furthermore, it's possible to change an Innocent's path. I thought that my decision had been final, but in a short time I've learned that I can be split in two... and be replaced by my darker self.

0713175511006500-Quest2017_2-.name: It's all a bit grim for my taste. Luckily, I've also got something interesting to tell you.

0713175511006501-Quest2017_2-.name: Among the many fascinating sections of the Dictionary is an appendix of magical minerals and how they interact with each other. With a little bit of experimentation, I've created a rather interesting object.

0713175511006502-Quest2017_2-.name: Interesting in a good way, I hope.

0713175511006503-Quest2017_2-.name: According to the known rules of magic, long-range scrying requires a specific target or location. But with some black onyx and a dose of emutal powder, I've managed to create a device that can show you a... hint, let's say. A clue to whatever mystery it is that you're pondering!

0713175511006504-Quest2017_2-.name: There's one mystery in particular that I'd like to use it to solve, but I need your help.

0713175511006506-Quest2017_2-.name: I want to learn who is behind the darkness spreading from the $map:02000146$. The mastermind who has attacked our cities. I'm convinced that these events are all linked.

0713175511006507-Quest2017_2-.name: You have stood against our shadowy enemy every step of the way. If you touch the crystal, I believe that it will point us in the right direction.

0713175511006508-Quest2017_2-.name: You have stood against our shadowy enemy every step of the way. If you touch the crystal, I believe that it will point us in the right direction.

0713175511006509-Quest2017_2-.name: It's $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... And he's looking for someone. Someone named $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. But how is $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ connected to all this?

0713175511006510-Quest2017_2-.name: That's what we need to find out. He's our best chance at tracking down the source of this evil.

0713175511006511-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$, you've worked with Dark Wind recently. Do you have any ideas about this?

0713175511006512-Quest2017_2-.name: That name, $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. I'm sure I've heard it somewhere...

0713175511006514-Quest2017_2-.name: Yes, that's right! $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ is the head of the Barrota Trading Company. But I heard that he'd gone missing...

0713175511006515-Quest2017_2-.name: His name came up when I was investigating $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$'s death. But it was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ who got me to focus on hunting down $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$, instead.

0713175511006516-Quest2017_2-.name: Some of the things I heard and saw didn't quite add up. $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is the leader of Dark Wind... But can we trust him? I'm not convinced.

0713175511006517-Quest2017_2-.name: Maybe it's not just $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ alone, but Dark Wind as a whole that's hiding something. Their old captain, $npc:11001816[gender:0]$, was one of the Seven Heroes.

0713175511006518-Quest2017_2-.name: Is there anyone who knows $map:02000100$ and Dark Wind well enough to give us an objective opinion? Someone who isn't part of the organization, but in a good position to observe their comings and goings.

0713175511006520-Quest2017_2-.name: That's a good idea. The mayor will certainly know more than we do. Please go to $map:02000157$ and see what you can find out.

0713175511006521-Quest2017_2-.name: That's a good idea. The mayor will certainly know more than we do. Please go to $map:02000157$ and see what you can find out.

0713175511006522-Quest2017_2-.name: Excuse me! May I help you?

0713175511006523-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm here to see the mayor.

0713175511006524-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm so sorry, but I don't seem to see your name on the schedule. Did you make an appointment?

0713175511006525-Quest2017_2-.name: I do so wish I could help you, but the mayor isn't seeing anyone without an appointment. You really should have made one.

0713175511006527-Quest2017_2-.name: I can pencil you in for... How does the week after next work for you?

0713175511006528-Quest2017_2-.name: In the meantime, I'd be happy to take a message for you.

0713175511006529-Quest2017_2-.name: I don't have time to wait two weeks!

0713175511006530-Quest2017_2-.name: Oh, I'm so so sorry, but the mayor is very strict about his schedule. I'd have to beg him heart and soul to get him to see you without an appointment. And, no offense, but why should I go through all that trouble for you?

0713175511006531-Quest2017_2-.name: What if I told you it's really, really important?

0713175511006532-Quest2017_2-.name: If it's so important, then maybe you should do me a favor. I'm really worried about my little sister. If you help me out, I could try to convince the mayor to see you.

0713175511006534-Quest2017_2-.name: Wonderful! $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ got a new job a few weeks ago, and nobody's heard from her since. My parents are worried sick. Mind giving her a visit at the $map:02000008$?

0713175511006535-Quest2017_2-.name: Wonderful! $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ got a new job a few weeks ago, and nobody's heard from her since. My parents are worried sick. Mind giving her a visit at the $map:02000008$?

0713175511006536-Quest2017_2-.name: This isn't the life I dreamed of. Not at all...

0713175511006538-Quest2017_2-.name: Uh, yeah? And who are you?

0713175511006539-Quest2017_2-.name: I can't believe my sister sent you to spy on me! That dweeb.

0713175511006540-Quest2017_2-.name: I thought I'd get to wear a prettier uniform than my sister and work in a nice cushy lab, but look at me. They're making me do fieldwork. And there are so many monsters!

0713175511006541-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm good at theoretical models and crunching numbers, but I'm not cut out for fighting! And now my boss expects me to gather samples myself. I'm doomed...

0713175511006542-Quest2017_2-.name: Hold on. You look pretty strong. Can you help me? Defeat the monsters around here and get some $itemPlural:30000872$. The sooner I have those, the sooner I can finish my report and head home!

0713175511006543-Quest2017_2-.name: Hold on. You look pretty strong. Can you help me? Defeat the monsters around here and get some $itemPlural:30000872$. The sooner I have those, the sooner I can finish my report and head home!

0713175511006544-Quest2017_2-.name: That was quick. Thanks so much!

0713175511006545-Quest2017_2-.name: Perfect! Give me a minute, and I'll write up my report.

0713175511006547-Quest2017_2-.name: Take my time? I'm already done! Mind taking this to my boss?

0713175511006549-Quest2017_2-.name: His name is $npcName:11000869[gender:0]$ and he's looking into something at $map:02000142$. They say he's hard to impress, but he'll have to be amazed if you tell him how great I am.

0713175511006550-Quest2017_2-.name: By the way, would you please tell him how great I am? If he keeps treating me like the most junior member of the team, I'll never get back to the safety of the lab!

0713175511006552-Quest2017_2-.name: You're an angel! Thank you. Remember, you're looking for $npcName:11000869[gender:0]$ in $map:02000142$!

0723043411007311-Quest2017_2-.name: Why do you want to work in the lab?

0723043411007312-Quest2017_2-.name: Please take this more seriously! Anyway, I made a copy, so here. Don't drop it this time!

0723043411007313-Quest2017_2-.name: Um, I'm pretty sure it's in your bag. You're an odd one, you know that?

0723043411007314-Quest2017_2-.name: If I give it to you now, you'll just drop it again. Make some room in your bag please.

0723043411007315-Quest2017_2-.name: Isn't it obvious? All this sun exposure is terrible for my skin!

0713175511006554-Quest2017_2-.name: Huh? You aren't one of my people...

0713175511006556-Quest2017_2-.name: Ah, yes, the new hire. They really are helpless in their first few years...

0713175511006557-Quest2017_2-.name: Many researchers think fieldwork is a waste of time—especially the young ones. I could send $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ back to the lab, but then she'd miss this opportunity to see this abnormal temporal phenomenon in person!

0713175511006558-Quest2017_2-.name: Have you ever heard of a temporal stop? Most laypersons think such things are science fiction, but it's happening right here. The closer you are to the clock tower, the slower time moves.

0720003111006853-Quest2017_2-.name: We arrived here three days ago, but I suspect that much more time has passed in the outside world.

0720003111006854-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$'s sister told me she'd been gone for weeks!

0720003111006855-Quest2017_2-.name: Whatever is causing this anomaly must be in the tower. We occasionally hear explosions from within, too. I sent some researchers to look into it, but none of them returned.

0720003111006856-Quest2017_2-.name: But is this temporal stop dangerous?

0720003111006857-Quest2017_2-.name: If the temporal stop spreads, then it would wreak havoc on the whole world. But how can I do anything with a handful of scientists?

0720003111006859-Quest2017_2-.name: Truly? What a courageous young $male:man,female:woman$ you are! Please go inside the $map:02000357$ and discover the source of this phenomenon. As much as I'd love to study it, I fear you will have to destroy it... for the good of the whole world.

0713175511006559-Quest2017_2-.name: Please go inside the $map:02000357$ and discover the source of this phenomenon. As much as I'd love to study it, I fear you will have to destroy it... for the good of the whole world.

0713175511006560-Quest2017_2-.name: Please tell me you took exhaustive notes!

0713175511006561-Quest2017_2-.name: Ah-ha! I suspected such a being might exist in there.

0720003111006861-Quest2017_2-.name: I'll have to run a full analysis on the area! ...is what I would say if I could afford the equipment. Which is sadly a pipe dream on our current budget.

0720003111006862-Quest2017_2-.name: $npc:11000065[gender:0]$ pledged his support for this project when he was running for reelection, but we haven't seen a single meso since. He won't return my calls, he won't accept my appointments...

0720003111006863-Quest2017_2-.name: You know his secretary is $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$'s sister, right?

0720003111006864-Quest2017_2-.name: Really? That unhelpful young lady is related to our $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?

0720003111006865-Quest2017_2-.name: Well, my work here is done. I need to head back.

0720003111006866-Quest2017_2-.name: When you get there, tell $npc:11000361[gender:1]$ about how much her sister is suffering thanks to our budget problem. She may be our best hope at getting the mayor back on our side.

0720003111006867-Quest2017_2-.name: When you get to $map:02000157$, tell $npc:11000361[gender:1]$ about how much her sister is suffering thanks to our budget problem. She may be our best hope at getting the mayor back on our side.

0720003111006868-Quest2017_2-.name: I honestly didn't think you were coming back. Did you see $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?

0720003111006869-Quest2017_2-.name: Yes. Her research is... something else.

0720003111006870-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm sure it is. I just hope she learns from all this.

0720003111006871-Quest2017_2-.name: Anyway, you owe me a favor.

0720003111006874-Quest2017_2-.name: Of course. You do have an appointment, after all. It's been two weeks since you were last here...

0720003111006875-Quest2017_2-.name: $npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is in the $map:02000154$. Please use the door to my right.

0720003111006876-Quest2017_2-.name: He is a very busy man, so don't waste his time. And do avoid asking any uncomfortable questions.

0720003111006877-Quest2017_2-.name: $npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is in the $map:02000154$. Please use the door on this side. He is a very busy man, so don't waste his time. And do avoid asking any uncomfortable questions.

0720003111006878-Quest2017_2-.name: Please, make yourself comfortable. How can I help you today?

0720003111006879-Quest2017_2-.name: I had some questions about Dark Wind.

0720003111006880-Quest2017_2-.name: You've worked with them in the past. Why don't you go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person?

0720003111006882-Quest2017_2-.name: I want to hear about it from a great man like you.

0720003111006883-Quest2017_2-.name: I... see. I'll answer what I can. What's your question?

0720003111006884-Quest2017_2-.name: What do you know about $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s death?

0720003111006885-Quest2017_2-.name: You're laying it on a little thick there. I don't have a lot of time to waste, so cut to the chase.

0720003111006886-Quest2017_2-.name: What do you know about $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s death?

0720003111006887-Quest2017_2-.name: Who put you up to this?

0720003111006888-Quest2017_2-.name: I don't know what you're trying to dig up, but I have nothing to tell you about Dark Wind. Even if I did, $map:02000100$ can't take any action against them.

0720003111006889-Quest2017_2-.name: My hands are full trying to deal with constant threats of riot—stirred up by $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and his foul group, according to reports. Dark Wind is vital to keeping them at bay.

0720003111006890-Quest2017_2-.name: But perhaps I should tell you one thing. Something for you to keep in mind. Not everything about a hero is great, and not everyone under a leader believes in the same values.

0720003111006892-Quest2017_2-.name: It's a shame that I couldn't be more help. If you want to know more about Dark Wind, go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person. That's all I have to say.

0723043411007316-Quest2017_2-.name: Thanks for your time, I guess.

0720003111006893-Quest2017_2-.name: Looks like I'm talking to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, after all.

0720003111006894-Quest2017_2-.name: It's a shame that I couldn't be more help. If you want to know more about Dark Wind, go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person. That's all I have to say.

0720003111006895-Quest2017_2-.name: It's been too long, friend. I hope you've been well.

0720003111006896-Quest2017_2-.name: We've been busy restoring $map:02000100$, but it's time we got back to the hunt for $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. Interested?

0720003111006897-Quest2017_2-.name: Actually, I wanted to ask about $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.

0720003111006898-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$... $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$... The old Barrota boss? He's on the run for insider trading and embezzling. I'm not interested in going after small fry like him.

0720003111006900-Quest2017_2-.name: No, we need to track down $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and make him pay for what he did to $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$. That's our only priority right now.

0720003111006902-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(If $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ really is hiding something, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ might know what it is. You should try to get to him before Dark Wind does.)</font>

0720003111006904-Quest2017_2-.name: I knew you'd come around. Thanks.

0720003111006906-Quest2017_2-.name: Oh, man... He's gonna lose it again...

0720003111006907-Quest2017_2-.name: The boss is usually calm, but when he loses his cool, man... I'm afraid to even go near him.

0720003111006908-Quest2017_2-.name: Any mention of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ just sets him off. He doesn't get mad about other things...

0720003111006909-Quest2017_2-.name: All the other agents are out looking for $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ 'cause they don't want to get yelled at. Of course we're all worried for her safety, but we're more worried about what he'll do if we don't find her...

0720003111006910-Quest2017_2-.name: Hey! Report! If anything happens to $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, I'm taking it out of your hide!

0720003111006911-Quest2017_2-.name: I-I don't really know the details. $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$ might have seen something. H-he was standing guard at $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$.

0720003111006915-Quest2017_2-.name: I apologize for losing my cool.

0720003111006916-Quest2017_2-.name: All of my resources are tied up in the search for $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, but it's not enough. Her life may be in danger. Can I count on your support?

0720003111006918-Quest2017_2-.name: Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$. As the guard posted in front of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house, he may have seen something.

0720003111006919-Quest2017_2-.name: Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$. As the guard posted in front of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house, he may have seen something.

0720003111006920-Quest2017_2-.name: Hey, I know you. What brings you here?

0720003111006922-Quest2017_2-.name: Look, it's like I told the others: I don't understand what happened. It was a day like any other. She went to $map:02000221$ to return some books she'd borrowed, and she never came out.

0720003111006923-Quest2017_2-.name: I got a bad feeling about the situation and ran inside, but $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ was already gone.

0720003111006925-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ was behind the counter... dozing off. He didn't see a thing. Funny coincidence, right?

0720003111006926-Quest2017_2-.name: I mean... We need some kind of lead to track $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ down. If we don't, it'll be us agents who suffer.

0720003111006927-Quest2017_2-.name: Every one of us is in the field, and we've found nothing. $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ doesn't know you. He won't give me the time of day, but there's a chance he'll open up if you're the one asking the questions.

0720003111006928-Quest2017_2-.name: Every one of us in the field, and we've found nothing. $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ doesn't know you. He won't give me the time of day, but there's a chance he'll open up if you're the one asking the questions.

0720003111006929-Quest2017_2-.name: Any particular book you're after? I'm sure I've got something to tickle your fancy.

0720003111006930-Quest2017_2-.name: I want to know about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s disappearance.

0720003111006931-Quest2017_2-.name: Sure, sure. I've got time to answer the same questions a million times. Not as if I have a shop to run... Anyway, like I told the others, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ traded in her old books and picked out a new one.

0720003111006932-Quest2017_2-.name: It was just like any other day. She went to look for her book behind that shelf over there. I dozed off while she made her pick, and when I awoke, she was gone.

0720003111006933-Quest2017_2-.name: That's all I know. Good heavens, I'm sick and tired of telling this story.

0720003111006934-Quest2017_2-.name: I've said all I've got to say. If you aren't here for books, please leave.

0720003111006935-Quest2017_2-.name: Did anyone else come here the day $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ disappeared?

0720003111006936-Quest2017_2-.name: Not anyone who matters! The only other customer I had all day was $npcName:11000532[gender:0]$, son of the family that runs the bed-and-breakfast on $map:02000111$. But he was gone long before $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ came in.

0720003111006937-Quest2017_2-.name: Do you know what books $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ came for?

0720003111006938-Quest2017_2-.name: Let's see... $item:39000012$ and $item:39000013$, if I recall correctly. Why do you care?

0720003111006939-Quest2017_2-.name: Where can I find those books?

0720003111006940-Quest2017_2-.name: Check the shelves in back, over by the owl clock. If you ask me, you're just wasting your time...

0720003111006941-Quest2017_2-.name: Check the shelves in back, over by the owl clock. If you ask me, you're just wasting your time...

0720003111006942-Quest2017_2-.name: Welcome, welcome! Here to rent a room?

0720003111006944-Quest2017_2-.name: Uh...? These are the books I borrowed from $map:02000221$... Why did you bring them back here?

0720003111006945-Quest2017_2-.name: Do you know a woman named $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$?

0720003111006947-Quest2017_2-.name: You both checked out the exact same books.

0720003111006948-Quest2017_2-.name: Uh, l-look, I don't know what this is all about. The money was good, and all I had to do was borrow and return the books. I didn't even read them...

0720003111006949-Quest2017_2-.name: Wh-why are you snooping around about this? Did I do something illegal? Is this some kinda spy thing?

0720003111006951-Quest2017_2-.name: And what do those books have to do with... Wait, I remember! There was also the thing with the bag.

0720003111006953-Quest2017_2-.name: As part of the job, I also had to leave a bag under the table at $map:02000221$. It was locked, so I don't have a clue what was in it. I guess it was gone by the time you got there...

0720003111006955-Quest2017_2-.name: Uh, the thing is... I never actually met them. They gave me instructions through notes, with the books and money left in a box hidden by the street leading from $map:02000039$ to the $map:02000045$.

0720003111006956-Quest2017_2-.name: I always figured it was some nut living in the $map:02000045$, but... Honestly, I was just in it for a little extra spending cash. That's all I know.

0720003111006957-Quest2017_2-.name: I always figured it was some nut living in the $map:02000045$, but... Honestly, I was just in it for a little extra spending cash. That's all I know.

0720003111006958-Quest2017_2-.name: Can I help you with something?

0720003111006959-Quest2017_2-.name: Have you seen anyone come through here with books?

0720003111006960-Quest2017_2-.name: Nope, can't say I have. And nothing gets past here without my noticing.

0720003111006962-Quest2017_2-.name: Now, why would a delicate lady like that come to a place like this? Never seen her around here. Unless she's coming through in the dead of night...

0720003111006964-Quest2017_2-.name: I reckon you're up to some important work, then. I haven't seen anyone like you described, but there's one place where they might slip by unnoticed...

0720003111006965-Quest2017_2-.name: A little ways from here you'll see the moving bridge—some of our finest work, if I do say so myself. We haven't gotten to the ravine the bridge crosses, though.

0720003111006966-Quest2017_2-.name: If someone was itching to hide, the ravine would be the place to go. Why not look there?

0720003111006967-Quest2017_2-.name: If you're so sure that someone's been skulking about, why not look in the ravine under the bridge?

0720003111006968-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(This mud wall looks man-made. There's something written under the muck...)</font>

0720003111006969-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(You wipe away the mud and read the letters.)</font>

0720003111006971-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems like a record of $map:02000051$.)</font>

0720003111006973-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems like a record related to $map:02000051$. Go to $map:02000031$ and seek out $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$'s advice.)</font>

0720003111006974-Quest2017_2-.name: So, what brings you to me today?

0720003111006975-Quest2017_2-.name: Have you ever heard the name "Yamarcha?"

0720003111006977-Quest2017_2-.name: The Yamarcha were said to have sold their souls to the darkness. They gained great power, but they lost their free will in the bargain. Why do you ask?

0720003111006978-Quest2017_2-.name: (Tell her about the words on the wall.)

0720003111006980-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to think about this for a moment. In the meantime, why don't you look around and fetch any books on $map:02000051$ that you find?

0720003111006981-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to think about this for a moment. In the meantime, why don't you look around and fetch any books on $map:02000051$ that you find?

0720003111006982-Quest2017_2-.name: Well, I'm not sure how your search went, but I think I know what place the writing referred to.

0720003111006983-Quest2017_2-.name: It's the site of the War of the Wolves. I'm sure of it. You'll find the $map:02000229$ there.

0720003111006984-Quest2017_2-.name: The wolves of Vayar Mountain protect whoever worships their pack's god. The Yamarcha found their guardians in the red wolves. When they went mad with dark power and attacked $map:02000051$, the Murpagoth and their white wolves fought back.

0720003111006985-Quest2017_2-.name: Even after the Yamarcha fell, the War of the Wolves raged on. They're still fighting at $map:02000170$ to this day. Based on my research, I believe that the king of the red wolves, $npcName:21900090$, is trapped by dark magic in the $map:02000229$.

0720003111006986-Quest2017_2-.name: But why would $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ be interested in this place? To tell you the truth, I was going to search for the $map:02000229$ myself before all this terrible business with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.

0720003111006988-Quest2017_2-.name: The temple was built by the Yamarcha for their dark rituals. Even though they are no longer in this world, their power still remains within the temple.

0720003111006989-Quest2017_2-.name: I don't know what $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is after, but if you're going after them, this is our chance to right some wrongs. I'd like you to take this $item:30000076$ with you.

0720003111006991-Quest2017_2-.name: This is the key that can free a soul from unholy chains. Since you're going into the temple anyway, please rescue $npcName:21900090$ from the darkness that keeps him trapped.

0720003111006992-Quest2017_2-.name: Why do I have to do that?

0720003111006993-Quest2017_2-.name: There are others who have sought the resting place of the Yamarcha, and they have all met terrible fates at the claws of $npcName:21900090$, who is a puppet for the darkness in his current state. We can't let anyone else fall to him.

0720003111006994-Quest2017_2-.name: I believe that $npcName:21900090$ doesn't want to hurt anyone. If we can release his soul, then no more blood needs to be shed.

0720003111006995-Quest2017_2-.name: The entrance to the $map:02000229$ should be at $map:02000170$. Good luck on your search. I hope you put the $item:30000076$ to good use...

0720003111006998-Quest2017_2-.name: I forgot what I'm supposed to do.

0720003111006999-Quest2017_2-.name: Really? All right. Well, here's a replacement...

0720003111007000-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm sure I saw you put it in your bag. Could you look again?

0720003111007001-Quest2017_2-.name: Um... Your bag looks terribly heavy. Maybe you should empty it out first.

0720003111007002-Quest2017_2-.name: Inside the $map:02000229$, burn away the undead body of $npcName:21900090$ with the $item:30000076$, then release his soul from its torment.

0720003111007003-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(In the light of the ember, you notice something behind the altar that wasn't visible before.)</font>

0720003111007004-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(A bag has been left on the floor behind the altar. Did $npcName:11000522[gender:0]$ leave this behind? Look inside.)</font>

0720003111007005-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">($item:39000034$ is inside. There's a map with a location marked inside...)</font>

0720003111007006-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(It's near the $map:02000133$. You should continue your search there.)</font>

0720003111007007-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(The $map:02000133$ is marked in $item:39000034$. Continue your search there.)</font>

0720003111007008-Quest2017_2-.name: And you must be $MyPCName$. You just missed $npc:11000064[gender:0]$.

0720003111007010-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ warned me you might come here.

0720003111007012-Quest2017_2-.name: Humblis has kept a close eye on Dark Wind in recent days. In the process, our agents have had a few run-ins with you.

0720003111007013-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm pretty sure I never met your agents.

0720003111007014-Quest2017_2-.name: If you knew they were our agents, they wouldn't be doing their job. But we've been keeping tabs on your activities... including your recent meeting with $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.

0720003111007015-Quest2017_2-.name: After that, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ said you'd probably turn up on our doorstep sooner or later.

0720003111007016-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ has been in contact with $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ this entire time. He finally convinced her to meet with us in person. They were supposed to meet here, but...

0720003111007017-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ was gone by the time we got here. It looked like there had been a struggle. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ chased after her himself, leaving me to take care of things here...

0720003111007019-Quest2017_2-.name: He didn't exactly say. The attacker dropped something, but he was tight-lipped about what it was.

0720003111007021-Quest2017_2-.name: I didn't get a good look, but it looked like some sort of green jewel. It had a crest on it.

0720003111007023-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(Such an item had to belong to a noble family. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ must have recognized the crest...)</font>

0720003111007024-Quest2017_2-.name: Did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ say anything before he left?

0720003111007025-Quest2017_2-.name: He wanted me to give this letter to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$. Beyond that... nothing.

0720003111007026-Quest2017_2-.name: I can deliver the letter if you want.

0720003111007027-Quest2017_2-.name: Sure. I think it's time the others met you for real. $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ should be at the $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$.

0720003111007031-Quest2017_2-.name: A letter from the boss can't just be replaced! Anyway, here's your replacement.

0720003111007032-Quest2017_2-.name: You sure it isn't still in your bag?

0720003111007033-Quest2017_2-.name: You need to clear up some inventory space first.

0720003111007037-Quest2017_2-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ takes the letter and quickly reads it.)</font>
He went into the Land of Darkness to retrieve $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. The fool... He'll help nobody by rushing off to his death.

0720003111007038-Quest2017_2-.name: Did he say where in the Land of Darkness he was headed?

0720003111007039-Quest2017_2-.name: Katramus... the Cruel Tower. It isn't a place anyone can hope to survive if they don't have a plan going in.

0720003111007040-Quest2017_2-.name: He's already gone, so there's no time left to plan. I wonder how the kidnapper knew where $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would be?

0720003111007041-Quest2017_2-.name: Do you know who it is?

0720003111007042-Quest2017_2-.name: Come now. You've proven helpful so far, but I can't trust you with that information yet. Even if you doubt $npc:11000044[gender:0]$'s intentions, that doesn't mean we're allies.

0720003111007043-Quest2017_2-.name: Speaking of which... Shouldn't  you be reporting to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ right about now?

0720003111007045-Quest2017_2-.name: I want you to think about what you're going to tell him. It's clear that you're suspicious of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but we have no idea what he thinks of you.

0720003111007046-Quest2017_2-.name: Personally... I'd keep your distance from him if I were you. At least until you've had a chance to talk to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.

0720003111007047-Quest2017_2-.name: So, what will you do? Do you want to help $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?

0720003111007050-Quest2017_2-.name: Then meet me in Katramus. The entrance is in a place called $map:03000057$ in the Land of Darkness.

0720003111007051-Quest2017_2-.name: Then I have nothing else to say.

0720003111007052-Quest2017_2-.name: Where have you been? Did you find $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$?

0720003111007053-Quest2017_2-.name: (Tell him about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, but leave $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ out of it.)

0720003111007056-Quest2017_2-.name: What have you been doing, then! $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$... Where are you...?

0720003111007057-Quest2017_2-.name: <font size='20'>I sense a trap closing around me... and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is the bait.</font>

0720003111007058-Quest2017_2-.name: <font size='20'>But no matter the risk, I can't allow $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to meet...</font>

0720003111007059-Quest2017_2-.name: <font size='20'>I have no choice. I need to ask for help from... him.</font>

0720003111007060-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, kidnapped... How do you know all this?

0720003111007064-Quest2017_2-.name: You disappoint me. How am I supposed to trust in your report if you can't give me evidence?

0720003111007065-Quest2017_2-.name: If she really is in the Land of Darkness... Then it's a trap, and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is the bait.

0720003111007066-Quest2017_2-.name: We can't allow $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to meet... That is, we can't let him hurt her.

0720003111007067-Quest2017_2-.name: Will I have to ask for help from... him...?

0720003111007068-Quest2017_2-.name: So, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is still alive! $MyPCName$, you've done well in telling me all this. I'll take it from here.

0720003111007069-Quest2017_2-.name: If she really is in the Land of Darkness... Then it's a trap, and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is the bait.

0720003111007070-Quest2017_2-.name: We can't allow $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to meet... That is, we can't let him hurt her.

0720003111007071-Quest2017_2-.name: Will I have to ask for help from... him...?

0720003111007072-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to take care of some things here. In the meantime, I want you to hit the streets and see what else you can find.

0720003111007073-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(His eyes are darting across the room. He's usually more calm and collected than this...)</font>

0720003111007074-Quest2017_2-.name: Bring back any intel you find. Anything that can lead us to $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. Got it?

0720003111007076-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(Just as $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ said, it's hard to tell what he thinks of you. For now, it's best not to provoke him.)</font>

0720003111007077-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(You need more information on Katramus. Return to the $map:02000031$ to talk to $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$.)</font>

0720003111007078-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(You need more information on Katramus. Return to the $map:02000031$ to talk to $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$.)</font>

0720003111007082-Quest2017_2-.name: First, there's something I'd like to show you. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ sent a letter. I put it right... Oh, dear.

0720003111007083-Quest2017_2-.name: Where did I put it? I was sure I had it just here. How strange!

0720003111007085-Quest2017_2-.name: Yes, good idea. Could you search that pile of books over there?

0720003111007086-Quest2017_2-.name: I set it aside specifically so I wouldn't lose it. How  maddening!

0720003111007087-Quest2017_2-.name: That's the letter. Thank you. The funny thing is, the paper is blank when I look at it. I suspect that the ink has been enchanted so that only you can read it.

0720003111007088-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$—I hope this letter finds you well. I've spent my days in study, punctuated only by the occasional attack on my sanctuary. The more time I spend here, the more I feel my memories begin to return.

0720003111007089-Quest2017_2-.name: I remember who brought me back to Ellinel. A woman in a red cape. She is a commander in the forces of darkness, and the mistress of the Cruel Tower in the Land of Darkness, where innocents of Maple World are stolen and forced into slavery...

0720003111007090-Quest2017_2-.name: I hate to jump to conclusions, but that description makes me think of someone. What do you think...?

0720003111007091-Quest2017_2-.name:
$npcName:11000057[gender:1]$... $npc:11000074[gender:0]$'s daughter.
<font color="#909090">(She's just the sort of person who would have a jewel like the one $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ found. But why would she be so careless as to leave it behind?)</font>

0720003111007092-Quest2017_2-.name: <font color="#909090">(She may have left it as a message for $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. If that's the case, then he's walking into a trap...)</font>

0720003111007093-Quest2017_2-.name: Who else knows that $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ is working with the forces of darkness? Does the empress even know?

0720003111007094-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ tried to keep it a secret, but news travels quickly among nobles. The empress, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$, even $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$... They all know. And $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ is using that knowledge as a weapon.

0720003111007095-Quest2017_2-.name: She certainly isn't being subtle. After the incident in $map:02000023$ with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, she used $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ to grab the attention of both $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and his pursuers.

0720003111007096-Quest2017_2-.name: She's not afraid to make a lot of noise to accomplish her goals. That makes her dangerous.

0720003111007097-Quest2017_2-.name: Both $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ are in great peril.

0720003111007098-Quest2017_2-.name: You can't risk facing her alone. Why don't you go to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and ask for help from his people?

0720003111007099-Quest2017_2-.name: You can't risk facing her alone. Why don't you go to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and ask for help from his people?

0720003111007100-Quest2017_2-.name: You're $MyPCName$, right? Here to see the boss?

0720003111007103-Quest2017_2-.name: Beats me! We were getting ready for a mission when he stepped out. $npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ is in charge of our supply lines—he might know something.

0720003111007104-Quest2017_2-.name: We were getting ready for a mission when he stepped out. $npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ is in charge of our supply lines—he might know something.

0720003111007106-Quest2017_2-.name: The boss went to Katramus. We didn't know the exact location, so we had to get a search party together.

0720003111007107-Quest2017_2-.name: It took time to pull everyone together, but I think we've got a shot here. Anyway, you want me to take a message to the boss?

0720003111007108-Quest2017_2-.name: I need to meet him in person.

0720003111007109-Quest2017_2-.name: Then you should go to Katramus. They should have found the entrance by now, so you better hurry.

0720003111007110-Quest2017_2-.name: You should go to Katramus. They should have found the entrance by now, so you better hurry.

0720003111007111-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm not convinced you're on my side, but I doubt that matters to the people you freed.

0720003111007112-Quest2017_2-.name: Meet me at the hideout and we'll plan our next move. We can sort out our allegiances later.

0720003111007113-Quest2017_2-.name: You've come this far, so help me liberate $dungeonTitle:21017001$.

0720003111007114-Quest2017_2-.name: You've come this far, so help me liberate $dungeonTitle:21017001$.

0720003111007115-Quest2017_2-.name: I think it's safe to say you're no enemy of mine.

0720003111007116-Quest2017_2-.name: Anyway... You helped save my friends. I owe you.

0720003111007117-Quest2017_2-.name: I can start repaying my debt with answers. I'm sure you've got a lot of questions.

0720003111007119-Quest2017_2-.name: This wasn't Humblis's first time in the Land of Darkness, so it wasn't difficult to find my way to Katramus.

0720003111007120-Quest2017_2-.name: The freedom fighters just happened to be preparing an attack when we got there. Lucky for us, since we needed the reinforcements.

0720003111007121-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm just glad we caught up to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ before he reached the top of the tower. If we hadn't, he and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would be goners.

0720003111007123-Quest2017_2-.name: He and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ are laying low while they recover from the battle. In the meantime, I've got a mission for you.

0720003111007125-Quest2017_2-.name: A little while ago, we got a tip from an anonymous source. This person claims that he has evidence about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s operations, but in exchange he wants protection from Dark Wind.

0720003111007126-Quest2017_2-.name: Some of my agents could use your help. It's time we finally nail Dark Wind to the wall.

0720003111007127-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ will brief you on the details.

0720003111007128-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ will brief you on the details.

0720003111007129-Quest2017_2-.name: We meet again. Nice to see you.

0720003111007130-Quest2017_2-.name: We got a lead on someone who can expose Dark Wind's wrongdoing near $map:02000279$. $npcName:11000565[gender:0]$  is already there, looking for our informant.

0720003111007131-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000565[gender:0]$'s the best tracker we've got. Meet up with him at $map:02000279$. I'm sure you'll find our man in no time.

0720003111007132-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000565[gender:0]$'s the best tracker we've got. Meet up with him at $map:02000279$. I'm sure you'll find our man in no time.

0720003111007134-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm just doing a favor for $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$.

0720003111007135-Quest2017_2-.name: I won't say no to the help. This place is bigger than I expected...

0720003111007136-Quest2017_2-.name: Me and the others are canvasing the area, but it's hard to get anything done with all the psycho robots here. I'm pretty sure they've been locking all the doors, too...

0720003111007137-Quest2017_2-.name: It's easy enough to dismantle them... most of the time. The $npcName:22000042$, on the other hand, is too much for my guys to handle. That mechanical monstrosity has the whole place on lockdown.

0720003111007138-Quest2017_2-.name: If anyone's got a shot of taking the $npcName:22000042$ down, it's you. You send that thing to the scrapyard, and we'll get the doors open.

0720003111007139-Quest2017_2-.name: If anyone's got a shot of taking the $npcName:22000042$ down, it's you. You send that thing to the scrapyard, and we'll get the doors open.

0720003111007140-Quest2017_2-.name: Great. While you took care of our big metal friend, I managed to get the power back on. The doors are open to us.

0720003111007141-Quest2017_2-.name: Now, back to the search. Mind checking out the closed off area behind me?

0720003111007142-Quest2017_2-.name: Now, back to the search. Mind checking out the closed off area behind me?

0720003111007145-Quest2017_2-.name: D-did $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$ send you? Thank goodness. I'm... I'm going to live!

0720003111007146-Quest2017_2-.name: I was sure $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ would track me down and make me "disappear." Those thugs were his men, I'm sure of it.

0720003111007148-Quest2017_2-.name: It's because I know the truth, and I can prove it. My name is $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$, and I am the president of the Barrota Trading Company.

0720003111007149-Quest2017_2-.name: After $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s death, I tried to smuggle myself away from $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but a pickpocket stole all of my money. I've been living on the streets ever since.

0720003111007150-Quest2017_2-.name: That pickpocket showed up dead days later. I hoped maybe they'd think it was me... but no, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ wouldn't be fooled so easily...

0720003111007151-Quest2017_2-.name: He kept chasing me in secret... and I just about ran out of places to hide. That's why I'm turning myself in to you. I'd rather spend the rest of my life in jail than die on the streets.

0720003111007153-Quest2017_2-.name: He's a traitor to the throne! He follows Turka, commander of the devils who attacked the city! And he murdered $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ in cold blood.

0720003111007154-Quest2017_2-.name: I'll tell you everything I know. Just don't let him get me!

0720003111007155-Quest2017_2-.name: I'll get the others. Humblis will keep you safe.

0720003111007156-Quest2017_2-.name: Thank you, thank you, thank you! I hid my account book behind the clock in my old office. It has more than enough evidence to put $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ behind bars for life.

0720003111007157-Quest2017_2-.name: I doubt anyone's found it. Get to it before someone does. Then you'll see what I mean about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

0720003111007158-Quest2017_2-.name: I've hidden my account book behind the clock in the $map:02000226$. It has more than enough evidence to put $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ behind bars for life.

0720003111007161-Quest2017_2-.name: That fat cat is a hobo now? I've gotta see this for myself!

0720003111007162-Quest2017_2-.name: Leave $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ to me. You should head to $map:02000139$ and get that evidence. If it's actually there, take it straight to $npc:11000529[gender:0]$ so we can put this behind us!

0720003111007163-Quest2017_2-.name: Leave $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ to me. You should head to $map:02000139$ and get that evidence. If it's actually there, take it straight to $npc:11000529[gender:0]$ so we can put this behind us!

0720003111007164-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000565[gender:0]$ has already filled me in. You have the evidence?

0720003111007167-Quest2017_2-.name: With $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$'s testimony and these logs... $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is finished. We can finally prove $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s innocence!

0720003111007168-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$! Go straight to $map:02000152$ and don't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ get away. I won't let him slither out of this one!

0720003111007169-Quest2017_2-.name: $MyPCName$! Go straight to $map:02000152$ and don't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ get away. I won't let him slither out of this one!

0720003111007170-Quest2017_2-.name: Whoa, there. What's the big hurry? Something happen?

0720003111007172-Quest2017_2-.name: He mumbled something about urgent business and... just left.

0720003111007173-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ looked like he was gonna puke. Never seen him like that before... What's got everyone in such a tizzy?

0720003111007176-Quest2017_2-.name: Dang... What's going to happen to us now?

0720003111007177-Quest2017_2-.name: You have the look of a $male:man,female:woman$ with bad news. What happened with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$?

0720003111007180-Quest2017_2-.name: Go to $map:02000001$ and show $item:30000075$ to the captain of the guard. I want every soldier in the empire to be on the lookout for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

0720003111007183-Quest2017_2-.name: I forgot what I'm supposed to do.

0720003111007184-Quest2017_2-.name: This is very important! Don't lose it this time.

0720003111007185-Quest2017_2-.name: Surely you weren't so careless as to lose it. Look in your bag again.

0720003111007186-Quest2017_2-.name: Why don't you clear out some space in your bag?

0720003111007187-Quest2017_2-.name: Go to $map:02000001$ and show $item:30000075$ to the captain of the guard. I want every soldier in the empire to be on the look out for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

0720003111007188-Quest2017_2-.name: You've been busy. I hear we have you to thank for $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$'s arrest.

0720003111007191-Quest2017_2-.name: I'll put a bounty out for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ right away. I have a lot of questions for $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ once we've got him in a nice, secure cell...

0720003111007192-Quest2017_2-.name: The news of your latest exploits has attracted the interest of Her Imperial Majesty. See her right away.

0720003111007193-Quest2017_2-.name: The news of your latest exploits has attracted the interest of Her Imperial Majesty. See her right away.

0720003111007194-Quest2017_2-.name: I hear that the head of Barrota Trading Company has been taken into custody. Is that true?

0720003111007196-Quest2017_2-.name: In the end, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ was behind so much suffering and chaos. Where is $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?

0720003111007197-Quest2017_2-.name: He's found somewhere safe to lick his wounds.

0720003111007198-Quest2017_2-.name: We'd mistaken our allies for enemies, and our enemies for allies. We must see to it that amends are made.

0720003111007199-Quest2017_2-.name: So, the rumors were true. $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ really is alive...
