0720003111007200-Quest2017_2-.name: I hear he had something to do with $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s death, too. Just thinking about it gives me the shivers. How am I supposed to deliver a letter to a guy like that...?

0720003111007202-Quest2017_2-.name: It's a letter from $npcName:11000097[gender:0]$ in $map:02000139$. It seems like he had something to say to his old boss. If you're so curious, why don't you deliver the letter yourself?

0720003111007203-Quest2017_2-.name: You have something to say to me?

0720003111007205-Quest2017_2-.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0720003111007207-Quest2017_2-.name: Didn't you put it in your bag? Maybe you should double-check.

0720003111007208-Quest2017_2-.name: How can you walk around with a bag that full? You should drop some things first.

0720003111007209-Quest2017_2-.name: It's not that far. Just follow the path along the west side of the castle until you hit the $map:02000310$.

0720003111007210-Quest2017_2-.name: I didn't expect to see you again. You want to question me, too?

0720003111007212-Quest2017_2-.name: A letter from $npcName:11000097[gender:0]$... I'm afraid to open it. I failed all of my employees.

0720003111007213-Quest2017_2-.name: Anyway... I'm resigned to my fate. But do you think you could do me one last favor?

0720003111007215-Quest2017_2-.name: Before he died, $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ gave me something. A keepsake of sorts. He wanted me to make sure his mother received it in case something... happened... to him.

0720003111007217-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s mother is blind. He used to send her tapes instead of letters so that she could hear her boy's voice anytime she wanted. This is his last recording. Of course, he didn't know that at the time...

0720003111007218-Quest2017_2-.name: I want you to give $item:30000342$ to $npcName:11000178[gender:1]$ in $map:02000076$.

0720003111007221-Quest2017_2-.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0720003111007222-Quest2017_2-.name: Ah... Please be more careful next time. This is $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ dying request, you know.

0720003111007223-Quest2017_2-.name: I put it in your bag. Look again.

0720003111007224-Quest2017_2-.name: You need to clean your bag! Even when I was out on the streets, my bag wasn't this jumbled...

0720003111007225-Quest2017_2-.name: How did you manage to find me if you can't find your way out of here?

0720003111007228-Quest2017_2-.name: Oh, how sweet. My son is always sending me letters. What a nice boy.

0720003111007229-Quest2017_2-.name: A stranger came by my house some time ago and told me that my boy was dead, but I'm no fool. I gave the man a swift boxing around the ears and sent him on his way. I wonder if it was the postman playing a prank, as I stopped receiving letters after that...

0720003111007230-Quest2017_2-.name: I was starting to get a little nervous, truth be told! It's so lovely to get a letter again after so much time.

0720003111007231-Quest2017_2-.name: Would you be a dear and play the tape for me? It can be quite difficult to get around, and I'm eager to hear my son's voice.

0720003111007235-Quest2017_2-.name: Oh, silly me! Did I forget to hand it to back to you? Well, here you are.

0720003111007236-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm quite certain I've already handed it to you...

0720003111007237-Quest2017_2-.name: Let me just... Oh, my. Your bag is much too full!

0720003111007238-Quest2017_2-.name: It should be just by the bed.

0720003111007239-Quest2017_2-.name: It is so lovely to hear my $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s voice again. But he's talking about the empress's big event... Wasn't that a while ago? When did he record this?

0720003111007240-Quest2017_2-.name: It just took a long time to get here.

0720003111007241-Quest2017_2-.name: That poor boy works too hard. You make sure he's eating well, will you?

0720010111007242-Quest2017_2-.name: I heard there's a newcomer at headquarters. You should go meet him!

0720010111007243-Quest2017_2-.name: I heard there's a newcomer at headquarters. You should go meet him!

0720010111007247-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ has signed on with our defense force. After he met with the empress, she asked him to track down $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

0720010111007248-Quest2017_2-.name: It's funny to think that he was one of the empire's most wanted not too long ago. Anyway... $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is eager to see you. He's in the $map:02000228$.

0720010111007249-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is eager to see you. He's in the $map:02000228$.

0828182711007318-Quest2017_2-.name: So, we finally meet face-to-face. And neither one of us are trying to arrest the other, even!

0828182711007320-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$ says you were a big help. It takes a lot to squeeze a compliment out of him.

0828182711007321-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm curious about everything you've been through.

0828182711007322-Quest2017_2-.name: Where do I even start? At first, all I cared about was getting revenge. But I didn't know who killed the captain or why...

0828182711007323-Quest2017_2-.name: Our enemies have been taking out the Seven Heroes one-by-one.

0828182711007324-Quest2017_2-.name: What has $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ gotten himself into? I couldn't believe he'd resort to murder just for a promotion, but it seems he's playing a bigger game...

0828182711007325-Quest2017_2-.name: If we want answers, we need to find $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. Everyone's out looking for him, but you don't get to the top of Dark Wind without learning a trick or two.

0828182711007326-Quest2017_2-.name: The $map:02000146$ isn't the only way to and from the Land of Darkness. There are plenty of tunnels dotting the landscape that also bridge our worlds.

0828182711007327-Quest2017_2-.name: We have to close the net before $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ escapes through one of them. I need your help.

0828182711007329-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm glad I can count on you. We've already got most of the tunnels covered.

0828182711007330-Quest2017_2-.name: I want you to search the $map:02000308$. I have a feeling that there's a minor gate to the Land of Shadow there. You start at the entrance near the $map:02000145$. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ will start from the other side.

0828182711007331-Quest2017_2-.name: Start at the entrance near the $map:02000145$. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ will start from the other side.

0828182711007334-Quest2017_2-.name: He spotted someone and chased after them. I tried to keep up, but I'm still recovering from Katramus...

0828182711007335-Quest2017_2-.name: He's in no condition to face $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ by himself. I couldn't stand to lose $npc:11000064[gender:0]$... not again...

0828182711007336-Quest2017_2-.name: Then we'd better hurry up and find them.

0828182711007337-Quest2017_2-.name: Thank you! I'll search around here. You continue on to the $map:52000003$.

0828182711007338-Quest2017_2-.name: I'll search around here. You continue on to the $map:52000003$.

0828182711007339-Quest2017_2-.name: Curses! I was determined to avenge the captain, but... $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ used to be a friend. Even after his betrayal, I hesitated...

0828182711007341-Quest2017_2-.name: I hope you're right. Until then, I won't be able to rest. As he fell into the darkness, I could feel the hatred in his eyes...

0720010111007274-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ will return. And he will doubtless be stronger than he is now...

0720010111007275-Quest2017_2-.name: I'd hoped to close this chapter of my life. No matter what, I won't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ escape again. For now, we need to let the others know what happened here.

0720010111007276-Quest2017_2-.name: I'd hoped to close this chapter of my life. No matter what, I won't lose to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ again.

0720010111007277-Quest2017_2-.name: So, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ has slipped from our grasp...

0720010111007278-Quest2017_2-.name: I agree with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s assessment—we haven't seen the last of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. One doesn't simply turn away from such darkness. The empress needs to learn what's happened here.

0720010111007279-Quest2017_2-.name: I agree with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s assessment—we haven't seen the last of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. One doesn't simply turn away from such darkness. The empress needs to learn what's happened here.

0828182711007342-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm still in shock that $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ was working with our enemies this whole time. The blood of a hero is on his hands... At least I believe I'm beginning to understand their plan.

0828182711007343-Quest2017_2-.name: Maple World is facing the greatest crisis of this time, and we need new heroes to rise up and stand against it. Heroes like you, $MyPCName$.

0828182711007344-Quest2017_2-.name: I hope you find $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ before he can do even more damage to my people.

0605134511008659-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In my capacity as the chief investor of the Frontier Foundation, it is my privilege to bestow you with your first assignment. $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$, please brief $MyPCName$.

0605134511008661-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now listen carefully, as I won't repeat myself.

0605134511008662-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As you have already heard, a sequence of extraordinary occurrences has coincided with the discovery of the lapenshards.

0605140611008790-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frontier Foundation believes there to be a connection between the two, and has begun a worldwide investigation.

0605140611008791-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: However, the foundation is still rather new, and finding suitable candidates for such a task is not easy. At this point, we can't afford to refuse any help.

0605134511008663-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To that end, we would like you to carry out this mission.

0605134511008665-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The waters beyond Barbosa Beach and Cheliska Bay have grown treacherous.

0605140811008792-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: With high, turbulent seas, and tidal waves threatening passage, sailing has become quite dangerous. And now the phenomenon has spread to the waters of Calibre.

0605134511008666-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As our allies, and investors in the Foundation, it is crucial we aid the Runeblades of Terrun Calibre in investigating these phenomena.

0605134511008667-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$, as this matter concerns us, why don't you allow us to take it from here?

0605134511008668-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A splendid idea, miss $npcName:11003885[gender:1]$. This tired old man would be grateful for the assistance.

0605134511008669-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I appreciate your understanding, $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$. $MyPCName$, please step over here for a moment.

0622180311010636-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why are you talking to me? Miss $npcName:11003885[gender:1]$ has requested your presence.

0605134511008670-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The unexplained ocean phenomena $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$ mentioned are more than just impediments to ocean travel—

0605134511008671-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Calibre Shore has been buffeted by tsunamis and powerful winds. Some of the smaller surrounding islands have even been swallowed by the sea. But it's becoming more and more clear this is a global problem.

0605134511008672-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I initially thought all this was caused by the lapenshards themselves, but we've learned that the lapenshards are simply catalysts. They have no real effect without someone to use them.

0605134511008673-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Excuse me. You realize I was speaking, do you not? Your status as acting Elder Blade does not give you license to interrupt.

0605134511008674-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmph... You're scarier than the raging waves.

0605134511008676-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font size='30'>Err, <font size='24'>I <font size='22>didn't <font size='18'>say <font size='17'>any<font size='16'>thing...</font>

0605134511008679-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... Thanks to Landevian I've lost my train of thought.

0605134511008680-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, what're you blaming me for?

0605134511008681-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...While they're busy arguing, allow me to wrap up this briefing.

0605134511008682-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: After detecting dark energies emanating from the sea, we in Terrun Calibre set out to investigate.

0605134511008683-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We then discovered an important clue to the mystery at hand.

0605160211008793-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We received word that $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$</font>, one of Maple World's most famous explorers, claimed to have encountered the "truth" behind the raging seas.

0605134511008684-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ may prove to be the key to unraveling this mystery. We must learn what he knows.

0605134511008686-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ should be under the care of $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$, manager of the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$.

0605134511008687-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then that's where I'll start my investigation.

0605134511008688-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003080[gender:0]$ is at the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$. Learn what he knows.

0605134511008689-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ should be under the care of $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$, manager of the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$.

0605134511008691-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm here to see $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. There's something I need to talk with him about.

0605134511008692-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... I don't know if he's any shape to talk right now. He was the sole survivor of the Majesty, a vessel lost to the raging seas.

0605160211008794-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Plus, he specifically asked not to be disturbed. The poor guy seemed scared out of his mind. I'm inclined to let him rest.

0605134511008693-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I tried to get him to tell me what happened on numerous occasions, but every time he just clammed up.

0605134511008694-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm here specifically to investigate the source of the ocean disturbances. I need to speak with $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$.

0605134511008695-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... I guess you can try talking to him. The situation at hand is extremely important to us.

0605134511008696-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a bedroom over there. $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s inside.

0605134511008698-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003080[gender:0]$ is inside. I hope this situation gets resolved before more lives are lost.

0605134511008699-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... How did you get in here? I specifically told $npc:11000019[gender:0]$ not to let anyone in.

0605134511008700-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$? I came to ask you what you know about the ocean disturbances that sank your ship.

0605160211008795-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... I'm done talking about that.

0605160211008796-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You need to tell me what you know. Lives hang in the balance.

0605134511008701-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... There is a divine beast that lives in the deeps. $npc:11003086$. He is the reason the seas rage.

0605160211008799-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003086$ is a living legend. A peaceful being who protects the ocean and guides sailors to safety on their journeys.

0605160211008800-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Guardian of the Seas is a legend known to all sailors. It is every sailor's dream to meet him before they die.

0605160211008801-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But... That is not the $npc:11003086$ I encountered that fateful day. Red eyes glittering beneath waves as tall as mountains...

0605160211008802-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
My childhood dream transformed instantly into a nightmare....
<font color="#909090">(He sobs quietly.)</font>

0605160211008804-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You want to find $npc:11003086$? You're out of your mind! I watched my ship and fellow crewmen get sucked into the deep like toys in a draining bath. And you want to meet the creature that did that?

0605160211008805-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Unless you can think of some other way to quiet the seas, I don't have a choice.

0605160211008807-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't know if you're brave, desperate, or stupid... Fine, I'll tell you.

0605160211008808-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't know where $npc:11003086$ is, but I know who does. The siren sisters $npc:11003888[gender:1]$ and $npc:11003889[gender:1]$ are friends of $npc:11003086$. They know how to find him.

0605160211008809-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then where can I meet these siren sisters?

0605160211008810-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They were always the ones who'd find me. Whenever I set sail they'd swim alongside my ship and visit for a while. But now that my ship is gone, we've lost touch.

0605160211008812-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't worry I know a personal friend of the siren sisters.

0605160211008813-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: One of my associates is a former pirate named $npc:11003082[gender:0]$. He lives in a small cabin in $map:02000182$. He can point you in the right direction.

0605160211008815-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes. The life's not for everyone. He wanted to wash his hands of that life and start a new one. I'm sure you'll be able to arrange some sort of trade in exchange for the siren sisters' whereabouts.

0702183911011040-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And... take this spyglass. The sisters will know I sent you if you show them this.

0605160211008816-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you for your help. Get well soon.

0605160211008817-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It looks like you've got to find an ex-pirate in $map:02000182$.)</font>

0605134511008712-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003082[gender:0]$ lives in a small cabin in $map:02000182$. Don't expect his help to come free.

0605134511008713-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(The door to the cabin is closed, but it doesn't appear to be locked.)</font>

0605134511008714-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You should probably knock as a courtesy.)</font>

0605134511008716-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: N-no! I'm not the person you're looking for! G-get out of my house this instant!

0605134511008717-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(What? But you're not even inside his house...)</font>

0605134511008718-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You should enter the $map:52000096$ and investigate.)</font>

0605134511008720-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I really appreciate your help, but what are you doing here?

0607110611008850-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know where to find the siren sisters. But I can't just tell you.

0607110611008852-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Easy. Nothing's free in this world.

0607110611008853-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll tell you where to find your sirens, but there's a price.

0607110611008854-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not giving you any money.

0607110611008855-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't need money, I need a new life! All you have to do is erase all evidence I was ever a pirate.

0607110611008856-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm sick of the pirate way. All I want is a quiet, honest life.

0607110611008857-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I want you to get rid of the $npcPlural:21000232[gender:0]$ living on the $map:02000182$ and destroy $item:30001151$ and all its copies—that is, a list of all pirates in the area. Do that, and I'm a free man.

0607110611008858-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems helping $npc:11003082[gender:0]$ is the only way you're going to find the siren sisters.)</font>

0607110611008859-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm sick of the pirate way. All I want is a quiet, honest life.

0607110611008860-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's done. There's nothing and no one left to link you to your past life.

0607110611008862-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You don't know how much that means! I'm going to live an honest life from now on, I swear.

0607110611008863-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I haven't forgotten my part of the bargain. You can find the siren sisters in the $map:52100002$ on $map:52100001$.

0607110611008864-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But reaching them may not be easy. There's a pirate captain by the name of $npc:29000213$ who fancies himself a suitor to $npc:29000212[gender:1]$, the younger one of the siren sisters. Odds are you'll cross paths.

0607110611008865-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He's been trying to kidnap her for I don't know how long. Her older sister $npc:29000211[gender:1]$ usually manages to drive him off, but his determination is unshakable. They may need your help.

0607110611008866-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Be careful, will you? Even if you reach the sisters, you may be in for some trouble if they can't tell you from the pirates.

0607110611008867-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Captain $npc:29000213$ is scary, but the sisters are scarier. Look out for that $npc:29000211[gender:1]$.

0607110611008868-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Did I hear it right? Did you really beat $npc:29000213$ and the siren sisters in a fight? Amazing!

0607110611008869-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Beat us? As if! How about you and I go fin to fin right here, right now?

0607110611008871-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't be so angry, sis. He didn't mean any harm.

0607110611008872-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh, it's that stupid happy-go-lucky attitude of yours that has pirates chasing you around in the first place!

0607110611008873-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The rumors are true... $npc:11003888[gender:1]$ is so sweet.

0607110611008874-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What is this ugly fish talking about?

0607110611008876-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh right, $MyPCName$ was it? Let's talk.

0607110611008877-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... $npc:11003888[gender:1]$ is so mean! Not like $npc:11003889[gender:1]$...

0607110611008878-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Mean? How about my trident and I show you what mean really looks like.

0607110611008880-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So I came to you because $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ said you could take me to Alvanos.

0607110611008881-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$! How is he? I haven't seen him recently.

0607110611008882-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There she goes again! Sigh, I don't know how my little sister fell for that finless vagabond...

0607110611008883-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How do you and $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ know each other?

0607110711008997-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He's been so many places, it was inevitable our paths would cross. Now whenever I see his ship on the horizon, I swim out to meet him and listen to tales of his journeys.

0607110711008998-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When I hear the stories of his adventures, I can't help but think about how big and amazing this world is.

0607110711008999-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That boy is full of hot air.

0607110711009000-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's funny, I remember a certain other mermaid sitting and listening to him talk all night.

0607110711009001-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: T-that was just because I was bored and had nothing better to do!

0607110711009002-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: She's just saying that because she's worried about me running off on my own adventures and getting in trouble. Sigh... It's been a while since I've heard from $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$.

0607110711009005-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003086$ is a divine beast and peaceful guardian of the ocean...

0607110711009006-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Or at least he was, until the incident...

0607110711009008-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A loud explosion shook the ocean floor. All the whales and the fish who heard it compared it to the crash of a falling star.

0607110711009009-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: After that, a dark energy began to spread across the ocean, corrupting things in its path.

0607110711009010-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003086$ went to the source of the disturbance to discover what happened.

0607110711009011-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But when he returned, he was different...

0607110711009012-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's when $npc:11003086$ started his rampage. One good thing did come of all this though. From what I've heard, the dark, mysterious energies leeching into the oceans had vanished.

0607110711009014-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can take you to $npc:11003086$, but you're not going to make it there by swimming. Not with the seas as rough as they are...

0607110611008901-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I know how you can get there! Why not steal $npc:29000213$'s ship, $map:52100012$? That thing glides through stormy seas like butter.

0607110611008902-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You want us to steal the what? From who?

0607110611008903-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course, stealing the $map:52100012$ won't be easy. It's anchored at $map:52100011$, which is brimming with pirates.

0607110611008904-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't worry about it. We'll help commandeer the ship!

0607110611008906-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This sounds like a crazy idea. Count me in.

0607110611008909-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... The darkness is receding... What was I doing just now?

0607110611008910-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What a relief! You're back to your old self!

0607110611008911-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you the ones who restored me to my senses? Thank you.

0607110611008912-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Somebody had to. But tell me, what happened to you to make you act that way?

0607110611008913-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It all began when $npc:11003795[gender:0]$ came crashing into the ocean from above.

0607110611008914-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I sensed that the evil energy trickling from his unconscious body was corrupting the lapenshards that had sprouted in the depths of the ocean. I knew that if nothing was done, this would lead to disaster.

0607110611008915-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In order to defend my domain, I called upon the powers of the waves and drove the darkness out of the ocean. The seas were pure once more.

0607110611008916-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But through all this there was something I had not considered...

0626175311011034-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That my exposure to the darkness would influence me.

0626175311011035-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I deeply regret the suffering my carelessness has caused.

0607110611008917-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If it weren't for your intervention, my ocean rampage would have continued unabated. Thank you, human.

0607110611008918-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, because of your actions, the ocean is at peace once more. Thank you so much!

0607110611008919-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You are welcome to return here any time—a privilege I have bestowed on no other human.

0607110611008922-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Please tell $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ that I said hello. And tell him to come visit us once he's fully recovered...

0607110611008923-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003888[gender:1]$, how could you be attracted to such a weak human?

0607110611008925-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Whatever. Anyways, $MyPCName$, you should come visit us with $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ some time. It'd be nice to see you.

0607110611008926-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(With Alvanos restored to his senses, the ocean disturbances have ended. Return to the $map:52010068$ and brief everyone on the results of your mission.)</font>

0607110611008927-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If it weren't for your intervention, my ocean rampage would have continued unabated. Thank you, human.

0607110611008928-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell $npc:11004097[gender:0]$ what happened on your mission, as well as what Alvanos said about the lapenshards.)</font>

0607110611008929-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That was quite the accomplishment for your first mission. I would expect no less of my champion.

0607110611008930-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ahem... It must have been quite a difficult task for you.

0702183911011041-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have already taken the liberty of informing the siren sisters of the sailor $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s recovery, by way of the former pirate $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$.

0607110611008931-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The intelligence provided by Terrun Calibre was very helpful in this mission. Perhaps you should speak with them.

0607110611008933-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, there is something I want to say to you.

0607110611008936-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh! Is something the matter, my kin?

0607110611008937-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Regarding your mission, I wanted to tell you—

0607110611008940-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A compliment, from Ishura? What a rare sight!

0607110611008941-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I admit, you did well. Guess you weren't just sitting on your butt this whole time.

0607110611008942-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's been a while. How goes your quest for revenge?

0607110611008944-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Whoa, there's no need to be snippy. I'm not trying to pick a fight.

0607110611008946-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Shouldn't you hurry on ahead? It seems everyone has gathered.

0607110611008947-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What about you? Where will you go from here?

0607110611008948-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My life belongs to the $npc:11003891[gender:0]$. My duty is clear.

0607110611008952-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How is Eve? Is she doing well?

0607110611008954-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I apologize for asking you to check up on her, especially considering your relationship with your own father...

0607110611008955-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's fine. If you'll excuse me, I need to report to the $npc:11003894[gender:0]$.

0607110611008957-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Lapenshards, tainted by darkness? Curious. Yes, I think we've learned all we need about the blackshards.

0607110611008958-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... Who could have imagined $npc:11003795[gender:0]$'s fall from grace would have such an interesting effect?

0607110611008959-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The divine beast's descent into berserk rage was also quite interesting.

0607110611008960-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The blackshards should prove an amusing toy. Just like the $npc:11003891[gender:0]$'s right-hand man.

0607110611008962-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The operation to collect Gespenst's lapenshard is proceeding smoothly.

0607110611008964-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes. Though it brings me no joy to return to the place where I failed once before...

0607142211009159-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My plan's going great too, thanks for asking!

0607142211009160-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm well on my way to building a forge that can transform lapenshards into blackshards, so you can look forward to that!

0607142211009161-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The blackshard is one of the weapons necessary to bring Operation Black Moon to fruition. I cannot overstate its importance.

0607142211009163-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003892[gender:0]$, I'm looking forward to the final test in the El Nath Mountains.

0607142211009164-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no need to worry. I've selected the perfect chess piece.

0607142211009165-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A man so cold he'd make your own heart seem warm... He's already made his move, hehehe...

0607142211009166-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Reports indicate that the extreme weather conditions in El Nath are tied to the lapenshards.

0607142211009167-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Since this was the case beneath the waters of Cheliska Bay, it's reasonable to presume the same must also be true for El Nath.

0607142211009168-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course, I value your own expert assessment. Do you believe lapenshards are involved in the phenomena occurring in El Nath?

0607142211009171-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Which means that someone or something is using lapenshards as a catalyst to create the extreme weather conditions there.

0607142211009172-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A savvy analysis, $MyPCName$. I was right to have chosen you as my champion.

0607142211009173-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah, our guest has arrived just in time. The perfect person to assist with our mission to El Nath.

0607142211009175-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11004018[gender:0]$, weapon merchant of $map:02000001$, at your service!

0607142211009176-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11004018[gender:0]$ will aid us in our investigation of El Nath. He also assists the foundation by providing certain materials.

0607142211009177-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's right! Come over here and we can discuss the details!

0607142211009178-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I mean, the extreme weather might just be that, extreme weather. Heatwaves and cold snaps happen in nature, don't they?

0607142211009179-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Perhaps. No matter the case, an investigation is warranted. The sooner we determine the cause, the sooner we may be able to do something to remedy the situation.

0607142211009180-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Really now, $MyPCName$... Already trying to shirk your duties to the foundation? Hmph.

0607142211009182-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All righty! Who's ready to investigate El Nath?

0607142211009184-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is our resident expert in all matters involving El Nath.

0607142211009185-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11004018[gender:0]$, weapon merchant of $map:02000001$, at your service! I also procure various odds and ends for the Frontier Foundation.

0607142211009186-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Come over here and we can discuss the details!

0607142211009187-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11004018[gender:0]$ is the one you should be speaking with.

0607134611009051-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As you've already heard, something weird is going on in El Nath and I think I know exactly what's to blame!

0607134611009053-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frozen Crystal—a mysterious jewel that sustains the kingdom of El Nath. I think something's gone wrong with it.

0607134611009054-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If something is wrong with the Frozen Crystal, that means something's gone wrong with its caretaker, Queen $npc:11004023[gender:0]$.

0607134611009055-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's why I need your help, $MyPCName$! From what I've heard about you, I bet you're up to the challenge!

0607134611009056-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If anyone can set things right in the kingdom of El Nath, it's you!

0608111011009227-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How do you know so much about El Nath?

0622202811010637-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That my friend is a question for another time.

0607134611009057-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Guidance has already been dispatched to the $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$. You are to take $npc:11004018[gender:0]$ and join them there.

0607134611009058-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your next mission is to investigate El Nath alongside the members of Guidance, locate $npc:11004023[gender:0]$, and secure the Frozen Crystal.

0607134611009060-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no time to waste! Let's hurry to $map:02000261$!

0607144411009189-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The foundation director said she'd send someone to help us and it looks she meant you. I'm glad she picked someone capable.

0607144411009191-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Brother, don't push yourself. Your wounds haven't healed yet.

0607144411009193-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He was investigating an $map:52000081$ alongside several soldiers when they were attacked by an unidentified swordsman...

0608143511009965-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11004021[gender:0]$, that's enough. There's no need to bore $MyPCName$ with the details. It was a trivial matter that occurred due to my own carelessness.

0608143511009966-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Unfortunately, the ambush has left our scouting party out of commission.

0608143511009967-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To this end, I'd like you to investigate El Nath in our place.

0608143511009968-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In $map:02000260$, you will find a $npc:11003061$ of particular interest.

0608143511009969-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hiding behind it is the cave where our investigation was interrupted. I want you to pick up where we left off. I've marked the location on your map.

0608143511009970-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: In $map:02000260$, you will find a $npc:11003061$ of particular interest.

0608143511009971-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hiding behind it is the cave where our investigation was interrupted. I want you to pick up where we left off. I've marked the location on your map.

0608143511009972-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You feel a draft coming from behind the tree. This must be the place $npcName:11004020[gender:0]$ spoke of.)</font>

0608143511009973-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(The cave $npcName:11004020[gender:0]$ told you about should be just behind this tree.)</font>

0608143511009976-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I had a run-in with the forces of darkness.

0608143511009977-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then there's something here that has their interest. Was there anything else?

0608143511009979-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And yet you're uninjured. Even against you, I doubt he could have been defeated so easily...

0608143511009980-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He saved me from an ambush.

0608143511009982-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then he is an enemy of the forces of darkness after all. He must know something that we don't...

0608143511009983-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, there's little to be done about that. More to the point, were you able to explore what was beyond the cavern? We never made it that far.

0608143511009984-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a narrow valley beyond it, but it was too cold to explore further.

0608143511009985-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmm... Then there is truth to El Nath's legendary cold. It's said that only the citizens of the snow kingdom could... That's it!

0608143511009986-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The cold must have slowed my wits! The snow kingdom vanished long ago, but some of its citizens now call the empire home. Including your friend $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ there!

0608143511009988-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Correct. Now he serves as a supplier of various goods. But before he came to the capital, he lived in the snow kingdom that once stood here. It may be that he knows a way to get past the bitter cold.

0608143511009989-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11003060[gender:0]$ was a subject of the kingdom of El Nath?

0608143511009990-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's right. Well then, I leave this mission to you and $npc:11003060[gender:0]$. Good luck.

0608143511009992-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm just a merchant from $map:02000001$ who supplies the foundation. The only reason I was sent over anyone else is that my kind is resistant to the cold...

0622210111010638-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's not the only reason, is it?

0608143511009993-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Err... Well, I do know this. The path you weren't able to traverse leads to the home of an old friend, and the cold that stopped you was conjured by $npc:11003069[gender:1]$...

0608143511009995-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I volunteered to tag along for a reason. I was hoping for a chance to see my queen again. But that snowstorm... I wasn't strong enough to get through it. Each snowflake felt like the tears of Queen $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ grieving the loss of her kingdom and her king, $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$...

0608143511009996-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you really have to find her? If Her Majesty is using this kind of magic to keep outsiders away, then she wants to be alone.

0608143511009997-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All the more reason for me to go.

0608143511009999-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The forces of darkness are here, too. Your queen is in danger.

0608143511010000-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then... then there's no other option. Do you promise you'll protect her?

0608143511010001-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will, but first I need to get through the blizzard.

0608143511010003-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You'd need magic to match $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s power if you wanted to dispel the blizzard. Luckily for us, there's no need for that. I know of a special potion that should do the trick.

0608143511010004-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yetis aren't usually good with potions. Our sense of smell is too poor to find herbs, you see. But $npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ is special. He can find herbs by feeling around with his skinny little fingers, and use them to make all kinds of medicine.

0608143511010006-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $map:02000263$. He's a little guy, so he's easy to miss. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.

0608143511010007-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $map:02000263$. He's a little guy, so he's easy to miss. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.

0608143511010010-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wh-what? Who're you? Why do you want it? Do you even know what you're asking?

0608143511010011-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I need to get through $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard and make sure she's okay.

0608143511010012-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ sent you, didn't he? Always sniveling about queen this and royal duty that.

0608143511010013-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Is it wrong for him to be worried?

0608143511010014-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He's worrying over nothing! Stubborn oaf...

0608143511010015-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sure, she was a fine queen, when times were good. But it all fell apart overnight! The kingdom vanished, and the king and queen with it. The cold wasn't the worst part... The worst part is how we all scattered.

0608143511010016-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So she wants to hole herself up and mope, when we're the ones who suffered because of her? Fine by me! I'll be happy if I never see her again!

0608143511010017-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not asking you to see her. I just need your help.

0608143511010018-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not interested! That potion is a pain in the tush to make. It's hard to get the ingredients.

0608143511010019-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard is a threat to all of Maple World.

0608143511010020-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
What? How does the cold here threaten the rest of Maple World? The kingdom is already ruined. Why are you raising such a ruckus?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ stares at you blankly.)</font>

0608143511010021-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If her blizzard gets any bigger, even those beyond El Nath are in danger.

0608143511010022-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... She may be queen to a lost kingdom, but she's still my queen... I can't let her become responsible for the deaths of others. Fine, I'll help.

0608143511010023-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. They grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.

0608143511010024-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I have one condition. If Her Majesty is in danger, you have to help her.

0608143511010025-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, what are you standing around here for? Gather the ingredients.

0608143511010026-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. They grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.

0608143511010027-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Another few minutes and I was going to wander off. Hand over the stuff.

0608143511010029-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Those'll do. Now stay out of my way. Need room to work.

0608143511010030-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The $item:20000451$ is complete. It will let you endure the blizzard. But remember, potions don't last forever. This one especially!

0608143511010031-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Drink it right before you enter $map:52000082$. If you use it too soon, it'll wear off and you'll wind up a popsicle.

0608143511010034-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How long does the potion last?

0608143511010035-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you kidding me?! You're lucky I made a big batch. Here's a refill. Remember, it won't last long, so hurry!

0608143511010036-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's right there in your bag. I'm not a charity, you know! Only one potion at a time!

0608143511010037-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your bag is crammed full of garbage. Make some room.

0608143511010038-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not long. That's all I can say. If I were you, I'd drink it right before going into $map:52000082$.

0608143511010039-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You and that swordsman saved me. I'll never forget your kindness... But how did you make it through the blizzard?

0608143511010040-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I had help from some yetis.

0608143511010041-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The yetis look like big oafs, but they're actually very resourceful. $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ were fond of them. I was hoping to get help from one of them in particular...

0608143511010042-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If he had been here, $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ might have made a different choice. I tried sending for him, but I never got a response. $map:02000001$ must be terribly far away...

0608143511010043-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A yeti in $map:02000001$... Do you mean $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$?

0608143511010044-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes! He sells weapons there. Before the kingdom fell, he was the gatekeeper of $map:52000086$ for a very, very long time. I'm surprised you know him!

0608143511010045-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: He's at the $map:52000080$ this very moment.

0608143511010046-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then... he did come! We still have a chance to save $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ from that specter. $npcName:11003060$ may be able to stop her from opening the $map:52000085$...!

0608143511010047-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I... sure. We could probably make that happen.

0608143511010049-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We need to get $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ and go to $map:02000381$! But... I can hardly walk in this state...

0608143511010050-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Let me go in your place.

0608143511010051-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But... This is for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$... I can't ask an outsider...

0608143511010052-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've got to go to $map:02000381$ with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ anyway.

0608143511010053-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But... What business could you have there...?

0608143511010054-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I need to investigate this specter for myself.

0608143511010055-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I understand. I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. It's the least I can do to thank you...

0608143511010056-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's no problem. You should get some rest.

0608143511010057-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you. Let me know when you're ready...

0608143511010060-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
O heavenly light, pierce the icy veil around us and light the way to safehaven.
<font color="#909090">(She raps the bottom of her staff against the floor and magic fills the air.)</font>

0608143511010061-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.

0608143511010063-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. Let me know when you're ready.

0608143511010066-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
O heavenly light, pierce the icy veil around us and light the way to safehaven.
<font color="#909090">(She raps the bottom of her staff against the floor and magic fills the air.)</font>

0608143511010067-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.

0608143511010069-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: W-well? Is the queen all right?

0608143511010070-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I need your help. We have to climb $map:02000381$.

0608143511010071-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I-is that where the queen is? What is going on?

0608143511010073-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then we really do have to hurry. Something big is going on.

0608143511010074-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The $map:02000382$ is the only way to reach the $map:52000086$. The snow kingdom is lost, but its secret treasure is still there. Our wise ancestors locked it up so that its power couldn't be used against the world...

0608143511010075-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frozen Crystal... It's in a vault in $map:02000383$, locked away by perfect yeti engineering. Only the queen can open up the path through the $map:02000382$ to get there.

0608143511010076-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The vault itself can only be opened by both the king and queen together. And they'd never do so willingly, since they know how dangerous the treasure is.

0608143511010077-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But now the kingdom is gone... and so is the king. And this specter promised the queen that he could somehow reunite her with $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...

0608143511010078-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ is alive, then the vault can be opened?

0608143511010079-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes. That's why we have to stop $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ at the shrine. I don't think she'll like us thwarting her plan to reunite with her beloved king $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$...

0608143511010080-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That seems pretty selfish of her.

0608143511010081-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: For as long as our kingdom was around, every queen had her king, and every king was made for his queen. They are two halves of a whole. To be separated from one another would be unbearable... I'm sure Her Majesty has suffered greatly in their time apart.

0608143511010082-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's why I have to protect her! She already lost too much. I can't let her sorrow for her lost kingdom and companion lead her to do something terrible.

0608143511010083-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a path on the slope atop $map:02000260$ that leads to $map:02000381$. The $map:02000382$ is there... somewhere. I'll meet you in the mountains.

0608143511010084-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not sure how to get there...

0608143511010085-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's easy... Just close your eyes and open your ears. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0608143511010087-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How do I get there again?

0608143511010088-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Can't you just take me there?

0608143511010089-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a path on the slope atop $map:02000260$ that leads to $map:02000381$. Halfway up, you'll see a bunch of trees near some stairs. Search the snowbank and you'll see a small cave that shines with blue light. Go in there.

0608143511010090-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's easy... Just close your eyes and open your ears. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0608143511010091-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can't say I wasn't expecting this... but we can't just give up.

0608143511010092-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We have no idea how much danger the Frozen Crystal is in or what awaits Her Majesty at $map:02000383$.

0608143511010093-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... I appreciate everything you've done for me... But are you sure you've got time to fix the problems of a fallen kingdom?

0608143511010094-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: With the forces of darkness here, this is my business, too.

0608143511010095-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then... will you go to $map:02000383$ with me? I have to find Queen $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$.

0608143511010097-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you. I'll meet you there.

0608143511010098-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Let me know when you're ready to leave.

0608143511010099-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $map:52000086$ is hidden by a veil of frost at the edge of $map:02000263$. But the door should appear to us, now that $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ has opened the way.

0608143511010100-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Give me a moment. I'll find the door...

0608143511010103-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Found it. The door to $map:52000086$ is right here at the top of $map:02000263$.

0608143511010104-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not sure how to get there...

0608143511010105-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's easy... Just close your eyes and open your ears. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0608143511010107-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: How do I get there again?

0608143511010108-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Can't you just take me there?

0608143511010109-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't you see the? It's right there! I'll meet you inside.

0608143511010110-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's easy... Just close your eyes and open your ears. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.

0608143511010111-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's been quite an adventure, $MyPCName$. Thank you for all that you've done for us.

0702203611011043-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm sorry about how things turned out.

0608143511010113-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Don't worry about me, I'm fine! But... I worry about the queen.

0608161111010274-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All this can't have been easy for you. How are you holding up?

0608161111010275-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... I owe you a great debt for all you've done.

0608161111010276-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If it weren't for your aid, I would have been a party to the destruction of your world. A tragedy I would regret for all my days...

0608161111010277-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... Though my kingdom is gone, you have reminded me that there are many things in this world worth protecting.

0608161111010278-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As for me and my beloved, you need not worry.

0608161111010279-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will find a way to bring him to his senses. He will come to see that it is possible to coexist with this world.

0608161111010280-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We will meet again, in time.

0608161111010282-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
I believe this may be of interest to you...
<font color="#909090">(Erda hands you a black-tinged crystal that radiates with malevolent energy.)</font>

0608161111010284-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The cause of all this... A crystal imbued with dark magic, given to me by Turka. He gave this to me to use to unseal the temple where Bjorn was locked away.

0608161111010285-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I was suspicious of Turka from the start. I used my magic to seal the crystal in a protective shell. If I had not done so, its dark power would have affected me just as it did my Bjorn.

0608161111010286-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So long have pined after my beloved $npcName:11004026[gender:0]$... But he is not the man I remember.

0608161111010287-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But even still, I love him. I cannot bear to see him so broken. I will not allow him to harm this world. But I will stand by his side until he is free of the darkness.

0608161111010288-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... If there are any other dark crystals such as that one, you must see to it that their corruption does not spread! This world is as dear to me as it is to you.

0608161111010289-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You have my word. I will stamp out the corruption, wherever it lies!

0608161111010290-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I leave the safety of our world in your capable hands.

0608161111010291-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You have a lot to go over. Report back to the $map:52000080$ and tell everyone what you've learned.)</font>

0608161111010293-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I leave the safety of our world in your capable hands.

0608161111010294-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell $npc:11004020[gender:0]$ everything that occurred since leaving the outpost.)</font>

0608161111010295-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's quite the ordeal you've face! Good work, $MyPCName$!

0608161111010296-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So, the deadly blizzard buffeting El Nath was caused by this dark crystal? No doubt that "$npcName:11004027[gender:0]$" had intended as much.

0608161111010297-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm afraid I can't tell much about the object, besides that it was forged with magic...

0608171311010326-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I'm certain that the researchers at the Frontier Foundation can help us unlock its secrets.

0608161111010298-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I still have matters to handle here. We have wounded that need tending after. Go to $npc:11004097[gender:0]$ and request a delivery of medical supplies, and tell her everything you told me.

0608161111010299-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I still have matters to handle here. We have wounded that need tending after. Go to $npc:11004097[gender:0]$ and request a delivery of medical supplies, and tell her everything you told me.

0608161111010300-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You've return victorious! I expected no less of my champion.

0608161111010301-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now, tell me what came to pass in El Nath.

0608161111010302-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell $npc:11004097[gender:0]$ what happened in El Nath.)</font>

0608161111010303-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Erda and Bjorn... Those are names I've heard only in fairytales. I'd never imagined they were real.

0625204011010639-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We have our own news to share. Our intelligence reports indicate that the blizzard ceased shortly before your return.

0625204011010640-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That was no coincidence. I know exactly what was responsible for the blizzard.

0625204011010641-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You show her the dark crystal you received from Erda.)</font>

0625204011010642-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What is this? It oozes with ominous energy...

0625204011010643-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Take that object back at once, before it harms the young lady!

0625204011010644-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no need for that, $npc:11003884[gender:0]$. I feel perfectly fine.

0625204011010645-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Queen Erda placed a magical seal around the crystal to prevent its corruption from spreading.

0625204011010646-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What is this crystal? It seems as though it was made with dark magic.

0625204011010647-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Miss, why don't we leave the analysis of the crystal to someone with greater knowledge of the magical arts?

0625204011010648-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, yes! I've been waiting for my turn!

0625204011010649-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ooh... It's so enticing I could just eat it!

0625204011010650-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Please don't eat the evil crystal!

0625204011010651-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
Relax! I was just joking. Mostly. It simply piqued my curiosity. Now, allow me to perform a magical analysis.
<font color="#909090">(She takes the crystal, looking positively giddy.)</font>

0625204011010652-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(She's prooooobably not going to actually eat it. Right...?</font>

0625204011010653-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npc:11004032[gender:0]$ has completed her analysis of the crystal. You should speak with her.

0625204011010654-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hello? I've completed my analysis of the crystal. I know, I know, I finished in a blink! I'm just that good.

0625204011010656-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now, as for the results of my analysis. I've determined this is in fact a lapenshard.

0625204011010657-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What? I've never seen a lapenshard that looked like that...

0625204011010658-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It might be more accurate to call it a blackshard. This is a lapenshard that was tainted by the power of darkness. The more I study it, the more terrible it seems.

0625204011010659-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Based on the manner in which this lapenshard appears to have been corrupted, I can safely say there are bound to be many more throughout Maple World.

0625204011010661-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is worse than I expected...

0625204011010662-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Queen Erda conjured an enormous, deadly blizzard with just this small blackshard. Imagine what someone even more powerful could do with enough blackshards.

0625204011010663-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It would be the end of the world.

0625204011010664-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Our mission is clear. Locate the rest of the blackshards, determine how they were made, and destroy them.

0625204011010665-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But there is a little bit of good news.

0625204011010666-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was able to learn a fair amount about the blackshard's origins. However...

0625204011010668-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The magic used to forge the blackshard... There was something quite unusual about it...

0625204011010669-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If I had to wager a guess, I'd say that dragon magic was used to refine the lapenshard into its current state.

0625204011010670-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I'm afraid dragons aren't my area of expertise—the big ugly things.

0625204011010671-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We're going to need a dragon magic expert. As much as the thought makes me want to hurl... we'll have to call her...

0625204011010674-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was right in the middle of some important magical business, so I hope you called me here for a reason.

0625204011010675-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh. I'm regretting calling you at all.

0625204011010676-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you for coming all this way, Master Wizard $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.

0625204011010677-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah, Director Beatrice. Teleporting over long distances is exhausting, but I'm sure you called me here for something important.

0625204011010678-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Indeed. We need you to inspect a lapenshard we believe was corrupted by dragon magic.

0625204011010679-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah, well you've called the right person. Before we delve into an analysis of your crystal, we should begin with a review of the nature of lumarigon magic and its immense power for the laymen here.

0625204011010681-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Imagine if you will a sequence of parallel mana constructs arrayed into a series of ever-winding strings, each cascading into one another, resulting in exponentially increasing magical output. This magnificent geometry is reflected not only in their advanced spellwork, but also their culture which, may I say, far eclipses those of humans by—

0625204011010683-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough! No one wants to hear your collegiate seminar on the awesomeness of dragons. Just get to the point! Can you track the dragon who forged this blackshard, or not?

0625204011010684-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course, $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$. Just who do you think I am?

0625204011010687-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What? I've yet to see you demonstrate any other skills!

0625204011010688-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So hey, this is a super productive conversation, but could we maybe get back to the evil, corruption-spewing lapenshard situation?

0625204011010689-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$ is right. Time is of the essence in this matter.

0625204011010690-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmph... fine. Well, $npcName:11004033[gender:0]$. Show us what you've got.

0625204011010692-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've got just the magic for the occasion! We start with Lazlow's Entropy Reversal to counter the decay of the caster's mana signature. Then we'll use Andor's Compass to track its path across any ley lines it may have passed. Cast a Feinmann's Net around the oldest intersection to find our magic hotspot, then use Arcane Azimuth to render the location on a topographical globe, and... voilà! We'll have our casting site!

0625204011010694-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm... I'll admit that's an impressive plan.

0625204011010695-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Does she actually understand what Orde's saying?)</font>

0625204011010696-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The nature of mana entropy makes it quite difficult to track magic after it's been cast, especially when the ambient magic involved in the conjuration is allowed to fade.

0625204011010697-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: However, when the caster is as powerful as a lumarigon and its catalyst is a lapenshard, there's going to be a lot of residual energy to work with.

0625204011010698-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course, anyone less than a master wizard wouldn't be able to pull it off. But then again, lumarigon magic makes what I've done here look like childsplay.

0625204011010699-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But, if my meager spell is of use to Maple World, then it makes me one very happy dragon fan.

0625204011010702-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Let's go over the plan, shall we! $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ and $MyPCName$ will go on a scouting mission to track down Madria's dragon.

0625204011010703-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Remember, your focus is on information gathering. If you find Madria's stronghold, fall back until the rest of the alliance can join you.

0625204011010704-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Excuse me. I must have misheard. You're sending me on this mission?

0625204011010705-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You created the spell, did you not? Besides, by your own admission tracking this magic will be quite difficult. I don't think we can risk a lesser mage losing the trail.

0625204011010706-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No, no no no. This is certainly the job for one of the alliance's mages, don't you think? I am not trained for battle!

0625204011010707-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmph! I knew she'd chicken out. She has no sense of duty! Well, it seems the entire operation is ruined.

0625204011010708-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I won't do it. I simply won't do it!

0625204011010709-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then I suppose we have no other choice. The only other mage I can think of who's qualified for the job is $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$.

0625204011010710-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Woah there, no can do. Dragon magic's not my bag. As a Psion, I specialize primarily in spatial magic.

0625204011010711-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm. Then we're at an impasse. I find it dubious that anyone could cast magic this complex beyond the one who designed it, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$...

0625204011010712-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Miss, perhaps we should employ our contingency plan?

0625204011010713-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I trust your judgment in all matters, but... Are you sure we can even obtain it?

0625204011010714-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will mobilize the full resources of the Alemani family to acquire it.

0625204011010715-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ahem. $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, should you change your mind about participating in this mission, I would be inclined to reward you with a special gift.

0625204011010716-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A limited edition 10th Anniversary "Afrien the Onyx Dragon" figurine from Nerman Toys, new in box. I'm told it is quite rare.

0625204011010717-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now I know a toy is hardly a reward—

0625204011010719-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: See! I told you! She's obsessed with dragons!

0625204011010720-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Lanemone wasn't kidding. She really is a dragon fan...)</font>

0625204011010721-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no time to waste, $MyPCName$! Maple World is counting on us!

0625204011010722-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My spell found a concentration of lumarigon magic at $map:52000088$. Meet me there!

0625204011010723-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My spell found a concentration of lumarigon magic at $map:52000088$. Meet me there!

0625204011010724-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's about time you got here. I came as fast as I could since I was worried about Maple World's safety!

0625204011010725-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Sure. It has nothing to do with that new-in-box "Afrien the Onyx Dragon" figurine...)</font>

0625204011010726-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway, look over there. See the hot springs that formed in the middle of the ice?

0625204011010727-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Most people aren't used to seeing such extreme environments right next to each other. Dragons, on the other hand, love places like this.

0625204011010728-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But that's all basic stuff. Any dragon could have come here. We need to prove that it was the right dragon.

0625204011010729-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Look at those rocks. There's lumarigon magic coming from their runes.

0625204011010730-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Rune stones are used to cast powerful spells without expending much spirit. Since they draw mana from the earth, they're great tools for efficient spellcasting.

0625204011010731-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is probably a good lead. I can determine the size of the dragon, along with other details, from the placement of the rune stones alone.

0625204011010732-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm going to analyze the mana that's lingering over here. Would you mind taking a look at the rune stones for me?

0625204011010734-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Go on. How were they arranged?

0625204011010735-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I see. Based on what you're telling me, the dragon should be the right size for Madria's pet.

0625204011010736-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I sense that a spatial distortion spell was cast here recently. If I had to guess, some sort of cloaking magic...

0625204011010737-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If the dragon had used lumarigon mana to power such a spell, it would have been like sending out a signal flare to magic users like me. It must have employed runic magic so that it could have a dip in the hot springs without any interruptions...

0625204011010738-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That lucky lizard. I wish I had time to laze around in hot water all day!

0625204011010739-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway, as dragons go, our prey was careless to just leave these rune stones here. It probably didn't expect to be hunted by a wizard of my caliber.

0625204011010740-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I can use what we found here to focus my tracking spell a little more. Hopefully we can get a more precise location this time...

0625204011010742-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Success! The spell came out more accurate than before, thanks to my brilliant deductions.

0625204011010743-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's a lava flow deep in Magma Gorge. The lumarigon was there recently.

0625204011010744-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: That's as far as my spell was able to trace. With any luck, we'll find some more clues that will help me refine the spell even further.

0625204011010745-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What are you looking at me for? Are you expecting me to teleport you there?

0625204011010746-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you have any idea how exhausting teleportation magic is? The drain on my spirit more than doubles with each extra person I take with me!

0625204011010747-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If you're ever dating a mage and you want to break up with them, all you have to do is say "Teleport me over to my place." They'll dump you before you can blink!

0625204011010748-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Magma Gorge isn't too far. Think of this as a chance to see the sights. I need to save my own energies for tracking magic, after all.

0625204011010749-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Magma Gorge isn't too far. Think of this as a chance to see the sights. I need to save my own energies for tracking magic, after all.

0625204011010750-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Phew. So glad I didn't walk here. Who knew magma was so hot?

0625204011010752-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway, this place is full of interesting clues.

0625204011010753-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: See the dragon scales scattered all over? They tell an interesting story.

0625204011010754-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Dragon skin is like steel. When it's injured, the dragon will go into hot fire or lava to cauterize its wounds shut. It's like how a blacksmith melts a dull blade in the forge in order to fix it.

0625204011010755-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Old scales will fall off the dragon's body in the process. Of course, examining these scales will tell us lots about the dragon.

0625204011010756-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I need you to get up close and personal with those scales. Tell me everything you can about them. No detail is unimportant, no matter how small!

0625204011010757-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'd love to take a look at the scales myself, but I'm allergic to scalding hot lava.

0625204011010758-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Too hot... Oh, are you done?

0625204011010759-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I felt dark magic on the scales.

0625204011010760-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Really? Quick, show me your hand.

0625204011010762-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes, yes. Traces of shadow magic still cling to you. These definitely came from the scales...

0625204011010763-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Incredible. Traditionally, dark magic and dragons don't exactly mix.

0625204011010764-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There's no doubt about it. The dragon we're tracking is Madria's.

0625204011010765-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's amazing enough that we found a living lumarigon—or something like a lumarigon. But for that same creature to be tainted by dark magic? It's all a little too much.

0625204011010766-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway, I need to refocus my spell.

0625204011010767-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Give me a minute. With any luck, I'll be able to find out where the dragon was heading...

0625204011010768-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmm... I think I'm picking up the source of this dark energy.

0625204011010769-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A unique signature. Shadow magic mixed with lumarigon mana. It's coming from the Land of Darkness...

0625204011010770-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I can't pinpoint the location from here. We need to go to the $map:02000146$. I should be able to do a more precise scan from there.

0625204011010771-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, $MyPCName$. I'll see you at the—

0627100911011036-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You don't expect me to walk again, do you?

0627100911011038-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: (Turn the puppy dog eyes up to 11.)

0625204011010774-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Okay, enough! Hold on tight. And if I collapse from exhaustion, it's your fault, got it?

0625204011010775-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Okay, enough! Hold on tight. And if I collapse from exhaustion, it's your fault, got it?

0625204011010776-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... Group teleportation is really hard! You cheated by looking so pitiful and sad!

0625204011010778-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well... I've learned a lot by going out into the field with you. So I guess we can consider ourselves even.

0625204011010779-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway, I can sense the lumarigon's magic clearly now, this close to the Land of Darkness.

0625204011010780-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I see Obsidian Mount... No, beyond... Is that a forest?

0625204011010781-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Tch... What a hassle. It seems Madria's dragon has some business in Blackmist Forest.

0625204011010782-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The dark energy of that forest erodes other magical signals. Madria's dragon was probably topping off its own energy reserves...

0625204011010783-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Dragons can gather mana from the air just by breathing, you know. It's just one of many quirks of the draconic respiratory system!

0625204011010784-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait, this isn't the time for dragon facts. The forest and its denizens are gluttons for magic.

0625204011010785-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We have to hurry, or there will be no traces of lumarigon magic left for us to analyze!

0625204011010786-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll go. The Land of Darkness is too dangerous for you.

0625204011010787-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Not so fast! I am a master wizard, you know!

0625204011010789-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sure. You try maintaining all these spells for hours at a time and see how bright and chipper you are. Of course I'm tired!

0625204011010790-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Fine, you win. I'll rest here for a bit. When you're done in the forest, meet me back here.

0625204011010791-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Is there anything I should look for in particular?

0625204011010792-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: For now? Just get rid of the monsters there. Their dark magic should glop onto you. It'll be simple for me to scoop off some samples when you're done.

0625204011010794-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Blackmist Forest is somewhere beyond Obsidian Mount in the Land of Darkness. The path may be hard to find, so keep your eyes open.

0625204011010795-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right. Let's take a look!

0625204011010796-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Orde leans in and looks you all over.)</font>

0625204011010797-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmm... So much dark magic for such a short visit...

0625204011010798-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The royal court was right. Maple World can never be safe as long as the gate to the Land of Darkness is open.

0625204011010799-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway, I can calibrate my spell a little more based on the samples you brought me. I can't help but feel that our goal is in reach...

0625204011010800-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What...? Right under our noses this whole time...?

0625204011010802-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thanks to the latest sample you brought me, I can pinpoint the source of the lumarigon magic perfectly now.

0625204011010803-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But I'm not sure if I can explain what I'm seeing. The magic... it's coming from here. Come on, I'll show you.

0625204011010804-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm going on ahead. I need to check on something first. See you there!
