0625204011010805-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm going on ahead. I need to check on something first. See you there!

0625204011010807-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you remember the cloaking spell that was cast at $map:52000088$? This is the same type of magic, but the scope... it's on a whole different level.

0625204011010808-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Look, you're floating! Space is so distorted here that not even the law of gravity is working properly.

0625204011010809-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is really amazing... How hasn't the alliance noticed this place? It's right here!

0625204011010810-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've been swimming in lumarigon magic lately.

0625204011010811-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmm... That's a good point. That energy could be the key that unlocked this place for us.

0625204011010812-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The time for investigation is over. Now we see what's beyond this phase distortion with our own eyes.

0625204011010813-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A spell this massive... Even if all the mages in the empire got together, they couldn't dispel it.

0625204011010814-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I guess that's obvious. Human magic doesn't hold a candle to dragon magic, after all.

0625204011010815-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm concerned by the shifts in the distortion that I'm picking up. By this time tomorrow, we may lose our ability to even see this much.

0625204011010816-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If we wait for the alliance to send reinforcements, it'll be too late. We have to break through this spell ourselves.

0625204011010817-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You said all the mages in the empire couldn't do that.

0625204011010818-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was talking about them, not me! Anyway, we were the ones to find this place, right? I'm sure we can figure it out.

0625204011010819-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Instead of punching through the cloak directly, we're going to make the spell break down on its own. Mana overload.

0625204011010820-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When the mana flow reaches a pressure too high for the magical matrix to handle, the whole thing will overload. Then, poof, no more spell.

0625204011010821-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We just need to keep feeding it more phase magic.

0625204011010822-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: First, let's seal up the spell's outflows. I can sense a stream of dark energy coming from the gorge to the right.

0625204011010823-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: See if you can find any dark energy sources we can use. I'll get things ready on my end while you're doing that.

0625204011010824-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Go to the gorge to our right. Collect anything that seems like a good source of dark energy.

0625204011010825-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This should be more than enough. Great!

0625204011010826-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hm. This energy is in powder form—it's far too dry. In a ritual chamber, it would be perfect, but it'll blow away out in the open like this.

0625204011010827-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll need a secondary source of dark energy that I can use as a mortar to keep the dust in place.

0625204011010828-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I saw some fields nearby I could check out.

0625204011010829-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hmm... Yes, perhaps there's something there we can use. I sense...

0625204011010830-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: More dark energy—It's practically alive... This place is infested with darkness. Fortunately for us, dark energy is what we need at the moment.

0625204011010831-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We're almost there. I just need a little more help! Bring me the source of that darkness.

0625204011010832-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ is focused on her ritual. Acquire $item:30000029$ in the field to the left.)</font>

0625204011010833-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ugh... My eyes are starting to water. They know that what they're seeing isn't real...

0625204011010834-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: At least our preparations are almost done. Just one step left!

0625204011010835-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ready to finish our magic seal?

0625204011010836-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Place rune stones on each of the six points of our seal while I put the finishing touches on the spell.

0625204011010837-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Where can I get rune stones?

0625204011010838-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you see those stones engraved with strange symbols?

0625204011010839-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They formed naturally when they were struck by the phase distortion spell.

0625204011010840-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Normally it'd take months to make stones like that in a magic lab. We're lucky they're here!

0625204011010841-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Place rune stones on each of the six points of our seal while I put the finishing touches on the spell.

0625204011010842-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Finally... We're about ready to trigger the overload!

0625204011010845-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course not! Who knows what's hiding behind this cloak? How could I possibly be ready?

0625204011010846-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm just going to do it. There's no one else here to do the job, after all.

0625204011010847-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Anyway... I hate the idea of tainted lumarigon wandering all over Maple World. There's no end to the damage they could do.

0625204011010848-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: And don't forget the figurine the empress promised you.

0625204011010849-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey, I'm trying to be a hero over here! Don't I deserve a little more credit than that?

0625204011010850-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Though... the limited edition Afrien does sweeten the deal...

0625204011010851-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough small talk! Let's find out what's going on right under our noses.

0625204011010852-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enough small talk! Let's find out what's going on right under our noses.

0625204011010853-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's good we arrived when we did.

0625204011010854-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Good work holding out this long, $MyPCName$. It is thanks to you that we made it in time.

0625204011010865-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: No one knew we were here. How did you find us?

0625204011010866-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ brought us here using a mass teleportation spell.

0625204011010868-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Stop it, you're making me blush!

0625204011010869-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thankfully, $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ had been tracking your whereabouts ever since your departure.

0625204011010870-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When she lost track of you in the distorted space, $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ became nervous.

0625204011010871-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: She caused quite the scene at the foundation, saying that you were both in danger, and that we needed to form a rescue party immediately.

0625204011010873-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: N-no! I simply didn't want to have to complete your mission when you inevitably failed—and I'll implode anyone who suggests anything to the contrary!

0625204011010874-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm glad you're okay. We're lucky $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ was checking up on us.

0625204011010875-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've never seen a mage teleport so many people at once. It seems $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ is more than meets the eye.

0625204011010876-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course all that would have been for naught if you and $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ had not held out long enough for us to come to your aid.

0625204011010877-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There is much to discuss, once the battle is won. Blackeye and his men covered our advance. Odds are, they're still fighting.

0625204011010878-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We'll secure this position. Go and assist Dark Wind.

0625204011010879-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We'll secure this position. Go and assist Dark Wind.

0625204011010880-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Although... I suspect Blackeye will have left very little for you to do.

0625204011010881-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Enemy hostiles neutralized. Jin, casualty report.

0625204011010883-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It was the perfect surprise attack. I've never seen anything like it.

0625204011010884-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ really came through for us. I'd never thought of using mass teleportation to initiate an ambush. Maybe it's time Dark Wind started recruiting mages.

0625204011010885-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11004034[gender:0]$ really came through for us. I'd never thought of using mass teleportation to initiate an ambush. Maybe it's time Dark Wind started recruiting mages.

0625204011010886-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. Were you worried about us?

0625204011010887-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As you can see, we can hold our own. I'm relieved to see the same can be said of you and $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.

0625204011010888-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If anyone needs help, it'll be the Green Hoods in the gorge. They're cutting off the enemy's retreat.

0625204011010889-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm glad to see you're still alive. Thanks for coming to check on us, but we've just wrapped up here.

0625204011010890-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Let's hurry and join the others.

0625204011010891-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Let's hurry and join the others.

0625204011010892-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thanks again for all your help, $MyPCName$. We made it through, thanks to you.

0625204011010893-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You're the reason we made it this far.

0625204011010894-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What are you saying? It was a team effort! Without you, I'd be toast.

0625204011010895-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I think we can agree, it's been a long day.

0625204011010897-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As soon as all the fighting was over, she went off to do more research on the lapenshards. She's got odd priorities, that one.

0625204011010898-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, here we are. Madria's stronghold. I sort of can't believe it.

0625204011010899-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's all thanks to you and $MyPCName$.

0625204011010900-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But the fight isn't over yet. Not while Madria's castle still stands.

0625204011010901-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This latest battle was only the beginning.

0625204011010902-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right. I need to rally the troops. We have a fight ahead of us.

0625204011010903-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, can you decipher the runes engraved on the gate? I'd prefer to avoid any surprises.

0625204011010904-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, can you decipher the runes engraved on the gate? I'd prefer to avoid any surprises.

0625204011010908-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: She went to such lengths to hide this place, and then wrote this flashy message on the front gate.

0625204011010909-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Likely to inspire dread in those who behold it. Had Madria's attack succeeded, she would likely have brought any prisoners here as slaves, like at Katramus.

0625204011010910-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This message was probably meant for them.

0625204011010911-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Madrakan... the Fortress of Fury. She obviously named it after herself.

0625204011010913-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We'll cure that with the destruction of her fortress.

0625204011010914-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003135[gender:0]$, return to headquarters and update everyone on what has occurred here. $npcName:11003091[gender:1]$, you should return to the Foundation as well.

0625204011010916-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You have already expended an immense amount of mana. According to $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, further exertion in your state could prove life-threatening. Don't worry. The royal court has many mages at its disposal.

0625204011010917-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehe... then you'll have to excuse me. I'm off to recover my magic! Perhaps at that hot spring...

0625204011010918-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I am not giving you license to derelict your duties. Return to $map:52010068$ and coordinate with the Foundation to develop a battle plan.

0625204011010919-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The mission is simple. Break through Madrakan's rampart, forge our way through the castle interior, and conquer its spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.

0625204011010920-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The mission is simple. Break through Madrakan's rampart, forge our way through the castle interior, and conquer its spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.

0625204011010921-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. Thanks to your efforts we were able to minimize our casualties in the siege upon Madrakan. Madria's fortress is on the verge of falling.

0625204011010923-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: However, Madrakan's spire yet stands. Our mages report that a powerful magical seal stands between us and surmounting the spire.

0625204011010924-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The quickest way to undo the seals is to find and eliminate the source of their power.

0625204011010925-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I've been told that the spell that bars our way is no ordinary seal, but one fueled by an old grudge from long ago.

0627144711011039-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To learn any more about this grudge and how to settle it, we require the aid of an expert mage.

0625204011010926-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To that end, I want you to return to the Frontier Foundation and report what we've learned. Surely Orde or Lanemone will know a way to break the seal. I will stand guard here and monitor the situation.

0625204011010927-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What? Seal? A seal powered by an intense grudge?

0625204011010929-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait, do you know something about this?

0626002711011031-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait, do you know something about this?

0625204011010930-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well, if it is Madria's grudge powering the spell, I might know a little about the circumstances. It happened long ago, and few still remember the tale...

0625204011010932-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Yes. It's a very sad story.

0625204011010934-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I was told the story so long ago it almost seems a fairy tale... There are bits and pieces lost to time, but I'll tell you what I know.

0625204011010935-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Madria family was a powerful noble family that once did business with the Alemani family. The only daughter of the household was also named Madria.

0625204011010936-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: An unknown plague swept through the Madria manor, afflicting not only the servants of the household, but young Madria as well.

0625204011010937-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: An unknown plague swept through the Madria manor, afflicting not only the servants of the household, but young Madria as well.

0625204011010938-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Madria's father exhausted great resources hiring numerous doctors and trying all manner of cures, all to no avail. Eventually, he requested the aid of the royal court. What happened after that is a bit unclear, but...

0625204011010939-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Some time later it was reported the manor was completely empty. No occupants, not even a corpse. Those who visited are said to have felt deeply uneasy. The manor has been abandoned to this day.

0625204011010940-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There are rumors the place is haunted and that Madria's father still stalks its halls, cursing the royal court for forsaking his household.

0625204011010941-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe that this is the grudge that fuels the seal our forces encountered.

0625204011010942-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe if we travel to the source of that grudge, we will find the casting site of our seal.

0625204011010943-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Finding the source is the easy part... We have to reach back across time and manifest the rage, loathing and anguish of the Madria family in the present where we can fight it. The myriad magics required for such a feat would be...

0625204011010944-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Can you cast a spell like that?

0625204011010947-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Forget all the intricate spellweaving entailed—we'd need an object with a psychic connection to Madria, a catalyst with a huge amount of magical potential. Where would we ever find something like...

0625204011010948-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Wait! The blackshard! It was created by Madria's dragon...

0625204011010949-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: But we'd still need a tremendous amount of mana...

0625204011010950-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What about your mana? Aren't you a super powerful mage?

0625204011010951-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm not that powerful! The amount of mana we're talking about, we'd need two Master Wizards on my level to even have a chance of success!

0625204011010952-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I believe there's a Master Wizard standing right over there...

0625204011010953-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Eh? You want me to work with her?! Yeah right. Good luck convincing her to help!

0625204011010956-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font size='40'>I said I'll help you cast the stupid spell!</font>

0625204011010957-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's not like I have a choice! I don't wanna be the girl responsible for letting the world be destroyed.

0625204011010958-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...Hmph. Then I guess we're working together.

0625204011010959-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: A-alright, fine! If you feed me a steady flow of mana, I'll handle the spell.

0625204011010960-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Well then, let's get started! $npcName:11003091[gender:1]$, get ready!

0625204011010962-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Grr... Ahem. $MyPCName$, we're going to be sending you to a sort-of between-place. You need to destroy the manifested psychic energy powering the seal—preferably without dying!

0625204011010966-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(The room begins to swirl around you, its colors stretching into infinity...)</font>
<font size="18">Urk... Everything's... wibbly-wobbly...</font>

0625204011010968-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You're back! You don't know how worried I was!

0625204011010969-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Oh thank goodness that worked! I've never physically teleported someone while at the same time projecting their consciousness onto the psychic plane...

0625204011010970-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: There were a million ways that could have gone terribly wrong, but I'm very glad that it didn't! Hey... you were already bleeding from your ears before, right?

0625204011010971-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
Ugh...
<font color="#909090">(You feel as though you've just emerged from a spin-cycle in a washing machine—bruised in body and spirit, and quite a bit disoriented.)</font>

0625204011010972-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
You mean... $MyPCName$ could have been killed...?
<font color="#909090">(Beatrice begins to faint. Thankfully, her loyal butler steps forward to catch her.)</font>

0625204011010974-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah... I... I'm fine, Pemberton. Now, $MyPCName$, please tell us what happened in that other place.

0625204011010975-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell everyone what happened in the $map:52100041$.)</font>

0625204011010976-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I wonder how it was that Madria went from being a sickly little girl to one of the Seven Commanders...

0625204011010977-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Now that we've destroyed the source of it's power, the seal at Madrakan should have collapsed, should it not?

0625204011010978-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You are correct, miss. We have just received news that the seal protecting the citadel's spire is no more.

0625204011010979-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then it's time to deal the fatal blow!

0625204011010980-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Go forth, my champion! Lead the final assault on Madrakan!

0625204011010981-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just say the word and I'll create a spatial distortion to teleport you to the front line at Madrakan!

0625204011010983-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just say the word and I'll create a spatial distortion to teleport you to the front line at Madrakan!

0625204011010984-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You're back, and the seal upon Madrakan Spire is no more. I trust this was your doing?

0625204011010985-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Then we will begin our full-scale assault the moment preparations are complete.

0625204011010986-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I look forward to your exploits in our final assault on Madrakan.

0625204011010987-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Preparations for the siege on Madrakan Spire are complete. Are you ready?

0625204011010989-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I don't think I'm ready for this...

0625204011010990-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Good, because the safety of Maple World is in our hands.

0625204011010991-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Good luck in there, $MyPCName$. We'll go in first and lead the charge. See you at the top of the spire!

0625204011010992-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Try not to die in there, all right?

0625204011010993-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sir, why don't you focus on looking after yourself? $MyPCName$ will be just fine!

0625204011010994-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your nagging will be the death of me. But seriously, $MyPCName$, I'm sure you'll do great. Good luck!

0625204011010995-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, soldiers, rally up! The time has come to strike at the heart of the enemy stronghold! I needn't tell you what's at stake. Stand together, and fight well!

0625204011010996-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What are you saying? You've made it this far! Steel your resolve, $MyPCName$. The future of Maple World is in our hands!

0625204011010997-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We'll lead the charge and carve a path through the enemy ranks. You can bring up the rear and deliver assistance wherever needed.

0625204011010998-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Good luck, $MyPCName$. See you at the top of the spire.

0625204011010999-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Try not to die in there, all right?

0625204011011000-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sir, why don't you focus on looking after yourself? $MyPCName$ will be just fine!

0625204011011001-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Your nagging will be the death of me. But seriously, $MyPCName$, I'm sure you'll do great. Good luck!

0625204011011002-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, soldiers, rally up! The time has come to strike at the heart of the enemy stronghold! I needn't tell you what's at stake. Stand together, and fight well!

0625204011011003-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All right, soldiers, rally up! The time has come to strike at the heart of the enemy stronghold! I needn't tell you what's at stake. Stand together, and fight well!

0625204011011004-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank goodness you're back from the infirmary!

0625204011011005-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sorry if I gave anyone a scare. The doctor says I'll be just fine, as long as I don't make a habit of getting blown up.

0625204011011006-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Pemberton cups his hand around his mouth and whispers.)</font>
<font size="20">The young miss was quite worried about you, $MyPCName$.</font>

0625204011011007-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Pemberton whispers again.)</font>
<font size="20">You were unconscious for days, but the young miss refused to leave your side, or even sleep.</font>

0625204011011008-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Pemberton whispers.)</font>
<font size="20">She was deeply distraught upon learning the leaders of Terrun Calibre had vanished. The thought that she might have sent them to their deaths was more than the young lady could bear.</font

0625204011011010-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$, wh-what are you muttering about over there?

0625204011011012-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We can't give up hope that those who went missing at Madrakan are still alive. If they're out there, we have a duty to rescue them.

0625204011011014-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$, any additional resources we can devote toward the search effort, we should do so immediately.

0625204011011015-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: All that has already been taken care of, miss.

0625204011011016-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: If $MyPCName$ survived without serious injury, then there must be other survivors. The Runeblades of Terrun Calibre are strong. There's no way they're dead.

0625204011011017-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Frontier Foundation must do everything in its power to rescue those still lost in the rubble.

0625204011011018-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My champion, our work is not yet done.

0625204011011019-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: When the dark crystal exploded, it sent blackshards flying all around Maple World. These objects are very dangerous—we have already witnessed their corrupting influence. The Frontier Foundation must recover them at once.

0625204011011020-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Secondly, there's the matter of the missing Runeblades of Terrun Calibre... Our initial rescue efforts have borne little fruit. We must redouble our efforts, and mobilize any and all remaining resources.

0625204011011021-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As the director of the Frontier Foundation, I hereby declare that these matters are our top priority. We must distribute our resources accordingly.

0625204011011022-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course, we cannot forget our mission of finding and acquiring the lapenshards to prevent their misuse and ensure this incident never be repeated.

0625204011011023-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We must return to ground zero of the dark crystal explosion... The $map:02000496$.

0625204011011024-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We must return to ground zero of the dark crystal explosion... The $map:02000496$.

0625204011011025-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We've got our work cut out for us.

0625204011011026-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Between locating the leaders of Terrun Calibre, recovering and quarantining the blackshards, and collecting the lapenshards, the Frontier Foundation has a profound mission to complete.

0625204011011027-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I hope you'll stand with me, until the end.

0625204011011029-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Of course. If there's anything you need, just call me.

0802160211012090-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We must investigate the site of the dark crystal's explosion.

0802160211012091-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Your talents are needed here at the $map:02000496$. It is time you fulfilled our contract.

0802160211012092-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Your talents are needed here at the $map:02000496$. It is time you fulfilled our contract.

0802160211012093-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I knew you would come to aid me. Then let us begin the briefing. Pemberton?

0802160211012094-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Good to see you, $MyPCName$. The Foundation has worked tirelessly to establish this base of operations. Thusnelda, head of the Alemani family, was of great help in this endeavor.

0802160211012095-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: To the north is the ominous crater left behind by the explosion of the dark crystal. We've taken to referring to it as the $map:02000496$.

0807185611012922-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Given the dangers posed by the scattered blackshards, we've already dispatched our most elite scouts to track them down. We set up this camp to study the nature of the blackshards, and their connection to the anomaly at the center of the blast site.

0802160211012096-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Guidance, the Lumiknights, the Royal Guard, and the mages of the royal court are already working in unison to study the lapenshards.

0802160211012098-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, my dear champion. In carrying out missions for the Foundation, you have demonstrated great ability. There is a special assignment I would have you perform.

0802160211012099-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I would like you to investigate the anomaly at the center of the blast site, search for the missing Runeblades of Terrun Calibre, and rescue any survivors you encounter.

0802160211012100-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There is no one in whom I place greater confidence. Though this mission will likely prove perilous, I entrust its completion to you.

0802160211012101-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Rather than hear of your exploits secondhand, I have come to the $map:02000496$ to witness your feats in person.

0802160211012103-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Of course, I would not send my kin into such dangers alone. A competent mage is here to aid you.

0802160211012105-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Of course! In addition to being handsomely compensated, I am deeply curious about the crystal at the center of the anomaly.

0802160211012106-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll do whatever I can to help. Shall we, $MyPCName$?

0802160211012108-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Sigh, she was never interested in the lapenshards to begin with. The moment she got her hands on that dragon toy she'd been drooling over, she shrieked with glee and tromped off somewhere.

0802160211012109-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Besides, she consumed an enormous amount of mana anyways. I doubt she'd be of much help in her state. So leave her to play with her toys in peace.

0802160211012111-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Orde has washed her hands of all this. It's up to the rest of us to see this through.

0802160211012112-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As for that enormous lapenshard over there beckoning to us in all its splendor, it must be radiating an immense amount of power to cause such a storm.

0802160211012113-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My first order of business is analyzing and identifying the crystals orbiting it.

0802160211012114-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We need to understand how such a large lapenshard formed at the heart of the blast, and whether it's a threat.

0802160211012115-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Of course, I can't go with you as I have my own research to attend to.

0802160211012116-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Bring me a sample of the crystals surrounding the lapenshard so that I may analyze them.

0802160211012117-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Bring me a sample of the crystals surrounding the lapenshard so that I may analyze them.

0802160211012118-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(The sheer power radiating from the lapenshard feels oppressive.)</font>

0802160211012119-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Wait. What's that faint sound... a voice?)</font>

0802160211012120-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Danger... Must... Flee... This place is...

0802160211012121-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(The voice seems to be emanating from the anomaly... It seems somehow familiar.)</font>

0802160211012124-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hold on, $npcName:11004038[gender:0]$! I'm coming to save you!

0802160211012125-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(The sheer power radiating from the lapenshard feels oppressive.)</font>

0802160211012126-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(Wait. What's that faint sound... a voice?)</font>

0802160211012127-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Danger... Must... Flee... This place is...

0802160211012128-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(The voice seems to be emanating from the anomaly... It seems somehow familiar.)</font>

0802160211012130-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You're certain this voice belongs to your master.)</font>

0802160211012131-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hold on, Master! I'm coming to save you!

0802160211012132-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(When you came to your senses, you found yourself somewhere entirely different.)</font>

0802160211012134-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems you were pulled into the anomaly at the center of the blast site...)</font>

0802160211012135-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Before I go any further, I'd better tell everyone what I've found.

0802160211012137-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Before I go any further, I'd better tell everyone what I've found.

0802160211012146-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$! There was a brilliant light from the lapenshard at the center of the crater just a few moments before you returned. What happened?

0802160211012147-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You want to tell Beatrice everything... But part of you wonders if what happened in that place was just a dream.)</font>

0802160211012148-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Why are you silent? Please tell me everything that happened.

0802160211012149-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Please tell me what happened inside the anomaly.

0802160211012150-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ishura and the other leaders of Terrun Calibre are all alive.

0802160211012151-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I see! I never doubted for a moment that our Moonlight Blade had survived the explosion unharmed.

0802160211012152-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I don't know if "unharmed" is accurate.

0802160211012154-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: He didn't seem like himself. He seemed... Feral. Like he might attack me any instant.

0802160211012155-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: A leader of Terrun Calibre would never do such a thing! They only raise their blade against injustice and evil.

0802160211012156-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm sure you're right, but I was transported out of that place before I could find out anything for sure.

0802160211012157-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Even if they have been altered in some way, our objective remains the same. Now that we have confirmed they are alive, it is our duty to rescue them.

0802160211012160-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Please tell me what happened inside the anomaly.

0802160211012161-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ishura and the other leaders of Terrun Calibre are all alive.

0802160211012162-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I see! I never doubted for a moment that our Moonlight Blade had survived the explosion unharmed.

0802160211012163-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I don't know if "unharmed" is accurate.

0802160211012165-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My master didn't seem like himself. He seemed... Feral. Like he might attack me any instant.

0802160211012166-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: A leader of Terrun Calibre would never do such a thing! They only raise their blade against injustice and evil.

0802160211012167-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm sure you're right, but I was transported out of that place before I could find out anything for sure.

0802160211012168-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Even if they have been altered in some way, our objective remains the same. Now that we have confirmed they are alive, it is our duty to rescue them.

0802160211012173-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're letting your emotions cloud your judgment. So what if the Runeblades are alive? Before you go tromping off, you need a plan.

0802160211012174-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: From the moment I arrived, I set out to study the large lapenshard at the center of the blast site. That's when I discovered it was emitting a signal.

0802160211012175-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: On analysis, the signal seemed like a person's voice—but it was too garbled to make out. However, I soon realized that the signal I detected corresponded to the periodic energy bursts being emitted by the crystal.

0802160211012176-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: That's weird. Have you ever seen anything like that before?

0802160211012177-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I have, in fact. I detected the very same signal when the dark crystal exploded at Madrakan.

0802160211012179-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you see? The dark crystal at the center of the anomaly is a blackshard.

0808144211012933-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: An unknown force has drawn the fragments of the blackshards back here where they have begun to re-form.

0802160211012180-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My hypothesis is that the mysterious power drawing the fragments of the dark crystal here is that of the missing Runeblades you encountered within the crater.

0802160211012181-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: But there's a more pressing issue. The signal and its corresponding energy pulse is growing stronger, and the time between pulses is decreasing.

0802160211012182-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: In other words, the energy within the dark lapenshard is approaching critical mass. Eventually...

0802160211012183-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My initial calculations based on the accelerating energy pulses indicated that its explosion will be thousands of times more powerful than the blackshard that destroyed Madrakan.

0802160211012184-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Considering the original explosion created a dimensional rift of this magnitude in the Shadow World, imagine what will happen this time?

0802160211012186-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Maple World will be utterly annihilated.

0807185611012924-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We're sitting on a ticking time bomb here.

0802160211012188-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Calm down, $npcName:11004107[gender:0]$. It's too soon to panic.

0802160211012189-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Besides, there's nowhere we could go to escape an explosion of that magnitude.

0802160211012191-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We can't change the stakes. All we can do is formulate a plan to deal with our current reality.

0802160211012192-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're right, but we can't do anything from here.

0802160211012194-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll go back inside the anomaly.

0802160211012195-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I cannot allow that, my champion. Your wellbeing is my responsibility. And after nearly losing you in the blast—

0802160211012197-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm not asking for permission. Someone needs to stop that crystal from blowing up, and I'm not going to sit on my hands.

0802160211012198-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're right of course. Something must be done.

0802160211012200-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Very well. Then make me a promise—promise me that no matter what happens, you will return to my side safe and sound.

0802160211012203-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We can't change the stakes. All we can do is formulate a plan to deal with our current reality.

0802160211012204-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're right, but we can't do anything from here.

0802160211012206-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll go back inside the anomaly.

0802160211012207-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I cannot allow that, my champion. Your wellbeing is my responsibility. And after nearly losing you in the blast—

0802160211012208-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm not asking for permission. Someone needs to stop that crystal from blowing up, and I'm not going to sit on my hands.

0802160211012209-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Besides, I have to save my master. I know it won't be easy, but the alternative is the end of the world.

0807190811012930-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: So I'm going in there, one way or another.

0802160211012210-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're right of course. Something must be done.

0802160211012212-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Very well. Then make me a promise—promise me that no matter what happens, you will return to my side safe and sound.

0802160211012217-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I suspected we would meet again.

0802160211012218-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What happened? The last time I saw you, you and Turka got sucked into some scary red portal.

0802160211012219-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Now is not the time to discuss that. There are greater things at stake.

0802160211012220-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I presume you've come here at the realization that the missing Runeblades hold the answer to our current predicament.

0802160211012222-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: No doubt you've also realized that $npcName:11004027[gender:0]$ is responsible for that business with the blackshard in El Nath. He and I have a score to settle.

0802160211012223-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: However, given the gravity of the crisis at hand, I've had to set that matter aside.

0802160211012224-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The issue of preventing the explosion of the new dark crystal dwarfs all other concerns. In this respect, I believe your interests align with my own.

0802160211012225-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You are here to rescue the missing Runeblades, are you not?

0802160211012227-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Does that really matter? We both know what must be done. Will you work with me?

0802160211012228-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Does that really matter? We both know what must be done. Will you work with me?

0802160211012230-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I don't like this any more than you do, but the situation dictates we work together.

0802160211012231-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll help you save the world, but that doesn't mean I trust you.

0802160211012232-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Then it sounds like we're on the same page.

0802162211012285-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I don't like this any more than you do, but the situation dictates we work together.

0802162211012286-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll help you save the world, but that doesn't mean I trust you.

0802162211012287-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Then it sounds like we're on the same page.

0802162211012288-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: So how did you find this place anyway?

0802162211012290-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Rune magic. I was a Runeblade myself.

0802162211012292-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Why did you hide that fact until now?

0802162211012293-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Is that really what you wish to discuss right now? Perhaps we should instead focus on the impending cataclysm.

0802162211012294-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I've been tracking the lapenshards by way of runic magic. A few days ago, I determined that the corrupted lapenshards that were scattered by the explosion were gathering once more here.

0802162211012295-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When I arrived to investigate, I discovered another kind of energy radiating from four dimensional pockets within this place.

0802162211012296-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It seems the power of the dark crystal has warped its surroundings, causing multiple spaces to overlap. Reaching the resultant pocket dimensions through traditional means would be impossible, however...

0802162211012297-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Given sufficient power, the rune embedded in each Runeblade's weapon is capable of cutting not just matter, but space itself. They can create a rift to travel between overlapping planes.

0802162211012298-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Are you saying you can cut us an entrance for these pocket dimensions?

0802162211012301-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There's no guarantees I can prevent the rift from sealing itself.

0802162211012302-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Which is to say, were I to create such a rift, I would need to remain here to maintain it.

0802162211012303-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: So you want me to go in by myself.

0802162211012305-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Unless of course you can fashion a rift yourself, in which case I would be happy to venture inside and locate the missing Runeblades.

0802162211012306-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It looks like there's no other choice.)</font>

0806111511012914-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
Here. You'll need these, when the time comes. I trust you know how to use them.
<font color="#909090">(He gives you a handful of colorful crystals.)</font>

0806111511012916-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The energies I felt radiating from the four spaces beyond this place match those of your lapenshards. I believe they may prove useful.

0807185611012925-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I can't say how powerful or dangerous those we seek have become in their altered state. It may be prudent to enter alongside a group of trustworthy adventurers.

0802162211012308-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Now, I will open a rift to the nearest of the four realms. When you return, I expect you report everything you witnessed and spare no detail.

0802162211012309-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
<font size='50'>Hiyaah!</font>
<font color="#909090">(He swings his blade through the air, and the surrounding space peels apart like paper.)</font>

0802162211012311-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I don't know how long the rift will stay open. Hurry!

0806122811012920-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: So how did you find this place anyway?

0802162211012312-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Using runic magic. Was it not obvious? I too am a Runeblade.

0802162211012314-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: No wonder your fighting style seemed so familiar! Which sect do you belong to? Pelgia? Or... Jibricia?

0802162211012315-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: At this point, neither. Or perhaps it would be more accurate to say both?

0802162211012316-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: But there are more important matters we should discuss, like the impending cataclysm perhaps.

0802162211012336-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ah, you're back. I was unsure you'd make it before the rift re-sealed.

0802162211012338-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Don't glare at me like that. If it had, I would have simply cut a new rift.

0802162211012339-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Now, tell me everything you saw inside the rift!

0802162211012340-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You provide the $npcName:11004112$ with a detailed account of what happened.)</font>

0802162211012342-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: How is it you know $npcName:11004190[gender:0]$ by name?

0802162211012343-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Is it odd I would be acquainted with a fellow Runeblade? Now, you said that $npcName:11004190[gender:0]$ seemed singularly obsessed with lifeforce...

0802162211012344-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If I had to wager a guess, I would say her consciousness is trapped within the dark crystal.

0802162211012345-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If I had to wager a guess, I would say her consciousness is trapped within the dark crystal.

0802162211012346-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As a result, she has become a shell of her former self, driven by base impulses and the influence of the dark crystal's power. That is why she attacked you.

0802162211012347-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As the dark crystal grows in power, her personality becomes more twisted. The only way to restore her is to disperse the energy within the crystal.

0802162211012348-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The next dimensional pocket is a little further than the one $npcName:11004043[gender:1]$ was in.

0807185611012927-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Anyone with a lesser mastery over the runic arts wouldn't be able to reach it.

0802162211012349-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As for our next destination, I suspect I know who you'll encounter. He will be extremely dangerous under the influence of the dark crystal.

0802162211012351-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
Who do you think I mean? Now, carving holes in the fabric of reality is quite exhausting. Let's get a move on, shall we?
<font color="#909090">(With a slice of his blade, another rift appears.)</font>

0802162211012352-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
Who do you think I mean? Now, carving holes in the fabric of reality is quite exhausting. Let's get a move on, shall we?
<font color="#909090">(With a slice of his blade, another rift appears.)</font>

0802162211012353-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
You're back. Tell me what transpired.
<font color="#909090">(He seems tired...)</font>

0802162211012354-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell him everything that happened.)</font>

0802162211012356-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: How could you have possibly known that $npcName:11004042[gender:0]$ was going to be there?

0802162211012357-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $npcName:11004041[gender:0]$, $npcName:11004042[gender:0]$, and $npcName:11004043[gender:1]$ disappeared together. Since we already located $npcName:11004043[gender:1]$, it was even odds on the matter of who we'd encounter next.

0802162211012358-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We've wasted enough time already. You must investigate the next space.

0802162211012359-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We've wasted enough time already. You must investigate the next space.

0802162211012361-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Are you sure? You look kind of tired.

0803133811012891-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If everything you've said is true, then $npcName:11004042[gender:0]$'s personality has also been affected by the dark crystal—just as I suspected.

0802162211012365-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: How do you know so much about the blackshards?

0802162211012366-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: That's simple. I've been researching the lapentas far longer than you. You don't need to know any more than that.

0802162211012367-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(What a jerk... This guy probably doesn't have very many friends.)</font>

0802162211012368-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We don't know how much time is left before the dark crystal explodes again. We must stop that outcome at all costs.

0802162211012369-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's time to open a rift to the third space. I'm sure you can guess who's there.

0802162211012372-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There's no time to get sentimental. We've still a long way to go. The space $npcName:11004041[gender:0]$ inhabits is even further from this place than the others. It will take a great deal of rune power to reach him.

0802162211012374-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As is to be expected. Bridging two distant points in space requires a tremendous amount of runic energy. I don't have much left.

0802162211012376-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: After creating this next rift, I don't think I'll be able to help you any further.

0802162211012377-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I appreciate everything you've done for me. I'll take it from here. The Frontier Foundation has a camp at the edge of the blast site. You should go there and get medical treatment.

0802162211012378-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: ...Nothing I've done was to help you. This is for Terrun Calibre. Promise me that you'll save them.

0802162211012379-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll take care of everything. Just go and get yourself checked out at the infirmary.

0802162211012380-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
Very well. Then I'll open the rift. Haaah!
<font color="#909090">(He slices open a rift in reality.)</font>

0803135711012892-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's time to open a rift to the third space. I'm sure you can guess who's there.

0803135711012896-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As is to be expected. Bridging two distant points in space requires a tremendous amount of runic energy. I don't have much left.

0803135711012899-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I appreciate everything you've done for me. I'll take it from here. The Frontier Foundation has a camp at the edge of the blast site. You should go there and get medical treatment.

0803135711012900-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: ...Nothing I've done was to help you. This is for Terrun Calibre. Promise me that you'll save them.

0803135711012901-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll take care of everything. Just go and get yourself checked out at the infirmary.

0803135711012902-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
Very well. Then I'll open the rift. Haaah!
<font color="#909090">(He slices open a rift in reality.)</font>

0802162211012381-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He pants with exhaustion)</font>
Hurry... Help Ishura... and the other Runeblades...

0802162211012385-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Don't worry? You've practically depleted your mana, and you're barely breathing.

0802162211012386-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It doesn't matter. Tell me what happened.

0802162211012387-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You know, you're a real piece of work...

0802162211012388-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell him everything that happened beyond the rift.)</font>

0802162211012389-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I see. From what you've told me, it seems $npcName:11004041[gender:0]$ has not yet completely abandoned reason. We still have time to restore them to normal.

0802162211012390-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: While you were off confronting $npcName:11004041[gender:0]$, I came here for medical treatment and did some thinking about how we might restore everyone to the way they were before. I had some ideas, but none I'm sure of.

0802162211012391-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Luckily, there was someone in this place of yours that actually understands lapenshards. I believe they can help us.

0802162211012392-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Luckily, there was someone in this place of yours that actually understands lapenshards. I believe they can help us.

0802180211012611-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When this guy showed up and started asking me a zillion questions, I figured you and he were connected.

0802180211012612-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It was quite annoying. Well, since I've already agreed to help, I'll just bill the Foundation for the overtime.

0802180211012613-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Now, while you were away we learned some things about the new dark crystal.

0802180211012614-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Your friend here told me that each of the three leaders of Terrun Calibre ended up in their own pocket dimension.

0802180211012615-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When I learned the region within the crater comprised a multidimensional space, I became quite interested.

0802180211012616-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: From what I've been told of the geometry of the three realms occupied by the Runeblades, it sounded as though they were forming something of a barrier over a central space. And in that center we'll find—

0802180211012617-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The heads of Terrun Calibre. That must be where they retreated after we fought.

0802180211012618-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It seems highly probable. And based on the relative positions of the other spaces, we can deduce the spatial coordinates of the core. But that wasn't the only thing we learned.

0802180211012619-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Shortly after your biosignal weakened—which corresponded with your entering the rift our friend created—the dark crystal stopped accumulating energy and actually started consuming the energy it had already gathered.

0802180211012620-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: That was when you were fighting with the Runeblades within the anomaly. That's how I knew my hypothesis was correct.

0807185611012928-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You see the Runeblades were drawing energy from the dark crystal from within the anomaly.

0802180211012621-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: In short, I believe the runic mana within their bodies interacted in such a way with the energy of the original explosion that the scattered blackshards were drawn back in and accreted into the giant blackshard you see now.

0802180211012622-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The Runeblades formed their own dimensional pockets within the anomaly by reshaping the energy of the dark crystal, according to an innate desire.

0802180211012623-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As they draw more and more energy through the dark crystal, their bodies will reach their limits. As a result, their physical forms will disintegrate, along with the spaces they've created. When this happens, all of the energy accumulated within the anomaly will be released in one great explosion.

0802180211012625-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Somehow apocalyptics destruction doesn't sound all that neat to me.

0802180211012626-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I was just joking! Lighten up a little.

0802180211012627-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I know what will happen when something with that much energy goes boom, and I'm not looking forward to it. There's still too much I haven't seen and done in this world. I can't let it come to that.

0802180211012628-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The remedy to our predicament is actually quite simple.

0802180211012630-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you can remove the Runeblades from the anomaly, the dark crystal will stop gathering power.

0808110311012931-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you force the Runeblades to burn up energy, the power stored within the giant crystal will slowly be depleted.

0802180211012631-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you think you can do all that?

0802180211012632-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It sounds like there's no other choice.

0802180211012633-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When this guy showed up and started asking me a zillion questions, I figured you and he were connected.

0802180211012634-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It was quite annoying. Well, since I've already agreed to help, I'll just bill the Foundation for the overtime.

0802180211012635-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Now, while you were away we learned some things about the new dark crystal.

0802180211012636-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Your friend here told me that each of the three leaders of Terrun Calibre ended up in their own pocket dimension.

0802180211012637-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When I learned the region within the crater comprised a multidimensional space, I became quite interested.

0802180211012638-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: From what I've been told of the geometry of the three realms occupied by the Runeblades, it sounded as though they were forming something of a barrier over a central space. And in that center we'll find—

0802180211012639-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My master and the other leaders of Terrun Calibre. That must be where they retreated after we fought.

0802180211012640-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Shortly after your biosignal weakened—which corresponded with your entering the rift our friend created—the dark crystal stopped accumulating energy and actually started consuming the energy it had already gathered.

0802180211012641-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: That was when you were fighting with the Runeblades within the anomaly. That's how I knew my hypothesis was correct.

0807185611012929-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You see the Runeblades were drawing energy from the dark crystal from within the anomaly.

0802180211012642-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: In short, I believe the runic mana within their bodies interacted in such a way with the energy of the original explosion that the scattered blackshards were drawn back in and accreted into the giant blackshard you see now.

0802180211012643-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The Runeblades formed their own dimensional pockets within the anomaly by reshaping the energy of the dark crystal, according to an innate desire.

0802180211012644-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As they draw more and more energy through the dark crystal, their bodies will reach their limits. As a result, their physical forms will disintegrate, along with the spaces they've created. When this happens, all of the energy accumulated within the anomaly will be released in one great explosion.

0802180211012646-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Somehow apocalyptic destruction doesn't sound all that neat to me.

0802180211012647-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I was just joking! Lighten up a little.

0802180211012648-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I know what will happen when something with that much energy goes boom, and I'm not looking forward to it. There's still too much I haven't seen and done in this world. I can't let it come to that.

0802180211012649-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The remedy to our predicament is actually quite simple.

0802180211012651-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you can remove the Runeblades from the anomaly, the dark crystal will stop gathering power.

0808110311012932-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you force the Runeblades to burn up energy, the power stored within the giant crystal will slowly be depleted.

0802180211012652-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you think you can do all that?

0802180211012653-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I will rescue my master, and my fellow Runeblades.

0802180211012655-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I hope you succeed. Our world has its problems—but it's also filled with beautiful things worth protecting. That's why I'm helping you. That, and boatloads of mesos.

0802180211012656-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Are you ready? I'll teleport you into the dimensional core.

0802180211012658-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Huh? In your state? You'd only get in the way.

0802180211012660-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I like your gumption, but multidimensional teleportation is extremely complicated. I can only send one person at a time.

0802180211012661-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: And even if the dimensional pocket doesn't collapse with you in it, there's no guarantee I'll be able to bring you back.

0802180211012663-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Huh? What are you looking at me like that for? Saving the world from annihilation is risky. So what, are you just not going to go?

0802180211012664-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: <font color="#909090">(It looks like there's no other choice...)</font>

0802180211012665-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My other half, promise me that you will return safely.

0802180211012666-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Let's make a blood pact you and I, one that can never be broken...

0802180211012668-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Okay, enough with the sappy farewells. It's teleportin' time!

0802180211012669-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Okay, enough with the sappy farewells. It's teleportin' time!

0802180211012674-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're not fine at all! Have you forgotten? You are my family—and your body is bound to me by contract. Your wellbeing matters to me!

0802180211012675-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What do you mean, "I'm fine?" Look at you, you're a mess!

0802180211012677-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The young miss always gets her way in the end, there's no use fighting it. Come now, let's get you treated.

0802180211012679-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hello, do you need medical atten—yeesh! Your gear's covered in blood. Let's get that off and have a look at you.

0802180211012681-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm not seeing evidence of any injuries, internal or external. And you were fighting Runeblades inside the anomaly-thing? I can hardly believe it.

0802180211012682-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The weird thing is, I've been treating the Runeblades you brought in earlier, but they don't have any serious injuries either. Minor scrapes and bruises, but they've already started healing.

0802180211012683-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: That's a relief. But then why haven't they woken up?

0802180211012684-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: That's hard to say. I don't see any reason they shouldn't have.

0802180211012685-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Perhaps it's due to the residual blackshard energy within their bodies. I'm sure this mage here can sense it.

0802180211012686-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ugh, come on. More work? We just saved the world.

0802180211012687-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I don't know who you are, but if you can sense the blackshards' energy within their bodies, you're no ordinary person. What do you think about coming to work with us at the Foundation?

0802180211012689-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Yeesh! I didn't even tell you about the job. You know for someone so pretty, you're a real sourpuss.

0802180211012690-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: This blackshard energy—do you know of any way to purify it?

0802180211012691-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Who do you think you're talking to? Of course I do. Lapenshards one of my areas of expertise, and blackshards are just lapenshards tainted by darkness.

0802180211012692-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If we used a lapenshard with a great enough energy capacity, we could essentially transfer the dark energy from their bodies to the crystal. Of course, I'll need rune magic to get the job done.

0802180211012694-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hmph. Get a load of Mr. Impatient here. All right everyone, stand back and let us work our magic.

0802180211012695-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hmph. Get a load of Mr. Impatient here. All right everyone, stand back and let us work our magic.

0802180211012696-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I feel as though I've awakened from a long dream.

0802180211012697-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My memories of what happened within the blackshard realm are still scattered, but...

0802180211012698-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thank you all for rescuing us.

0802180211012700-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm sorry I raised my blade against you. There is no excuse for my behavior.

0802180211012701-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's okay. All that matters is it's over now.

0802180211012705-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I feel as though I've awakened from a long dream.

0802180211012706-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My memories of what happened within the blackshard realm are still scattered, but...

0802180211012707-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thank you all for rescuing us.

0802180211012709-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm sorry I raised my blade against you. There is no excuse for my behavior.

0802180211012710-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's okay. All that matters is it's over now.

0802180211012716-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What? $npc:11004115[gender:0]$? What is he doing here?

0802180211012717-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: How dare you show your face here after everything you've done!

0802180211012719-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Of course! I could never forget the face of my sworn enemy—the man who betrayed Terrun Calibre by murdering Master Arazaad!

0802180211012720-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Did you hide your identity so I'd help you? Unforgivable!

0802180211012721-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Don't be so quick to rush to judgment!

0802180211012722-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Such blind rage is the mark of a truly weak mind. Now all of you back off. I have matters to discuss with $npcName:11004128[gender:0]$. You can worry about what you want to do with me afterwards.

0802180211012723-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Very well then, out with it.

0802180211012724-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I warned you, did I not? That your ignorance would bring about ruin. Well now you've reaped the fruits of that ignorance.

0802180211012725-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $npcName:11004128[gender:0]$, $npcName:11004129[gender:0]$, $npcName:11004130[gender:1]$... surely you witnessed the truth within the abyss.

0802180211012726-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: All I did was cut down the true traitor to Terrun Calibre, and for that I have been persecuted.

0802180211012728-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: This matter does not concern you, outsider. This is about Arazaad, the former leader of Terrun Calibre.

0802180211012730-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: In a world encroached upon by darkness, Arazaad saw no hope for the future. To spare his own hide, he bent the knee in service of the Black Mage, and offered up Terrun Calibre as tribute.

0802180211012731-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I happened upon a secret meeting between Arazaad and Turka and overheard everything.

0802180211012732-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I tried to persuade Arazaad that he was making a terrible mistake, but his mind was made up.

0802180211012733-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When I stood in his path, he raised his blade to strike me down, and I answered in kind—putting an end to his treacherous contract.

0802180211012734-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $npcName:11004128[gender:0]$... Do you really believe all this?

0802180211012737-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: This business with the blackshard was just another in a long line of catastrophes. Our inevitable ruin lies yet ahead.

0802180211012738-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As members of Terrun Calibre, we have a mission to uphold. You haven't forgotten, have you?

0802180211012739-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you deny the future you saw in the dark crystal?

0802180211012742-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What? $npc:11004115[gender:0]$? What is he doing here?

0802180211012743-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: How dare you show your face here after everything you've done!

0802180211012744-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: No... It can't be... You're saying that's $npcName:11004115[gender:0]$?

0802180211012745-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Of course! I could never forget the face of my sworn enemy—the man who betrayed Terrun Calibre by murdering Master Arazaad!

0802180211012748-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I can't believe this whole time I was being deceived by a traitor!

0802180211012749-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Was murdering Arazaad not enough?! What is it you're after now?

0802180211012750-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll see that you regret ever coming here!

0802180211012751-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Don't be so quick to rush to judgment!

0802180211012753-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Such blind rage is the mark of a truly weak mind. Now all of you back off. I have matters to discuss with $npcName:11004128[gender:0]$. You can worry about what you want to do with me afterwards.

0802180211012755-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Very well then, out with it.

0802180211012757-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I warned you, did I not? That your ignorance would bring about ruin. Well now you've reaped the fruits of that ignorance.

0802180211012758-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $npcName:11004128[gender:0]$, $npcName:11004129[gender:0]$, $npcName:11004130[gender:1]$... surely you witnessed the truth within the abyss.

0802180211012759-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: All I did was cut down the true traitor to Terrun Calibre, and for that I have been persecuted.

0802180211012762-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Master? What is he talking about?

0802180211012761-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you want to know what really happened that fateful day?

0802180211012764-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Arazaad was plotting to betray Terrun Calibre and all we stand for.

0802180211012768-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: In a world encroached upon by darkness, Arazaad saw no hope for the future. To spare his own hide, he bent the knee in service of the Black Mage, and offered up Terrun Calibre as tribute.

0802180211012769-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I happened upon a secret meeting between Arazaad and Turka and overheard everything.

0802180211012770-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I tried to persuade Arazaad that he was making a terrible mistake, but his mind was made up.

0802180211012771-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: When I stood in his path, he raised his blade to strike me down, and I answered in kind—putting an end to his treacherous contract.

0802180211012772-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Unbelievable! I can't believe we're sitting here listening to the words of this traitor!

0802180211012773-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hmph. What about you, $npcName:11004041[gender:0]$? Do you think I'm lying? Even after all you've seen?

0802180211012774-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There's no way you're taking any of this seriously, right Master?

0802180211012775-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There's no way Master Arazaad would betray us.

0802180211012777-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: No... It can't be... I don't understand!

0802180211012778-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: This business with the blackshard was just another in a long line of catastrophes. Our inevitable ruin lies yet ahead.

0802180211012779-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As members of Terrun Calibre, we have a mission to uphold. You haven't forgotten, have you?

0802180211012780-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you deny the future you saw in the dark crystal?

0802180211012781-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you deny the future you saw in the dark crystal?

0802180211012782-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The dark crystal was forged with darkness. The visions I witnessed inside may have been no more than a trick. I cannot trust them so readily.

0802180211012783-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Fool! Can you still not see?

0802180211012784-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I tried to stop Arazaad from destroying everything Terrun Calibre stands for, and he returned the favor by trying to kill me.

0802180211012785-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: A great cataclysm approaches. Arazaad could not see it. I helped save you in a desperate effort to stop it.

0802180211012786-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you continue to cling to your ignorance, not just Terrun Calibre, but all of Maple World will be destroyed.

0802180211012787-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The dark crystal was just the beginning... The true threat to this world has yet to awaken.

0802180211012788-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I tell you all of this not as your supposed enemy, but as a fellow bladesman you once held in the highest of esteem. I hope for the world's sake you can see that.

0803163211012903-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I... have to think. The next time we meet, I can't say whether it will be as friend or foe.

0803163211012904-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: But for the time being, I want you to leave. Your presence here is a disruption.

0802180211012792-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You're really going to let him just leave? After everything?

0802180211012791-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... I know that all this may be difficult to understand.

0802180211012793-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I hope that what $npcName:11004115[gender:0]$ said isn't true. But if he's right...

0802180211012795-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There's so much I want to tell you about what I witnessed within that other place... visions of what might be. But my memory is fragmented and out of order.

0802180211012796-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's too soon to jump to conclusions—but if the empress really does turn into that...

0802180211012798-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Forget it. And thank you again, for everything.

0802180211012789-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My old friend... I hope the next time we meet, it will be not to cross blades, but to aim them at a common foe.

0803165211012913-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You should leave, before the rest of Terrun Calibre learns you're here.

0802180211012790-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hmph. As for you... $MyPCName$, was it? I suspect we'll meet again.

0802180211012801-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The dark crystal was forged with darkness. The visions I witnessed inside may have been no more than a trick. I cannot trust them so readily.

0802180211012802-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Fool! Can you still not see?

0802180211012803-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I tried to stop Arazaad from destroying everything Terrun Calibre stands for, and he returned the favor by trying to kill me.

0802180211012804-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: A great cataclysm approaches. Arazaad could not see it. I helped save you in a desperate effort to stop it.

0802180211012805-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you continue to cling to your ignorance, not just Terrun Calibre, but all of Maple World will be destroyed.

0802180211012806-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The dark crystal was just the beginning... The true threat to this world has yet to awaken.

0802180211012807-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I tell you all of this not as your supposed enemy, but as a fellow bladesman you once held in the highest of esteem. I hope for the world's sake you can see that.

0803163211012907-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I... have to think. The next time we meet, I can't say whether it will be as friend or foe.

0803163211012908-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: But for the time being, I want you to leave. Your presence here is a disruption.

0802180211012811-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Master... Are you really going to let him just leave?

0802180211012810-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$... I know that all this may be difficult to understand.

0802180211012814-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Do you really believe Arazaad could have betrayed us?

0802180211012812-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: And what's all this about an impending cataclysm?

0802180211012813-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I hope that what $npcName:11004115[gender:0]$ said isn't true. But if he's right...

0802180211012815-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, there's so much I want to tell you about what I witnessed within that other place... visions of what might be. But my memory is fragmented and out of order.

0802180211012816-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's too soon to jump to conclusions—but if the empress really does turn into that...

0802180211012817-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: ...I will have no choice but to cut her down myself.

0802180211012819-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Forget it. You and I will see that it never comes to that.

0802180211012808-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: My old friend... I hope the next time we meet, it will be not to cross blades, but to aim them at a common foe.

0803165211012912-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You should leave, before the rest of Terrun Calibre learns you're here.

0802180211012809-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: As for you... $MyPCName$, was it? We'll be seeing each other again.

0802180211012823-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Welcome, my other half. We've all been waiting for you.

0802180211012824-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Now that everyone is here, let's begin. $npcName:11004107[gender:0]$?

0802180211012826-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ahem. Fellow members of the Frontier Foundation.

0802180211012827-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: We began our journey here with a mission to research and regulate a powerful new phenomenon of our world known as the lapenshards.

0802180211012828-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Though we were waylaid from that mission by numerous threats to the world—such as the weather anomalies in El Nath and the high seas, the discovery of Madrakan, and the disappearance of our friends after the dark crystal's explosion...

0802180211012829-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Never did we buckle under the pressure. In the end, we saved the world from utter devastation, and rescued our friends.

0802180211012830-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: None of this would have been possible without the help of everyone here.

0802180211012831-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I, Beatrice di Alemani, first of my name, director the Frontier Foundation, am pleased to declare the threat of the blackshards ended.

0802180211012832-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Henceforth, the Frontier Foundation will redirect its efforts once more toward the research, acquisition, and regulation of the lapenshards, for the good of the world.

0802180211012833-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I want to extend my sincere gratitude to each of you for your part in our work thus far.

0802180211012834-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: This concludes our investigation into the lapenshard anomalies.

0802180211012835-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: This concludes our investigation into the lapenshard anomalies.

0802180211012836-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's $MyPCName$, right? Working with you was actually pretty fun, I'm surprised to say. As for what comes next, I plan to remain here and continue my research on the lapenshards.

0802180211012837-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: After all, there's nowhere more rich in the stuff than here!

0802180211012838-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'd like to devise a means of teleporting using the power of the lapenshards in place of mana, for our mutual friend who hasn't quite managed to master the art.

0802180211012839-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She glances around and then leans in to whisper.)</font>
<font size='20'>And this is top-secret, but we actually have a sample blackshard here. Who knows what kind of amazing spells I'll develop by studying it?</font>

0802180211012840-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What?! I thought the blackshards were all gone?

0802180211012841-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hahaha. Do you really place such faith in the silver tongue of nobility? You're a naïve one, aren't you?

0802180211012842-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: And just what are you two mumbling about over there?

0802180211012843-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ahh! Nothing! Anyway, I was just leaving. Out of my way, gramps. See you later, $MyPCName$!
