0802180211012844-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ahem. In any case, I would like to extend my deepest gratitude on behalf of the lady Beatrice.

0802180211012846-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Should you ever require the assistance of the Frontier Foundation, please do not hesitate to call. Until next we meet, take care of yourself.

0802180211012847-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I am in your debt. It seems the world is not quite ready to coexist alongside the lapenshards.

0802180211012848-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: For now the others and I will return to $map:52000169$ to prepare for what's to come.

0802180211012849-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Your heroism has moved us—and shown us that we still have training to do.

0802180211012851-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I guess you're not such a rookie after all. Thanks for what you did for us.

0802180211012852-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thank you very much for saving us. It's reassuring to know that even in our absence, there are those who would defend this world.

0802180211012853-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thanks for everything. Tinchai and I will return to Halo Mountain to work on restoring Guidance to its former glory.

0802180211012854-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$! Wherever you go next, I'll be cheering you on!

0802180211012855-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I have work to get back to with the Green Hoods myself. Take care of yourself.

0802180211012856-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I too have strayed too long from the Empress's side. I will return to Tria and carry out my duty.

0802180211012857-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Impressive work out there. We'll be watching you.

0802180211012859-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Even if your mission has ended, you and I have made a pact.

0802180211012860-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I hope you'll come and visit me often. I'll be waiting.

0802180211012861-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Whenever you need me just call and I'll find my way back here.

0802180211012863-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: It's $MyPCName$, right? Working with you was actually pretty fun, I'm surprised to say. As for what comes next, I plan to remain here and continue my research on the lapenshards.

0802180211012864-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: After all, there's nowhere more rich in the stuff than here!

0802180211012865-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'd like to devise a means of teleporting using the power of the lapenshards in place of mana, for our mutual friend who hasn't quite managed to master the art.

0802180211012866-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She glances around and then leans in to whisper.)</font>
<font size='20'>And this is top-secret, but we actually have a sample blackshard here. Who knows what kind of amazing spells I'll develop by studying it?</font>

0802180211012867-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What?! I thought the blackshards were all gone?

0802180211012868-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hahaha. Do you really place such faith in the silver tongue of nobility? You're a naïve one, aren't you?

0802180211012869-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: And just what are you two mumbling about over there?

0802180211012870-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ahh! Nothing! Anyway, I was just leaving. Out of my way, gramps. See you later, $MyPCName$!

0802180211012871-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Ahem. In any case, I would like to extend my deepest gratitude on behalf of the lady Beatrice.

0802180211012873-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Should you ever require the assistance of the Frontier Foundation, please do not hesitate to call. Until next we meet, take care of yourself.

0802180211012874-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$, I am in your debt. It seems the world is not quite ready to coexist alongside the lapenshards.

0802180211012875-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: For now the others and I will return to $map:52000169$ to prepare for what's to come.

0802180211012876-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: You've come a long way, $MyPCName$. I'm extremely proud of all you've accomplished, and how you've grown.

0802180211012877-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thank you for all you've done on our behalf.

0802180211012878-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I guess you're not such a rookie after all. Thanks for what you did for us.

0802180211012879-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thank you very much for saving us. It's reassuring to know that even in our absence, there are those who would defend this world.

0802180211012880-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Thanks for everything. Tinchai and I will return to Halo Mountain to work on restoring Guidance to its former glory.

0802180211012881-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: $MyPCName$! Wherever you go next, I'll be cheering you on!

0802180211012882-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I have work to get back to with the Green Hoods myself. Take care of yourself.

0802180211012883-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I too have strayed too long from the Empress's side. I will return to Tria and carry out my duty.

0802180211012884-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Impressive work out there. We'll be watching you.

0802180211012886-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Even if your mission has ended, you and I have made a pact.

0802180211012887-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I hope you'll come and visit me often. I'll be waiting.

0802180211012888-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Whenever you need me just call and I'll find my way back here.

1120154911013072-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, your presence is required at $map:52020037$ immediately.

1206160611013327-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Good. I cannot overstate the urgency of this matter. I hope to lay eyes on you soon.

1120154911013074-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Thank you for joining us, $MyPCName$. We have gathered to discuss an unusual and urgent matter, the appearance of an unidentified continent in the skies of Maple World.

1204172811013311-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, please bring everyone up to speed.

1120154411013003-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Right! The object first appeared on Sky Fortress's active radar at 9:12 AM Tria time. After entering Maple World's atmosphere, it descended into the troposphere where it appears to be holding altitude.

1121171511013076-Kritias_Epic01-.name: So far there's been no signs of activity on the floating continent. If anyone lives there, their motives are a mystery. However...

1121171511013078-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Sky Fortress's equipment has detected the presence of lapenshards on the continent.

1121171511013079-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Is such a thing possible?! I presumed the lapenshards were unique to Maple World. How did they appear on a continent of unknown provenance?

1121171511013080-Kritias_Epic01-.name: By all accounts, the dark crystal's recent energy pulse was so powerful it pierced through the very heavens—a blast which immediately preceded the appearance of the floating continent.

1121171511013081-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Are you saying that it was the dark crystal explosion that brought the continent here?

1121171511013082-Kritias_Epic01-.name: More likely that than a coincidence. After all, the crystal was notably composed of lapenshards.

1121171511013083-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Your highness, I advise sending an investigatory expedition to the unidentified continent immediately. So far, they have shown no visible signs of hostility, but Maple World must be prepared to mount a defense.

1121171511013084-Kritias_Epic01-.name: ...Very well. We do not yet know whether this new continent will prove a threat or a boon to Maple World. Furthermore, if it was affected by the dark crystal, then it is our responsibility to address the fallout.

1121171511013085-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, will you help lead the investigation? Your experience would be of great aid.

1121183411013095-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I hereby order the Sky Fortress and its crew to depart for the unknown continent. While I leave the particulars of the operation to you, I ask that you establish a base of operations to serve as an alliance foothold there.

1121171911013090-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Thank you all for volunteering for this mission. Though the journey may prove dangerous, I will pray for your safe return.

1120154411013005-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Your radio crackles and chimes.)</font>
Sky Fortress to $MyPCName$, come in $MyPCName$. Requesting status update, over.

1122150811013097-Kritias_Epic01-.name: My pod had a bit of a rocky landing, but I'm in one piece.

1122150811013098-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Have you identified the source of the attack?

1122150811013099-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Don't be ridiculous, $male:he,female:she$ only just landed! More importantly, are you okay pumpkin? What's the situation on the ground?

1122150811013100-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If it were me, I would have simply connected the dropship to the Sky Fortress computer and compared the projectile's trajectory against topological data gleaned by the craft's sensors during its descent.

1122150811013101-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, don't listen to him. All that matters is you landed safely. Still, our number one priority is figuring out who attacked us and why.

1205155811013321-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We have to figure out what we're up against, for the safety of Maple World.

1130150011013309-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm detecting a heat signature consistent with a humanoid lifeform 11 meters from your position. Assuming they're friendly, maybe they can shed some light on the situation?

1122150811013102-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We've identified an ideal site to establish a base. Sky Fortress should be arriving in about two hours. Once construction is complete, we will begin scouting the surrounding area.

1204172811013312-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm sending you the coordinates of our landing site. Proceed there once you have completed your mission.

1120154411013008-Kritias_Epic01-.name: What the heck are you wearing?

1120154411013009-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Is that really what's in fashion in Tairen these days? I guess a lot can change in seven years.

1122173211013105-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Wait, you're not an exile? Then where're you from? Scratch that. I don't really care, so long as you can be of use.

1122173211013106-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The aircraft I came here on was targeted by some kind of missile. Do you know who attacked us?

1122173211013107-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You must be talking about those guys who set up shop here a few days ago. Been tearing through Kidel on a mission to find something. You can tell just by looking they're not from around here. I can tell you what I know, but there's something I need from you first.

1122173211013109-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Sometimes even combat vets like me find themselves in a bit of a snafu. In my case, my gun's gone dry. Totally out of aetherine. Meanwhile I'm surrounded by a forest full of man-eating beasts.

1122173211013110-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I can't say I blame the critters. We did set up camp on their land. But seeing as I want to make it back to $map:02020030$ in one piece, I could use an assist. See those bugs there? They've got some grade-A aetherine growing right out of their spines.

1120154411013010-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You harvest some for me, and I can use it to charge up my rifle. After that, the trek back to $map:02020030$ will be a cakewalk. I may have left the service, but I'm still a sharpshooter.

1120154411013011-Kritias_Epic01-.name: That was some fine work there, $male:son,female:miss$. Clean, efficient kills. I was fairly certain those $npcNamePlural:25020003$ would be gnawing on your eyeballs right about now.

1122190011013118-Kritias_Epic01-.name: There's more than enough aetherine here to get my rifle charged up. I should be able to make it to $map:02020030$ without a hitch, thanks to you. Well a deal's a deal. What was it you wanted to know?

1120154411013012-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I want to know about the missiles that were fired on my ship. Who tried to shoot us down?

1122173211013111-Kritias_Epic01-.name: These strangers came to Kidel not long ago. Like you, they're outlanders. Word is they've built themselves a sizable base northeast of here. I don't know what they're after, but they've become quite the menace.

1122173211013112-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Whatever it is they're after, they're willing to kill for it. Nobody who's had the misfortune of running into them ever seems to come back alive. They have a camp on the hill north of here.

1122173211013113-Kritias_Epic01-.name: As for your missile, I did see one fire off from somewhere northwest of here. Good odds that's who tried to blow you out of the sky.

1122173211013114-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Then it looks like I know where I'm headed. Thanks for the information.

1122173211013115-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I wouldn't go that way if you're not looking to die. The road there is filled with mechanical soldiers who are none too friendly.

1205162111013322-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Woodland critters are one thing—bloodthirsty or otherwise—but those machines will cut you in two without a moment's hesitation.

1122173211013116-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I appreciate the concern, but I'm not afraid of a bunch of robots. I've got a mission to complete.

1122173211013117-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Well, if you really want to die, that's your prerogative. I'm not going to stand in your way. Good luck, stranger.

1205163011013323-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Before I go, can you tell me any more about those mechanical soldiers?

1205163011013324-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You know as much as I do. If I wanted to know more I'd have to go up to them, and I'm not quite dumb enough for that.

1120154411013013-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Oh, and one more thing. That missile of yours was destroyed by something here on land. I don't know what exactly shot it down, but it made quite the explosion.

1120154411013015-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Are you the one who took out all these soldiers?

1122191311013120-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Do you know what destroyed the missile they fired at our ship?

1122191311013121-Kritias_Epic01-.name: ...Soldiers? Missile? I don't understand. What is this place? Ungh. I'm so hungry... I feel like I'm going to faint.

1122191311013122-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Stay here, I'll find you something to eat.

1120154411013016-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I don't want to be here alone. Please hurry back.

1120154411013017-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Is that fruit? It looks good! Thanks.

1122193211013127-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You pick up your radio and push the talk button).</font>
$MyPCName$ to Sky Fortress. I have an update on the operation. Please respond.

1122191311013123-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(There is a brief silence, then your radio crackles to life.)</font>
Sky Fortress here. I trust you have by now identified our mysterious assailants?

1129162011013273-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We were attacked by Dark Army soldiers. They appear to have set up a number of surface-to-air missile launchers in advance of our arrival.

1122191311013124-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Dark Army soldiers?! What are they doing here?

1122191311013125-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The better question is how they knew we were coming. If they went as far as setting up anti-aircraft weaponry, they must have been intent on keeping us out.

1122191311013126-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, thank you for delivering this new information.

1204172811013313-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I have a new assignment for you. I want you to determine why the Dark Army has come to this land. That will be all for now. Over and out.

1120154411013020-Kritias_Epic01-.name: D-don't come any closer! I'll blow your head clean off! This gun is fully charged!

1123150711013129-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Calm down!? You do what you did, and then you tell me to calm down? You are one of them, aren't you?

1120154411013021-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The ones who captured my brothers-in-arms were outlanders just like you. Get out of my sight! Any funny business and I'll take you out!

1123150711013130-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
Have it your way.
<font color="#909090">(You turn and begin to walk away.)</font>

1123150711013131-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hey, w-where do you think you're going?!

1123150711013132-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You just said... Make up your mind!

1123150711013133-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm sorry... It's hard to know who to trust. Those outlanders took my friends. The three of us barely made it out alive.

1123150711013135-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hostiles in dark cloaks. Their little inquisition has been terrorizing the area. We came across their ship's landing site out on patrol, and they ambushed our squad.

1123150711013136-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We made it out, but the rest of our squad was taken captive. I brought these two here to recover and pursued the aggressors on foot. But after what I witnessed, I turned tail and ran.

1120154411013023-Kritias_Epic01-.name: They had corralled my squad into this clearing, and then they just... sat there. They were waiting for something.

1123150711013138-Kritias_Epic01-.name: It was like... some kind of demon...

1120154411013024-Kritias_Epic01-.name: ...And then I ran for my life. Listen, my friends are in no shape to move and they're in need of immediate medical attention. I could do something about their injuries if I had some of the medicinal herbs that grow in aetherine-infused soil.

1123170111013139-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Please, will you gather the herbs for me? I don't want to leave their side.

1123170111013140-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Your radio crackles.)</font>
Sky Fortress to $MyPCName$. Requesting progress update.

1123170111013142-Kritias_Epic01-.name: A cloaked figure with large horns...? He must have meant $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$. And he said $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ was looking for a specific woman? Did the Dark Army really come here just to find a single person?!

1123170111013143-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Huh. I guess even hideous, murderous wraiths get lonely.

1123170111013144-Kritias_Epic01-.name: This is no time for jokes! We've got to identify this woman and find out why the forces of darkness are after her.

1123170111013145-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hmm. I wonder if this could be related to the woman you encountered earlier? $MyPCName$, see what you can find out about this person the Dark Army is after, and whatever it is they are plotting.

1123170111013146-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm on it. After I help $npcName:11004393$ tend to his wounded friends, I'll resume my investigation. $MyPCName$ out.

1120154411013025-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Please hurry. The plant has a very distinctive appearance. It should be easy to pick it out from the forest's foliage.

1120154411013026-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Thank you for this. With these herbs I should be able to get them well enough to travel to a proper medical facility.

1120154411013027-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm sorry I misjudged you. I suppose not all of you outlanders are the same. Is there any way I can thank you for what you've done?

1123170111013147-Kritias_Epic01-.name: This woman the Dark Army is after—do you know anything about her?

1123170111013148-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Sorry... I'm just a pathfinder. That sort of intel is above my pay grade.

1123170111013149-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hmm. Well, maybe you can tell me this: if your organization came across a wounded "exile," where would they take them?

1123170111013150-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Now that I can answer. Our base of operations is a little town called $map:02020030$. I'm surprised you didn't know that.

1123170111013151-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I don't really know anything about this land.

1123170111013152-Kritias_Epic01-.name: So you're not just an outlander... You're not even from Kritias! And yet you still helped us... Well, I suppose I can fill you in on some of the details. I'm a member of Humanitas. We're a group of freedom fighters formed to oppose the tyranny of Tairen.

1123170111013153-Kritias_Epic01-.name: What can you tell me about Tairen?

1123170111013154-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Tairen is the greatest society in all of Kritias. It's where I was born, and the homeland of every member of Humanitas. And now they consider us enemies of the state...

1123170111013155-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Why is it that you're at odds with this Tairen?

1123170111013156-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The kingdom is under the control of an artificial lifeform called $npcName:11004432$ whose vision of utopia carries an unacceptable cost. We fled Tairen to be free of her control and built a new home here in the wilderness—$map:02020030$.

1123170111013157-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11004432$ sent her mechanical soldiers to destroy $map:02020030$, but together we persevered. Despite her attacks, we've managed to survive out here for more than seven years.

1123170111013158-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Now I need to see to my comrades. If I were you I'd make my way to $map:02020030$. Between my superiors and the townspeople, someone should have the answers you're looking for. Good luck, outlander.

1120154411013028-Kritias_Epic01-.name: There's a bridge northwest of our position that will take you straight to $map:02020030$. You can't miss it.

1120154411013029-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You must be the outlander our soldiers encountered at the missile site.

1204172811013315-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Our intelligence network is nothing if not impressive. Plus, you can't expect soldiers not to chat about encountering someone from a distant land.

1120154411013030-Kritias_Epic01-.name: So, what business does an outlander have in $map:02020030$?

1123180411013159-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm here investigating what the Dark Army is doing in your land.

1123180411013160-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hmm? You must mean the Daemon Army. Those cloaked monsters have been steadily encroaching on our territory, and now they're close enough to threaten $map:02020030$. Of course from our perspective, you're just as much a threat as they are.

1123180411013161-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If you want to take them on, have at it. We won't stop you. But if you harm our people, we will loose the full power of our forces and obliterate you. If we weren't dealing with the constant threat of siege by those blasted mechanical soldiers, there's no way we'd let you outlanders run wild in our territory.

1123180411013162-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You may not realize this, but your continent recently appeared in the skies of our world out of nowhere. The Maple Alliance isn't here to meddle in your affairs, we're here to determine whether you're a threat to us.

1123180411013163-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Maple Alliance...? Is that what you call your faction? And the ones who've been attacking our troops are the "Dark Army?" Hmph. Our name for them is catchier.

1123180411013164-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I don't know what the Dark, err... "Daemon Army" has planned for your land, but if left alone they're a threat to both your people and mine.

1123180411013165-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Your story seems reasonable enough, and the soldiers you encountered spoke well of you... $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$, our leader, has an office just up those steps. I can arrange a meeting for you, if you're interested.

1123180411013167-Kritias_Epic01-.name: However—just because your story sounds reasonable doesn't mean it's true. How am I to know you're not a spy or an assassin sent by the Daemon Army?

1123180411013168-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The Daemon soldiers attacking our town represent a clear and present danger. Getting some of their blood on your hands would go a long way toward building good will with $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$. In any case, I'll let her know to expect you.

1120154411013031-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If you want to gain $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s trust, you can start by dealing with some of the Dark Army soldiers on our doorstep.

1120154411013032-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I wondered when you'd make your way here. Our scouts have kept me apprised of your activities in our land.

1204172811013316-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Including your little brawl with the Daemon Army. So tell me, what brings an outlander into our territory?

1120154411013033-Kritias_Epic01-.name: My name is $MyPCName$. I represent a coalition known as the Maple Alliance which is responsible for the defense of my world. A few days ago your continent appeared in our skies, so we arranged an expedition to figure out what you're doing here.

1127144911013169-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I assure you it wasn't our intent to appear in your skies. Kritias was sealed away by an unknown power a very long time ago. To us it felt like total darkness—a dreamless sleep that never ended. I don't know how long we spent in that state.

1127144911013170-Kritias_Epic01-.name: And then the seal was suddenly released, and we found ourselves here in the skies of your world. Those you call the Dark Army landed soon after. They have been rampaging throughout the Kidel region, and now they threaten us here in $map:02020030$.

1127144911013171-Kritias_Epic01-.name: It takes all of our strength to keep the mechanical soldiers of Tairen at bay, and yet now we find ourselves waging a war on two fronts—thanks to the Daemon Army.

1127144911013172-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The "Daemon Army" is looking for someone here in Kritias. Maybe even your friend there. We don't know why, but whatever their reason it can't be good. They are a serious threat to Kritias.

1127180311013192-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Perhaps. But you don't really care about that, do you? You care that they're a threat to you. Our data analysts have accessed your historical archives. We know that your Alliance and the Daemon Army are at war.

1127144911013173-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But why have you brought that battle to our domain? We refuse to be a proxy to your war! Tell the captain of your vessel they have ten days to withdraw or they will be fired upon!

1127144911013174-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npc:11004395$, please stop shouting! This $male:man,female:woman$ is a good person. $male:He,female:She$ brought me food when I was hungry.

1127144911013176-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I was not shouting, I was merely making myself perfectly clear!

1127144911013177-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I met this woman in the forest in the middle of a destroyed Daemon Army camp. What is she doing in your office?

1127144911013178-Kritias_Epic01-.name: This conversation is ended! If you require it, my adjutant $npcName:11004396[gender:0]$ will arrange your transportation back to your vessel.

1120154411013034-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I expect the way back to your ship will be perilous, thanks to the Daemon soldiers scattered throughout the region...

1120154411013036-Kritias_Epic01-.name: My little brother $npcName:11004393[gender:0]$ says that two of his squadmates are alive and on the road to recovery, thanks to your actions. For that you have my thanks.

1127144911013179-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm given to understand you had a meeting with $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$. I'd wager from the look on your face it didn't go very well. I apologize if she said anything untoward. She's got a lot on her plate. Tairen has stepped up their attacks as of late, and now we're under siege by the Daemon Army.

1127144911013180-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Your brother told me a little about your conflict with the Tairen, but I didn't get the whole story. Why is it they keep attacking you?

1127144911013181-Kritias_Epic01-.name: It's because we revolted against the artificial lifeform who controls the entirety of Tairen, $npcName:11004432$. We formed Humanitas in order to take it back from her. Personally, I take it as a compliment she thinks we're enough of a threat to warrant killing.

1127144911013182-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Our numbers may be small, but we're confident the citizens of Tairen will join us as they come to see our cause is true.

1127144911013183-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I get all that, but why did you revolt, and why didn't the rest of the kingdom join you?

1127144911013184-Kritias_Epic01-.name: To answer your second question, many of the kingdom's denizens believe it has become a utopia under $npcName:11004432$'s reign. $npcName:11004432$ takes care of everything, from manufacturing and construction to agriculture, governance, and even population control. She analyzes everything to determine an "optimal" outcome, and acts.

1127144911013185-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The people of Tairen live lives of abundance, free from worry. You see, $npcName:11004432$ was created to optimize our society, and initially, it seemed she was an amazing success...

1127144911013186-Kritias_Epic01-.name: So then what was the problem? How did all this lead to a revolt?

1127144911013187-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Well you see, $npcName:11004432$ decided that truly optimizing society required people to give up their free will. Her "utopia" required precision and predictability, two traits people generally lack. So she decided anyone who didn't fit her mold or who broke the rules would be exiled. We decided we wouldn't stand for that.

1127144911013188-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(A device on the Adjutant's armor gives off a series of electronic purrs, and then a voice issues forth.)</font>
Southwatch to $map:02020030$, do you read? Our position is being overrun. Requesting immediate backup!

1127144911013189-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Southwatch, this is $map:02020030$. Alpha Squad is out on patrol, and taking any soldiers off the wall would compromise our primary defenses. Reinforcements from $map:02020033$ are at least two hours out. How long can you hold out?

1127144911013190-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We've got wounded here, $map:02020030$. I'd say one hour, at the very most.

1127144911013191-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Let me go. I can help them.

1120154411013037-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You'd do that? For us? You have my profound gratitude. Southwatch is our first line of defense against the Daemon Army. We can't afford to lose it.

1120154411013038-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Because of you Southwatch is still standing, and most of my men are alive. I don't know how to thank you, outlander.

1120154411013039-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Southwatch is $map:02020030$'s southernmost lookout. From here we can observe the enemy's approach, and crush them with a two-pronged attack.

1127180311013193-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Losing this post would be a crippling blow and would endanger $map:02020030$'s survival.

1127180311013194-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm glad I could be of help. If there's nothing else, I'll be returning to $map:02020030$.

1127180311013195-Kritias_Epic01-.name: There is one more thing we could use your help with. One of our soldiers got cut off from our position during the fighting. If he's alive, please escort him to $map:02020030$ to receive medical attention.

1127180311013196-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But... should the worst have transpired, I'd like you to retrieve the identification tag from around his neck and deliver it to $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$.

1127180311013198-Kritias_Epic01-.name: That's not my story to tell. Anyways, thanks again. Be careful out there.

1120154411013040-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Keep your eyes peeled for a Daemon Army ambush.

1120154411013041-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I believe I instructed you in no uncertain terms to return to your ship. What are you doing back here?!

1120154411013042-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I retrieved this from the body of a soldier. I was asked to bring it to you.

1127180311013199-Kritias_Epic01-.name: ...This young man was the first exile I rescued after I founded Humanitas. Did he suffer?

1127180311013200-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm afraid I can't say. He was already dead when I found him.

1127180311013201-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I see. Well, thank you for bringing this to me. My adjutant says you risked your own life to assist our soldiers at the southern watch post. I would like to know why.

1127180311013202-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Because it was the right thing to do.

1206161711013329-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Which I'm guessing is the same reason you're looking after that exile. I know you're skeptical, but our two peoples have more in common than you think.

1127180311013203-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Yes, there are things we have in common. More than you could have imagined. For instance, this exile is the child of $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$—a man your people revere as a sage.

1127180311013204-Kritias_Epic01-.name: What? How could you know that?

1127180311013205-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Because I was $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$'s lover. I am one of the Hallowed—the noble houses of Kritias. We possess the unique talent of sensing one's bloodline through the aetherine flowing in their veins. $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$ and she are kin.

1127180311013206-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But the sages lived hundreds of years ago!

1127180311013207-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Kritias was sealed away for what might have been centuries. What for you is ancient history, was for us a matter of years.

1127180311013208-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Not long after $npcName:11004432$ began exiling those she deemed useless to society, I founded Humanitas. But $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$... He took a different path. He refused to stand by and watch the people of Tairen turn their weapons against each other. So he left our world, and found his way to yours.

1127180311013209-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$ was the greatest magician in the Royal Office of Arcana. If he had only joined Humanitas, we would be on much more even footing in our struggle against Tairen. To your ancestors, his power must have seemed godlike. It's no wonder they considered him a sage.

1127180311013210-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I did once read that the sage $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$ had a daughter named $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$... But that's the only thing anyone ever wrote about her.

1127180311013211-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$?! Are you sure? After we awakened from the long darkness, our analysts hacked into the Royal Office of Arcana's archives to understand what had happened. We found communications speculating that an entity called $npcName:11004432$ was responsible for sealing Kritias away.

1127180311013212-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine that "$npcName:11004400[gender:1]$" was a person, let alone the woman standing in my office!

1120154411013045-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If the Daemon Army gets their hands on the power $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ used to seal Kritias, neither of our peoples will be safe.

1127180311013213-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I can't allow that to happen.

1127180311013214-Kritias_Epic01-.name: And I can't allow that horned brute to harm $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$'s child. Thankfully, I had the foresight to order a tracker placed on $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ when she arrived in our care—in case she, like her father, decided to stray.

1127180311013215-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She fiddles with a strange device for a few moments, then scowls.)</font>
I can't get a signal. Our signal repeater must've been damaged by the Daemon Army. Getting the parts necessary to replace it will take far too long! Unless...

1127180311013216-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We might be able to repair the repeater, but we'll need parts from the Tairens' mechanical soldiers.

1127180311013217-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm good at breaking things, just point me at them.

1127180311013218-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Excellent. Inside the MK-II's control module, you'll find a spherical, pronged device. That's what we're after. You'll need to pry it gently from its socket and bring it to $npc:11004386$.

1127180311013219-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You pick up your radio and push the talk button).</font>
$MyPCName$ to Sky Fortress. Come in Sky Fortress.

1127180311013220-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Your radio crackles.)</font>
This is Sky Fortress. Have you identified the woman $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ is searching for, or what his aims are?

1127180311013221-Kritias_Epic01-.name: <font color="#909090">(You fill the crew in on everything you've learned.)</font>

1127180311013222-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You're telling me $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ has captured the person responsible for sealing Kritias?! That sort of power in the hands of the forces of darkness represents an existential threat to the Maple Alliance. We must initiate a rescue plan at once!

1127180311013223-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Before $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ was captured, $npcName:11004395$'s people placed a tracker on her. We just need to repair the signal repeater. With any luck, we should be able to find her.

1127180311013224-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Begin at once. We will provide any support necessary.

1127180311013225-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I suggest positioning Sky Fortress over $map:02020030$. Wherever they've taken her, we should be ready to mobilize as soon as we determine $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$'s location.

1127180311013226-Kritias_Epic01-.name: This takes precedence over our current endeavor. We should depart at once!

1206162111013330-Kritias_Epic01-.name: According to our on-board AI, Cat Sith, factoring in the time it will take to unload our cargo, get the crew back aboard, and begin launch preparations...

1206162111013331-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We should be ready to depart in approximately one hour and 17 minutes, give or take a minute.

1127180311013227-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, we will set a course for $map:02020030$ as soon as we're able. Until then, you are to do everything in your power to locate and rescue $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$. Everything hangs in the balance. Sky Fortress out.

1120154411013046-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Ready to go get that part? Tairen's mechanized soldiers won't go down without a fight. Be careful.

1120154411013047-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ brought me up to speed on your plan. Did you get the part we need to repair the repeater?

1120154411013048-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I pulled this out of the guts of one of those mechanical soldiers. This is the thingy you needed, right?

1128135311013228-Kritias_Epic01-.name: An ESR-193 shortwave amplifier... That's the part! Thank you. As soon as one of our squads is back from patrol, I'll task them with repairing the signal repeater.

1128135311013229-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We don't have the time to wait around for that. Can't you just talk me through the repair?

1128135311013230-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If you're offering to handle the repair, that would be great. I'm not familiar with the specifics of the device, but I have a technical manual here you can borrow.

1128135311013231-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Before you go, I was wondering about something. $npcName:11004387$ said you told him the Daemon Army tried to blow your ship out of the sky when you first arrived, but that the missile exploded on its own.

1128135311013232-Kritias_Epic01-.name: It wasn't intercepted by our people, which begs the question—who destroyed it? The odds it was a malfunction are incredibly low. I worry there may be yet another faction at play.

1207194211013333-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'd better get to repairing the repeater. The clock's ticking.

1120154411013049-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The tracking device we slipped onto $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ is useless until we repair the signal repeater. That area's crawling with Daemon soldiers, so watch yourself.

1120154411013050-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, you've returned. I take it the repeater is back online? Let's see...

1120154411013051-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She powers on her device and presses some buttons.)</font>
I've got a fix on her signal! It's coming from... $map:02020031$?! That's the site of one of Tairen's ore extractors...

1128135311013234-Kritias_Epic01-.name: What possible reason could they have for taking $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ there? I don't understand... Could it be that the Daemon Army and Tairen are working together?

1128135311013236-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Good. $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ is at the heart of many questions I'd like to see answered—such as how she lost her memory. In any case, we have agents in $map:02020031$ who can assist you.

1128135311013237-Kritias_Epic01-.name: They were deployed to track Tairen's resource shipments, so there's a good chance they saw the Daemon Army passing through. I'll draft a new order to assist you by any means necessary.

1128135311013238-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm placing my trust in you... Don't make me regret it. If you cannot rescue $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ on your own, report back with any tactical information you can glean. I'll order our forces at $map:02020033$ to prepare for an imminent operation.

1120154411013052-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Locate our agents in $map:02020031$. They must have seen something. The safety of both our peoples is in your hands.

1120154411013053-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hold it, stranger! Don't take another step! What've you got in your hands there?

1120154411013054-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He snatches $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s orders from you and looks them over.)</font>
These came straight from $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$! She says I'm to assist you in any way possible.

1128175411013239-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm tracking a woman named $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ who was captured by the Daemon Army. I have reason to believe they brought her here to $map:02020031$.

1128175411013240-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Yes, the Daemon Army came through here, and I did see a woman with them. There was also a horned... thing. It took over $map:02020031$ in the blink of an eye. Literally!

1128175411013241-Kritias_Epic01-.name: That must be $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$. What do you mean he "took over $map:02020031$"? Just how large are his forces?!

1128175411013242-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I don't know how big they were before, but they're bigger now! That horned thing floated straight up to Tairen's mechanized soldiers, and then these beams of blue light shot out from under his hood, where his eyes ought to be. And just like that, every Tairen soldier in sight fell under his control.

1128175411013243-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But that's not all. The soldiers... their appearance changed too. They turned dark... I don't know if that horned thing was using magic or advanced technology, but I've never seen anything like it!

1128175411013245-Kritias_Epic01-.name: They took her inside the old fusion reactor to the northeast, but... You're not going to have an easy time getting past all those metal soldiers.

1128175411013246-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm sure I'll figure something out.

1128175411013247-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We have another agent stationed inside the fusion reactor. I'll radio ahead to let him know you're coming. Good luck.

1120154411013055-Kritias_Epic01-.name: How did this $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ guy take control of all those Tairen soldiers?

1120154411013057-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11004398[gender:0]$ brought me up to speed on that woman you're looking for.

1128175411013248-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Did you see where $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ took her?

1128175411013249-Kritias_Epic01-.name: They barreled through here and into the reactor. Then all of the sudden, the whole facility went on lockdown. The blast doors all slammed shut. And good luck getting through those things. We're talking three layers of Zybithium-composite meant to contain the force of an exploding fusion reactor.

1128175411013250-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Near as I can tell, there's not a single problem with the reactor though. These guys must have triggered the lockdown manually.

1128175411013251-Kritias_Epic01-.name: They're trying to make sure no one gets in...

1207194311013334-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Stand back, I'll try and open the door.

1128175411013252-Kritias_Epic01-.name: It's useless. I already tried the manual override. Even hooked up a hacking tool and tried to pop it digitally, but I couldn't get a response. I think they destroyed the microcomputer in charge of raising and lowering the door.

1128175411013253-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The only way you're getting that door open is to blow it up, or the aetherine spire on top of the facility... According to the reactor's emergency manual, the blast doors are all hooked up to a manual release that triggers when the plant's aetherine supply is cut off.

1205164111013325-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Problem is, there isn't a weapon in our arsenal that'll blow that door, and the spire's built from pretty much the same stuff.

1120154411013058-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Sorry, but I don't see that door opening until the people inside want it to.

1212174711013336-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'll head back to $map:02020030$ and figure something out.

1120154411013059-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, you're back. I don't see $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ with you...

1120154411013060-Kritias_Epic01-.name: What?! The reactor's on lockdown? Giving up on $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ is not an option. We'll just have to blast our way in!

1128175411013254-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Woah now, let's not get hasty!

1128175411013255-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Our aircraft are equipped with bunker-busting bombs that should certainly be able to pierce the facility's walls.

1128175411013256-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm no physicist, but sounds like the sort of thing that might cause the reactor to explode in a monumental ball of flame. I'm not a huge fan of the "everybody dies" scenario.

1128175411013257-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Well, we have landcruisers at $map:02020033$ equipped with aetherine railguns we could use to deliver a more precise blast to cut our way inside the facility.

1128175411013258-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I take it from the name those vehicles travel by land... I'm afraid they just wouldn't make it in time.

1128175411013259-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Well then what do you propose?! We cannot allow $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$'s power to fall into the hands of our enemies!

1128175411013260-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
One of your agents said something about taking out the reactor's aetherine spire—I have an idea. Let me call my people.
<font color="#909090">(You pick up your radio and signal Sky Fortress.)</font>

1128175411013261-Kritias_Epic01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Your radio crackles).</font>
This is Sky Fortress. What is your status?

1128175411013262-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The Daemon, err, Dark Army is holding $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ inside the fusion reactor in $map:02020031$, but the place is locked down. Destroying the aetherine spire on top of the building will force open the blast doors so we can get in. But we need to be sure that's all we hit, or else... boom.

1128175411013263-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Landing a direct hit on the facility's spire without damaging the building's structure... It's feasible, but it's going to be a challenge. We'll need to fine-tune the particle accelerator and triple-check the math.

1128175411013264-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But first, we'll need to get there. We're about 27 minutes out from $map:02020031$.

1128175411013265-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We've lost too much time as it is. Who knows what they're doing to $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ as we speak? What if they've already found a way to harness her power? There's no time to lose.

1128175411013266-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Cat Sith calculates that firing from this distance would result in a 34.7% chance of missing the target. Do you really want to risk destroying the reactor and everything in and around it?

1128175411013267-Kritias_Epic01-.name: It's worth the risk, Captain. Besides, if anyone can pull off the shot, it's our crew. We can do this.

1128175411013270-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Very well. Nairin, deploy the Big Gun and fire up the Magitron reactor! We'll take the shot as soon as everything is ready. The rest is up to you, $MyPCName$. Veliche out.

1128175411013271-Kritias_Epic01-.name: That's a bold plan you've got, but I believe it could work. Good luck, $MyPCName$. Find $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ and bring her back safely.

1120154411013061-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please bring $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ back safely.

1120154411013062-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Are you CRAZY?! You could've blown this place sky high!

1120154411013063-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If you had hit even ten meters lower we'd all be dead!

1129162011013274-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But we didn't. Because our team is the best there is.

1129162011013275-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hmph. Maybe. But your rescue mission isn't over yet.

1129162011013276-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Your friends in there are going to notice that all the doors have popped open. They're probably organizing you a welcome party as we speak.

1129162011013277-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I can handle the Daemon Army.

1120154411013064-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Well, I can't question the resolve of somebody who's willing to risk killing everybody to get what they want. Good lucky rescuing your lady friend.

1212160511013335-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$! Are you all right? I got here as soon as I could, but it looks like you've got it under control.

1120154411013066-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You came here for me...? Thanks.

1129162011013278-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I think I'm the one who should be thanking you. It was you who destroyed the missile they fired at Sky Fortress, wasn't it?

1129162011013279-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Yes, but I wouldn't read anything into it. I destroyed it on instinct. I had no idea who your people were until I regained my memory.

1129162011013280-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Maybe on a subconscious level you helped us because Maple World is your home.

1129162011013281-Kritias_Epic01-.name: No... My father was the one who loved your world and its people.

1129162011013282-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Why did you seal Kritias away?

1129162011013283-Kritias_Epic01-.name: That was a long time ago. Long before you were even born. You've heard of the artificial lifeform that rules Tairen, haven't you? $npcName:11004432$.

1129162011013284-Kritias_Epic01-.name: After $npcName:11004432$ took over the Tairen Kingdom, she transported the entire Kritias continent to Maple World. Her goal is to do to your world what she did to Tairen.

1129162011013285-Kritias_Epic01-.name: How could anyone consider a place where they exile everybody who doesn't fit the mold a "utopia?"

1129162011013286-Kritias_Epic01-.name: That's not how $npcName:11004432$ saw it. To her, she was just eliminating defects from a system. Optimizing it. It's the way she was programmed. According to her metrics, these people weren't contributing as much to Tairen as they took from it. It was a heartless diagnosis, and it disgusted my father. That's why he left for Maple World.

1129162011013287-Kritias_Epic01-.name: So when Kritias arrived in Maple World, you sealed it away to protect us? Even knowing that you would be trapped alongside it?

1129162011013288-Kritias_Epic01-.name: ...Now that the seal is broken, $npcName:11004432$ will try to take over your world. Don't let her. Defend the land that my father loved.

1129162011013289-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You're not going to help us? With your power—

1129162011013290-Kritias_Epic01-.name: No, there's something I need to take care of before anything else. As for my power, I've yet to unlock it's true potential. Something is preventing me from harnessing the full power of the lapenta I absorbed.

1129162011013292-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm going to fight in my own way.

1120154411013068-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Tell Marlene I'm grateful for everything.

1205113111013319-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The fate of your world is in your hands.

1129170511013293-Kritias_Epic01-.name: The Dark Army—or Daemon Army as you call them—will never give up on capturing $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$. Using the power of the Blue Lapenta within her, they could conquer Maple World.

1129170511013294-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We'll never allow that to happen. Not while this ship still flies, and the Alliance stands.

1129170511013295-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If what $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ said is true—that Tairen intends on invading your world—then we share a common enemy. Why not pool our resources against them?

1129170511013296-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm afraid that for us, securing $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ and keeping her out of the hands of the forces of darkness is a much greater priority. I shudder to think what they could achieve with the power of the Blue Lapenta.

1129170511013297-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We can't take $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$'s warning about a Tairen invasion lightly. She is $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$'s daughter and the person who sealed Kritias away to protect our world.

1129170511013298-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Our land is alien to you. If you intend to battle the Daemon Army on our soil, you would be wise to accept our aid.

1129170511013299-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Captain, why not put your trust in the woman who sacrificed her own future and the future of her father's homeland to protect our world?

1129170511013300-Kritias_Epic01-.name: $MyPCName$, you've spent more time on the ground than anyone else on the crew. What are your thoughts?

1129170511013301-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I believe in $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$. She can take care of herself. At least for now, I think Tairen is the threat we should be worrying about. Their technology is advanced and we know almost nothing about them. As for $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$ and her offer, I've found her to be an honorable and well-meaning leader... even if she's a bit rash and short-tempered.

1129170511013303-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Another well-reasoned, albeit unnecessarily personal argument.

1129170511013304-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Well then. $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$, leader of Humanitas—in the interest of future cooperation and the good of our peoples, I extend the hand of friendship on behalf of the Maple Alliance.

1129170511013305-Kritias_Epic01-.name: While our Empress $npcName:11004390[gender:1]$ is the final authority in these matters, I have discretion in such trying times as these to formalize this partnership.

1129170511013306-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Yes! Together we'll fight against Tairen and the Daemon Army to protect both Maple World and Kritias from harm!

1129170511013307-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Yes... Together. What do you say, $MyPCName$?

1129170511013308-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Our two worlds share a common heritage, and we're much stronger together. You can count me in!

0316110312002293--.name: Just go into the $map:52000116$ behind me to sign up as a caravan guard. It's a great way to do some good, maybe get your name out there.

0316110312002294--.name: To tell you the truth, this is my first mission as a member of the guard. I'm lucky I got to see a pretty town like this on my first trip out of the capital.

0316110312002295--.name: Let me just add your name to the list... and there we go. You're all signed up for the caravan escort.

0419160212002462--.name: We're just waiting for one last guard.

0313165412002204--.name: This last guard is apparently still a cadet. What was his name again? $npcName:11003164[gender:0]$, I believe.

0313165412002206--.name: Indeed. Even though he's inexperienced, he comes highly recommended by $npc:11003165[gender:0]$. He must be a great talent, indeed.

0313165412002207--.name: When will I get to meet him?

0313165412002208--.name: Oh, it shouldn't be long now.

0313165412002209--.name: From what I hear, $npc:11003165[gender:0]$ promised to make him an official member of the guard if $npcName:11003164[gender:0]$ successfully completes this mission.

0313165412002210--.name: Ahem! Sorry for being late. $npc:11003164[gender:0]$, reporting for duty!

0419160212002463--.name: It looks like you and me are going to be guarding this caravan. A real pleasure!

0313165412002211--.name: All we gotta do is guard the caravan through the $map:63000041$. Simple, right?

0313165412002212--.name: Do you know the way to the $map:63000041$?

0313165412002213--.name: Sure! Just head to the northwest side of $map:02000062$. You can't miss it.

0313165412002214--.name: Out of everyone in my class, I'm the only cadet left. That sure doesn't seem fair to me...

0313165412002215--.name: Finally awake, are we? Your injuries weren't too severe, but you were out for a long time.

0315125612002216--.name: When you're done sleeping in, I need you to come with me to the $map:52000033$. The empress is waiting for you.

0315125612002219--.name: You will mind your manners in front of Her Imperial Majesty.

0315125612002220--.name: The security of the empire depends on the success of your investigation.

0315125612002221--.name: Then I'd better do a good job.

0315125612002223--.name: Begin by speaking with $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ at the $map:52000117$. Hardly a thing happens in the kingdom without his knowing of it. At least, when it comes to caravan routes and trade schedules.

0419160212002464--.name: A friend will be waiting for you at the $map:52000117$. I'm sure you'll find his help indispensable.

0315125612002225--.name: Did you get lost? I understand. The city can be overwhelming for a newcomer. To get to the $map:52000117$, head southwest from the palace.

0315125612002226--.name: I think $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is off getting lunch. It must be nice to have a personal janitor come and clean for you...

0315125612002228--.name: Yeah. A masked fella dressed in all black. Had blades on his hands and everything.

0315125612002229--.name: That $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ is obviously up to no good!

0315125612002231--.name: If he isn't here, and he isn't at his office, then that means $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is missing...

0519172912002491--.name:
Gosh, that's a great idea! Maybe we'll find $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ if we follow him. But, uh... Where'd he go?
<font color="#909090">(Start by searching north of $map:02000001$.)</font>

0315125612002232--.name: This isn't adding up. Sure, the masked guy looked shady, but he was just so nice!

0612140812002501--.name: Did you see a $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ pass through here?

0519172912002492--.name: Of course I saw him! You don't meet a creepy $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ every day, you know.

0612140812002502--.name: I didn't let that guy out of my sight. He headed towards the $map:02000083$.

0612140812002504--.name: The $map:02000083$ is just that way. You know, that way.

0612140812002505--.name: Did you see a creep in a mask go by here?

0612140812002506--.name: I didn't see a $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$. I saw a whole bunch! They're swarming all over the $map:02000121$!

0519172912002493--.name: There's more than one masked man?

0315125612002234--.name: Yes, and they're all jerks! I'm just trying to make a living here, and them tearing up the $map:02000121$ every week isn't making my life any easier. You've got to help me!

0315125612002235--.name: You look like you know how to fight! Please, you've got to make them go away. For good, if you can!

0315125612002236--.name: While you were in the shop, a bunch of masked hoodlums took your friend!

0419160212002465--.name: I don't have any—Wait, you mean $npcName:11003344[gender:0]$?

0315125612002237--.name: While you were off fighting masked figures, your guard friend was asking the masked figures about you.

0419160212002468--.name: They were headed for $map:52000119$. I'm sure of it!

0315125612002238--.name: They didn't feel like answering questions, so they dragged him off to their lair. We may never see him again...

0315125612002239--.name: N-not so fast, friend! It was all a big joke. I-in fact, the real reason I brought your friend here was... was to help your investigation!

0519172912002494--.name: How do you know about that?

0519172912002495--.name: Nothing happens in the $map:02000083$ without me knowing about it. Nothing. So, let's all keep our cool.

0419160312002463--.name: Now, I don't know where he is, but I know how we can find him. All you gotta do is trust me.

0419160312002464--.name: I'd rather just hand you over to the guard.

0315125612002243--.name: Let's not be so hasty! With my network, we'll track down your mystery man in no time. But if you turn me in, you get nothing.

0315125612002244--.name: Okay. We'll try it your way.

0315125612002245--.name: H-hey now... I don't know what you're planning, but can't we talk this through, all civilized-like? I'll get you this mystery man on a silver platter. Promise.

0315125612002247--.name: Phew. You had me going there for a minute. Now, you head on down to the $map:2000084$. My man $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$ will do good by you.

0315125612002248--.name: <font size='20'>Little twerp. Next time, I'll...</font> H-hey, you're still here? Haha! I was just gonna say, next time I'll... welcome you with a friendly handshake!

0419160312002466--.name: $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ sent ya? Get outta here! I don't got time for the likes of you!

0315125612002250--.name:
I'll, um, I'll give you some space.
<font color="#909090">(You should ask around and see what $npc:11000396[gender:0]$'s deal is.)</font>

0413165212002457--.name: Sure. He used to do odd jobs for me. But ever since he crossed $npcName:11003241[gender:0]$, he hasn't been much good for anything.

0413165212002458--.name: Poor guy's been starving in the streets ever since...

0519172912002496--.name: I think $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ and I need to have a little chat.

0315125612002252--.name: Wait up! I know how we can help $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$.

0315125612002253--.name: Tell me about it, O Great Raccoon.

0315125612002254--.name: It's really simple. It just requires some muscle...

0315125612002255--.name: All you have to do is pick up $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$'s old job.

0315125612002257--.name: Sure it will! Let's get started. Head up from here and you'll find some tires. Bring me some.

0315125612002258--.name: You aren't quitting already, are you?

0315125612002259--.name: You're pretty quick. Have you ever thought about moving tires for a living?

0315125612002260--.name: Now, for your second task! There are $itemPlural:30000120$ all over the place. Gather them up. <font size='20'>And one more thing. Come closer, please...</font>

0315125612002262--.name: <font size='20'>Drive $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$'s men away from here. Those guys are giving $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$ a hard time.</font>

0315125612002263--.name: Keep that second request between us, will you?

0315125612002264--.name: You're pretty good! While you were taking care of business, I put in a few good words on your behalf with $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$.

0315125612002265--.name: I got a feeling $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$ will be happy to talk to you now.

0315125612002266--.name: Do you happen to have any brothers or sisters? I could use a few more workers like you.

0315125612002267--.name: $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$ says you did a lot to help me...

0519172912002497--.name: I'm real sorry about before. I thought you were another one of his thugs.

0315125612002268--.name: How can I make it up to you?

0315125612002269--.name: I'm looking for a masked figure.

0315125612002270--.name:
Sorry. Only masks I've seen are the thugs around here.
<font color="#909090">(It seems that $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ has been wasting your time...)</font>

0315125612002271--.name: I guess there's no way I can repay you. So I'll do the only thing I can—I'll live my life to the fullest!

0315125612002272--.name: M-mercy! Show mercy, or you'll never find $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$!

0315125612002274--.name: Yes! Yes, so you can't hurt me. Understand?

0315125612002275--.name: My men spotted $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000043$. Said he was headed towards $map:52000037$.

0315125612002276--.name: That sounds bad. I better hurry!

0315125612002277--.name: That's right! Get a move on!

0315125612002278--.name: I thought you were in a hurry. Why are you still here?

0315125612002279--.name: <font color="#909090">(You were too late. He hasn't been here long...)</font>

0315125612002280--.name: <font color="#909090">(Whoever did this should still be in the cave. Search the area for clues.)</font>

0315125612002281--.name: <font color="#909090">(Whoever did this should still be in the cave. Search the area for clues.)</font>

0315125612002282--.name: Whaddaya mean, you were too late?!

0315125612002283--.name:
<font color="#909090">(You show him the notebook.)</font>
Even if I knew what that was, why do I gotta answer to you?

0315125612002284--.name: In that case, I'm sure the guard will love to hear about you.

0315125612002286--.name: Sorry, $male:buddy,female:lady$. You ain't leaving here alive!

0315125612002288--.name: Take your best shot! Whatever you do to me, you'll get ten times over!

0315125612002290--.name: It'll be different this time. We'll crush you flat! Flat as a pancake! Or I'll step down as boss!

0315125612002291--.name: If we don't beat you this time, I'll quit my job as the boss!

0315125612002292--.name: Fine. I give up. You're the boss now.

0421171812002468--.name: Yeah, yeah. I'm getting to that.

0330111912002296--.name: See this symbol on the cover? That's the crest of the Barrota Trading Company. We don't do business with them. If you wanna learn more, you better head over to $map:02000139$.

0330111912002298--.name: I can tell that you're eager to do business.

0421171812002470--.name: That's not just any company crest. That's the president's personal crest!

0330111912002299--.name: Why don't you speak to President $npcName:11000526$ yourself? He's in the $map:2000226$. Just take the elevator in the $map:2000225$ behind me.

0330111912002300--.name: The elevator in the $map:2000225$ will take you right to the $map:2000226$.

0421171812002471--.name: I suppose that explains why no one's seen him in a while.

0330111912002302--.name: Did you manage to find any clues, at least?

0330111912002304--.name: What on earth was $npcName:11001262[gender:0]$'s business card doing there...? He operates the $map:52000020$, just south of here.

0330111912002305--.name: I have no idea what could have happened to the chief...

0330111912002306--.name: That was a close call. Thanks for the help...

0330111912002307--.name: Not! Thanks to you, those thugs are going to hit me twice as hard next time.

0330111912002308--.name: What was your business card doing in the president's office?

0330111912002309--.name: What's it to you? I'm not going to start flapping my gums just because some rowdy roustabout thinks $male:he's,female:she's$ a detective.

0330111912002310--.name: That was just the first wave, friend-o. Blackstar will be back, and when they are, it's curtains for me!

0330111912002311--.name: Stay behind me. I'll take care of the mob.

0330111912002312--.name: Hmm... All right. You keep me breathing, and I'll tell you what you want to know. Deal?

0330111912002314--.name: You held up your end of the bargain, all right. After the cost of cleaning up the mess you made here, your reward is... one piece of grade A intel!

0330111912002315--.name: How is the masked figure connected to Barrota?

0330111912002316--.name: Ooh, tough luck, Scout. The answer to that question is grade S, easy. It's a shame, but I just can't give that kind of intel away for free.

0330111912002318--.name: Look, it just isn't possible. Information doesn't grow on trees. If you want the real primo intel, you've got to cough up the mesos!

0411150212002452--.name: I can point you in the right direction. That's worth something, right?

0330111912002319--.name: Go to the $map:02000153$ in $map:02000100$. There's information brokers, and then there's those guys. Maybe you can convince them to cough up some secrets.

0330111912002320--.name: Consider this a little taste. Next time you're here, don't forget to bring your wallet.

0330111912002321--.name: Look, uh, the boss is out right now. Is this important?

0330111912002323--.name: I really shouldn't tell you this, but if it's that important... Go to Eve's house. The boss spends most of his time there these days.

0330111912002324--.name: Eve's place is the second house on $map:02000147$. Just head southwest from here.

0330111912002325--.name: Those two better not be fighting again...

0330111912002326--.name: You there! You make it a habit of barging into people's homes?

0330111912002327--.name: (Tell him about Nelph and the caravan attack.)

0330111912002328--.name: I'm impressed. Even my spies only knew some of that. Interesting...

0411150212002453--.name: All right. Let's discuss this back at headquarters.

0330111912002329--.name: Come with me to $map:52000073$. We can go over the details there.

0330111912002330--.name: Who told you I was here? Does one of my men have a loose tongue?

0330111912002331--.name: Allow me to properly introduce myself. I am $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, captain of Dark Wind. What brings you to my city?

0330111912002332--.name: I thought $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$ was the captain of Dark Wind.

0411150212002454--.name: The leader of Dark Wind was $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$, as you say. But... he is no longer with us.

0330111912002334--.name: $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$ was murdered by his right-hand man, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. It came as a shock to all of us.

0330111912002335--.name: We can't let $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ get away. He's a disgrace to the Dark Wind name... and a danger to $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$'s daughter, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$.

0330111912002336--.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ must pay for his crimes. No matter what!

0330111912002337--.name: I completely believe your plausible and well-told story.

0330111912002338--.name: Now that I think of it... $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ may well be this $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ you're after.

0330111912002339--.name: It seems our goals have aligned. Let us work together.

0330111912002340--.name: It seems you have a guest. Go ahead and speak with him. I will wait.

0330111912002341--.name: $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and the $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ have both shown that they are remorseless killers. It only makes sense that they would be one and the same.

0330111912002343--.name: You've gotta come back to $map:52000037$ with me!

0330111912002344--.name: I can't go back there alone. $map:52000037$ is... It's just not a nice place, okay?

0330111912002346--.name: Evil monsters attacked our home on $map:02000290$! If we don't do something, they'll ravage the kingdom and destroy the princess!

0330111912002347--.name:
If you're as strong as that $male:other $guy... Please, you're our only hope!
<font color="#909090">(That $male:other $guy? Who could he mean?)</font>

0330111912002348--.name: Thank goodness we met you! The princess and the whole kingdom are safe. You are just like that guy!

0330111912002349--.name: Yeah, that guy is my personal hero. Who are we talking about?

0330111912002350--.name: The blond-haired human! He helped me when I got in trouble on the $map:02000017$.

0330111912002351--.name: I asked him who he was, but he wouldn't say. I guess he has to clear his name first. That's why he was going back to... back to wherever his name wasn't cleared!

0426092012002477--.name: <font color="#909090">(Surely he isn't foolish enough to return to $map:02000100$... is he?)</font>

0330111912002352--.name: What are you two talking about? Blond guy?

0330111912002354--.name: Yikes, that sounds serious! You go back to $map:02000153$. I'll stay here and... and look for the missing body...

0330111912002355--.name: P-please, go before I lose my nerve!

0330111912002356--.name: I gotta be honest with you, $MyPCName$. Your timing isn't super great. The boss is out. Again.

0330111912002357--.name: He didn't tell us where he was headed, but smart money says he's back at $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house.

0330111912002358--.name: I don't get it. What's so great about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house?

0330111912002359--.name: $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ hasn't been by today. Sorry to disappoint you.

0330111912002360--.name: I wouldn't put my faith in $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ if I were you. The $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ I know would never hurt my father.

0330111912002361--.name: This has to be a misunderstanding. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ would never send lackeys to do his dirty work.

0330111912002362--.name: I knew this would happen! $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s set his sights on $npcName:21900089[gender:1]$!

0330111912002363--.name: Until we put that traitor in the ground, none of us are safe! For now, let's head back to $map:52000073$.

0330111912002364--.name: I... lost my temper. Let's return to $map:52000073$ so we can sort this out.

0330111912002365--.name: So, what did you learn in $map:52000037$?

0330111912002367--.name: It all adds up. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ murdered $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$, and now he's returned to finish the job. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ isn't safe.

0426092012002478--.name: $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is like a sister to me. If anything happened to her...

0330111912002368--.name: Sorry to butt in, but I just got a report about a $npc:11000064[gender:0]$ sighting in $map:02000167$. Seems a lady by the name of $npc:11001116[gender:1]$ spotted him. You should see what she has to say.

0330111912002369--.name: Did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ really kill $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$? That question's way above my pay grade, but something doesn't add up...

0330111912002370--.name: Hmmm... You don't look like a Dark Wind agent...

0426092012002479--.name: Well, I guess it doesn't matter to me what uniform you guys decide to wear. You're here about my report?

0330111912002371--.name: The Masked Man went into the $map:2000328$. It wasn't always like this, you know. I bet he's the one who messed up the garden's biz!

0330111912002372--.name: It used to be such a pretty garden. Curse that masked villain!

0330111912002373--.name: That wasn't your man, was it? Who would've thought a creeper in a mask would turn out to be one of the good guys... But will the garden be okay?

0330111912002374--.name: The garden will be just fine.

0330111912002375--.name: Really? That's great to hear! Thanks a lot, $male:Mister,female:Miss$ Dark Wind person.

0330111912002376--.name: I feel really bad I made you come all the way out here for nothing. Well, bye!

0519172912002500--.name: I guess I'll head back to $map:52000055$.

0414084812002459--.name: Wait! Before you go, I heard a weird rumor. There was someone creeping around the $map:02000148$ like a real creeper!

0414084812002461--.name: $npcName:11000543[gender:0]$ told me. You should go check it out!

0330111912002377--.name: I wonder what he looks like under the mask... What if he's a famous pop star in disguise? What if he's really $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$?!

0330111912002378--.name: Hmph. You aren't dressed for hard labor. So what are you doing here?

0330111912002379--.name: I didn't actually see the guy you're looking for. I heard about it from $npcName:11000533[gender:0]$. Go hassle him instead, why don't you?

0330111912002381--.name: Yeah, I saw the blond guy everyone's looking for.

0426111012002481--.name: That depends. What's it worth to you?

0330111912002382--.name: Now, don't get the wrong idea. It's not that I mind working hard for a living. But these conditions... There are some things I just can't do on my own.

0330111912002383--.name: And you want me to do something about it.

0330111912002384--.name: Get rid of all the wild monsters roaming around here. And while you're at it, knock the rust off the old oil pipes.

0330111912002385--.name: You do this for me, and I'll tell you where to find the guy you're after.

0330111912002386--.name: This's gotta be the worst job I ever took. I should've known, with a name like $map:02000148$...

0330111912002387--.name: You take care of those problems for me?

0421171812002472--.name: Sure did. It can't be easy, working out here.

0421171812002473--.name: Don't I know it! The suits'll never understand what they put us through. But thanks to you, it's a little more bearable now.

0330111912002388--.name: I saw the blond guy head for $map:02000139$. If you're lucky, he could still be there.

0426133412002482--.name: Even if he isn't, I bet somebody else saw him. He kind of stands out.

0330111912002391--.name: Did a blond guy come through here?

0330111912002392--.name: Oh, yeah. Yeah. I saw a guy, all right. Did you say blond? Yeah, a blond guy.

0330111912002393--.name: He's in the $map:2000193$ up above us. You better hurry! Or he'll get away!

0330111912002394--.name: Quick now! You don't want that blond guy to get away, do you?

0330111912002396--.name: Those guys ought to leave me alone, now that they know a $male:guy,female:gal$ like you is prowling around.

0330111912002397--.name: I don't suppose you saw any other blond guys here...?

0330111912002398--.name: You mean, you were here looking for someone else? Why'd you think there'd be someone like that in this old warehouse?

0330111912002399--.name: So my brother sent you, after all...

0330111912002400--.name: I figured it was a long shot, but you did it. You saved my brother.

0330111912002401--.name: I thought my brother was done for. Thanks a lot!

0427125712002484--.name: I had no choice! I'm no match for those thugs. But you looked strong enough, and I was right!

0427125712002485--.name: And now I've lost the trail. Great.

0427125712002486--.name: Maybe not. I really did see a blond guy, just like you said. Real tall, kinda handsome.

0427125712002487--.name: Talk to $npcName:11000867[gender:0]$ in the center of $map:02000138$. If anyone saw where your blond buddy went, he did.

0330111912002402--.name: I'll find a way to pay you back for this. Thanks again!

0330111912002403--.name: Hmm. Something tells me you aren't here to buy fruit.

0330111912002404--.name: Did a blond man pass through here?

0330111912002405--.name: Yes, I saw someone like that. He left one heck of an impression, too.

0421171812002474--.name: Can't say I remember where he went, though...

0330111912002406--.name: I really wish I could help you, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, but I just can't seem to remember anything with all these hoodlums roaming about...

0330111912002407--.name: I'll take care of the hoodlums if it'll jog your memory.

0330111912002408--.name: Well, now that you mention it, that just might do the trick. You take care of my little problem, and I'm sure the memories will pop right back up.

0330111912002409--.name: How's a man supposed to concentrated with all this racket?

0330111912002410--.name: Dang this rickety memory of mine... Heh heh...

0510172212002488--.name: I took care of your problem.

0510172212002489--.name: What a coincidence! My memory is just now returning to me. Now, about this blond fella you're after...

0330111912002411--.name: I saw him duck into $map:52000126$. Seems to me he's going through rough times. The man looked half-starved...

0330111912002412--.name: You sure I can't interest you in some fresh fruit for the road? Guaranteed 70% bug-free!

0330111912002413--.name: I don't know a danged thing!

0330111912002415--.name: Relax. I'm looking for a blond man. Tall, handsome...

0330111912002416--.name: I have no idea who you're talking about. Now leave me be!

0330111912002417--.name: Why won't you leave me alone...?

0330111912002418--.name: Have you always lived out on the streets?

0330111912002419--.name: N-none of your business! Get outta here. Leave me alone!

0330111912002420--.name: $npcName:11003206[gender:0]$ and I found the blond guy you're after. I figured that was the best way to pay you back for saving my brother.

0330111912002421--.name: He's staying in an $map:52000046$. It's not far from here. You better hurry before he gives you the slip again!

0330111912002423--.name: So, you think I killed the captain...

0330111912002424--.name: I can't turn myself in to Dark Wind until I can clear my name. I didn't kill Winn Stilton.

0330111912002425--.name: Maybe not, but you still have to come with me.

0330111912002427--.name: Sorry, but I'm not going anywhere with you.

0330111912002428--.name: That was too close, $MyPCName$. If it weren't for $npcName:11003210[gender:0]$, I never would have found you.

0330111912002430--.name: You were the only one there when I found you. I guess $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$ is long gone...

0330111912002431--.name: I guess we'd better let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ know what happened...

0330111912002432--.name: When I thought we lost you, I... I never felt like that before, $MyPCName$. You've got to be more careful. I don't know what I'd do if I couldn't see you again!

0330111912002433--.name: You're my hero! And the truth is, I l...look up to you!

0330111912002434--.name: So, $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$ got away. It can't be helped, I suppose...

0330111912002435--.name: This isn't over yet. Let's head downstairs and figure out our next steps.

0330111912002436--.name: I should've sent more men out to join in the search. Every second we waste is another second that $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s life is in danger...

0330111912002438--.name: First we have to... Hold on. What's all this racket?

0330111912002440--.name: Without you, $map:02000100$ may well have fallen today. Thank you.

0330111912002442--.name: Spare me the humility. You did good work out there. Unfortunately, I'm going to be too busy cleaning up $map:02000100$ to help track down $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$ for a while...

0330111912002443--.name: You and your friend should return to $map:02000001$. Let them know what happened here... and what happened to Winn Stilton.

0421171812002475--.name: I'm sorry that I can't do more to help.

0330111912002444--.name: It'll be good to sleep in my own bunk again. Ready to go back to $map:02000001$?

0330111912002447--.name: I don't know if I'm cut out for field work! I thought being a guard had more standing around and... you know... guarding...

0330111912002448--.name: First Winn Stilton, and then $map:02000100$... Shock after shock.

0421171812002476--.name: This is a dire matter, indeed. The empress should hear it from your lips.

0330111912002449--.name: I understand that you have quite the tale for me.

0330111912002451--.name: We just got word from $map:02000076$. They're being attacked by dark creatures. This is $map:02000100$ all over again!
